name: Condo in Calgary · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Chic, cozy, and steps from the buzz of 17th Ave—this downtown gem is your perfect Calgary escape. Just a 15-min stroll to Stampede Park, it features a king bed, comfy sofa bed, and a fully equipped kitchen with a Keurig, air fryer, and more. Thoughtfully designed for comfort and charm—whether you're here to explore or just relax, you’ll feel right at home. Our living room Google TV comes with free Prime, Disney, live TV & more. Feel free to log into your own apps too!The spaceStep into a stylish downtown retreat designed with comfort in mind. The bedroom features a plush king-size bed with quality linens, while the living area offers a comfy sofa bed for extra guests. The open-concept kitchen is fully equipped—perfect for coffee, quick meals, or a cozy night in. You'll find a spacious bathroom with a deep soaking tub and powerful shower, ideal for unwinding. Every space is thoughtfully decorated to feel modern, warm, and inviting.Our living room Google TV comes with free Prime, Disney, live TV & more. Feel free to log into your own apps too! Our Wi-Fi is strong with a 1GB download speed to handle any tasks you throw at it.Guest accessGuests get to enjoy the entire space all to themselves—relax, unwind, and make it feel like home.Other things to noteAs much as we love furry friends, we’ve chosen to keep the condo pet-free to ensure a comfy stay for all our guests. Thanks for understanding!Registration DetailsBL292580
reviews:
Marc and Elizabeth were very helpful, very responsive and went out of their way to accomodate for a late arrival due to a flight delay.
The place was great, clean as described and good value, in a quiet area minutes away from core downtown and exactly what was needed.
Strongly recommend !
Thanks again

Super central and walkable recently renovated Condo unit that is very nicely updated and extremely clean. Retro vibe building with a modern, clean and fully equipped unit. Hosts we're flexible for check-in and check-out in a friendly manner. Overall great stay!

This is very comfortable and well equipped accommodation, close to 17th Ave amenities and restaurants.
I would highly recommend it,

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.85 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.This delightful two-bedroom condo is located in the best location, offering large windows, with sun filled early afternoons, city skyline and beautiful mountain views.You’ll enjoy being within close proximity to; restaurants, shops, gyms, cafes, downtown core, convention centres, Saddeldome, 17th Avenue, mission, grocery stores and more.The spaceWalking into the suite you'll find an open living space with large windows. The condo has two bedrooms, a bathroom, living room, a kitchen, and laundry space. The kitchen has a dining table with seating for four, as well as all the essentials; (coffee, pots, pans, oil, salt/pepper). The kitchen and dining space flow nicely into the living area. This open floor plan makes it easy to cook, eat, relax, entertain and feel connected to the people you're traveling with. In the living room, you're able to log into your own accounts using the smart TV and will find cuddling up on the couch quite comfortable. The couch can be used as an additional sleeping space, and it folds out into a sofa bed, should you wish to travel in a larger group. In the bathroom, you'll find towels, shampoo/conditioner, soap, a hair dryer, and a combo bath/shower. The primary bedroom offers a queen-sized bed, lamp, shelf, and closet. It also boasts large windows which brighten up the space.  The sliding fogged doors can be closed or completely opened up to allow you to watch TV from bed.  The second bedroom offers a double bed for comfortable sleep.The space is great for those traveling or anyone living in Calgary and looking for a date night. Instead of rushing home and having to come back downtown, pack a bag and get ready in the suite. You'll be able to walk to popular favorites such as 10 Foot Henry (1 min walk), The Allium (2 min walk), Native Tongues Taqueria (3 min walk), Two Penny (1 min walk) or the Saddledome (13 min walk).  The best part?! You'll be able to skip the pricey cab ride and sleep in the next morning! Leaving you feeling refreshed. Use that extra time (and energy) to hit a fitness class (Hot Shop Yoga is just across the street!) or head to brunch to catch up with a friend.Guest accessGuests have access to the whole suite, designated parking stall and the shared building amenities, including a shared rooftop patio.Other things to noteIn-person check-in is required.Registration DetailsBL287248
reviews: Had a great stay in this apartment clean and tidy just looks like the pictures got everything you need ie kitchen/living space etc..host is very responsive and very helpful with any questions you may have..check in is very easy as well..the apartment has restaurants/bars/coffee shops just mins away which is great plus downtown/calgary tower is about 10 mins away.

Beth's place was walkable from Calgary Tower and other historical locations.
We used the kitchen most of the time and it was stocked with rice cooker, pans, mugs, paper towel, dish soaps & etc.
We were able to use the wash & dry before our flight back home.
It was a good location & very convenient.
Will definitely book again.

Nice place, not far from downtown and also from other restaurant/social areas on 17th. Well equipped and comfortable - was just right for our needs.
If you are light sensitive, bring an eye mask as one of the bedrooms looks out over the city - quite light in the mornings. Other bedroom at the back.
Very good communication and responsiveness - thanks Beth!
Ian

We had a great stay at this apartment. The location is perfect - right in the heart of downtown, close to everything. The apartment itself is modern, clean and very comfortable, exactly as described. Communication with the host was easy and clear, and check-in and check-out went smoothly. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting the city!

The location of our accommodation was convenient. Lots of cafes and restaurants around. Beth was really easy to talk to. She replies right away. The apartment had everything we need. Would definitely book here again if we need a place to stay in Calgary!

The apartment was just like the photos, clean, comfortable, and right in the heart of the city, close to everything. Beth was always very friendly and responsive, and Ali, who helped us when we arrived, was also extremely helpful. It was a wonderful stay — we’ll definitely be back!

We really enjoyed our stay here! The Airbnb is in a central location, very walkable area and lots of amazing restaurants. Easy parking, and host was very responsible and accommodating. Would absolutely recommend staying here!
We had a wonderful stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was very responsive and made check-in easy. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Airbnb was a great location in town, super walkable for everything. You need a fob for everything which was a little tricky with 5 people traveling together and the shower drain was backed up but other than that the space was clean and everything else was easy enough.

One of the best service i ever had. She was clear with her instructions which made it pretty easy for us to find the place anf navigate throught everything .I will definitely recommend my friends .The view from the apartment was breath taking and worth every penny i spent

Had a great quick getaway with friends! The BnB was clean, cozy, and had a nice view. We loved how it was in a walkable area—lots of spots to eat nearby and an easy walk downtown for anything we needed. Would definitely stay again!
We had a great stay at this spot! Beth was so responsive and helpful!! Would for sure recommend!
In downtown, so near everywhere we need to go. Great local places near me and the apartment had a lot of kitchen appliances so you can easily cook, if you choose.
Awesome view of Calgary! Great neighborhood with restaurants, quick places to eat, and green spaces. Close enough to explore downtown Calgary.

We had a great stay at this condo! It was within walking distance to all our amenities and to the conference we were attending. The building and unit all felt clean, safe and secure. Incredible views! the AC wasn't working but we were able to keep cool with the multiple fans provided. Host was easy to work with. Would stay here again!

A great stay in downtown Calgary , great apartment well stocked and looked after . Beth was a great host very responsive always helpful , 2 parking spaces .
Close to bars and restaurants, loved the 1st market over the road , bars and restaurants, Calgary tower , bankers hall , supermarkets all in walking distance even in the cold , thanks to Beth and team for a great stay, definitely use you again , John

We had an absolutely fantastic stay! It was the perfect downtown spot, surrounded by incredible restaurants, we were spoiled for choice. The apartment was spotless, and they'd thought of everything. We didn't have to hunt for anything because everything was labeled and organized perfectly. Plus, the flexible check-in was a huge bonus. Honestly, we couldn't have asked for more. Highly recommend this place!
The location and the apartment was better than expected. It was conveniently located and close to a lot of shops & restaurants. I had a wonderful stay.
Such a great location! Apartment was clean and very responsive host. Only negative is that the “second bedroom” doesn’t have a window so feels more like a closet. Will stay again.

Fantastic location with lots of restaurants within 5min of walk. The neighborhood is quiet, very walkable and feels safe. The unit is super clean and looks just like the pictures. Definitely recommend this place when visiting downtown Calgary.
The place was clean and the host was responsive! There were a few minor damages from a previous guest, but the host told us with lots of notice! Would definitely stay there again.

This apartment was perfect for a business trip to Calgary, with everything close!
Very helpful hosts, and lots of great restaurants around.
Would totally recommend staying here.

Would definitely stay here again. So much to do right next to the home and even more just a slight walk away. The apartment was super cozy to come back to and the view was very nice as well:)) 100% recommend
My stay was brilliant! The place was clean, the host was communicative throughout, and the kitchen had everything I could possibly need for my stay. I would definitely recommend Beth and her team!

listing_name: Entire rental unit in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The condo is located in the Beltline district, which is one of the most accessible districts in Calgary. Some of the best bars and restaurants are literally across the street (One of the best cocktail bars in town is in the building!). Close to the saddledome, minutes to downtown and the Red Mile (17th Ave), and a stone's throw from the river walks, parks, library, museums, and shopping.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Most hot spots are an easy couple of minutes of walking away. 7th Ave free transit zone is about 6 blocks away (10 minutes walking).

Steps from vibrant 17th Ave, you'll have easy access to top restaurants, cafés, bars, and shopping, all while being minutes from downtown, the Saddledome, and Stampede Park.Relax in the open-concept living area with Netflix, cook in the fully equipped kitchen, and enjoy high-speed WiFi, in-suite laundry, and secure parking. Whether you’re here for business or leisure, this space is designed for comfort and convenience.📢 Guest Verification Notice: To ensure a safe and secure stay, we’ve partnered with Know Your Guest, the leading vacation rental guest-screening provider. Before check-in, you’ll need to verify your details and identity through their secure process.Book now for a stylish and seamless Beltline experience!Registration DetailsBL289571
reviews: First time staying here and really enjoyed it! great area of downtown and close to everything. The place was very clean and the underground parking spot was super helpful. would definitely rent this place again. thanks.

Chloe and Jason were very responsive, helpful and friendly throughout our stay! Everything was clean and the location was easy to find. Check in and check out were flawless! We would definitely stay again!

Had a great stay at Chloe and Jasons place. They provided more than enough information and were proactive and quick with there messages. Then place was quite nice and clear. I would stay there again in the future.

We loved the location! It was walkable to lots of great shopping, amazing restaurants and the MNP Sports Centre. It was easy to get to all the places around Calgary we needed to be. The parking spot was easy to get in and out of with our rental car. We’d stay again if we’re find ourselves back in Calgary.

The property was clean, easy to find and up to the mark. The location was very good which suited my purpose of the trip. One issue happened with the fob which was promptly addressed.
If I have to nitpick, the only issue was with the shower handle in the bathroom which was a bit loose. Otherwise everything else was fine.
Awesome airbnb! We stayed a few nights to explore the city. It’s a great location, close to restaurants/bars/shopping centre in downtown Calgary. Apartment itself is very clean. Definitely recommend!

You’ll enjoy being within close proximity to the downtown core, convention centres, Saddeldome, 17th Avenue, mission,  grocery stores and more.The spaceWalking into the suite you'll find an open living space with large windows. The condo has two bedrooms, a bathroom, living room, kitchen and laundry space. The kitchen has a dining table with seating for four, as well as all the essentials; (coffee, pots, pans, oil, salt/pepper). The kitchen and dining space flows nicely into the living area. This open floor plan makes it easy to cook, eat, relax, entertain and feel connected to the people you're travelling with. In the living room you're able to access Netflix and will find cuddling up on the couch quite comfortable. The couch can be used as an additional sleeping space, should you wish to travel in a larger group. In the bathroom you'll find towels, shampoo/conditioner, soap, hair dryer and a combo bath/shower. The primary bedroom offers a queen sized bed, lamp, shelf and closet. It also boats large windows which brighten up the space.  The sliding fogged doors can be closed or completely opened up to allow you to watch TV from bed.  The second bedroom offers a double bed, closet and dresser. The space is great for those travelling or anyone living in Calgary and looking for a date night. Instead of rushing home and having to come back downtown, pack a bag and get ready in the suite. You'll be able to walk to popular favorites such as 10 Foot Henry (1 min walk), The Allium (2 min walk), Native Tongues Taqueria (3 min walk), Two Penny (1 min walk) or the Saddledome (13 min walk).  The best part?! You'll be able to skip the pricey cab ride and sleep in the next morning! Leaving you feeling refreshed. Use that extra time (and energy) to hit a fitness class (Hot Shop Yoga is just across the street!) or head to brunch to catch up with a friend.Guest accessGuests have access to the whole suite, designated parking stall and the shared building amenities, including a shared rooftop patio.Other things to noteThe suite is conveniently located within walking distance to many of the top restaurants, bars, event centres and main attractions. Travelling for work? Most people from the building walk to their offices! We’re also steps from numerous bus stops and close proximity to the Victoria Park Stampede CTrain Station.Registration DetailsBL000000
reviews: The apartment was exactly as described and conveniently located near the BMO Centre, making it the perfect place to stay during a trade show. Everything was clean, comfortable, and easy to access. Would definitely stay here again.

Beth hosted a beautiful place! We had a great stay, she also recommended some great places for some fun. We had a gorgeous view of the city and we could see the tower from downstairs. Definitely recommend and will be back again.

This unit located at 13th Ave SW and 1st is perfectly located downtown within walking of more than a dozen restaurants and bars. The indoor parking spot is great for very easy in and out access. Beth and her team were very helpful and communication was top notch. Thank-you. The unit itself had all the comforts of home and provided west views from a elevated floor. We found the unit quiet and rarely heard neighbours or people passing through the hallway. We recommend Beth and her team and this lovely place to stay.

Beth was a great host—super responsive and always provide clear instructions from check-in to check-out. The airbnb was very clean and comfy. Our group enjoyed how walkable many stores and restaurants were.

We had such a great stay. The condo was so clean and beautifully decorated. Beth had such thoughtful things throughout the place that made the stay so nice. Complimentary coffee was a really nice touch. It’s also in such a good location, walking distance from everything. We would for sure stay again.

Great location, everything you need is close by. the property had everything you would need. The beds were comfy. Great view of the city. I would highly recommend for anyone looking in downtown Calgary. Host was very quick to respond.

A good experience and responsive host. It met my expectations, and the location was quite convenient. I would recommend it to others and would stay again if the opportunity arose.
Beth’s place was great! Everything was clean, comfortable and exactly as described. It is very walkable with excellent restaurants nearby.

location_details.value: The condo is located in the Beltline district, which is one of the most accessible districts in Calgary. Some of the best bars and restaurants are literally across the street (One of the best cocktail bars in town is in the building!). Close to the saddledome, minutes to downtown and the Red Mile (17th Ave), and a stone's throw from the river walks, parks, library, museums, and shopping.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Most hot spots are an easy couple of minutes of walking away. 7th Ave free transit zone is about 6 blocks away (10 minutes walking).

description_by_sections.value: This delightful two bedroom condo is located in the best location, offering large windows, with sun filled early afternoons, city skyline and beautiful mountain views.Located just across the street from the condo you'll find bus stops, fitness studios, restaurants, cafes, a pub, bars and coffee shops. name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: 1Bed 1Bath all Concrete Condo in Mission, one of Calgary's trendiest neighbourhoods. Located 2 blocks from 4th St SW and all its bars, restaurants and shops, you are also minutes from the Saddledome, 17th Ave SW as well as the Stampede Grounds. Our building is tucked away in a quiet cul de sac.Highlights:- In Floor Heating for the winter, AC for the summer- Insuite Laundry - Huge Elbow Riverfront backyard with picnic table w/ uninterrupted Downtown viewsThe spaceOur unit is finished with marble tiles that have in-floor heating throughout. Facing north, this unit is a perfect getaway. It's quiet, has river sounds and private riverfront access. There is a full kitchen, everything you could need as well as a washer and dryer in the unit.Guest accessPrivate Apartment with Self Check in. Just buzz in, grab the keys and go! We are professionally managed so there is always someone around to answer your questions.Other things to note**** Furniture has slightly changed **** New Photos coming soon, apartment is the same, couch is new, bed is new, you'll love it :) Parking outdoor availableRegistration DetailsBL265128
reviews:
Definite pro’s
Aaron was responsive, reasonable and went out his way to accommodate me during emergencies.
Location was excellent, walking distance to restaurants, parks and walking trails. The unit itself was great, well equipped and comfortable. (Sofa needs changing).
Con’s
Since this is a property managed Airbnb, the only minor issue was, having a single point of contact as a host. “Call host” typically directed you to an answering service and ultimately to the host - a new experience for me staying Airbnb’s.
Excellent and beautifully located unit. We enjoyed our stay a lot! I recommend this place, close to the river and close to grocery shops, pharmacies, restaurants, etc!
Loved the stay. Great to be around the heart of mission with the river and the restaurants it offered

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Aaron's place. The place is clean, great furniture, nice rooms, great kitchen, and an excellent place to sit and work with a nice desk setup. I also walked into the city regularly, to work at coffee shops. The walk is only ~15-20 minutes, which is also pleasant to get fresh air and see the city. The local area of Mission is also enjoyable if you want some food or a smaller coffee shop.
The building and property are also beautiful, but the apartment I stayed in (202) is on the non-river side. I think the listing photo is a little misleading, as it showcases the river photo first, but this is not your experience in this apartment. Your keys get you access to this back area with the river, but only the grass and some used dirty lawn furniture. If you are renting this apartment for that beautiful view and outdoor experience, you are not going to get it.
Still worth the stay, if you want a beautiful apartment and a well-organised AirBnB experience!
Small, cozy space. Convenient and great location!

This place was great! Theres a lot of great restaurants nearby and its in a quiet neighborhood. Would definitely stay again. Only issue I came across was the parking. I could not access the garage and unfortunately the issue was not resolved during my stay. It made things a bit inconvenient as I had to find street parking and then walk to the apartment. But again other than that it was nice :)

This place was great for our few days in Calgary at the stampede. It was walking distance max 15min walk to the stampede and very close to excellent breakfast joints and other restaurants. The place was spacious for a one bedroom and we had an additional person sleep on the couch (not a pull out). Aaron was very responsive and quick to respond when a few items (extra towel and linens) were missing from the place. We would recommend to others!

My partner and I visited Calgary for a short few days, and we had a great stay at Aaron's apartment. It is a great apartment with everything we need. The location is great, easy to walk to public transit. And there are lots of good restaurants blocks away. Aaron gives clear instructions, and the communication we had was friendly and straightforward.

This is a great place to stay! Super central in the best neighbourhood with restaurants, bars, and shops in walking distance. Right next to river, which was an amazing place to walk in the heat wave. The place was clean and stylish. Bed was comfortable. Would absolutely stay again next time in Calgary!

Aaron’s place was great. It had everything you needed in the kitchen, laundry and bathroom (along with travel skin care samples). The condo also had a nice back yard with lawn chairs right by the Elbow river. It was a great place to hang out with our Golden.  Thanks Aaron!

We loved our stay at Aaron's place and will definitely be back! Aaron was a great, responsive host and his thorough instructions were both super helpful and appreciated. Aaron's place is in a beautiful area - we felt super safe and right at home. The apartment was super clean and comfortable. Super close to restaurants and there's the river right out back and a nice park right down the road. We really enjoyed the centrality of Aaron's place - everywhere we visited was a short drive away. Overall, great place and great host!
We loved Aaron’s place! He was very communicative and very kind. We loved the neighborhood and thought the Airbnb itself was meticulously, cleaned and offered a cozy experience!
Lovely place to stay, close to restaurants, stores, mall and train station. Would definitely stay again.
Place was clean and host had awesome communication. They gave lots of ideas and had easy to follow check in.
Aaron was a great host and very responsive when it came to reaching out. The place was in a nice area, close to the downtown area that is lively and free spirited.
The place was very clean and beautiful. The kitchen was modern and there was a lot of natural light. Would definitely recommend it!
Loved my stay here. It was in a great location and felt like home! Will be staying here again. Thanks Aaron!
Extremely pleased, everything was as it was described. Aaron was very forward with information & would stay again for sure.
Great place to stay!! Kitchen was equipped enough to cook a great meal, super clean, and Aaron was easy to reach
Beautiful and bright place. Very clean. Great location. Will definitely stay again.
Amazing location! Close to a lot of stores and restaurants. Very accommodating host!
Ths was a great Airbnb.  It was comfortable spotless and in a great location.
the stay was amazing, everything was clean

Wonderful apartment, super clean, very stylish and the perfect location to Missions trendy neighbourhood. Walking distance to many great coffee shops and restaurants. Comfortable bed, heated floors and the well stocked kitchen were just a few things I loved. Lots of great sunlight in the suite too! Aaron was a great host and I would highly recommend it!

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.73 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome home!This stylish suite has features floor to ceiling glass windows, breathtaking city views, two bedrooms, king bed, comfy living area, a dedicated work space, BBQ, high speed internet, private patio and more.When you stay with us you’ll experience all the comforts of home, in a professionally decorated downtown condo.Perfect for diverse groups of travellers, including; business, couples, families, friends and even solo travellers looking for extra space.The spaceWithin walking distance to 17th Ave, Saddledome/Stampede grounds and downtown core. Steps away from Calgary's trendiest restaurants and best nightlife such as St James corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, endless pubs, popular 8th, 10th and 17th Ave, Starbucks and a yoga studio a stone throw from front entrance.Notable Features:-King bed-Queen bed-Sofa bed- Free underground parking -Balcony with spectacular skyline view-Fresh beddings & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-Eating Bar-High-speed WiFi-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machineID Verification required for our property.We do not accept arrivals 2am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time please refrain from booking. Thank youGuest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.Registration DetailsBL287399
reviews:
This was such a great place to stay. We really appreciate Kyle, Andrew, and everyone at KYAN properties for having us. Everything was as advertised, and comes with a great view of downtown Calgary. We don't visit the city too often, but when we do, we'll be looking out for your listings. Would reccomend!
-Paul
The place was clean, quiet, and centrally located.  Kyle provided clear instructions for accessing the condo. Kyle checked in with us during our stay.
Fantastic place to stay in downtown core with beautiful views

Well… I stayed for 1 week on this apartment. The apartment was dirty and dusty. It has a great view of downtown, but it is not worthy the price I paid.
I had some trouble to park the car, since there was no instruction saying the parking spot number.
The responsible person took some time to answer and I had to stay inside of the car until I figure out what was the parking number. After 12 hours car trip(I was really tired). He was very rude at first, saying I didn’t read the manual with the informations, which I did and later he confessed there was a “bug” in the system and didn’t show me the full information about parking.
Note: if you have children, be careful because the bedroom doors have very sharp metal edges and can hurt a kid very easily and get your clothing stuck when you’re walking by.
Other than that.. the apartment is well located. Garage gate keys need to be replaced. Not working very well.
Peaceful place.

I was in the city attending a wedding. Location was perfect. Everything you need is on your doorstep or a short walk away.
Apartment was on the 19th floor offering AMAZING views over the city.
Any issues and concerns I had were answered and sorted straight away. Great support.
it was a very nice place & location!
Very convenient location, beautiful view
this place is really great to stay at, it has the beautiful view of the calgary tower
Highly recommended

Beautiful apartment with stunning views of the city, very available and responsive host.
Highly recommend
Beautiful, clean and functional property.

Steps away from Calgary's trendiest restaurants and best nightlife such as St James corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, endless pubs, popular 8th, 10th and 17th Ave, Starbucks and a yoga studio a stone throw from front entrance.Notable Features:-King bed-Queen bed-Sofa bed- Free underground parking -Balcony with spectacular skyline view-Fresh beddings & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-Eating Bar-High-speed WiFi-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machineID Verification required for our property.We do not accept arrivals 2am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time please refrain from booking. Thank you

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: You will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

reviews_details.review:
This was such a great place to stay. We really appreciate Kyle, Andrew, and everyone at KYAN properties for having us. Everything was as advertised, and comes with a great view of downtown Calgary. We don't visit the city too often, but when we do, we'll be looking out for your listings. Would reccomend!
-Paul
The place was clean, quiet, and centrally located.  Kyle provided clear instructions for accessing the condo. Kyle checked in with us during our stay.
Fantastic place to stay in downtown core with beautiful views

Well… I stayed for 1 week on this apartment. The apartment was dirty and dusty. It has a great view of downtown, but it is not worthy the price I paid.
I had some trouble to park the car, since there was no instruction saying the parking spot number.
The responsible person took some time to answer and I had to stay inside of the car until I figure out what was the parking number. After 12 hours car trip(I was really tired). He was very rude at first, saying I didn’t read the manual with the informations, which I did and later he confessed there was a “bug” in the system and didn’t show me the full information about parking.
Note: if you have children, be careful because the bedroom doors have very sharp metal edges and can hurt a kid very easily and get your clothing stuck when you’re walking by.
Other than that.. the apartment is well located. Garage gate keys need to be replaced. Not working very well.
Peaceful place.
reviews_details.host_response:
When Jonathan mentioned the unit was dusty, we immediately offered to send a cleaner out to resolve the issue — an offer that was declined — and there were no further concerns raised after that point.
Regarding the garage fob and the metal edges on the doors: unfortunately, we were not made aware of these issues during Jonathans' stay. Had we been informed, we would have addressed them right away. We're always more than willing to resolve problems promptly when given the opportunity to do so, and we truly value open communication with our guests.

reviews_details.review:
I was in the city attending a wedding. Location was perfect. Everything you need is on your doorstep or a short walk away.
Apartment was on the 19th floor offering AMAZING views over the city.
Any issues and concerns I had were answered and sorted straight away. Great support.
it was a very nice place & location!
Very convenient location, beautiful view
this place is really great to stay at, it has the beautiful view of the calgary tower
Highly recommended

Superbe appartement vue imprenable sur la ville , hôte très disponible et réactif .
Vivement conseillé
Belle propriété propre et fonctionnelle.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our stunning downtown Calgary corner unit condo! This modern retreat offers you the perfect combination of convenience, luxury, and breathtaking views.As you step inside, you'll immediately be captivated by the floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase the stunning city skyline and majestic mountain vistas. Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.*** POOL is closed for the winter.The spaceOur condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy king bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.Additionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, with an array of fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops within easy walking distance. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night.Notable Features:-Balcony with spectacular skyline view-Dedicated work station-Dining Table (4 seats)-Fresh beddings & linens-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-High-speed WiFi-Free underground parking-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machineID Verification Required for our property.All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.Guest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.*** POOL is closed for the winter.Other things to notePlease be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you are arriving later than this, do not proceed with the booking or inquire about late check in (40$ Fee)Registration DetailsBL285708
reviews:
I enjoyed my stay here. Clean linens and equipment.
Excellent and clear directives.
The building is in quite a strategic location which enables you have an excellent view of downtown.
It’s smaller than I expected but overall it’s cozy.
I look forward to spending time here if have to visit Calgary again

We absolutely loved staying in this apartment.  We had everything we needed, the apartment itself was immaculate and in a great location.  We loved the views of the city and sitting out on the balcony. We probably spent more time in the apartment than we usually would just because we loved being in there so much. Everything went very smoothly and we wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again.

I had a wonderful stay at this beautiful home! It was spotless, comfortable, and had everything I needed for my visit. Kyle & Andrew were amazing hosts. friendly, responsive, and thoughtful throughout my stay. The location was great and made my time in Calgary even better. Everything was perfect, and I would definitely stay here again. Highly recommend this beautiful home!

Our stay was absolutely excellent! Communication with the hosts was very quick and clear from the start — the check-in and check-out instructions were easy to follow. One time, we accidentally left one of our keys inside the apartment, and they responded immediately, helping us right away. We also forgot an item at check-out, and they kindly returned it to us in perfect condition with no extra charge. Everything was handled so well! Highly recommend this place.
My second stay in Calgary. This apartment was better than the previous I had.  It is situated far better in a more cozy area compared to SE Calgary.   Would rent this place again.

This is the second time staying at this location, very walkable and accesible, central to many restaurants. It was a bit noisy due to the stampede tent but that will not be a problem until next year. The hosts are great and understanding even after I lost the key-fobs, obviously I needed to pay the replacements. I like the alternative option of calling someone to give access to the condo. I have not seen that anywhere else.

Great location, close to both downtown and beltline. Lots of nice cafes and restaurants. Smooth checkin, hosts are very responsive.
The couch is not comfortable and there are no blackout blinds so it is bright at night. Recommend carrying eye marks
very convenient place to stay.  everything was walking distance and made our stay less stressful. beautiful views

I would definitely recommend this air bnb to anyone. I felt so at home, they had extra things I didn’t even think to pack. The air bnb was just beautiful. When I had to leave they were really good with letting me know what I could do to help out (where to bring garbage/recycle etc). I will definitely book with them again if and when I travel back to Calgary.
Kyle did a great job providing all the instructions before, during and after my stays. Great place! I enjoyed my time at Kyle’s place.
Enjoyed my stay there. Would love to come back. The apartment has beautiful interior and view. It’s super clean and cozy.

The location was fantastic—perfect for exploring downtown Calgary, with plenty of great restaurants nearby. The hosts were also very responsive, which we appreciated. However, the listing was a bit misleading—the space felt smaller than in the photos, and there was no mountain view as advertised. The main downside was the comfort, as the bedding (mattress and pillows) felt a bit worn out, and the couch wasn’t very usable. Overall, it was okay for a short stay, but not the best option for those looking for a truly comfortable experience.

I had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb! The place was impeccably clean, spacious, and cozy, with a perfect layout that made it feel like a home away from home. The host was very responsive. Definitely returning!!

I really recommend staying at one of Kyle & Andrew’s properties. The place was absolutely beautiful with city views and so close to many restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shopping. It was the perfect place for a weekend getaway!  Kyle and Andrew are very responsive to your messages and make the check in instructions clear and easy. They messaged me daily to make sure our accommodation was meeting our expectations which I really appreciated! Plus the underground parking was so nice to have for our stay! I will definitely be staying at one of their accommodations again in the future!
Kyle was great, definitely recommend anyone visiting the area

The apartment was just as pictures, easy to get around, and the parking was handy. Nice balcony and seating.
The hosts can't do anything about it, but there were quite a few homeless in the alleys around the apartment block, in general there are a lot of homeless in the city though. Nice touches like bssic supplies and coffee pods
The hosts were very keen to make sure everything was great, with frequent communications and clear instructions.
As other guests have mentioned, the couch is not comfortable and could probably benefit from being replaced. The other thing that would make the place even better would be some blackout blinds or curtains in the bedroom as it was very light and this disturbed our sleep.
Great unit exactly what you see in the photos!
Very cozy and very reassuring that the hosts checked in via chat often.
It was great place. Lots of restaurants and things to do, all within walking distance. It’s a great place to stay in Calgary.
Beautiful place with a great view. Loved the design. Great to have parking included. Enjoyed it very much.
Great place right downtown. They have a coffee machine and tea which was really nice. The building has a small gym which is very convenient.

Great apartment!
Ultra clean, super well-equipped, very well-decorated.
If you're looking for a city apartment experience, that's perfect!
Kyle was very proactive and quick to answer our questions.
Totally recommend!
Good place to stay, nice review and accomodating hosts🙌🏻
Great stay, clean and the hosts were responsive, will be staying here again :)

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.74 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 bathrooms
description: Welcome to your luxury sub-penthouse in one of Calgary’s most sought-after buildings. Soaring above the city, enjoy skyline views from two private balconies, floor-to-ceiling windows, a sleek kitchen, and open-concept living. Includes fast Wi-Fi, in-suite laundry, secure underground parking, plus access to a private gym and pool perfect for business trips or a relaxing getaway.The spaceLimited-Time Weekly & Monthly Discounts Available!Step into your elevated escape in one of Calgary’s most sought-after sub-penthouse suites. This bright and modern 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo is perched above the city and features two private balconies with sweeping skyline views perfect for your morning coffee or sunset wind-down.Key Features:• Prime downtown location – Walk to Stampede Grounds, Calgary Tower, 17th Ave, river pathways, and more• Two private balconies – Double the space, double the views• Free underground parking – Safe, secure, and included• Floor-to-ceiling windows – Soak in natural light all day• High-speed Wi-Fi & Smart TV – Stream your favorites with ease• Fully stocked kitchen – Cook and entertain in style• In-suite laundry – Ideal for longer stays• Gym & pool access – Stay active or take a relaxing dip• Modern, comfortable furnishings – Designed with both style and comfort in mindWhether you're working remotely, vacationing, or simply exploring Calgary, this sub-penthouse is a perfect blend of luxury and convenience  your private oasis above the city.Registration DetailsBL292587
reviews: Wonderful stay! The place was exactly as described, spotlessly clean, and the host was responsive and helpful. Check-in was smooth, location was perfect for our needs, and all amenities worked great. Would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend to others. Thank you for a fantastic experience!

Chloe & Jason were phenomenal! Incredibly smooth check in and very thorough PDF doc outlining everything for the condo from check in & check out to amenities and even recommended spots! The condo itself was perfect and made for a wonderful stay! Would highly recommend and will definitely be back! Thanks again!

Large and comfortable apartment in Calgary.
We had to book the apartment very short notice due to a cancelation we received.
This was not an issue and we are very grateful for the great Organisation.
The bed in the big bedroom is large and very comfortable.
The view from the apartment is just amazing.
We really enjoyed the stay and can only recommend.

Very organized and looked exactly like the pictures. The communication was very open and available ALOT of details and instructions. Overall great stay I would stay here again. Thanks for being great Hosts Jason and Chloe.

I stayed here for 5 nights a my Mom. Always a treat getting to spend time with her, and staying at Chloe and Jason’s for the bill perfectly.
There’s a lot going on in the neighborhood. Good restaurants and bars, real businesses, and other residential projects. I was able to walk to my morning meetings downtown in no time. 17th Street is also just a quick walk with more bars and restaurants and even a pharmacy.
The suite is generous and beautiful. It’s very well designed and the two balconies face South and East. This isn’t your typical condo project - you don’t have to leave your room to change your mind :)
Chloe and Jason made sure everything was taken care of and responded inside of 10 minutes and sometimes immediately. It was very reliable communication.
Plenty of pillows and comfortable bedding to melt into after marathon days.

I wanted to share my stay in this apartment. The apartment was fabulous. The booking went smooth. I give them 5/5 but I faced a scary experience with the building itself. They have two garages in the underground parking. The main one and there's another trap metal door the further you drive down. If you drive an SUV it will give a small height space. I drove through this trap door following another car infront of me with a reasonable allowance. I followed since I was close to the car and the door was fully open when I looked. As I was in the middle I heard a sound that was the metal door hitting the top of my Audi q7 shattering the top of my windshield. Thankfully I was not injured but my hope through this message is that people will be careful with the garage when they stay at this location.
Thanks,
Moira
What a great view!! We enjoyed this condo and super easy to get around downtown
Great place for the price! We enjoyed our stay and the views of both the mountains and the city skyline. Comfortable furniture as well.
The place is extremely beautiful, very clean and perfect location. The view is extraordinary and we are looking forward to come back. We strongly recomand it to others
We had a great time at this location. Everything was really close, and the view was unforgettable.

We had a great stay at this Airbnb! The host was super friendly and very responsive throughout our stay. The unit was clean, well-maintained, and comfortably fit five people. The check-in process was very clear and smooth, and overall, we’re really happy with our experience.
One suggestion for the host: the checkout instructions ask guests to pile up used towels, linens, and rags in the bedroom. While it’s understandable to help the cleaning staff identify used items, I’d personally prefer if the host’s team handled that entirely to avoid any hygiene issues—especially since guests might accidentally forget something.
Also worth mentioning (as other reviews have noted), there are some homeless people around the neighborhood, but this didn’t affect our stay and is, of course, outside the host’s control.
Overall, we’d definitely recommend this place and would stay again!

We were honestly quite disappointed with our 2-night stay, mainly because of two things. First, when we arrived, the master bedroom wasn’t clean at all. the floor was still dirty, like it hadn’t even been swept. The towels also smelled bad and we had to wash them before using them. The sofa in the living room also had an unpleasant smell which made it uncomfortable to sit on.
Second, the TV wasn’t working the whole time we were there. We were told it was already having issues and still being fixed but we feel like it should have been sorted out before our check-in. We were told multiple times that someone would come by to fix it, so we waited the whole day but no one showed up. That was really frustrating.
We paid the full price expecting a relaxing stay, but instead, it ended up being stressful. Please make sure the place is fully cleaned and ready before guests arrive. The thing is, the unit itself is actually nice and the view is beautiful. It just needs be maintained well.

This property was exactly what I needed during my stay in Calgary: spacious, well-equipped, and ideally located.
While the check-in process may seem a bit tricky at first, the hosts have provided an incredibly detailed and clear PDF guide that makes everything smooth and straightforward. Once inside, the space far exceeded my expectations, with stunning views and thoughtful touches throughout.
It's worth noting that some of the surrounding area faces social challenges, which are beyond the hosts’ control, just something to be aware of. That said, the secure parking and overall convenience of the location more than made up for it.
I genuinely appreciated the care and effort the hosts put into making this a great stay.
Thanks again, and hats off to the hosts for doing such a great job. Keep it up!
One of the Best building in Downtown area, the best view and location
Chloe and Jason were good hosts I’ll visit again.

Overall, the room is spacious and beautiful.The response was very quick and the support was very kind.The location is also very good, and you can walk to the nearby supermarkets and restaurants.
The minor complaints are that there was no hair dryer, Netflix could not be watched in the designated way, there were no tissues, and the neighbors and surroundings were noisy until the middle of the night on Saturday night.
However, there is no particular dissatisfaction.
We have a very good place to stay.
Nice and spacious great location
It was a fun experience staying downtown.  Great views.
Lovely condo, great area and excellent hosts!
Great Place! Easy communication!
Great accomodation
Great host
Good

I wanted to share my stay in this apartment. The apartment was fabulous. The booking went smooth. I give them 5/5 but I faced a scary experience with the building itself. They have two garages in the underground parking. The main one and there's another trap metal door the further you drive down. If you drive an SUV it will give a small height space. I drove through this trap door following another car infront of me with a reasonable allowance. I followed since I was close to the car and the door was fully open when I looked. As I was in the middle I heard a sound that was the metal door hitting the top of my Audi q7 shattering the top of my windshield. Thankfully I was not injured but my hope through this message is that people will be careful with the garage when they stay at this location.
Thanks,
Moira
What a great view!! We enjoyed this condo and super easy to get around downtown
Great place for the price! We enjoyed our stay and the views of both the mountains and the city skyline. Comfortable furniture as well.
The place is extremely beautiful, very clean and perfect location. The view is extraordinary and we are looking forward to come back. We strongly recomand it to others
We had a great time at this location. Everything was really close, and the view was unforgettable.

We had a great stay at this Airbnb! The host was super friendly and very responsive throughout our stay. The unit was clean, well-maintained, and comfortably fit five people. The check-in process was very clear and smooth, and overall, we’re really happy with our experience.
One suggestion for the host: the checkout instructions ask guests to pile up used towels, linens, and rags in the bedroom. While it’s understandable to help the cleaning staff identify used items, I’d personally prefer if the host’s team handled that entirely to avoid any hygiene issues—especially since guests might accidentally forget something.
Also worth mentioning (as other reviews have noted), there are some homeless people around the neighborhood, but this didn’t affect our stay and is, of course, outside the host’s control.
Overall, we’d definitely recommend this place and would stay again!

We were honestly quite disappointed with our 2-night stay, mainly because of two things. First, when we arrived, the master bedroom wasn’t clean at all. the floor was still dirty, like it hadn’t even been swept. The towels also smelled bad and we had to wash them before using them. The sofa in the living room also had an unpleasant smell which made it uncomfortable to sit on.
Second, the TV wasn’t working the whole time we were there. We were told it was already having issues and still being fixed but we feel like it should have been sorted out before our check-in. We were told multiple times that someone would come by to fix it, so we waited the whole day but no one showed up. That was really frustrating.
We paid the full price expecting a relaxing stay, but instead, it ended up being stressful. Please make sure the place is fully cleaned and ready before guests arrive. The thing is, the unit itself is actually nice and the view is beautiful. It just needs be maintained well.

This property was exactly what I needed during my stay in Calgary: spacious, well-equipped, and ideally located.
While the check-in process may seem a bit tricky at first, the hosts have provided an incredibly detailed and clear PDF guide that makes everything smooth and straightforward. Once inside, the space far exceeded my expectations, with stunning views and thoughtful touches throughout.
It's worth noting that some of the surrounding area faces social challenges, which are beyond the hosts’ control, just something to be aware of. That said, the secure parking and overall convenience of the location more than made up for it.
I genuinely appreciated the care and effort the hosts put into making this a great stay.
Thanks again, and hats off to the hosts for doing such a great job. Keep it up!
One of the Best building in Downtown area, the best view and location
Chloe and Jason were good hosts I’ll visit again.

総じて、部屋は広くて綺麗です。返答がとても早く、対応がとても親切でした。立地もとても良く、徒歩で周辺のスーパー、レストランに行けます。
敢えて細かい不満な点はドライヤーが無い、NETFLIXが指定された方法では観れなかった、ティッシュが無い、週末の土曜夜は隣人、周辺が夜中まで騒がしかった、等が挙げられます。
が、特に大きな不満はありません。
とても良い滞在先でした。
Nice and spacious great location
It was a fun experience staying downtown.  Great views.
Lovely condo, great area and excellent hosts!
Great Place! Easy communication!
Great accomodation
Great host
Good

It was clean, and pristine. Benji was responsive& helpful.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.87 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Enjoy this spacious 2 bedroom , 2 bath condo in the heart of downtown Calgary. Perfect for up to 4 guests, this modern space is ideal for families, friends, or business travelers. The building features a gym, outdoor pool (open in summer), and free secured parking. Safety is a priority in this secure building, and its prime location puts you near top restaurants, shops, and entertainment. Experience the best of downtown Calgary in comfort and style. Book your stay today!The space2 bed 2  full bath 1 queen 1 double Large outdoor balconyRegistration DetailsBL281544
reviews: I’m a local Calgarian and stayed here for a month. The location was great — walkable to everything I love about this city. I didn’t hear any noise from neighbouring units through the walls or ceiling during my stay. For anyone who’s noise-sensitive, you can hear some street noise and trains, but earplugs helped. The building felt safe, and there’s a security guard on site. The kitchen had everything I needed to cook meals, and this was the cleanest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. I would love to live in this building and would definitely stay here again.

I loved this place and will definitely be back!
The host was fantastic, everything was clean, and access was super easy. Having parking available — especially in downtown — was a huge plus.
I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay!

very responsive host and large, clean suite. suite well stocked. location being right downtown was not ideal for families with young kids, not alot of activities/parks for young kids. the pool was enjoyed by the kids.

A beautiful, spacious and conveniently located condo. The gym and pool are nice additions and the condo is very well equipped with everything you could
need for a comfortable stay.

I used to live in Calgary and this is one of the nicest, cleanest, and perfect bnb's / apartment I have ever stayed at in YYC! From the 2 bedrooms, to the huge balcony, pristine kitchen with all needed appliances and utensils, washer/dryer, hair dryer, 2 bathrooms, and overall extremely luxury feeling! I felt very safe with the 24/7 concierge. The neighbourhood itself felt very safe and friendly located conveniently downtown. Overall I cannot recommend this place more. If you desire a luxury, cozy home feeling, and want to experience there DT life of Calgary this is the place to book! Will definitely be back and cannot wait to book again! To also add, the hosts were extremely accommodating and allowed me to check in early, thank you both again for a great stay in Calgary!
Extremely easy check in. Michelle was more than flexible with our late arrival time. Would definitely stay here again.

This was our second time staying here.  We really enjoy the area, lots of things to do, good restaurants and shopping all within easy walking distance.  The apartment was very clean as before and well stocked with all the basics.  We enjoyed the large balcony and large windows with great views.  Will stay again next time we’re in Calgary.
This is a really nice place. The pics dont do the apartment justice. Great neighbourhood too. I wish I had more time to explore the area.
We had a wonderful time staying at Michelle’s for Stampede. The condo was in a great location, spacious and matched the listing perfectly. I would absolutely book again!
Very central within downtown. Michelle & Mo were super responsive Hosts. Home was beautiful, modern and clean. Would recommend and stay here again!
Very nice place, great location downtown close to all the restaurants and pubs. So much to do, Uber’s are always around and scooters as well.
Great location, just parked the car & walked everywhere.  We were pleasantly surprised by the items in the kitchen-equipment & some basic items for use.
Wonderful stay, the apartment was beautiful, very well kept with thoughtful additions Thankyou
Michelle and Mo were fantastic—very responsive and attentive and helpful! The apartment was clean, well stocked, and in a great location!

Accommodations were ideal for us. Location was perfect and we could walk pretty much everywhere. The unit is well stocked with essentials and more, and whatever was lacking was replenished pretty much immediately once the host was notified. The only thing not up to par was the gym downstairs- the bike was not rideable as the pedal crank was broken, dumbbells were minimal, even the barbell plates were unevenly numbered (??) and we couldn’t open the window for fresh air. Michelle had better weights and bike in the unit itself!
I would definitely return the next time I’m in Calgary!

Michelle’s place was pristine, beautiful and thoughtfully appointed. Great view and lot’s of sunshine. Aesthetically decorated home.A lot of care had been taken to make the guest feel right at home. We easily found everything that we needed on our holiday.

The floor to ceiling windows were great, wonderful views of the city from main room and both bedrooms.   Location was only a few blocks from the +15 and easy walking to restaurants and shopping.  Host was helpful and quick to respond to messages.  Would definitely stay again when in Calgary.
Great space have stayed before and will stay again. Place is immaculate, highly recommend
Enjoyed our stay here. Building and suite were great, very clean and quiet.
Great location, clean, exactly as advertised with well appointed kitchen.
close to the places I wanted to visit. Good security doors & elevator
Nice place. Quick response
A beautiful place , we really enjoyed it
It was really nice to stay here.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
description: Enjoy one of the best spots in Calgary, all that Beltline day and night life has to offer in this incredibly well appointed boutique apartment at the top floor with 15' high ceilings.This two bedroom, two bathroom unit is perfect for travellers, whether for work or for fun! Cuddle up on the sofa while enjoying the cozy indoor fireplace. The area is highly walkable, ideal for sightseeing, and offers local shops and dining experiences. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking.The spaceapartment, featuring two bedrooms and two bathrooms for your comfort and convenience.The primary bedroom has a cozy queen size bed with luxurious Turkish cotton sheets boasting 1200 threads, ensuring a restful night's sleep. The 15' high ceilings create a spacious and bright atmosphere, complemented by a cozy fireplace that adds warmth and charm.Enjoy the well-equipped kitchen, complete with a pantry for your culinary needs. The apartment boasts ample closet space, ensuring a clutter-free stay. Take in the fresh air on the balcony or make use of the in-suite laundry for added convenience. Whether you're here for work or leisure, our cozy yet stylish space offers a perfect retreat in the heart of Calgary.You'll also enjoy the convenience of heated underground parking, eliminating any worries about parking hassles.Additionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, just steps away from Calgary's trendiest restaurants, coffee shops, and vibrant nightlife.Notable Features:- Dedicated work station- Queen size bed- Fresh beddings & linens- Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries- 40" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix- Bright living room w/ sofa- Stocked kitchen with basic necessities- Eating Bar- High-speed WiFi- Free heated underground parking- Hairdryer- Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine- kitchen essentials such as blender, toaster, electric kettle, french press and basic dinnerware.Guest accessYou'll enjoy full and exclusive use of the entire apartment, ensuring complete privacy during your stay.Other things to noteThe apartment is in the heart of Beltline, downtown, our location is both pleasant and secure. While the area is generally safe, we recommend keeping your car securely locked at all times and ensuring your belongings are discreetly stored to enhance your peace of mind.Registration DetailsBL290652
reviews: I had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb. The house is beautifully decorated, extremely clean, and equipped with all the amenities I could ask for. The host was very helpful and professional, making the whole experience smooth and enjoyable. The location is also excellent, very convenient and close to everything I needed. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to others!

We had such a great stay! The place was so cozy, super clean, and had everything we needed. The location was perfect—within walking distance to great restaurants and all the amenities we could ask for. Would definitely stay here again!
German was very prompt on responding to any questions I had.
Stayed for 2 nights on our way through to Vancouver. German’s apartment was a great find, well stocked, modern and very close to many of Calgary’s best food spots!
Nice place, super high ceilings. Great to have separate washrooms.

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The Beltline is characterized by its dynamic atmosphere, vibrant and trendy district located just south of downtown Calgary. It's known for its diverse range of shops, restaurants and bars such as Mercato Gourmet & Pizza, Korilla Korean BBQ & Karaoke, Made by Marcus Ice Cream Shop and Maven Brunch.With a mix of historic buildings and modern condominiums contributing to its unique charm. It's also home to various parks, green spaces, and the popular 17th Avenue SW, known for its lively nightlife and entertainment options.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Navigating the lively Beltline neighbourhood is a breeze, with plenty to explore on foot and convenient access to public transit. If you have a vehicle, enjoy the ease of heated underground parking, ensuring your car is securely stored. For added flexibility, ride-sharing services and taxis are readily available, making it simple to explore the neighbourhood and beyond. Whether you prefer walking, public transit, or driving, the Beltline offers seamless accessibility for a delightful stay.

German was very prompt on responding to any questions I had.
Stayed for 2 nights on our way through to Vancouver. German’s apartment was a great find, well stocked, modern and very close to many of Calgary’s best food spots!

You again soon.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our charming heritage property in Calgary! Immerse yourself in rich history and character in this renovated apartment. Located near 4th Street and 17th Avenue, explore shops and cafes, with bike and walking paths nearby. Experience old-world charm with modern comforts like marble countertops and fireplaces. Whether for business or pleasure, enjoy plush bedding and high-speed internet. Come experience Calgary's magic from our unique hideaway. Welcome home!The spaceNestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that’s hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city’s vibrant hustle and bustle. Perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike, our home promises an unforgettable stay.Other things to notePlease note that you will be required to climb one story of stairs to access this unit.Sofa bed is a futon, not a pull out bed.This is a heritage home, and therefore noise travels easily. Please understand that the quiet hours are strictly enforced for the pleasure of our guests.We have a designated parking available for our guests. Please note that it accommodates a single vehicle and may be quite snug for larger vehicles (especially taller ones). If this poses an issue, we can assist in registering your vehicle for street parking to override the parking time allotments. Just let us know, and we’ll be happy to help ensure a smooth parking experience for you.Registration DetailsBL279210
reviews:
Chic and charming apartment in a very nice part of town with lots of restaurants, shops and parcs nearby. Easy walk to 17th av and 4th street and direct bus to downtown.
Super clean and well appointed. Everything was tip top. I booked it once last minute, loved it, and quickly booked it again for another visit 2 weeks later. Courtney was very responsive throughout.
My favourite Airbnb in Calgary

We loved staying here and will keep it top of mind for Calgary (and friends visiting!) in the future. This space was beautiful and had everything we needed. Close to 17th and 4th, and some great walking routes nearby.

Courtney's place was located  in an ideal location close to bus lines and great walking along the Elbow River. The place itself is very stylish with lots of personality. I highly recommend this place, thanks Courtney!

Courtney’s place was lovely! A true gem in a fantastic walkable area! The home is comfortable, tastefully decorated and Courtney was very accommodating when we needed to adjust our stay. Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to Calgary!

The apartment was very comfortable and I loved the decor. Lots of windows and fresh air. Peaceful courtyard and loved all the birds.
Very central location.
Some really thoughtful extras including a complimentary coffee at my favourite Calgary coffee shop.
Courtney was very accommodating of my arrival time.
You can hear some noise from the traffic but with earplugs at night it was fine.
I would definitely stay here again.

We had a wonderful stay! The apartment is lovely and has everything you could possibly need. There are plenty of restaurants nearby but it is still a rather calm neighbourhood which is nice.
Courtney was fantastic. She was super friendly and incredibly quick to respond to any messages. She was also able to accommodate us on very short notice, which we truly appreciated. Would definitely stay here again!

I can't say enough good things about Courtney's apartment. Clean, cozy, quiet, close to lots of restaurants and shops. This was by far one of the best places I've stayed in a long time. I will be booking here again anytime I'm in Calgary!
Loved it and will definitely stay again! Really appreciate all the attention to detail and thought put into making this place feel like a home away from home.
Wonderful stay—super cute and peaceful! Courtney was so welcoming, and there are plenty of great restaurants nearby. I’ll definitely be back!
Courtney’s place is just a wonderful, cool spot…we felt right at home and she was super responsive and kind. Will definitely be staying again next time we’re in Calgary!
Courtney's place was great with everything you need for a comfortable stay and close to restaurants.

Second time staying with Courtney and it was great. The location is perfect. The suite is really clean and beautifully decorated.

Very nice place to stay.  Courtney was helpful with providing options for places to eat  and was easy to communicate with.  Would stay there again in the future.

What an amazing place. Super location, very classy apartment. The property had everything we needed. Courtney was a superb host, incredibly flexible and extended our stay when our flights changed at last minute. Thank you!!!!

We had a great stay and Courtney was a wonderful host. Thank you!
Great host, brilliant location, will return here when in Calgary!
Unique, comfy, clean, excellent home!
Courtney was amazing with response times and incredibly flexible with extending my stay on short notice.
Splendid apartment in a prime location.  the flat is well equipped and decorated.  Communication with Courtney was perfect.  Highly recommended

Great apartment in the beautiful Heritage district Cliff Bungalow  – very clean and exactly as in the photos! The kitchen was well equipped. We felt super comfortable. Communication was totally uncomplicated and all questions were responded to quickly. Absolute recommendation – we will be happy to come back anytime!
Courtney's place was really nice. The location is nice and everything is well equipped. And it's very clean! I recommend staying at Courtney's place!

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Cliff Bungalow is a historic and vibrant neighborhood nestled in the heart of Calgary, Alberta. Known for its charming character homes, tree-lined streets, and eclectic atmosphere, this community offers a unique blend of urban living and peaceful retreat. Residents enjoy easy access to boutique shops, trendy cafes, and local eateries along 4th Street and 17th Avenue. With picturesque views of the city skyline and proximity to parks and pathways, Cliff Bungalow is a sought-after destination for those seeking a dynamic and connected lifestyle in Calgary.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: There is one designated carport stall for guests. There is also street parking available with a guest pass to override the 2-hour allotment upon request. All areas are walkable with plenty of bike lanes and e-scooters.
