name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.88 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bathroom
description: Welcome to the heart of Calgary and steps away from restaurants, shops and inner-city parks. This 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom condo has contemporary decor and as you enter the space you will love the modern open concept showered by natural light and its full equipped kitchen. Step out to the private balcony to enjoy epic views of the Calgary Tower and beyond. The unit comes with in-suite laundry, one underground parking spot, and A/C. The building offers bike storage and an inviting communal terrace.The spaceThe condo has all amenities you need for a great stay. It also includes a spot in the underground parking and laundry in-site.Entering the unit you have a closet for your jackets, shoes and laundry in-site.The living room is cozy and has a comfortable couch set. A TV to enjoy Prime Video, Netflix, etc and WIFI is also provided.Dinning area includes a round table and 4 chairs. It links perfectly with the open concept style Kitchen.Kitchen has all the appliances you need to prepare the best breakfast, lunch and dinner. It also has a Keurig Coffee maker to enjoy that morning coffee with a City view.Bathroom has a large mirror and a comfy bath, we provide some essential supplies and fresh towels.Bedroom #1 has a Queen size bed, night stands and a big closet. The view is facing the beautiful City of Calgary.Bedroom #2 has a comfortable double size bed, night stands and a closet.Feel like home...**Unit capacity for up to 4 people, different rates may apply**Guest accessEnjoy the condo all for you and private access. Buzzer and doorcode will be provided.Registration DetailsBL288908
reviews: This apartment was one of our favorites spots we’ve stayed at in Calgary. The view is unmatched and the unit was so quiet and clean and well decorated. We did have to wait 25 minutes to be let inside as host wasn’t receiving or answering our buzzer but we were finally in and happy to be there. Amazing location.

he stay was excellent. The place was very clean, comfortable, and exactly as shown in the photos. The location was perfect, and Cami was an amazing host, always kind, attentive, and quick to respond to any questions. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting the area.

The place was nice and quiet and secure, so it was safe I enjoyed the city view of the buildings at night with the light show they have on the outside out the other buildings. the condo was clean and conformable.
over-all it was a nice stay and worth the money for the stay I would stay again at this place. The host was very nice and quickly respond to any questions I had .

What a fantastic stay! Cami's apartment was absolutely superb and exceeded all my expectations. The place was spotless, beautifully decorated, and had everything I could possibly need. The location was also amazing, making it easy to get around and explore Calgary. Cami was a wonderful host—responsive and a pleasure to communicate with. I can't recommend this place enough and would definitely stay here again on my next visit to Calgary.

Nothing short of excellent. The host is amazing to deal with and quick with responses. Very caring and reasonable.. I ran out of toilet paper and messaged the host and she told me that I could get some and she’ll reimburse the difference which she did.
Other than that the place speaks for itself. Very clean, cozy and has everything you need. Great experience :)

Cami’s place is fantastic. Great condo in a great building in a great area. The balcony and window views are just as amazing as depicted in the photos. The space is clean and comfortable. Cami was very welcoming and communicated promptly and clearly.  Definitely recommend and would stay there again.

I had a wonderful stay in Cami’s apartment! It was just as advertised and had a beautiful view both during the day and night. Easy to get around to hotspots downtown including 17ave, Stephen Ave and the tower walking. Would book again in the future :)

My stay at Cami’s place was fantastic! Access was super easy, and the unit itself was absolutely amazing—clean, stylish, very comfortable and the view of the city of Calgary is absolutely stunning. Cami was a great host, and I’d definitely stay here again. Highly recommended!

The apartment was fine but the access was not satisfactory. Only one access token was supplied for two adults. Made it very difficult to coordinate our business. I requested an additional token but the landlord wouldn't accommodate me.

This was my first airbnb. Was a great place. Cami was fast to respond to any questions or concerns. It was clean and comfortable beds. Starbucks right across the street. Lots of restaurants and pubs on the surrounding blocks.
Only clean up was dishes and to take the garbage out.
**door to garbage room is locked, make sure to take it out before you lock up to leave the condo.
Would book here again.

Thank you Cami, once again !
We had such an amazing time staying at your condo . The Condo was very clean and met our expectations!
Was right in the downtown area over looking the downtown . So pretty at night looking at the city . We loved the lights and seeing the tower turn different colours every night . Restaurants in walking distance . Would definitely stay here again !
Thanks again for a great experience!
Julie

Loved the location and the food hall across the street with many different options of food to eat from. The Irish Pub was also very good. So many options within walking distance and a cozy little place for a family of 4 ! The only issue I ran into was needing a key fob to even enter the building so I had to wait for someone to let me in as well as use their fob for the elevator, which only goes to their floor or parking. So walking down/up a few flights of stairs to get the the Airbnb was a bit out of the way with kids but it was fine. Camis place has the best view of the city! furniture was very comfortable and she had all amenities available. Great first time in Calgary!

Had a lovely view days at Cami’s place. Great location - within walking distance of lots of great food places and shopping. Kitchen really well stocked with amenities. We stayed with a baby and the space worked great for us.

Situation pretty central and very close to excellent restaurant.
The appartement is very comfortable for 4 persons and located in the higher levels of the building so that the view on downtown is amazing!

Great location close to many great restaurants. I recommend the 10 foot henry  restaurant which is right across the street. I only stayed for the weekend but condo was comfortable and had all the essential items.

Awesome place in a great location! Close to shops, restaurants, and all the cool spots.
Cami was super responsive and made everything easy. Our 4-day stay truly felt like a home away from home. We’d absolutely come back again!

Absolutely Stunning view, and perfect location downtown close to restaurants and bars.
It Fit my mini vacay and I totally enjoyed that bougee feeling staying there ✨ 💫 Highly recommend!

beautiful stay. I would recommend Cami's place to anyone visiting Calgary.  it matches the pictures posted perfect. walking distance to many restaurants.  felt safe walking well into the late evenings. Cami was an amazing host 10/10 recommend. Will definitely stay here again

View was amazing from the condo. Instructions were well laid out and easy to check in. The condo was right in downtown Calgary which made everything so easy to visit. Host was awesome and answered any questions very quickly. I would recommend this Air B&B.

We had a wonderful stay at Cami’s place. It’s quiet and yet central, from there one can walk easily to downtown, to stores and restaurants, or to the river. We also found it very comfortable and super clean. It has everything, so if you don’t feel like going out, it’s easy to cook a meal… in short it just felt like home, while being in the middle of the city. What we loved the most was the spectacular view of downtown, every night it was an amazing show of lights, just beautiful!
Thank you!
Great location!!! Very easy to walk around downtown Calgary!! The view is also spectacular, totally worth it!
Beautiful condo, great views, perfect location near my work and lots of places to eat. Would definitely stay there again.
The place was gorgeous and clean. Cami was very active and responsive. Would definitely book again when in the city
Great accommodation with magnificent daytime and nighttime view of the city including the Calgary Tower! Cami was an accommodating host!

description: Fall in love with this cozy & contemporary 2 bedroom corner unit the moment you check in. This unit comes with everything you you need to make your stay feel like home. From floor to ceiling windows to breathtaking panoramic city views, what more could you ask for? What really defines this building is its location. Only a short walk to the downtown core, and within a few blocks from some of the trendiest spots in Calgary. This location can't be beat!Guest accessThe smart TV comes with access to Netflix and YouTube. Please note that cable channels are not included. reviews:
We had a wonderful stay! The apartment was clean, centrally located and had everything we needed for our 2 night stay. The check-in instructions were easy to follow and it was nice to have a parking space downtown.
The window in the bedroom was unfortunately still broken and in need of a clean. That didn’t take away from our trip however and we really enjoyed our stay.

Location! Across the street is several awesome restaurants and bars and only a short walk to Stephen Ave for more great dining and shopping. Check in and out was smooth and easy. Hosts were very responsive and friendly. Condo was very clean and great view. Would stay again. Thank you!

I stayed in this two-bedroom apartment in Calgary for two nights, and it was an excellent experience. The photos represent the apartment very accurately, so what you see is exactly what you get. The place was very clean, and the hosts provided clear instructions that made both check-in and check-out quick and easy. Communication was smooth throughout my stay, the hosts were very responsive and helpful.
Overall, I was very happy with my time here and would not hesitate to book again in the future. Highly recommended!

Very responsive team. There was no iron and the next day they delivered a steamer. Nice!
The place has a bedroom that has no windows meaning no light in. I took that one and was wonderful to sleep there after a busy day.
Nice and well equipped kitchen.
Cleaned and well maintained bathroom and wash room.
I really liked the secured system to get in and out the building and the apartment.

The apartment is a very spacious, well-equipped, and close to many restaurants and pubs. Downtown Calgary (8th Ave.) is only 10 mins. away on foot, and Prince's island 25 min.
The hosts were very reactive and helpful whenever needed, we could even check in earlier than expected.
I can only recommend this apartment for anyone (1-4 persons) visiting the Calgary downtown area.
Great location and very well equipped apartment. We felt right at home. The only negative is that there are some grumpy fulltime residents that grumbled about "short-timers."

The apartment is amazing, really clean and has everything in it, wonderful location, a Starbucks just across the street. The stay was at my last vacation in Canada, totally worth it, totally 10/10, would recommend to anyone.

It’s such a cute place! Personally I love the big windows for some sun time. The location was really good. We were able to walk everywhere we wanted. Close to restaurants and the tower. Also, the whole team was so great and very responsive. Would definitely come back again.

I had a great stay in Calgary! The hosts were very quick with communication and were very accommodating with my request for an earlier check-in. The place was clean and had all amenities described. The location is great for access to downtown. The apartment was quiet and secure. I would say that there are some signs of wear and tear of the apartment such as a cracked window, broken closet, broken fridge drawer, but that did not impact our stay and the hosts are working on getting these things repaired. Would stay again!

Although they were a bit flexible with the check-in time, there were some minor issues:
- There was a big crack on the bedroom window, which is really dangerous.
- Despite charging a cleaning fee, they asked us to take out the trash, wash and dry the towels =))
- The unit gets VERY hot during the sunny days in Calgary because the AC is not working at all.
Maybe, overall, it was an alright place for a short stay, especially if you're not in the unit from early morning to late night.
Such a great location! Close to everything you need, hosts were super responsive and friendly. Would definitely recommend!
Place is great; loved it. It has everything, and it’s close to anywhere you need. Will definitely stay there again.

Location is great with lots nearby. Property in dire need of repairs. HVAC heated all day resulting on temps of 27C  fighting with portable air conditioner. 2 of 3 outlets in bedroom not working and "fixed" with the addition of an eztension cord. Broken windor in bedroom. Hosts were responsive to issues but not fixed while we were there.

- Great place & Location, very peaceful
- Loaded with supplies
- Helpful & Responsive Hosts
- Comfy Beds
Only drawback was when we arrived, there were 💩 stains on the toilet seat but they took care of that after. Also the shower drain kept on clogging up, had to keep pouring Drain O to clear it up which was annoying.
Overall it was a great place to stay at & would definitely rent again!
Great location, right in downtown. The apartment is clean and spacious.
Great condo near downtown attractions. Host is very responsive.
Fantastic location, very comfortable stay. I thoroughly enjoyed my time here.
lovely apartment. easy to get into main part of town. highly recommend.
Beautiful apartment and very well equipped! Excellent hosts!
Great location and great price for the location. Would highly recommend
We enjoyed our stay in Calgary. Great location and the owners were very responsive and helpful.
Great stay, excellent location. We had troubles with the locks but they were super helpful and responsive.

I had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb! The apartment was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The location was perfect, close to everything I needed, and the host was friendly and responsive. Highly recommend for anyone visiting the area!

I had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb, thanks to the responsive and kind hosts who made everything seamless. The place was spotlessly clean with beautiful views that elevated the experience. I’d highly recommend this gem to anyone seeking a comfortable and scenic getaway!

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.93 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
description: Experience Prime Downtown LivingPerfect Location:Walk to the Saddledome, BMO Centre, dining, and shopping.Just minutes from the Calgary Stampede!Comfort & Convenience:High-speed Wi-Fi with Netflix.Relaxing patio with views.Fully equipped kitchen & coffee station.Master bath with large bathtub, second with stand-up shower.Laundry room with essentials.Sleep & Storage:Queen-sized beds in both bedrooms.Ample storage space.Extras:Heated, secure underground parking included.The spaceThis beautiful property offers a comfortable and spacious layout, perfect for a relaxing stay.As you enter, you'll find a generously sized main bathroom with a variety of linens and supplies for your convenience. The bathroom also includes a sleek glass stand-up shower.Continuing down the hall, you'll find the secondary bedroom to your left. This room features sliding glass doors for privacy, a queen-sized bed, a closet for storage, and an alarm clock for added convenience.Next, the open-concept living and kitchen area boasts abundant natural light from the floor-to-ceiling windows, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere. The living room includes a cozy fold-out couch, ideal for relaxing or watching TV. A desk is also available, perfect for work or reading, with plenty of space for your personal items.The kitchen is fully equipped with both large and small appliances to meet all your needs, and we've added a Keurig coffee station for your enjoyment.Step outside onto the smaller but cozy patio accessible from the living room, where you can enjoy beautiful views and unwind.The master bedroom, located immediately to the right as you enter, offers a spacious retreat with a comfortable queen-sized bed, a closet for your belongings, and an alarm clock.Connected to the master bedroom, the en-suite bathroom features a relaxing tub and a spacious vanity area, providing ample space for your personal items.This property offers everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay—book now for an unforgettable experience!Guest accessGuests have access to all areas within the property.Other things to noteIf you have any questions or concerns please ask!Registration DetailsBL285409
reviews: Had a nice stay at Jesse’s condo. I booked last minute and had a really seamless check in process. The space was clean and well stocked including things like cooking oil and spices. I deducted a star because I found the bed to be very soft to the point of discomfort while sleeping. Otherwise this was a 5 star stay in a great location with a great host.
Only downside is that getting into the parking lot is mildly inconvenient with the remote needed from inside the apartment. Other than that the place is perfect and a great price.

We had a lovely stay at Jesse’s place. The condo is very comfortable and in an excellent location. Jesse is quite possibly the most responsive host that I have dealt with!  We had absolutely no concerns and would be happy to stay there again …

Jesse's place was great and the detailed instructions for getting into the building and parking were excellent. The location was perfect, right in the heart of downtown with excellent restaurants nearby. the Food Hall across the street was very handy and yummy.
Fantastic condo in a great location and at a great price. Very responsive and friendly host. Everything you need is provided. Parking was a big plus. We’ll be back for sure.

This is such a great location to explore Calgary. The apartment was spotless, had everything we needed and the coffee was great! Our host’s communication was superb and we couldn’t have wanted anything more.

Really enjoyed our short stay! Great location, apartment is very spacious, lots of sunlight. We were positively surprised with kitchen - you can find not only normally provided staff like glasses and plates, but spices, sugar, cooking oil, simple things which could make it way more convenient if you like to cook. Communication with Jesse was great as well - very helpful(I made sure to ask stupid questions:)) and friendly. Would recommend!

Great stay! Jesse was very responsive and checked in to make sure everything was going smoothly. The apartment is in a great location—just a short walk to downtown, with plenty of restaurants and coffee shops nearby. It also has a nice view of the city skyline. The space was clean, well-equipped, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Highly recommend!

Beyond what I have listed in my ratings about the location, cleanliness, and host responsiveness I wanted to highlight that they beds were very comfortable and the pillows were a premium variety (none of that folding pillows in half to get a decent head lift lol). Great stay, completely as advertised and right in the heart of downtown - close to working spaces, excellent food and drink options, and also to the Stampede grounds. Fantastic stay!

Clean place, exactly as described. Thoughtful details that a lot of other hosts miss. Location couldn't be better. Jesse is a very responsive and accommodating host. Would stay here again without hesitation.

Although I had sent my id for the host twice, my access was not activated because of id request!
The condo was clean , but the second bedroom was actually a den without walls or window
Jessie’s is a very pro active host. Friendly and helpful. The place is super convenient and lots to do with in the area, the bed is comfort and it has peaceful balcony patio. I will def stay again.

the place was very nice. and spacious like it said. I liked the view. it was clean the check in was easy host was fast to response and it's downtown in a great location I would definitely book again when I come back to calgary.
Jesse was amazing with his communication. He reached out during my stay to ensure everything was up to par! His place had everything my friends and I needed! Would say here again!
Great location super close to what we needed, house was clean and self check in worked well for us. House is stunning and balcony is great :)

Place was as described with no issues
Easily fit a full size truck in parking spot
Great place !
We were only here for one night, but I wish we could have stayed longer! Such a cute place, great location, nice view, comfy beds, loved it!

Great place to stay in downtown Calgary, great view, awesome place to stay, and very helpful host. We had a little of trouble getting in (totally my fault, didn’t read the instructions well enough) and Jesse was extremely helpful and made sure we made it in. Very nice furniture, comfortable beds, and was extremely clean! Would definitely recommend a stay!

Had a great stay, amazing views of the City, great locations to bars and arena. Place was clean, and enjoyed the kitchen for breakfast - had everything you needed. I received random message asking how the stay was, it was great to hear
From the host, even though we did not need anything. Highly recommend!
Clean unit with all amenities included. Great location as well! Jesse is the man 👍

Nice big flat
Stayed there with three other friends. Nice, functional apartment for a group of four.
Great location,exactly what we were looking for. The place was inviting, well-maintained, and exceptionally convenient.  Highly recommended!
Great place in a nice neighborhood with fun restaurants nearby. Close to downtown and convenient for everything we wanted to do in Calgary!
Perfect location for our convention at  the BMO, we were able to walk there and all around Calgary. The apartment was comfortable and peaceful.

Great place !

description: Live life in style at this amazing 2-bed condo with breathtaking downtown skyline views! Enjoy unique features like floor-to-ceiling windows, polished concrete floors, and stylish furnishings. Marvel at sunsets over the Rocky Mountains from your living room!Walk to Calgary's hottest restaurants, nightlife, and events. Located near Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, 17th Ave SW, and the Calgary Saddledome & Stampede Grounds! Don't miss this opportunity to stay at Calgary's finest!The space- FREE parking for one vehicle in the heated underground parkade! - Modern condo with stunning views!- Breathtaking downtown views- Floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light- Air conditioning for optimal comfort- Granite countertops and polished concrete floors- Tastefully furnished bedrooms- Plush queen mattresses and pillows- Ample closet space- Dedicated work area- In-suite laundry- Fully equipped kitchen- Comfortable living room- Shower essentials provided- Dedicated workspace- Located in the prestigious Colours building- Developed by award-winning Batistella DevelopersGuest access- Secure smart lock!- Elevator to your floor!- Private and exclusively yours apartment!- Assigned stall in secure underground parkade!- Wheelchair friendly!Other things to note-Missing keys incur a $250 replacement fee.-Respect condo bylaws, especially quiet hours after 10pm. - We use a noise monitoring device; It does NOT record actual sounds or conversations, it simply monitors the noise level (measured in decibels). name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.98 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Free Underground Heated Parking - One lot.***Walk Score 96***Welcome to our stylish and comfortable 2 bedroom condo in the heart of downtown Calgary, just steps from the financial district and famous 17th street with its great restaurants and patios! Our fully equipped and beautifully decorated unit is perfect for business trips or a city break with family.BL265033The spaceOur 2 bedroom condo can accommodate up to 3 guests and offers all the amenities you'll need to feel right at home. We've designed the space to be bright, modern and functional with an open-plan living and dining area, sleek kitchen and plenty of natural light. Main  bedroom is furnished with comfortable queen-sized bed and the second bedroom features single bed. Both bedroom comes with high-quality linens for a good night's sleep.If you're looking to explore the city, you'll be delighted with our location right in the heart of it all! You'll be able to walk to some of the city's most popular sites, such as the Calgary Stampede Park and Saddledome arena, and our building boasts an impressive Walk Score of 96! Plus, with free parking included, you can bring your car and explore the city at your leisure.After a day of sightseeing or meetings, come back to our condo and relax on the balcony to take in the city views. Then, head down to 17th street to explore some of Calgary's best restaurants and pubs, or cook up a meal in our fully-equipped kitchen.Come and experience all that Calgary has to offer from our prime location in the heart of the city. We look forward to hosting you soon!Guest accessYou will have access to entire condo and it’s balcony.Other things to note“The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will  comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay.”You will also find the binder inside the condo.Registration DetailsBL265033
reviews:
Anna's place was just as advertised! Perfect location, the view was spectacular and the apartment was extremely clean and in good condition!
Anna's quick to get back to you and made sure everything was explained to a T and that our visit was running smoothly. I would definetly stay here again when in town.

Anna’s place was everything that we hoped for! The location is absolutely awesome. It’s situated perfectly between Stephan Ave and 17th, and right in the middle of 1st Street’s fantastic restaurant area.
The condo itself was really clean, the furniture was comfortable and Anna’s little extras were extremely thoughtful. We felt right at home and would be very happy to stay again. Thanks for having us!

Our stay with Anna was fantastic.Her instructions were clear and easy to follow. The apartment was exactly as pictured clean, comfortable, and with stunning views. The location couldn’t be better, right in the heart of downtown Calgary, with everything within walking distance.Would definitely come back again.

Anna’s apartment was perfect for our stay in downtown Calgary! The place was spotless, comfortable, and had a great view of the city. The location was super convenient, and Anna was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Would definitely stay here again!

Anna’s place is a Fantastic find in downtown Calgary!
It’s a beautiful apartment with everything you need and lots of supplies to make you feel at home.
There’s even a great view from the floor to ceiling windows or balcony.
Highly recommend dealing with Anna. Super responsive host!

Really enjoyed my stay here. Anna was able to accommodate my check in for earlier than the normal time which was nice of her. Great host and the unit was really nice. Everything was the way it was in the photo. I’ll definitely come back.

Had a great stay at Anna’s place. The location was super convenient and had a great view of downtown Calgary! Anna was super responsive and the instructions for how to get into the condo were very easy to follow. Highly recommend booking with Anna!

A sensational stop over in Calgary. Anna's space was perfect, as described and exactly what was needed.
Super location for downtown, the tower, the SAM centre and even a trendy little street market. Anna was so responsive, helpful when we had a parking query and went the extra mile to call ahead and check out restrictions at the venue we were attending
Could not ask for more. 5*

My family and I had an awesome time at this spot. From the great restaurant options to the incredible view to the perfect amount of space for a family of three in downtown Calgary. We loved the bathroom and the washer and dryer was a huge plus. And the host had some of the best most detailed instructions possible. Would highly recommend this place.

Had a great stay at Anna's apartment.  Very easy to get in, good location (15 minutes walk to city centre) and some good bars and places to eat across the street.  Anna also left some snacks and drinks, which was brilliant after a long trip.  Communication was really good, and always very fast.  Apartment was very clean, with pretty much everything you would want for a week long stay.  Couldn't fault anything : A+ experience.  Thank you Anna!

We stayed at Anna’s apartment as part of a girl’s trip and had a great time. She was so responsive and incredibly helpful with everything from check-in to check-out. The apartment was very clean, and exactly as advertised—beautiful floor to ceiling windows in a central location downtown. Many cafes nearby and plenty of locations to walk to. Would definitely stay again!

We had a lovely stay at Anna's! Free parking was very helpful. Had a stunning view of the city. We were lucky to have a lightning storm that evening for quite the spectacle behind the Calgary tower. Comfprtabe space. Lots of good eats nearby.

We loved staying here, appreciated that it had parking but was also so walkable to restaurants. Everything was clean, as pictured, and had everything we needed for our stay. Host gave very clear instructions and was easy to communicate with. Would definitely recommend!
Great unit in a great location! Unit was very clean and looked exactly like its photos. Anna was very communicative and responded quick. Looking forward to staying here again!
adorable apartment nestled in the heart of downtown Calgary, I would definitely recommend it to others 😊 Very clean and lovely! we enjoyed our stay!
Spend two nights at Anna's place. This unit is Cozy and  modern, and Anna is super easy to communicate with. Will stay again if we visit Calgary next time.
Anna was very responsive and made it a smooth process to check in. The place was very clean and felt very comfortable. The view from the apartment is amazing.
What a view of downtown Calgary! Responsive host, easy check in and out, and reasonably priced.
Anna was an awesome host, and her Airbnb was just what we were looking for! Excellent location, and a beautiful view. Thanks!

Anna's condo was a delightful addition to our trip. We felt very secure in her building. Her 12th floor condo gave us a view of Calgary we'd never seen before and we were shutterbugs trying to capture the Calgary Tower and what we called 'the cube building' that showed colourful 'rain drops' and other designs as night fell and lights came on. The view overshadowed any concerns about the lack of window coverings in the livingroom, as we would have left them open anyway. The deck gave us another experience as we heard the city from a fresh perspective. We really enjoyed our stay at Anna's place had everything we needed and more, and hopefully we can stay there again on our next trip to Calgary.

I stayed at Anna's place for 5 nights as part of a work trip. Anna was very accomodating with check-in due to my late flight arrival and was responsive throughout. The unit itself has a very good use of space and wonderful city view.  The abundance of snacks, drinks, and bathroom supplies were a fantastic touch! The location is very central making getting around city super easy. Overall I'd highly recommend!

Anna’s condo was very well situated for my stay in Calgary.
Getting around was super easy, whether by vehicle or on foot.
There are several restaurants and coffee shops nearby, the neighbourhood is very walkable.
The condo itself is well appointed with comfortable furniture and bedding.
Anna is a great communicator and very accommodating.
I would stay here again without hesitation and highly recommend it to other travellers

We had a great two days in Calgary. Anna's place played a large part in that. There was a small hiccup regarding a key fob when we first got there, but that was quickly resolved.
The location was fine, we did go to 17th Street the first night for dinner, and downtown for the second night.
The view of the downtown skyline was superb!
If I found myself in Calgary again, I'd definitely try to book this property again.
Exactly as described with stores in walkable distance. The view is spectacular!!!!

We loved the bathroom and the washer and dryer was a huge plus. And the host had some of the best most detailed instructions possible. Would highly recommend this place.

Had a great stay at Anna's apartment.  Very easy to get in, good location (15 minutes walk to city centre) and some good bars and places to eat across the street.  Anna also left some snacks and drinks, which was brilliant after a long trip.  Communication was really good, and always very fast.  Apartment was very clean, with pretty much everything you would want for a week long stay.  Couldn't fault anything : A+ experience.  Thank you Anna!

We stayed at Anna’s apartment as part of a girl’s trip and had a great time. She was so responsive and incredibly helpful with everything from check-in to check-out. The apartment was very clean, and exactly as advertised—beautiful floor to ceiling windows in a central location downtown. Many cafes nearby and plenty of locations to walk to. Would definitely stay again!

We had a lovely stay at Anna's! Free parking was very helpful. Had a stunning view of the city. We were lucky to have a lightning storm that evening for quite the spectacle behind the Calgary tower. Comfprtabe space. Lots of good eats nearby.

We loved staying here, appreciated that it had parking but was also so walkable to restaurants. Everything was clean, as pictured, and had everything we needed for our stay. Host gave very clear instructions and was easy to communicate with. Would definitely recommend!
Great unit in a great location! Unit was very clean and looked exactly like its photos. Anna was very communicative and responded quick. Looking forward to staying here again!
adorable apartment nestled in the heart of downtown Calgary, I would definitely recommend it to others 😊 Very clean and lovely! we enjoyed our stay!
Spend two nights at Anna's place. This unit is Cozy and  modern, and Anna is super easy to communicate with. Will stay again if we visit Calgary next time.
Anna was very responsive and made it a smooth process to check in. The place was very clean and felt very comfortable. The view from the apartment is amazing.
What a view of downtown Calgary! Responsive host, easy check in and out, and reasonably priced.
Anna was an awesome host, and her Airbnb was just what we were looking for! Excellent location, and a beautiful view. Thanks!

Anna's condo was a delightful addition to our trip. We felt very secure in her building. Her 12th floor condo gave us a view of Calgary we'd never seen before and we were shutterbugs trying to capture the Calgary Tower and what we called 'the cube building' that showed colourful 'rain drops' and other designs as night fell and lights came on. The view overshadowed any concerns about the lack of window coverings in the livingroom, as we would have left them open anyway. The deck gave us another experience as we heard the city from a fresh perspective. We really enjoyed our stay at Anna's place had everything we needed and more, and hopefully we can stay there again on our next trip to Calgary.

I stayed at Anna's place for 5 nights as part of a work trip. Anna was very accomodating with check-in due to my late flight arrival and was responsive throughout. The unit itself has a very good use of space and wonderful city view.  The abundance of snacks, drinks, and bathroom supplies were a fantastic touch! The location is very central making getting around city super easy. Overall I'd highly recommend!

Anna’s condo was very well situated for my stay in Calgary.
Getting around was super easy, whether by vehicle or on foot.
There are several restaurants and coffee shops nearby, the neighbourhood is very walkable.
The condo itself is well appointed with comfortable furniture and bedding.
Anna is a great communicator and very accommodating.
I would stay here again without hesitation and highly recommend it to other travellers

We had a great two days in Calgary. Anna's place played a large part in that. There was a small hiccup regarding a key fob when we first got there, but that was quickly resolved.
The location was fine, we did go to 17th Street the first night for dinner, and downtown for the second night.
The view of the downtown skyline was superb!
If I found myself in Calgary again, I'd definitely try to book this property again.
Exactly as described with stores in walkable distance. The view is spectacular!!!!

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.98 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Centrally located downtown condo with amazing sunset and mountain views. The condo has been set up for business travellers and couples with a large desk that accommodates two people and computers. The coffee table also extends up allowing proper ergonomics if wanting a change of scenery to work comfortably from the couch. I will price match any other unit with a similar layout in the building. Contact me for shorter trip request. Unit can accommodate a third person with a cot style bed.The space- Real photos - Personally respond to all messages  - Price match any similar layout at time of booking - Below market rate cleaning fees - Higher quality more personalized stays- No extra fees for checkin/checkouts - Lots of extra supplies for longer stays - Brand new King bed  - 680 Thread count sheets - Down filled duvets  - 55’ Sony TV with surround sound - Webber BBQ- Curated for couples and business travel - Extremely organized decluttered space- Highest quality and speed internet - Full cable package add on Sports/News- Heated underground parking - Gym on the second floor - Coffee and Keurig machines with pods- Stainless steel full pot and pan set- Glass lock food storage containers  - Quality shampoo, body wash and soaps - Located one block from grocery storeGuest accessYou have access to the pool and common area, however the pool is only open during the summer months.Registration DetailsBL265761
reviews: Jonathan's place is very conveniently located in the Calgary downtown area, so it's walkable to all kinds of food options, cafes, etc.  The place itself has a very nice layout, decoration, and a well stocked kitchen/bathroom.  Jonathan was very keen to make sure he was available to help if needed and was very friendly throughout my stay.

Such a great find, beautiful apartment in a great location within walking distance to all the main attractions in calgary.  Great host and a stunning apartment with absolutely everything you need for your stay x

A charming condo with an amazing view of downtown Calgary.   Very central location, within walking distance to restaurants and shops.  Very easy check in and check out.   Gracious and responsive host.  I would definitely book it again when I come back to Calgary.

Our stay here was amazing! Very close to all the essentials and was easy to get around. The private parking space also made things a lot easier.
Jonathan was always on hand to help with anything we were unsure about.
The house was clean, with all the essentials that we required and we truly felt at home! The view of Calgary and the mountains was also incredible!
Would totally recommend this place to anyone looking for somewhere to stay.

WOW!   From booking to checkout, Jonathan was awesome.  VERY responsive.  The condo was even better than advertised!   My husband & I were there for a rotary conference at the BMO center.  Friends paid 3 times what we paid for a hotel room.  Location, price, cleanliness, security & Jonathan made our week perfect!  Would definitely recommend & would rent again if we ever come back to Calgary!

Beautiful clean condo in a great location. Everything was as described and very close to a lot of restaurants and cafes. Had a bit of trouble checking in but Jonathan was accommodating of a check-in after hours which was appreciated. Also sent lots of great recommendations for the area. Would definitely stay again!

What a gem of an Airbnb! The downtown location couldn't be beat for exploring the city, and waking up to that amazing view every morning was a highlight. Beyond the great space, our host was genuinely friendly and welcoming, making the stay even more enjoyable. Would definitely book again!"
It was the perfect place and just what we needed whilst staying in Calgary. Had all the amenities we needed and the view from the apartment is just beautiful. Thank you for the pleasant stay.
We had a lovely stay the views were amazing and we enjoyed watching the sunset. The space was lovely and comfortable it made a great base.
great place and location was very walkable.  only complaint was a lot of noise at night between the railroad and sirens.

I had such a wonderful stay at Jonathan’s 24th-story condo! The view is absolutely stunning, and the location couldn’t be better,just steps away from fantastic restaurants like Bridgette bar and sweet Loretta‘s. Having secure convenient underground parking made everything so easy.
The condo itself is beautifully appointed with everything you could possibly need. It was spotlessly clean, with crisp white towels and linens that made it feel like a luxury hotel. It’s the perfect space for up to two people.
The building amenities are great,the pool may be on the smaller side, but it was more than sufficient for a refreshing dip. What really stood out were the thoughtful little touches Jonathan put into the space. His collection of retro cassette tapes and the ghetto blaster added such a fun, personal vibe and put a smile on my face throughout my stay.
Overall, a fantastic experience,I’d definitely recommend this condo to anyone looking for comfort, convenience, and character.

Spent 10 days here.  The place was exactly as described and with the clear weather the views towards the mountains spectacular. Jonathan was easy to communicate with and was flexible around our arrival time from the airport. I would definitely look to see if this place was available on my next visit to Calgary.

What a stunning condo. We stayed here for a week when we first arrived in Calgary and couldn’t be more happy. Everything is in walking distance, including grocery’s only a couple of blocks away. And the apartment, really cool decor, comfy bed, and everything you could possible need. To top it all off, Jonathan was quick to respond to any questions and amazing to deal with. Definitely check this place out if you need somewhere to stay in Calgary!

We spent almost two weeks at Jonathan’s apartment in Calgary and we enjoyed our stay. The photos completely coincide with the space. It is very comfortable for two people. We enjoyed the city view, well equipped kitchen and cozy sofa and bed. The apartment desk is very useful if you are thinking of working remotely. In top of all that Jhonatan is a very attentive and ready to give you support.

Jonathan is a fantastic host. Can’t do better. Place is spotless, beautiful views and just that ‘home away from home’ feel.
Bed & bedding top notch - slept like a baby. Can still hear the trains, but didn’t wake me at night and for the location, it’s hard to avoid this, it’s high enough that it’s not a bother. Perfectly equipped. Just can’t fault this place. Will stay again.
Beautiful condo.  Exactly as advertised.  Clean, nice view.  Convenient location with lots of amenities within walking distance.  Jonathan was a great host.
Great spot to stay, centrally located and easy to access everything you could want and need! Highly recommend!
Jonathan is an excellent host with very clear, quick communication. The apartment was just as described. The location made it easy to walk to the grocery store and local eateries.
Jonathan’s apartment was the perfect space for our weeklong stay! Not only is it in the perfect location downtown, but it’s a beautiful space with everything we needed. I highly recommend it!
Great Host, Great Place,  nothing more to say
Very nice apartment, amazing bed. Location is very central and many good restaurants and grocery stores are walkable.
Jonathan is has great communication and it was very easy to check in and out. The unit has EVERYTHING so check to see if the unit has it first before buying it yourself.
Beautiful place, clean and had everything we needed to make our valentines weekend a blast. Jonathan was a great host and always responded promptly. 100% recommend!
What a beautiful condo and dealing with Jon was a pleasure .  Would recommend to anyone staying in Calgary !!!

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.97 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: FREE UG Secured Parking - 1 spot***Walk Score 96***Welcome to our modern downtown condo situated just above the famed 17th Avenue in downtown core! This stunning one-bedroom condo is perfect for working travelling people or couples seeking adventure in the heart of the city. Whether you're here to explore the city,  business trip, attend the famous Stampede festival, or simply relax with someone special, this charming place has everything you need for an unforgettable stay!BL266105The spaceThis peaceful corner unit features:- floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning panoramic views,  - modern sliding glass doors, - flowing layout,- fully equipped kitchen,- granite countertop, - ergonomic workstation, - highspeed Internet, - Nostalgic Classic Turntable with records, - 50" Smart TV with Netflix, - One designated underground parking lot.*** Please inquire if you need additional sleeping arrangements, we can provide bedding set for the sofa bed if you travel with children***The moment you step into this stunning condo, you will be greeted by gorgeous city views through floor-to-ceiling windows and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. The condo is bright and sunny, perfect for starting your day on the right foot. And if you love coffee or tea, you're in for a treat! Our condo boasts a Nespresso coffee machine that will make sure you feel energized and ready to tackle the day ahead. Our condo is also equipped with a turntable, perfect for those of you looking to kick back, relax, and let the music transport you to another world. Whether you're into classical tunes, smooth jazz, or some upbeat pop, our turntable has got you covered. In the bedroom you'll find a comfortable queen-sized bed that guarantees a good night's rest. As you wake up refreshed, head to the fully-equipped kitchen to whip up a delicious breakfast. Enjoy your meal at the stylish granite countertop kitchen bar, where you can admire the stunning views of the city from the high floor.And if you are a remote worker in search of perfect space that combines productivity, comfort and leisure, this condo with dedicated  working ergonomic place and calming atmosphere that allows to focus is the ultimate retreat.If you're in town for the Stampede festival, you're in luck! This condo is conveniently located close to the festivities and offers easy access to all the exciting events. After a long day of exploring, return to the comfort of your home-away-from-home and lose yourself in the pages of a good book or enjoy 50" Smart TV  with Netflix perfect for movie nights with a complementary pop corn. Book with us today and experience downtown living at its best!Guest accessYou will have access to entire condo and its balconyOther things to note“The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay.”Registration DetailsBL266105
reviews: We had a wonderful stay at Anna’s place!! The apartment was just as pictured with gorgeous views. The location was absolutely perfect and walking distance to everywhere we needed to go. Anna was a wonderful and very responsive host and made the check in/check out process super smooth for us. Would definitely stay here again!
I recommend the Anna’s place.  Nice location, nice view and clean unit.  And had everything I needed in the unit.  The communication was excellent.  I would stay here again.

This was the perfect place for my short time in Calgary. Central and nice area to walk around also.
The apartment has great views and the host was responsive and helpful.
Would definitely book it again.

I can't wait to stay here again! I loved the location: walkable, restaurants galore, best bars, etc...I felt safe and people were really friendly. The space was beautiful and had everything I needed - including Nespresso coffee. The views were spectacular; I enjoyed waking up to the sunrise from the bed. This place invigorated me in so many ways!
Anna was extremely responsive and her communication truly showed how much she cares for her guests. Highly recommend!

I stayed for two weeks with my teenage son. Thanks to Anna, we were able to enjoy a safe and comfortable environment, along with a room that offered a wonderful view. It was truly an unforgettable experience in my life.
The location is close to downtown, and there are two supermarkets nearby, which made cooking very convenient. A sofa bed was also provided, making the room spacious and comfortable.
I highly recommend this place, especially for parents traveling with their children:)

This was a perfect condo for my trip. The location is prime, the condo is spacious, well equipped and very modern, and the host is very nice and helpful. Very suitable for both short and longer term stays in Calgary.
You just can’t beat the location and the views. The place had everything we needed and the bed was comfy. We were there for 2 nights and slept great! Nice work station too.
Anna’s condo was great.  Loved the location which was walkable to many restaurants and shops in the heart of the city.  It was nice not having to worry about parking being so close to everything.
Great place to stay! Clean, easy check-in/out, convenient location in city, quiet building, loved the corner unit. No issues at all, Anna was a great host, would highly recommend to others!
Great location with much walkable food and amenities near by. Amazing view of the city and skyline of the mountains on the horizon. The full Calgary experience.
Great place to spend a few nights in Calgary. Near great restaurants and coffee shops. Very walkable. Clean and cozy.

Anna’s beautiful place was perfect for our stay in Calgary!  An easy walk to and from BMO Center/Saddledome/Stampede grounds.  The bedroom doors close so a second person can stay up later and watch TV in the living room which has a good sofa bed.  A walk-in shower and a bath/shower combo were a bonus. Great closet space and laundry.  All the apartment features made for a comfortable and wonderful multi-day stay.  Anna is the BEST kind of host…communicates clearly, responds quickly.  She answered my many questions about the neighborhood which as a first-timer to that part of Canada, I GREATLY appreciated!   I highly recommend this place!

Anna was a great host.  Her place was as described and was everything I expected.  Her place is in a great neighbour and very close to everything downtown.  The only draw back to the building is having to use the fob to exit the parkade, finding a place to park on the street, and then returning the fob to the unit.
Anna’s place was exactly as described. We will definitely return. Highly recommend.
Great space to stay for a quick trip.  Anna was extremely responsive to all questions.
We loved our stay at Anna’s apartment, it was comfortable, clean and had everything we needed there. Location was perfect too. Would definitely stay there again!

Can't say enough about this place - bed was firm and super supportive and comfortable - couldn't even feel my partner who typically tosses all night. The water pressure was a pleasant surprise - very powerful! room darkening blinds really help because this unit has windows on 2 sides, which gives a very open roominess feel. The location was perfect as our son was competing at the nearby MNP sport complex, less than a 10 min walk away and the unit was so close to 17th avenue where there is incredible nightlife and energy.
Anna was extremely pro-active on the happenings of the condo complex and an excellent communicator with great recommendations. Typically responded to text messages in less than 2 minutes. It felt like we were her top priority. The Nespresso machine and pods was also a nice touch as were the granola bars and microwave popcorn (which we took advantage of having arrived at 10pm). Great place - we will come back for sure!!

we stumbled across Anna's rental when our original rental had some plumbing issues they couldn't fix immediately. The unit is in a great location, and Anna was very accommodating with it being a last minute booking. we will definitely be back as this place has a great vibe to it.

Very clean centrally located. Lovely views. Easy walking distance to restaurants and shopping. Very clear instructions how to get in and leave. Host was available and responded immediately to any questions we asked. The unit was pristine and had everything available to make our stay enjoyable. We highly recommend this unit and we would love to stay there again if/and when we might visit Calgary in the future. Thank you for making our Christmas memorable.
Lila & Ron Tucker

Anna’s place is in a great location, surrounded by great restaurants and coffee spots.
It was clean, quiet, and easy to access. It was a great value compared to hotels in the area.
Beautiful condo. Great location. Would highly recommend.
We had a great stay and appreciated the hospitality of the hosts.
Fantastic location.  The host is also extremely responsive!
Anna was great. The place was homey. Very happy with the stay.

reviews_details.review: We had a wonderful stay at Anna’s place!! The apartment was just as pictured with gorgeous views. The location was absolutely perfect and walking distance to everywhere we needed to go. Anna was a wonderful and very responsive host and made the check in/check out process super smooth for us. Would definitely stay here again!
I recommend the Anna’s place.  Nice location, nice view and clean unit.  And had everything I needed in the unit.  The communication was excellent.  I would stay here again.

This was the perfect place for my short time in Calgary. Central and nice area to walk around also.
The apartment has great views and the host was responsive and helpful.
Would definitely book it again.

I can't wait to stay here again! I loved the location: walkable, restaurants galore, best bars, etc...I felt safe and people were really friendly. The space was beautiful and had everything I needed - including Nespresso coffee. The views were spectacular; I enjoyed waking up to the sunrise from the bed. This place invigorated me in so many ways!
Anna was extremely responsive and her communication truly showed how much she cares for her guests. Highly recommend!

I stayed for two weeks with my teenage son. Thanks to Anna, we were able to enjoy a safe and comfortable environment, along with a room that offered a wonderful view. It was truly an unforgettable experience in my life.
The location is close to downtown, and there are two supermarkets nearby, which made cooking very convenient. A sofa bed was also provided, making the room spacious and comfortable.
I highly recommend this place, especially for parents traveling with their children:)

This was a perfect condo for my trip. The location is prime, the condo is spacious, well equipped and very modern, and the host is very nice and helpful. Very suitable for both short and longer term stays in Calgary.
You just can’t beat the location and the views. The place had everything we needed and the bed was comfy. We were there for 2 nights and slept great! Nice work station too.
Anna’s condo was great.  Loved the location which was walkable to many restaurants and shops in the heart of the city.  It was nice not having to worry about parking being so close to everything.
Great place to stay! Clean, easy check-in/out, convenient location in city, quiet building, loved the corner unit. No issues at all, Anna was a great host, would highly recommend to others!
Great location with much walkable food and amenities near by. Amazing view of the city and skyline of the mountains on the horizon. The full Calgary experience.
Great place to spend a few nights in Calgary. Near great restaurants and coffee shops. Very walkable. Clean and cozy.

Anna’s beautiful place was perfect for our stay in Calgary!  An easy walk to and from BMO Center/Saddledome/Stampede grounds.  The bedroom doors close so a second person can stay up later and watch TV in the living room which has a good sofa bed.  A walk-in shower and a bath/shower combo were a bonus. Great closet space and laundry.  All the apartment features made for a comfortable and wonderful multi-day stay.  Anna is the BEST kind of host…communicates clearly, responds quickly.  She answered my many questions about the neighborhood which as a first-timer to that part of Canada, I GREATLY appreciated!   I highly recommend this place!

Anna was a great host.  Her place was as described and was everything I expected.  Her place is in a great neighbour and very close to everything downtown.  The only draw back to the building is having to use the fob to exit the parkade, finding a place to park on the street, and then returning the fob to the unit.
Anna’s place was exactly as described. We will definitely return. Highly recommend.
Great space to stay for a quick trip.  Anna was extremely responsive to all questions.
We loved our stay at Anna’s apartment, it was comfortable, clean and had everything we needed there. Location was perfect too. Would definitely stay there again!

Can't say enough about this place - bed was firm and super supportive and comfortable - couldn't even feel my partner who typically tosses all night. The water pressure was a pleasant surprise - very powerful! room darkening blinds really help because this unit has windows on 2 sides, which gives a very open roominess feel. The location was perfect as our son was competing at the nearby MNP sport complex, less than a 10 min walk away and the unit was so close to 17th avenue where there is incredible nightlife and energy.
Anna was extremely pro-active on the happenings of the condo complex and an excellent communicator with great recommendations. Typically responded to text messages in less than 2 minutes. It felt like we were her top priority. The Nespresso machine and pods was also a nice touch as were the granola bars and microwave popcorn (which we took advantage of having arrived at 10pm). Great place - we will come back for sure!!

we stumbled across Anna's rental when our original rental had some plumbing issues they couldn't fix immediately. The unit is in a great location, and Anna was very accommodating with it being a last minute booking. we will definitely be back as this place has a great vibe to it.

Very clean centrally located. Lovely views. Easy walking distance to restaurants and shopping. Very clear instructions how to get in and leave. Host was available and responded immediately to any questions we asked. The unit was pristine and had everything available to make our stay enjoyable. We highly recommend this unit and we would love to stay there again if/and when we might visit Calgary in the future. Thank you for making our Christmas memorable.
Lila & Ron Tucker

Anna’s place is in a great location, surrounded by great restaurants and coffee spots.
It was clean, quiet, and easy to access. It was a great value compared to hotels in the area.
Beautiful condo. Great location. Would highly recommend.
We had a great stay and appreciated the hospitality of the hosts.
Fantastic location.  The host is also extremely responsive!
Anna was great. The place was homey. Very happy with the stay.

name: Guest suite in Calgary · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description: Great basement suite with high ceilings in the heart of Calgary, located in the trendy area of Mission. Many great restaurants and bars / clubs are only steps away. Downtown, 17th avenue, Stephen avenue, the Saddledome, the river and Stampede grounds are all nearby and easily accessible by foot!Access to public transportation is steps away. All the amenities you require including grocery stores, shops, shoppers drug marts and public parks are within 5 minute walks.The spaceThe main bedroom is a Queen size bed with a full en-suite (bathroom). The couch in the living area is a full pull out bed that can comfortably sleep another two. The half bathroom is great if you plan to have 4 people using the space and a full washer and dryer is ready to use.  The kitchen is fully functionable including a stove, oven and refrigerator and all kitchenware you may need during your stay is available. You will enjoy one free outdoor public parking spot.  Public parking is also available. If you require an additional spot please inquire and I will assist.A large 65 inch tv with roku awaits you. Wi fi and and ethernet cable are also avaialble. i am happy to look into any requests you may have.Guest accessYou will have access to the entire basement. this suite is completely separated from the rest of the house and you will not be bothered by other tenants.Other things to notePlease note that there is no direct control of the heating and cooling in the suite. Temperature is set to a comfortable setting and there is an additional electric fireplace that can be controlled by the guest for extra heat.
reviews: Location was super for walking to C-train to get to Stampede grounds.  Many great restaurants right around the corner on 4th, plus a Shoppers and Safeway nearby, which was a nice surprise and very handy.  It is a basement suite, so more of a sleep and go location, though the kitchen is well equipped if you want to do any meals.  John was easy to reach, welcoming, and responded quickly.   I would stay again 😊

John’s Airbnb was absolutely perfect! We stayed for four months without a single issue, and it truly felt like home. The location is amazing—very walkable, close to the river, and surrounded by beautiful parks with plenty to do. The place is well-equipped with everything we needed for a long stay, and it was also great for our pet. John was a fantastic host—friendly, responsive, and always helpful. We absolutely loved our time here and would recommend it to anyone!
Perfect location for lots of dining options

We booked John's place as a base for our move to Canada, and it was a lovely place to land when we got to the country. Very spacious and with good amounts of kitchen and bathroom space. The immediate area was pretty quiet which was a nice aspect, and it was super close to drugstores, groceries and lots of restaurants and coffee shops to explore. Easy to walk to downtown or catch a C-Train in, it's a great spot for exploring Calgary. John was one of the most responsive hosts I've ever stayed with and I really appreciated how quickly he got back to me and so quickly. Very considerate when our plans changed, which I'm very grateful for 😊
Solid stay! Great location and responsive host!
The accommodation is so neat and there are plenty of necessities! I love the location.

Stayed here for a weekend for the Calgary Stampede. Was only a 20 minute walk from the grounds, close to so many restaurants, quiet at night and parking was included. Looked exactly like the photos and the bedroom and bathroom were very spacious. Will definitely stay here again next time I’m in Calgary.

Myself, my husband and our gorgeous dog moved over here from the UK and found John's place and thought it would keep us afloat for about 5 weeks. We absolutely loved this amazing place. We felt right at home right away, the location is perfect and John is such a perfect host. Nothing was too much trouble. Can't recommend this place enough!

Had a great stay. Suite looks like pictures. John was very responsive and attentive to a few minor issues that came up. The location was wonderful -easy walking distance to anything you may need or want. Three blocks east on 25 Ave is a lovely walking path along the river - walk for as long as you want. Will take you to the Calgary Stampede grounds in 20 minutes.
Would stay here again!

Great location. I stayed for 1 month, so my needs are a bit different than a brief stay but overall, my needs were met.
I gave a 3 on overall experience because the mattress is ready for the trash and I didn’t sleep well the entire time. Once the mattress is replaced, its value will go up but if you want good sleep, until the caved in mattress is replaced, it might be hard.
Other than that, John was communicative and helpful. You’ll be able to cook a meal, and do laundry. Master shower is awkward and needs a no slip mat but no real complaints on basic needs.
Excellent place to get to know the center of Calgary, very well equipped and quiet, a very family-friendly area but also with many restaurants and markets nearby.

We had a great stay at John's apartment. Highly recommended! The apartment is located in Mission which is a great area with small boutiques, fine dining and walking distance to Stampede Park. The street parking is easy and always as space. Communication and check-in very easy.

John is a great host. He is very helpful and accommodating. Very quick response times and was always there if I needed anything. It was great that I was able to bring my two cats with me. The area is great and there is lots to do! Thanks John
We enjoyed it so much!
John is a great host. He is very responsive and will help out right away if there is an issue. Thank you so much, John!
Everything was perfect, both the accommodation and the location, John was very attentive and friendly at all times. Recommended 100%

A gorgeous suite in an excellent location with lots to do in the immediate area (many restaurants, pubs and bars). John is a great host, responds to questions quickly and made the stay seamless. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a place to stay in Calgary.
The suite is in a fantastic neighborhood, close to nice walking trails, stores, restaurants and not too far from downtown and c-train station. We were very comfortable there.
Amazing location. Communication was great. Super easy check-in. Comfortable and clean apartment with everything you need to feel at home. Would definitely recommend.
Phenomenal space right in the heart of mission. Great amenities and John was a fantastic easy to access host. Will definitely be back!
Great place around many restaurants and coffee shops. Friendly neighborhood.
Fantastic suite, location, and hospitality. I highly recommend staying here.
Nice comfortable basement suite in a great location.
Was very clean and homely. We really enjoyed our stay

listing_title: Great basement suite in the Heart of Mission
listing_name: Entire guest suite in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: This basement suite is located in the trendy area of Mission right on 4 street SW. There are many great bars and restaurants. The elbow river and pathways are literally steps away and the Safeway grocery store and Shoppers drug mart are right around the corner.You can very easily get around by foot to all the vibrant areas of Calgary, including downtown, 17th avenue, the Saddledome, Lindsay Park, Victoria Park, the Elbow river and much more! We would be happy to answer any questions you may have!

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: The mission neighbourhood is one of the most easily accessible areas in Calgary. You can walk to the Saddledome , downtown and other night spots like 17th avenue in minutes. There is a bus stop located just around the corner that is super convenient if you want to go longer distances and save money , not to mention that a parking spot is available for rent in case you have your own vehicle (please inquire). 4th street easily lets you access all these major areas.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.85 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome home!Our chic two-bedroom condo with a king bed and beautiful views of the downtown skyline, with a view of the Calgary tower. Located in the heart of the Beltline. Walking distance to everything,  restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores, and all popular/trendy avenues. 5-min drive to river, Stampede, and Saddledome.Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location. POOL is closed for the winter.The spaceThis condo is only a 5 minute drive away from the Stampede grounds and the Saddledome!Notable Features:- Large balcony with a spectacular skyline view with unobstructed views of the Calgary tower-1 King bed w/ fresh beddings & linens-1 Queen bed w/ fresh beddings & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix, Amazon Prime and TSN (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ floor to ceiling windows-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-Ensuite Washer/Dryer with detergent and dryer sheets-High-speed WiFi-Free heated underground parking-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee-Iron/Ironing Board-Communal Lounge Area-Communal Pool (Between June to August)ID Verification Required for our property.All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.Guest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.*** POOL is closed for the winter.Registration DetailsBL288194
reviews: We didn’t get to stay so our rating doesn’t mean much. Our flight got cancelled due to the Air Canada strike. This airbnb owner will stick to the cancellation policy and won’t make any extra efforts for those who have been struck with misfortune. It is what it is. No bad blood. Review for future guests who may be affected by trip cancellations outside their control.

The condo was mostly clean except for the bathroom where the showers is mouldy, walls were unclean, and ring around bottom of tub. Washing machine mouldy and smells bad. While not the property owners’ fault, there is a very large presence of unhoused people. Lots of drug use in this neighbourhood. Located next to recycling facility which had lineup of homeless people each morning.

Excellent stay!
The condo was just what we needed! Kyle and Andrew were fantastic hosts, very quick to respond to questions, and very flexible to our needs over the extent of the stay. The location is excellent if you need to be downtown, and the view of the Calgary Tower is great!

This was a great base camp for our trip and Kyle was super quick with communication. The apartment looked exactly like the photos and having a dedicated parking spot in the garage was nice! I’d stay here again.

This Property was more than expected.
The hosts were great, easy to communicate with, and easy to talk to.
I would highly recommend this property for anyone staying in the Calgary area wanting quick access to downtown.
Five stars across the board.

I was in town for a music event near the unit and that worked out really well. I expected a noisy area but it was more than I anticipated. I do always have my Loop Sleep earplugs so I was fine, just be aware of that if you are a light sleeper. There are lots of nice places for a coffee or a bite in the area, and a Safeway a quit walk away. The unit itself is really sweet and stylish with great views of downtown and two very comfy beds, great bedding and quality towels. I loved having a full kitchen with good equipment! I also really appreciated having underground parking included.

Kyle’s place was amazing, very modern, clean and well maintained. The location was good, super easy to get cabs and uber rides.
The garage was perfect and the entry and exit was seamless.
Kyle was responsive and helpful a great spot.
Great communication from the host. Place was well equipped, clean and in such a nice location.

This was a lovely AirBnB to stay after flying in from the UK.
The beds were very comfortable, and everything was very clean.
Thanks for a great stay!
Great spot, very light and sunny - exactly like the pictures and Kyle was great
Great apartment in a great location! We would definitely come back again.
Great communication and an even better location. Perfect for a weekend away.
Had a great stay this weekend! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The location was perfect, and check-in was super easy. Would definitely stay here again!
kyle was an awesome host !!! the place is great check it out for yourselves!!!!

Had a great stay at Kyle & Andrew’s Airbnb in downtown Calgary. The location is perfect—everything you need is just a short walk away, from restaurants and shops to entertainment spots. The place itself was clean, comfortable, and had all the necessary amenities to make the stay convenient and hassle-free. On-site parking and gym access were added bonuses that made things even better. Communication with the hosts was smooth and prompt—they were helpful and responsive throughout. Overall, a very pleasant experience and I’d happily stay here again on my next visit to Calgary. Highly recommended!

perfect stay
next time I'm in Calgary I'll stay here again
Really wonderful space and very responsive hosts.
Great place to stay right in the middle of downtown and near lots of amenities. It was also easy and to get check in and out had no issues the 3 days we stayed
Great location. Great value. Very responsive host. Will definitely stay at one of Kyle/Ryan’s place for a third time.
We enjoyed staying at Kyle's place. Very good location, with a beautiful view of the Calagary Tower. The accommodation is modern and Kyle is very responsive. We highly recommend it.
