Had a great stay this weekend! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The location was perfect, and check-in was super easy. Would definitely stay here again!
kyle was an awesome host !!! the place is great check it out for yourselves!!!!

Had a great stay at Kyle & Andrew’s Airbnb in downtown Calgary. The location is perfect—everything you need is just a short walk away, from restaurants and shops to entertainment spots. The place itself was clean, comfortable, and had all the necessary amenities to make the stay convenient and hassle-free. On-site parking and gym access were added bonuses that made things even better. Communication with the hosts was smooth and prompt—they were helpful and responsive throughout. Overall, a very pleasant experience and I’d happily stay here again on my next visit to Calgary. Highly recommended!

perfect stay
next time I'm in Calgary I'll stay here again
Really wonderful space and very responsive hosts.
Great place to stay right in the middle of downtown and near lots of amenities. It was also easy and to get check in and out had no issues the 3 days we stayed
Great location. Great value. Very responsive host. Will definitely stay at one of Kyle/Ryan’s place for a third time.
Nous avons aimé séjourner au logement de Kyle. Très bon emplacement, avec une très belle vue sur la Tour de Calagary. Le logement est moderne et Kyle est très réactif. On recommande fortement.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to Summit—a stylish corner unit with stunning mountain views in the heart of downtown YYC located at 1st. Just steps from the arena, BMO Centre, and Hotel Arts, you're perfectly positioned to explore the city. Walk to 17th Ave or hop on nearby transit with ease. Relax in your spa-inspired bathroom. Sink into a spacious king bed, and enjoy modern amenities throughout. Take in the panoramic views from inside or on the patio. Your elevated city escape awaits!The spaceThis thoughtfully designed corner unit features  the spa-style ensuite, enjoying a glass of wine on the private balcony, or streaming your favorite show on the 55' Smart TV, every moment feels indulgent.BedroomPrimary Suite: Spacious primary with King bed with hybrid mattress, direct laundry access and a walk-through closet leading to a spa-like ensuite. Second BedUnfold a hidden luxury — a sleek cabinet double bed with stunning mountain views right from your pillow.OfficeA tucked-away office behind a sleek glass door — discreet storage plus a comfortable space to workBathroomPrimary ensuite with soaking tub shower combo, plus an additional walk-in shower, stocked with essentials (robes, towels including, body towels, hand towels, finger towels and makeup towels, hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, Epsom salt, floss picks, Q-tips, cotton pads, makeup remover, hair wrap towels, bath tub tray. KitchenFully stocked for home cooking with pots, pans, utensils, wine glasses, dinnerware,  electric stovetop, granite counters, and a large island for socializing.BalconyPrivate corner balcony with sweeping mountain and skyline views, complete with a plush lounge sectional.Living roomSoak in 180° mountain and skyline views from chic, comfortable seating. Enjoy curated décor and a 55” 4K Smart TV — perfect for cozy movie nights or streaming your favorite shows. Remote-controlled blinds offer privacy and darkness when needed. BonusFree underground parking included.Guest accessThe entire condo is exclusively yours for the duration of your stay, ensuring complete privacy and peace of mind. Step onto your private patio, the perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee or an afternoon cocktail while soaking in the vibrant downtown atmosphere. Designed for your comfort, this urban escape provides a private and relaxing setting for your stay.Registration detailsBL287262
reviews: This unit was so well thought through,everything we needed was provided, and the space was both functional and comfortable. The views were absolutely beautiful, and it’s clear the hosts put a lot of care into every detail. The kitchen was well-stocked, making it easy to cook and relax during our stay. Overall, a really lovely and thoughtfully designed place. We’d definitely stay here again!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Amazing Stay with a Stunning Downtown View!
I absolutely loved my stay at this Airbnb! The highlight was definitely the breathtaking downtown Calgary view — it was beautiful both day and night. The apartment was spotless, modern, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The host was friendly, responsive, and made check-in super easy. The location couldn’t be better — right in the heart of the city

This place was such a lucky find! It was so beautiful! Karly had lots of nice little touches that made the place feel luxurious and comfortable. She was very responsive and checked in on us throughout our stay. The view alone was worth the money, beautiful views of the sunset from up on the 17th floor! Loved our stay and hope to be back in the future.
What a view!   Beautiful condo with amazing views.  Comfortable king bed and fully stocked kitchen.  Was great to have the underground parking stall.  Thanks for a wonderful stay.

I booked a different unit for an employee who was visiting town, when I found out a couple of hours before check in that the unit was no longer available. In a pinch, I booked this unit. Karly was absolutely wonderful! She was super helpful and responded to my messages promptly. She was also able to accommodate an early check in as our employee had already arrived to town and the unit was available. The unit itself was absolutely beautiful, and very clean. The pictures portray it perfectly! Our employee was very happy with this place. Highly recommended and look forward to booking here again!! Thanks Karly and Kelly!
Great place. Clean, great views and overall just a stunning place. Loved everything about it
Favorite place in Calgary by a far! Reasonably priced, fantastic location and an exceptional host. Thank you.

We had such a wonderful stay! Karly was incredibly accommodating and communicative from start to finish, which made everything so easy. The little extras she provided were such a thoughtful touch - from the bath salts to the black makeup-removal towel (so much better than white facecloths!) to the cozy Fairmont robes. The kitchen was stocked with everything we could possibly need, and the included parking was the clincher for us.
Although we were only in town for one night, we truly wished we could have stayed longer. The location is unbeatable - having lived in Calgary for three years, I can say this is the best area for restaurants, coffee shops, brewpubs, and easy access to downtown and the convention centre.
We’d absolutely stay again and recommend Karly’s place to anyone visiting Calgary!
very clean place in a great location right downtown. a safe place with private parking right in the building. definitely recommend and we will stay again
Place is so comfy and warm. Also with downtown view is the best! I love it and I would go there again.
Great host and the property. Its amazing how well the property is decorated and maintained loved it. Stay was great and host was really helpful with any questions i had
Loved staying here! Great location! Host was excellent to communicate with!
Very cute condo,  well stocked, lovely decor.

Great place!! Fantastic area …
One of the best
A perfect girls night spot. Lots to do in the area.

listing_title: Summit Mountain & City Views Beltline
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
location_details.value: Stay in the heart of Calgary’s Beltline — one of the city’s most dynamic and walkable neighbourhoods. Just steps from downtown, the Beltline is known for its trendy cafés, boutique shops, craft breweries, and some of Calgary’s best restaurants. Explore nearby 17th Avenue, often called the “Red Mile,” for its lively nightlife, patios, and local charm.Guests will enjoy easy access to Stampede Park, the Saddledome, and the BMO Centre, making it an ideal location during events like the Calgary Stampede or conferences. The area also boasts beautiful green spaces like Central Memorial Park and a variety of transit options to get around the city with ease.Whether you’re in town for business or leisure, the Beltline offers a perfect blend of convenience, culture, and city energy.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: The Beltline is one of Calgary’s most walkable neighborhoods, with everything you need just steps away. Stroll to restaurants, cafés, grocery stores, and nightlife along vibrant 17th Avenue or downtown.For longer trips, public transit is easily accessible — multiple bus routes and the CTrain (Calgary’s light rail system) are within walking distance, providing quick access to all parts of the city, including Stampede Park, the Calgary Tower, and the airport.Prefer to drive? Paid street parking and parkades are nearby, and ride-sharing services like Uber are widely available.Whether on foot, bike, transit, or car, getting around from the Beltline is fast and convenient.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.87 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
description: Enjoy a tastefully decorated condo, centrally located in downtown Calgary. The condo offers unique amenities such as;- Rustic Japandi Interior Design Theme done by a local Interior Designer. Each piece was selected with comfort, ease of use and design theme in mind- Offering unique amenities such as a rooftop pool, gym, underground parking, private patio and more - Fully functional kitchen, perfect for cooking - Three sleeping spaces (two queen beds + double sofa bed) - Cable + HigThe spaceYou have full and private access to everything inside the beautifully designed condo. This property is full of amenities, such as; gym, root top patio and pool (seasonal)!  These amenities are shared with all other building occupants and there are rules that must be adhered to when in use.Inside the unit you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay. Every window has an amazing view. Whether you are sitting on the patio staring at the sun glistening off the high rise office buildings or if you are at the dining table admiring the Calgary Tower, you have view for days! There is one underground assigned parking stall for your sole use. Additional parking will need to be off site on the street ($) or at nearby paid parking lots ($$).Guest accessAs our guest you'll have access to the following amenities:•Private patio from the unit and shared rooftop patio•Kitchen w/ gas stove, convection oven, range and all utensils•Pool (seasonal)•Gym•TV •Cable •High speed internet•Washer & Dryer •Underground Parking •Professionally cleaned•Hosts that are available 24/7, should you have any questions.*** Always refer to the amenities section of the listing for the most up to date list of amenities ***Registration DetailsBL281774
reviews: Our family of four stayed for three nights. The apartment looked a little tired in person, but functionally everything was available as advertised. Beth's team were exceptionally proactive and provided great detail, and the views were to die for, particularly at sunrise. The beds were a little firm for our liking, but might suit others - thanks for having us.

I spent four days at Beth's apartment  downtown Calgary, and it was an amazing experience. The sunrises over the downtown skyline were absolutely beautiful. There are also plenty of restaurants and a vibrant nightlife, making it a great place for anyone wanting to get to know the heart of Calgary. I absolutely loved it!❣️

This was by far one of the best stays I’ve had dt Calgary. The customer service alone was so reliable and easy flowing. Beth made sure I was comfortable and answered all my questions. The unit was lovely very relaxing ambiance and great amenities within the building. The check in was smooth and straight forward as well as check out. I absolutely plan on rebooking this in the future so don’t walk run to book before it’s gone!

Beth and her team took great care of us from start to finish. Property felt very spacious with high, concrete ceilings, large windows, beautiful corner views (looking out to the Calgary tower from master bedroom), and spotless. Excellent location - very walkable to all sites and restaurants, including walks at the Bow River. Perfect for our 2 night stay, prior to flying out. A1 - highly recommend to all.
Cheers!
Marie

Enjoyed our stay as the place was very clean and had everything we needed. The host had very clear instructions and was quick and easy to communicate with. We did not notice the apartment was right next to multiple train tracks when we booked (our own fault), just be of caution if your a light sleeper that the trains run all night and can be loud (as well as many sirens). Great location though for night life as you can walk to many restaurants/ bars and shops around.
Thanks for having us!

Bright, clean, nice apartment ! Apartment managed by a company - professionally handled. Neighbourhood is good location for access to downtown and lots of nice restaurants  ; however it also carries with it a significant amount of displaced individuals (homeless/ substance abusers etc ) outside hanging around. They all seemed to be mostly harmless but good to be aware. Overall is a good apartment and place to stay especially as a home base for exploring Calgary .

Location was perfect! Very close to all the attractions, very walkable. Place was clean and equipped with coffee and cooking ingredients like oil and seasonings. Building is very safe. Detailed instructions are provided.
Best of all, Beth was extremely responsive. We locked ourselves out early morning on our last day and she responded quickly so we didn’t miss our flights. My advice is to read the manual and instructions so you don’t get locked out. 😉

Pros: Beautiful clean condo with small but nice patio. Great location. Amenities in kitchen and bathroom. Sheets/pillows/blankets for pullout. Blackout curtains on bedroom windows. Responsive (if sometimes unhelpful) host.
Cons: Check in was late in the day and inflexible. En suite bath is severely clogged. Only two elevators made it challenging at times. Only one building key fob. Train tracks across the street with late night trains. Bedroom doors are frosted which lets in light (not a huge deal).

We really enjoyed our "home" in the sky. It is a beautiful apartment with tasteful design and elegant touches. Comfy seating with huge windows. Upscale amenities and appliances throughout. Spotlessly clean. The roomy balcony had comfy seating from which we watched perfect sunsets behind the Olympic ski jump in the distance. A lightbulb burned out during our stay and it was replaced promptly. Management was kind and helpful. Highly recommend.
Thank you!

My family of three had a wonderful time. The panoramic city views, visible from every room, were absolutely captivating and made every moment feel luxurious. Beth was a great host, very friendly and responsive. Communication was effortless and immediate, from the initial booking to any questions that arose during our stay. The condo is in a central location yet very quiet at night. This is definitely a place we'll be recommending and returning to!

Beautiful place, very quiet and private. Great view of the city and super clean as well as organized. Very clear easy step by step instructions for everything. This allowed us to enjoy our trip with no hold ups from having to message the host for instructions on anything.

The perfect apartment for our family of 5 adults in a great location with absolutely everything we needed for our entire stay. Spacious and clean with tasteful decor throughout, every appliance needed was provided and very comfortable beds.
The management team were super responsive and extremely helpful throughout the booking and stay. Great downtown location with great bars and restaurants nearby and fantastic dual aspect views of the city and beyond.
We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to wonderful Calgary. Thank you Beth and team 🤗

Beautiful location and condo which met our needs adequately!  Management team was excellent with prompt responses, simplified instructions, and fabulous restaurant recommendations that were literally right around the corner!  Such a wonderful trip!
The air bnb was clean, in a perfect location and easy to access. The host was very responsive! Lots of instructions but if you read them carefully you have all the information you need.

Perfect location for exploring downtown Calgary and convenient access to all levels of shopping and restaurants.  The unit is super cute and comfortable with comfy beds and pillows!  The host is extremely responsive and accommodating, and provides clear and thorough instructions along with great resources for the area.  The building is quiet, and we heard no noise at night.  Highly recommend the Last Best Brewing and Distilling, which is a 2-minute walk away, great happy hour and food.

I spent my last week in Calgary here. I had neck & hand injuries, so my perspective is a bit different. The 22nd floor view is nice. I kept the windows uncovered 24/7. I loved the sun waking me up naturally. The kitchen is well-equipped. Checking in & out is easy. The bathtubs are long & deep. Very hot water. There are plenty of restaurants nearby w/delivery. The waste chute is a few steps from the door. Safeway is a 7 minute walk away. Those are the positives.
Worst ever pillows. I can't even guess what they're filled with. Nothing? The extra pillows in the closet were hard as a rock. For someone w/neck issues like me, it was excruciating.
Bring your own coffee unless you like deep discount brands or decaf. Mgmt never swapped out the Zenius decaf for me like they said they would.
No facial tissues, a miscalibrated thermostat, and a troublesome front door lock (code had to be entered twice every time) were other issues.
I won't stay anywhere managed by this company again.
The host was responsive and kind, and the place was beautiful -just as pictured & described!

I visited Calgary for the first time with my family, and it was a wonderful experience with Beth from Key Rental Management. Check-in and check-out were smooth and effortless.
The space itself was immaculate, secure, and thoughtfully equipped. We loved having clear instructions, which we truly appreciated from Beth. Whenever we needed something, they responded promptly—within just a few minutes—without any delay.
The condo was exactly as pictured: spotless, beautifully styled, and incredibly cozy. This rustic Japandi-inspired condo is situated in the heart of downtown—close to great restaurants and vibrant nightlife. The rustic Japandi vibe gave the place a warm, modern feel.
Communication was quick and reliable, and everything felt secure and spotless.
Thank you so much, Beth, for providing such a wonderful experience at your place. It was truly memorable, and we will definitely consider staying at the Rustic Japandi-Inspired condo again for future visits to Calgary.
This was my first Air BNB reservation, and Beth made it feel very smooth. Great location and great walkable resturant in this area.
We really enjoyed our stay in Calgary. The apartment was clean and exactly what we wanted.
Beth’s communication was outstanding! The instructions to get into the bnb was also very easy to understand. 😊
Clean apartment and great views. Very clear instructions from host. Would recommend staying here!
The stay was awesome!  We always had a response from the host to help us with anything we needed!! The location was awesome with an amazing view!!
If you want to stay in downtown Calgary, there’s probably no better place to stay. Awesome location, and the place was great.

Pros: Beautiful clean condo with small but nice patio. Great location. Amenities in kitchen and bathroom. Sheets/pillows/blankets for pullout. Blackout curtains on bedroom windows. Responsive (if sometimes unhelpful) host.
Cons: Check in was late in the day and inflexible. En suite bath is severely clogged. Only two elevators made it challenging at times. Only one building key fob. Train tracks across the street with late night trains. Bedroom doors are frosted which lets in light (not a huge deal).

We really enjoyed our "home" in the sky. It is a beautiful apartment with tasteful design and elegant touches. Comfy seating with huge windows. Upscale amenities and appliances throughout. Spotlessly clean. The roomy balcony had comfy seating from which we watched perfect sunsets behind the Olympic ski jump in the distance. A lightbulb burned out during our stay and it was replaced promptly. Management was kind and helpful. Highly recommend.
Thank you!

My family of three had a wonderful time. The panoramic city views, visible from every room, were absolutely captivating and made every moment feel luxurious. Beth was a great host, very friendly and responsive. Communication was effortless and immediate, from the initial booking to any questions that arose during our stay. The condo is in a central location yet very quiet at night. This is definitely a place we'll be recommending and returning to!

Beautiful place, very quiet and private. Great view of the city and super clean as well as organized. Very clear easy step by step instructions for everything. This allowed us to enjoy our trip with no hold ups from having to message the host for instructions on anything.

The perfect apartment for our family of 5 adults in a great location with absolutely everything we needed for our entire stay. Spacious and clean with tasteful decor throughout, every appliance needed was provided and very comfortable beds.
The management team were super responsive and extremely helpful throughout the booking and stay. Great downtown location with great bars and restaurants nearby and fantastic dual aspect views of the city and beyond.
We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to wonderful Calgary. Thank you Beth and team 🤗

Beautiful location and condo which met our needs adequately!  Management team was excellent with prompt responses, simplified instructions, and fabulous restaurant recommendations that were literally right around the corner!  Such a wonderful trip!
The air bnb was clean, in a perfect location and easy to access. The host was very responsive! Lots of instructions but if you read them carefully you have all the information you need.

Perfect location for exploring downtown Calgary and convenient access to all levels of shopping and restaurants.  The unit is super cute and comfortable with comfy beds and pillows!  The host is extremely responsive and accommodating, and provides clear and thorough instructions along with great resources for the area.  The building is quiet, and we heard no noise at night.  Highly recommend the Last Best Brewing and Distilling, which is a 2-minute walk away, great happy hour and food.
reviews_details.host_response:
Hi Jana,
Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We’re so glad you enjoyed the location, it really is the perfect home base for exploring downtown Calgary. We’re also happy to hear the beds and pillows were comfortable and that the space felt cozy and inviting for your stay.
It means a lot to hear you found our instructions helpful and appreciated the local recommendations. We love being able to share our favourite nearby spots, and we agree, Last Best Brewing and Distilling is a must-visit!
Thank you again for staying with us, and for being such a kind and respectful guest. We’d absolutely love to host you again anytime your travels bring you back to Calgary!

reviews_details.review:
I spent my last week in Calgary here. I had neck & hand injuries, so my perspective is a bit different. The 22nd floor view is nice. I kept the windows uncovered 24/7. I loved the sun waking me up naturally. The kitchen is well-equipped. Checking in & out is easy. The bathtubs are long & deep. Very hot water. There are plenty of restaurants nearby w/delivery. The waste chute is a few steps from the door. Safeway is a 7 minute walk away. Those are the positives.
Worst ever pillows. I can't even guess what they're filled with. Nothing? The extra pillows in the closet were hard as a rock. For someone w/neck issues like me, it was excruciating.
Bring your own coffee unless you like deep discount brands or decaf. Mgmt never swapped out the Zenius decaf for me like they said they would.
No facial tissues, a miscalibrated thermostat, and a troublesome front door lock (code had to be entered twice every time) were other issues.
I won't stay anywhere managed by this company again.
The host was responsive and kind, and the place was beautiful -just as pictured & described!

I visited Calgary for the first time with my family, and it was a wonderful experience with Beth from Key Rental Management. Check-in and check-out were smooth and effortless.
The space itself was immaculate, secure, and thoughtfully equipped. We loved having clear instructions, which we truly appreciated from Beth. Whenever we needed something, they responded promptly—within just a few minutes—without any delay.
The condo was exactly as pictured: spotless, beautifully styled, and incredibly cozy. This rustic Japandi-inspired condo is situated in the heart of downtown—close to great restaurants and vibrant nightlife. The rustic Japandi vibe gave the place a warm, modern feel.
Communication was quick and reliable, and everything felt secure and spotless.
Thank you so much, Beth, for providing such a wonderful experience at your place. It was truly memorable, and we will definitely consider staying at the Rustic Japandi-Inspired condo again for future visits to Calgary.
This was my first Air BNB reservation, and Beth made it feel very smooth. Great location and great walkable resturant in this area.
We really enjoyed our stay in Calgary. The apartment was clean and exactly what we wanted.
Beth’s communication was outstanding! The instructions to get into the bnb was also very easy to understand. 😊
Clean apartment and great views. Very clear instructions from host. Would recommend staying here!
The stay was awesome!  We always had a response from the host to help us with anything we needed!! The location was awesome with an amazing view!!
If you want to stay in downtown Calgary, there’s probably no better place to stay. Awesome location, and the place was great.

reviews: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Mo’s place. We especially loved how close it was to public transit and every restaurant we visited nearby was top notch! I used to live in Calgary for four years but definitely feel like I missed so much of the city after staying at Mo’s. We had a clear view of the stunning sunset in the evening from the patio as well as the pink glow of dawn alongside the Calgary Tower in the morning. Pure magic! Would 100% stay here again!
Great place to stay! Right downtown so amazing location. The host was very responsive to any questions I had. Nice and clean place with a comfortable bed! Would stay here again. Thank you!
Fairly priced stay, cleanliness and minimalist design. Perfect for a weekend away especially if you’re around the downtown area. Thanks again Mo & Benji.
Nice, well communicated, cant wait to come back!
Thank you Mo for the great stay. One of the best Rbnbs I had
We had an amazing stay, mo and Benji were great hosts. Definitely recommend staying here
great host wonderfully views some of the best in calgary

everything described, was exactly as he said it was going to be.
only thing was the pricing for one night, definitely not worth it.
Solid place to stay
amazing, will always come back.
A very nice apartment with great views. Located on the 30th floor, we slept very well and the location is great.
Wonderful place in the city, would stay again.
It's a good place.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our stunning downtown Calgary corner unit condo! This modern retreat offers you the perfect combination of convenience, luxury, and breathtaking views.As you step inside, you'll immediately be captivated by the floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase the stunning city skyline and majestic mountain vistas. Please be aware that the front doors of the building lock at 10 pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.*** POOL is closed for the winter.The spaceOur condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy king bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.Additionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, with an array of fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops within easy walking distance. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night.Notable Features:-Balcony with spectacular skyline view-King bed-Dedicated work station-Fresh beddings & linens-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix  (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-Eating Bar-High-speed WiFi-Free underground parking-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine ID Verification Required for our property.All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.Guest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.*** POOL is closed for the winter.Other things to notePlease be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you are arriving later than this, do not proceed with the booking or inquire about late check in (40$ Fee)Registration DetailsBL269147
reviews: We had a perfect stay at Kyle’s! The flat was very clean and in great condition. We always had a sunset view from the balcony. The communication with the host was also a 10/10 - very clear instructions and good communication. We felt very safe and comfortable. We would definitely book a stay at Kyle’s again!

Excellent communication from the beginning and was blown away when we walked into the apartment. The views across the city are outstanding and it's in a great central location. There is private secure parking and the apartment had everything we needed and was spotless. Would definintely book here again when we return to Calgary.
This place has immaculate views, great location, and has lots of amenities like parking! Hosts were great about communicating and explaining everything! Highly recommend if you are in the area!

Loved this place! It was spotless, in a fantastic location close to great restaurants and shopping, and the bed was super comfy. Communication was top-notch—responses came within minutes every time. I travel to Calgary regularly, and this is now my first choice!

I really enjoyed my stay! The hosts communicated clearly and made everything easy. The location was perfect for our mini getaway — everything we needed was nearby. And the views were definitely a highlight!

We had so much fun staying on the 20th floor and overlooking Calgary. The patio was fabulous and huge windows made the views even more stunning!
The noise of city life happening around us was audible from our room but didn’t disturb us as it was a constant drone of noise.
The sun woke us up in the morning and was a welcome awakening!
*please note, if you are a light sleeper or light sensitive, I would suggest bringing any necessary amenities to account for this.

The apartment is close to the centre of Calgary, just a 10 min walk, which was great. Things we would have liked to know beforehand were as follows:
1. It’s close to a freight railway, which is quite noisy through the night.
2. The blinds are not blackout and let in a lot of light at night time.
3. On multiple occasions on entering the building there were many homeless/addicts hanging around, which was confronting as we aren’t used to that.
4. It is a bit of a faff to get in first time, you find and pay for street parking, and the touch pad to get in isn’t sensitive so it took some firm pressure to get it to respond - we thought we were doing it wrong!
These are mostly outside of the control of the hosts, and due to the location of the building.
The hairdryer is tiny and low powered so if you’re like me with hair of a winter bison, take your own as the one supplied won’t get the job done efficiently.
The hosts were great in their communication and were keen to resolve issues.
10/10 recommend the stay! We loved the city views and vibes from the balcony! Coming back for sure:)

We really enjoyed our stay here! Kyle was wonderful to chat with, very responsive and the instructions for everything were super easy and seamless to follow.
You are definitely in the heart of downtown here, and are engulfed by the sounds and sights! The views are stunning, and the floor to ceiling windows allowed for lots of beautiful natural light.
We loved that we were walking distance to so many great restaurants, bars, grocery stores etc. Sadly, there are lots of homeless and people asking for money in the area, but they aren’t bothersome or causing trouble.
Will definitely stay again!

Everything is super well organised! The instructions are super detailed and easy and quick reaction from both guys! Will definitely come back and do recommend the place! The only downside was that during my stay there was only one functioning elevator, so had to wait a bit to go up to 20 or to come down, but the guys had nothing to do with it! Highly recommended!

Kyle and Andrew were exceptional hosts! They were super helpful and let us know that they were always available if we had any questions or concerns. Their unit was extremely clean and was at a great location, as everything was of walking distance. I definitely recommend this airbnb if anyone is looking to visit downtown Calgary!
Great place to stay ! Comfy bed , wonderful location and hosts! Will be back !

Wow what a view!
The view is fantastic, sunset is just breathtaking:) first night we were tired after long hours of driving and we stayed in- didn’t regret as we got to enjoy stunning sunset!
It was way to find the place, check in quite easy. The apartment is very pretty, nicely decorated, the instructions clear. Everything spotless clean.
There’s secured parking which is a huge advantage. Everything is walking distance. I was so pleased to discover fantastic vegan restaurant just downstairs. It doesn’t happen often :)
Kyle and Andrew messaged us during our stay making sure everything was ok and replied to my messages quite quickly. Just too bad we didn’t get to meet them in person, I’m sure they are lovely people.
We are on our 3 week US- Canada roadtrip, you can imagine we slept in different places. This was our favorite so far!
Thank you guys

A fantastic apartment in the heart of Calgary with views of the Rocky Mountains from your window in the morning to the Calgary skyline lights in the evening. The views on their own are worth the money!
The place is clean and real homely feel. We would 100% stay again when we return to Calgary

This location was perfect and walking distance to downtown. Kyle was very communicative and quickly responded to my messages. Place was clean, shower pressure was strong, and the suite was well taken cared of. Highly recommend this home to others visiting Calgary.
Loved staying at Kyle & Andrew’s place. Perfect location downtown and a spacious 1 bedroom apartment that fit two of us comfortably. Would definitely stay again when I’m back in Calgary!
A modern bright apartment with outstanding views over Calgary towards the Rockies.

The location and view of the accommodation were fantastic. Even though it was downtown, you could see all the way to Seolsan, and even though you could hear a little bit of the city noise, it was perfect for enjoying downtown.
I was a little embarrassed that the check-in process didn't go smoothly as instructed, and I spent a lot of time using the kitchen appliances because they didn't work well, but overall, I think it was a good experience. If you're staying in Calgary, I would definitely recommend it.
Perfect location, friendly host, and easy instructions.
Great location, clean and spacious. Wonderful hosts!
This is definitely a place you must visit. The host was wonderful and the pictures is one thing but seeing it in person is another feeling. Definitely 10/10
Kyle’s place was just as described, the view of the mountains was an added plus! We would definitely recommend this place to anyone staying in Calgary!

Place was amazing with great views of the city. Kyle was really
Responsive to my texts as well! Great host and would highly recommend
The place is clean, but don’t expect thoughtful responses on your questions about the property from owners.

description: Stay in the heart of Calgary! This cozy 2BD condo offers free parking, a gym, roof top patio and top walkability. listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Welcome to the Heart of Calgary – The Beltline!Nestled in one of Calgary’s most vibrant and walkable neighbourhoods, our home puts you right in the center of it all. The Beltline is loved for its perfect blend of urban convenience and local charm.Step outside and in just 5 minutes, you’ll be strolling along 17th Avenue SW—Calgary’s iconic "Red Mile"—lined with some of the city’s best restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and boutiques. Whether you're in the mood for a cozy brunch, craft cocktails, or international cuisine, you’re truly spoiled for choice.Need groceries or essentials? You’re just a short walk from Save-on-Food, Safeway, and local markets, making it easy to settle in and feel right at home.Here for an event or summer adventure? The Calgary Stampede Grounds and Saddledome are about a 15-minute walk away, so you can enjoy concerts, hockey games, and the “Greatest Outdoor Show on Earth” without the hassle of parking.With downtown just a few blocks north and peaceful parks like Central Memorial and Haultain nearby, the Beltline offers a balanced lifestyle—energetic yet relaxed, lively yet livable.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: One of the best parts of staying in the Beltline is how easy it is to get around—most of what you need is just a short walk away!🚶‍♂️ Walk Score: This area is a walker’s paradise. From restaurants and bars to grocery stores and parks, everything is close by—no car needed.🚲 Bike Friendly: Calgary has a growing network of bike lanes, and the Beltline is right in the middle of it. You’ll find shared e-scooters and bike rentals nearby if you're up for a fun and fast way to explore.🚆 Transit Access: The C-Train (LRT) is only a 10 minute walk away, giving you quick access to downtown, the university, or the Stampede grounds.🚗 Driving & Parking: If you’re bringing a vehicle, there’s easy access to major roads like Macleod Trail, 14th Street, and Crowchild Trail, making it a great hub for exploring the rest of Calgary.✈️ Airport Access: Getting to Calgary International Airport (YYC) is straightforward - about 20-25 minutes by car or rideshare.

Dazu sind einige Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erreichbar. Z.B. der Eau Claire Park mit der Peace Bridge oder, etwas weiter, der Calgary Tower.
Unser Gastgeber war sehr hilfsbereit und schnell erreichbar. Mehr kann man kaum erwarten:
Eine sehr empfehlenswerte Unterkunft.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans le logement de Demitri! Conforme à la description l’appartement est confortable, très bien équipé et d’une propreté impeccable à notre arrivée. Demitri a répondu à toutes nos questions et a fait en sorte que notre séjour se déroule dans les meilleures conditions. Nous avons apprécié la luminosité du salon et des chambres, la présence d’un aspirateur, le confort du lit et du canapé, la cuisine ouverte ainsi que les nombreux espaces de rangements.
Nous recommandons fortement ce logement pour un séjour dans le centre de Calgary, à proximité de toutes les commodités.

Le logement était propre. Il y’avait tout ce dont j’avais besoin. L’immeuble est vraiment calme pendant la nuit, donc on dort bien.  Il y’a beaucoup de restaurant pas loin de l’appartement et on n’est pas loin du centre-ville. Demitri a été attentionné à notre égard. Très beau séjour.
Would stay again!!!
God please

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.85 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Welcome to your elevated urban escape in the heart of Calgary! This beautifully 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo offers not only stunning contemporary design but also one of the best skyline views in the city—featuring a direct sightline to the iconic Calgary Tower.Perfect for professionals, couples, and small groups, this 14th-floor suite delivers both comfort and wow-factor from the moment you enter. Whether you're visiting for business, leisure, or a mix of both, this is the stay you deserve.The spaceStep into a calm, modern interior where every detail is intentional.The open-concept living area is surrounded by full-height glass walls, filling the space with natural light and jaw-dropping city views. Sink into a plush leather sectional and relax beneath designer lighting.Enjoy home-cooked meals or takeout at the round dining nook, framed by the glittering downtown skyline—ideal for romantic evenings or relaxed brunches.The fully equipped kitchen features stainless steel appliances and everything you need to cook in.Both bedrooms are styled for rest and rejuvenation:The primary suite includes large-scale artwork, luxurious bedding, and full ensuite.The second bedroom offers equally refined decor with massive windows and excellent workspace options.Two full bathrooms ensure privacy and convenience for everyone.The private balcony features a BBQ grill, patio seating, and astro turf—perfect for evening wine with a view.In-suite laundry makes longer stays a breeze.Includes one secure, assigned parking stall—a huge bonus downtown!Guest accessYou will have access to the entire condo and one (1) assigned parking stallRegistration DetailsBL000000
reviews: It’s that luxurious feeling the moment you step inside ..the furniture is beautifully balanced ..I kicked off my shoes and sank into the couch ,gazing out the windows at the sparkling city lights and towering buildings truly a captivating view at night …the host was incredibly kind and responsive making the stay more enjoyable

This unit was very clean. The beds were extremely comfortable with nice linens. Check in was easy and the underground parking fit our full size truck. Hosts were communicative and helpful.
We were there for a wedding, so can't speak to the neighborhood per se, but cute restaurants and shopping easily accessible by foot.
Would stay again next time in the area.

Beth's place was as advertised! we loved how spotless and clean everything felt. usually when we stay at other Airbnb's when we wear our slippers inside the house you can see the dirt and grime on the soles however it was hardly noticable with Beth's place. we appreciate how clean it was.
I'd definitely stay here again.

I cannot say enough good things about our stay at Beth's place in downtown Calgary-the location, the indoor condo space, the appointments, the view, the communication....fabulous in every way. Truly a wonderful experience. Thank you, Beth and your team! If and when we get back to Calgary I will definitely book with Beth.

This was a real gem! Great spot in the downtown area and beautiful night time view. The place itself was spotless - super clean, thoughtful amenities (k-cups were a lifesaver in the morning), and modern sleek furnishing. I’d definitely stay here again when  in Calgary!

Great location, near restaurants and pubs. Short walk to Saddledome for our concert. Decorated well, nice looking place. Gets warm in the unit at night even after turning temp down in advance. Beds are closer to doubles than queens.
Overall was great and would stay here again!

I loved staying in this apartment. It was exactly as described. The view, the location, the apartment itself. It was all amazing. We stayed in the city and driving to Banff for Lake Louise and Morraine lake was 2 hours, but well worth it.  The instructions were very clear and their response times were very quick. Food in the area was amazing. It's fairly quiet, especially on weekdays. We've been to Montreal and Quebec and so far Alberta and its residents were the nicest and most welcoming Canadians we've encountered. I would highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again.

A very professionally run unit with a responsive host and dedicated property manager. Unit was in excellent shape and it is across the street from perhaps the best stretch of restaurants in the entire city. We'll definitely stay here again the next time we visit.

I had such a wonderful stay! The host was incredibly welcoming, responsive, and made everything so easy from check-in to check-out. They went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and even arranged a late checkout, which was a huge help.
The location was perfect — safe, quiet, and close to everything I needed. The space was exactly as described (if not better!) — clean, cozy, and well-equipped with all the little touches that make you feel at home.
I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone visiting the area and will be happy to stay here again on my next trip.

I had such a great stay here. First off the unit was spacious, clean, and had the most comfortable bed I’d ever slept in.
The views were stunning, so nice to have views of the city.
It was right across the street from so many great eating options, one being First St. Market - which had a variety of high scale vendors in which I ate most my meals.
I will definitely recommend and will be back! Thanks team!

Beth and her team were great! Very responsive and polite. The unit was clean bright and spacious for our family of four. The location was great, lots of restaurant options and easy access to all of Calgary. I would definitely stay here again!

Beautiful place. My 18 yr old son thought the couch was very comfy. No blinds in living area so if you mind bright, early in the am and are sleeping on the couch, bring an eye mask. Bedrooms were great. Kitchen had lots of items to cook pretty much anything. Instructions for checking-in were easy to follow but the only issue we had is we were given wrong keys causing us to have to carry our luggage up and down stairs until we got the correct keys. 😕

The location was great! The views were great! The unit was not ready at checkin time, and we got to spend 1.5 hours with the cleaner which lead to a very strained communication in texts and over the phone with the host.  Attention to cleaning the windows, furniture, and the oven would be suggested.
Amazing place extremely clean. The only complaint I have is that no towels were provided but other than that I had an amazing stay.
This was a great place to stay with amazing views. The host was very kind and helpful. Thank you for making our trip so enjoyable!
Beautiful condo with amazing city views. Loved that is was within walking distance to restaurants and shopping. Great stay!
Had a great stay at Beth‘s place. The location was perfect to reach downtown easily by foot. The flat is super cozy and the kitchen was very well equipped.
We had a great stay. The host is very organized, apartment is clean and in a great location.
Beautiful place, highly recommend. Great location as well! Thank you for the wonderful stay :)
Such a great experience for a weekend getaway! Tons of restaurants and shops just minutes away and such a comfy vibe inside!
Great attentive host had a great time staying here. would definitely recommend and would come agian!!!
Great space and in the perfect location!
Very nice place and location.  Loved the view of the tower !
good location.  clean.

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Nestled in Calgary’s dynamic Beltline district, this location offers the ultimate urban experience. The city's best dining, shopping, and entertainment are all within walking distance. Indulge in top-rated restaurants such as Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues Taqueria, and Model Milk, or grab a craft cocktail at one of the many stylish bars in the area.Shoppers will love the nearby CORE Shopping Centre and boutique stores along 17th Avenue, a lively street known for its trendy vibe. As the sun sets, explore the thriving nightlife scene with popular venues like The Palace Theatre, Greta Bar, and National on 10th.For event-goers, this condo boasts unbeatable proximity to the Calgary Stampede Grounds and the BMO Convention Centre, both just a short walk away! Whether you're attending the world-famous Calgary Stampede, a concert, or a major conference at BMO, you'll love the convenience of staying so close to the action.

The location was great! The views were great! The unit was not ready at checkin time, and we got to spend 1.5 hours with the cleaner which lead to a very strained communication in texts and over the phone with the host.  Attention to cleaning the windows, furniture, and the oven would be suggested.
Amazing place extremely clean. The only complaint I have is that no towels were provided but other than that I had an amazing stay.
reviews_details.host_response:
Hello Esther,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review and kind words about the cleanliness and comfort of the suite, we are so glad you enjoyed your stay!
We’re sorry for any confusion about the towels. They’re always stocked under the bathroom vanity, and details like this are included in the guest portal for easy reference. Our team is also available at any time to assist with responses to where items are or deliver extras if needed. We would have been happy to help right away.
We truly appreciate your 5 star review and your kind recommendation. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we’d love to welcome you back anytime!

reviews_details.review: This was a great place to stay with amazing views. The host was very kind and helpful. Thank you for making our trip so enjoyable!
Beautiful condo with amazing city views. Loved that is was within walking distance to restaurants and shopping. Great stay!
Had a great stay at Beth‘s place. The location was perfect to reach downtown easily by foot. The flat is super cozy and the kitchen was very well equipped.
We had a great stay. The host is very organized, apartment is clean and in a great location.
Beautiful place, highly recommend. Great location as well! Thank you for the wonderful stay :)
Such a great experience for a weekend getaway! Tons of restaurants and shops just minutes away and such a comfy vibe inside!
Great attentive host had a great time staying here. would definitely recommend and would come agian!!!
Great space and in the perfect location!
Very nice place and location.  Loved the view of the tower !
good location.  clean.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Experience heritage living in our contemporary lower-level suite in Calgary's charming Cliff Bungalow. Bright ample natural light from full-sized windows, it blends historic character with modern conveniences. Prepare meals in the full kitchen, luxuriate in the clawfoot tub, and enjoy a en-suite washer/dryer. Outside, a serene communal garden awaits your leisurely moments. It's the perfect retreat for soaking up Calgary's vibrant atmosphere while relishing in comfort and style.The spaceNestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that’s hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city’s vibrant hustle and bustle. Perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike, our home promises an unforgettable stay.Other things to noteOur property has ample street parking and we can assist in registering your vehicle for street parking to override the parking time allotments. Just let us know, and we’ll be happy to help ensure a smooth parking experience for you.Registration DetailsBL279926
reviews: A lovely basement suite will all the amenities you would need including a full kitchen. Steps from restaurants, bars and coffee shops. Steps from the Elbow River with its wonderful walking/bicycling trails. Courtney was very responsive and instructions were clean and concise. I will definitely visit again.

My flight got canceled due to the Air Canada strike, so I had to book this Airbnb very last minute. Courtney was such a great host—she even let me check in earlier than the regular time, which was a huge help. The place itself is really nice, and we enjoyed walking through downtown from here. If we ever come back, we’d definitely love to stay here again!

Courtney was incredibly accommodating and helpful! I had to book a place to stay rather last minute, and she was kind enough to let me switch units after the first night due to mixed availability and store my luggage while the new unit was being cleaned in between guests - a real lifesaver! The units themselves were beautiful & cozy, with plenty of amenities and a perfect location. I would definitely stay here again the next time I'm in Calgary - highly recommend!

This place is one of my favorite Airbnbs I’ve stayed at in Calgary! I come back often to visit family. This place feels like a home, and doesn’t have the stale creepy beige decor that I’m used to seeing in Airbnbs. Instead it’s very warm while also being clean and tasteful. The layout is great, it’s roomy and the perfect size for one person or a couple. The amazing neighborhood and access to amenities, cafes, river walking trails, and restaurants CANNOT be surpassed! I really appreciated the fully stocked kitchen, large closet, and really nice toiletries.

The location is perfect, walkable to grocery store, restaurants and coffee shops. The accommodation was exactly what the pictures showed, clean and comfortable. Courtney was quick to respond to our questions. I would definitely stay again and recommend to friends.

Courtneys place was lovely & comfortable for 2 of us. Location was great for getting to the Stampede with lots of cafes and restaurants close by. The apartment has everything you need and feels like a home from home. The bed is one of the most comfortable we've ever slept in! The coffee gift cards were a lovely touch. Highly recommend this place to everyone!

Amazing place in Calgary!
Courtney is amazing, helped and answered all what we needed, and always so polite .
The location is superb - 3 min walk from the downtown , but quiet and peaceful.
The apartment is clean and beautiful, having all what you need for a pleasant stay.
We will come back next time in Calgary - no doubt about that.

If you are visiting Calgary, this is the place to stay. The corner property is a lovely well landscaped yard with a courtyard perfect for a sunset glass of wine. The historic apartment is gorgeous, clean and well laid out. We felt right at home!  Courtney also gave me a great list of local restaurants, coffee shops and grocery stores all within walking distance. Overall a 10 star experience!

Great setting, private and perfect location. It was so easy to be in contact with Courtney. As this was my first time staying in a Airbnb, Courtney answered all my many questions and made it a great experience!
I highly recommend that you stay in this lovely suite!

This was the perfect place to stay close to downtown, but also steps away from trail running, MNP sports center, and Mount Royal. The suite was comfortable, well appointed and a delight to stay in. I would definitely recommend.
Courtney’s place was amazing and stylish. I had a wonderful stay and everything was super clean and felt like home. The neighbourhood was gorgeous and walkable with great eats. Highly recommend!

We were blown away by the kindness of Courtney and how she bent over backwards to accommodate us. After a not-so-nice stay at a different Airbnb that we were forced to end early, Courtney absolutely saved the day by allowing us to check in early and treating us so nicely when I had particular requirements related to needing to have no scent/chemicals used on my linen. She never made me feel like a burden or that it was too much to ask. Every interaction was speedy, friendly and she provided ample detail on her instructions.
As for the apartment- WOW. Styled to perfection. The surrounding area was lovely to walk around with lots of amenities nearby and beautiful to look at. The bed is supportive and on the firmer side. Plenty of storage/cupboard space. It had everything we needed. Could easily have stayed here for months! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would 10/10 stay again. Courtney- you are an amazing host! THANK YOU ever so kindly 🫶🏼

We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful, professionally designed suite. All the details that make for a special stay were included: a comfy bed and quality linens,  extremely clean throughout, clear and helpful communication and many extras like a variety of coffees (and cream), a large flat screen tv and well stocked bathroom and kitchen supplies.  Courtney was very helpful with parking registration and bike storage as well which we appreciated. The location is within a few blocks of the grocery store, restaurants, shops and the Elbow River trails. We hope to stay again when we return to Calgary.

had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb in Calgary! The location is excellent — close to shops, restaurants, and just a short trip to downtown. It was incredibly easy to get around from here. The space itself is quaint, cozy, and has everything you need to feel right at home. The bed was unbelievably comfortable — one of the best sleeps I’ve had in a while! Would I stay here again? ABSOLUTELY!!
Great stay! It felt very cozy and the neighbourhood was lovely!
Amazing property, perfect location where it is peaceful yet walkable to downtown. Well decorated and full of amenities!
Oh goodness, this place a PERFECT!  My greatest sadness was that I didn’t have more time to stay longer!!!
Perfect stay! Spotless nice apartment with everything what you need. Courtney was always reachable and we really enjoyed our stay.

What a lovely location… the Cliff Bungalow area was perfectly situated to explore Calgary. The space is beautiful and had everything that was needed to feel right at home. I look forward to staying here again the next time I am through town. Thanks!
Courtney is one of the best hosts I've ever dealt with. She's truly a professional and knows what she's doing. The place was fantastic. Every little detail accounted for.

Great neighbourhood full of restaurants, easy access to groceries and a plethora of coffee spots. You can walk to the river for a nature hit and walk downtown for work.
Tastefully decorated, with many beautiful heritage details, and a well equipped kitchen.
Great value.

Courtney is an absolutely lovely host who responded to our every ask with immense kindness and care for our stay! The area is exactly where you want to be to enjoy Calgary and I am so happy with our stay! Highly recommended for a couple looking to experience such a lovely town!
Very nice place,  extremely responsive host, great location.  Thank you Courtney!
Was a good stay, location is great

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.93 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Discover the luxury of our 2-bedroom condominium in the heart of downtown Calgary, offering mesmerizing views of the city skyline.Situated within close proximity to the financial district and the famous 17th Street, known for its excellent dining options and charming outdoor seating.This unit is elegantly furnished, fully equipped, and ideally suited for both business travelers and those seeking a city escape with their loved ones.Walk Score - 96Free Underground Heated Parking IncludedThe spaceTHE CONDO:1) Entrance from Main Building Access2) Large Open Plan Living and Dining Room3) Queen Room 1 - Cosy Bed - Closet - Standing Mirror4) Double Room 2 - Cosy Bed - Closet - Mirror5) Private Fully Equipped Kitchen6) Full Bathroom with Shower and Toilet7) Stunning Skyline ViewsINVENTORY:The condo comes equipped with;1) A Large 65" Smart TV, Dining Table, Dining Chairs, Sofas, Coffee Table2) Kettle, Electric Stove, Oven, Fridge, Freezer, Cooking Utensils, Cutlery, Plates, Glasses, Knives, Forks, Spoons, Bowls3) Vacuum Cleaner/ Mop and other Cleaning Products4) Essentials; Bed Linen, Towels, Iron and Hair Dryer5) Furniture: Queen bed and Double Bed, Closet x 2, Dining Table x 1 (4 Chairs)6) Washing Machine and Dryer 7) Central HeatingGuest accessAs a guest in this 2-bedroom modern condo, you will have access to a luxurious living area that promises comfort and relaxation. The living area features a Large Smart TV, allowing you to unwind and enjoy your favorite shows and movies.Within the Condo, you will find two warm and cozy bedrooms with luxurious beds and ample storage. The bathroom is beautifully designed and well-equipped, offering a tranquil space to refresh and rejuvenate.The apartment also features a modern kitchen, where you can indulge your culinary desires. The kitchen is equipped with all the necessary amenities and appliances, making it easy for you to prepare your meals and enjoy some home-cooked delicacies during your stay.Registration DetailsBL271320
reviews: What a great place! The view alone was worth the price. It was clean, comfortable, and the location next to several great restaurants made it very convenient. We loved it!

I highly recommend this apartment if you are looking for a great place to stay in downtown Calgary. Beautiful clean apartment with fantastic view of the city.  Location and parking very convenient. Host responded very quickly to any inquiries.  Apartment comfortable and well equipped with all necessities for group of 4.

Najam is an absolutely wonderful host! He gave us clear and easy instructions to follow every step of the way! We couldn't have asked for a more perfect stay! Location is a short walk to BMO and downtown! Very convenient amd what a great deal! I would highly recommend booking this unit.The view from his unit is stunning! mahalo Nui Loa Najam! We will be back!!

Najam was very responsive host his place was definitely worth the price that we payed the height gave a beautiful view of Calgary tower and all of downtown if we ever come back to Calgary I'll definitely book his place

We had a wonderful stay at Najam’s place! Najam was an excellent host - very easy to communicate, helpful throughout our stay and very nice. The Apartment was clean and well-equipped, location was great and the underground parking was incredibly convenient. Highly recommended!!
A beautiful apartment and a beautiful view! Looking forward to staying here again, very clean and lots to do in the area! Easy check in and clear instructions
Their place is amazing and would recommend the stay to anyone!! 11/10 stay:) would stay again.
The view is amazing 10/10, and the place is very clean. Highly recommend to anyone who is staying in town.
Najam was great. He was very responsive, gave clear instructions and was a very good host. Check in was a breeze and he was very accommodating and

Great place overall. The kitchen is better equipped than lots of airbnbs in some ways, and yet was missing some key items if you want to cook full meals from scratch (no chef's knife, bread knife, grater, or vegetable peeler, and the non-stick frypan is too scraped up to use safely, coffee was supplied but no tea). In every other way, the apartment felt generously welcoming and comfortable.

Beautifully clean condo in a fun location, close to a variety of restaurants and in a vibrant area.  Gorgeous view of downtown.  Had a great stay.  Only caution is the parkade is a bit tight and it would be challenging to maneuver a large vehicle (e.g a truck).  But that said, it's very nice to have heated and secure parking.

Najam and his co-hosts were amazing. Super quick and easy to communicate with from start to finish, which made everything very smooth. The place has an incredible view and is in such a convenient spot downtown. The underground parking was a great bonus, especially in winter. I’d definitely recommend staying here!

What a WONDERFUL spot!!!
Spotless, organized and an easy walk anywhere….we loved our time here and will definitely be back to enjoy it all over again:)

Was a great place, mum and me were on a little getaway highly recommend if
your wanting a great place in downtown.
Clean, great location and all details communicated clearly. I would stay again!
Great host, responsiveness was swift, easy check in and out!
Excellent location in downtown Calgary. Really nice condo with a great view!
Nice apartment with good location for our family attending Calgary Stampede for the 1st time.
This place was very clean with a beautiful view of downtown Calgary . The check in and out was very easy and Najam is helpful if you have any questions. I would recommend this bnb !!

I had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb! The place was spotless, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was very responsive and helpful throughout my visit. The location was perfect, close to everything I needed. I especially loved the little touches like the welcome snacks and local tips. The bed was super comfortable, and I felt right at home. Check-in and check-out were smooth and hassle-free. Overall, it was a great experience, and I’d definitely recommend it to anyone visiting the area. I would happily stay here again!
Great place to stay in Calgary! If you like being downtown, this is the spot. I’d recommend this place to friends and family, for sure. Will definitely stay here again in the future!

We had a lovely stay. The check-in and check-out was seamless with good communication prior. The unit has a nice view, layout, and good kitchen and laundry machine.  My little one's travel crib fit in the smaller room with the closet doors open and made for a dark room for naps and he loved the view from the couch. Overall the value is good too as it's a several minute walk from the Telus Centre and much more affordable than staying at a conference hotel which doesn't even include parking. I'd happily stay there again I need to!

Really great spot, looks a hidden gem from the outside.
Awesome location to walk to downtown and easy for 17th Avenue.
Great bars and restaurants on the doorstep.
The view of the Calgary skyline was stunning. Would definitely stay again

Our stay was great. The place was incredibly clean, including all linens. The beds were very comfortable. It is a smaller condo, and may be tight for 4 people for an extended period, but it was very comfortable for 2 people. The host was very communicative and quick to respond. The check in instructions and details for our stay were crystal clear and easy to follow. We did have one issue when checking in, however the host was very quick to respond and fix the issue. The building is a little tired, but the apartment was totally fine and updated. We would stay here again.

Spotless, organized and an easy walk anywhere….we loved our time here and will definitely be back to enjoy it all over again:)

Was a great place, mum and me were on a little getaway highly recommend if
your wanting a great place in downtown.
Clean, great location and all details communicated clearly. I would stay again!
Great host, responsiveness was swift, easy check in and out!
Excellent location in downtown Calgary. Really nice condo with a great view!
Nice apartment with good location for our family attending Calgary Stampede for the 1st time.
This place was very clean with a beautiful view of downtown Calgary . The check in and out was very easy and Najam is helpful if you have any questions. I would recommend this bnb !!

I had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb! The place was spotless, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was very responsive and helpful throughout my visit. The location was perfect, close to everything I needed. I especially loved the little touches like the welcome snacks and local tips. The bed was super comfortable, and I felt right at home. Check-in and check-out were smooth and hassle-free. Overall, it was a great experience, and I’d definitely recommend it to anyone visiting the area. I would happily stay here again!
Great place to stay in Calgary! If you like being downtown, this is the spot. I’d recommend this place to friends and family, for sure. Will definitely stay here again in the future!

We had a lovely stay. The check-in and check-out was seamless with good communication prior. The unit has a nice view, layout, and good kitchen and laundry machine.  My little one's travel crib fit in the smaller room with the closet doors open and made for a dark room for naps and he loved the view from the couch. Overall the value is good too as it's a several minute walk from the Telus Centre and much more affordable than staying at a conference hotel which doesn't even include parking. I'd happily stay there again I need to!

Really great spot, looks a hidden gem from the outside.
Awesome location to walk to downtown and easy for 17th Avenue.
Great bars and restaurants on the doorstep.
The view of the Calgary skyline was stunning. Would definitely stay again

Our stay was great. The place was incredibly clean, including all linens. The beds were very comfortable. It is a smaller condo, and may be tight for 4 people for an extended period, but it was very comfortable for 2 people. The host was very communicative and quick to respond. The check in instructions and details for our stay were crystal clear and easy to follow. We did have one issue when checking in, however the host was very quick to respond and fix the issue. The building is a little tired, but the apartment was totally fine and updated. We would stay here again.

name: Apartment in Calgary · ★4.91 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bathroom
description: Welcome to The Rubix! This bright and modern 2 bedroom unit is located in the heart of downtown. This unique space has floor-to-ceiling windows, sliding glass doors, industrial polished floors and a fully equipped open space kitchen. Also includes a designed workspace, super comfortable couch with complimentary Netflix.You can't miss out on this great location! Just steps away from the hottest restaurants and bars in town! Only less than 5 minutes away from the Calgary Tower and Stampede Park!The spaceDesignated workspaceHighspeed internet connection (100 mbps)Fully stocked kitchenCozy and comfortable queen size bedsAmazing city views50" Smart TV with Netflix Self check-in / Keyless SmartlockOne designated secured underground parking stallOther things to notePhoto ID such as driver license or passport is required from the individual booking the reservation. This a mandatory requirement from the Condo Board in order to register guests in the building and prevent unauthorized personnel. Furthermore, names of all guests staying under the reservation is required. ID and guest names are to be provided upon acceptance / approval of the booking and before check-in.Registration DetailsBL289312
reviews: Overall great. Good location, nice view from the apartment, and really response host. Checking in and out is a bit of a pain if you have a car. Need to find street parking which was tough, then get inside to get the key/garage remote to move the car inside. Same thing in reverse on the way out. Not a deal killer, I’d stay again.

I loved staying at Maggie's place. The location is absolutely perfect, with great food and night life options all around. The pictures very much represent the vibe - it's spacious, clean, and serene. I would totally stay here again if I am ever back in town! Maggie is also a great host and always willing to help. 10/10!

We were in Calgary to visit our son and his girlfriend for 9 days. Maggie was super to deal with- informative and quickly responds to any inquiries. The airbnb was clean and located close to fantastic restaurants and bars. Thank you for making our stay in Calgary enjoyable, we will definitely be back!

Maggie was a great host. Instructions for our stay (checking in and out were clear). Place was clean and as advertised. Good location and was great to have a dedicated parking spot. One thing to note if people are light sleepers (which we are) is the front bedroom gets noise from the streets (cars with loud exhaust, sirens from ambulance or police car and people celebrating on the street) and can be heard late into the night.

The condo was clean, well equipped with a full kitchen and great amenities. Its location was good , within walking distance to both the Calgary Stampede grounds and downtown.
T
he host was quick in responding and accommodating, allowing us to drop off our luggage before check-in.
While the bed and pillows could have been more comfortable and having blackout shades in the bedroom with windows would be convenient to block out the outside lights, overall it was a lovely place to stay for a short visit.
The apartment was ideal for our trip with two small kids. We especially enjoyed the two separate bedrooms, the great view, the playground right around the corner and the busy and beautiful area.

This condo is beautiful and in a great location! There's lots to do and places to eat. It's also a great landing spot for visiting the surrounding areas and still coming back to have that "downtown" experience. Would absolutely stay here again!

We had a great stay, walkable distance to a lot of places. Although black out curtains would have been nice for the bedroom, the large windows were great to look at the view of the city! Maggie was a great host, allowing us to have a flexible check in/check out time, which we appreciate as not a lot of host could accommodate that request. Overall a good experience! :)

A great place to stay for a weekend away! Great location downtown and walking distance to everywhere we needed. Easy check in, place had all the necessities and Maggie was very responsive and great host! Would stay here again.

Maggie is a great host and accommodated our late check in.  The location is close to restaurants, bars and downtown.  The reserved parking space was very helpful.  Would definitely use again when staying in Calgary!

Maggie’s place was the perfect home base for our first Calgary Stampede!
It was comfortable and spacious for our group of four girls, with everything we needed for a fun and easy stay. The location was fantastic—super convenient for getting to the Stampede grounds quickly, but also tucked away enough for a good night’s sleep.
Having in-suite laundry was a total bonus (especially during Stampede week!), and the space was clean, well-stocked, and welcoming.
This was our first Stampede, but definitely not our last—and we’d book Maggie’s again in a heartbeat. Highly recommend.

Great stay and well worth the price. It’s located walking distance from restaurants and tourist attractions. It’s also a beautiful and comfortable stay. The space itself is very nice and has everything you’d need including laundry! Comfortable beds and a great full size kitchen.
Maggie’s place was perfect for our stay in Calgary. Great location, very clean, and had everything I needed for me and my little one. Maggie was responsive and helpful—highly recommend!
Easy and quick check-in, great walkable location. The host had lots of great recommendations and was quick to respond to messages.
The place was so well kept and in a fantastic location! Perfect for a weekend stay in Calgary
The location was perfect for proximity to Stampede and restaurants near by. The space was clean and comfortable - Perfect for a quick trip to the area.
Maggie was a great host. Super helpful and responsive. Loved her flexibility on check in and checkout.
Had a great stay at Maggie's! everything was spotless and Maggie was a fabulous host and there were lots of recommendations for things to do/places to eat provided!

Great place, location to die for.
Great connection to all Calgary has to offer within a quick walk

Very comfortable, spotless, nice beds soft bedding. Cute condo with great view excellent location. We will book again. Our host also gave clear instructions for check in and out. Close to shops and restaurants. Great experience.
In town for a convention. 10 minute walk to BMO. Had everything we needed.
Maggie is a very responsive host and we had a pleasant stay. We will book again.
Great place and host
Great place to stay! Clean, spacious, comfortable, and a great location. Would definitely recommend. Had a great time here.

location_details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
location_details.value: The best part of the stay is the amazing location! Just walking distance, you will find the trendiest restaurants and bars such as First Street Market, Starbucks, Ten Foot Henry, Shelter Cocktail Bar, Proof YYC and Home & Away.  Hop across the street to Anytime Fitness and HotShop Yoga for a little self-care time.  Looking to venture off to Calgary’s top attractions? The Calgary Tower, Core Shopping Centre, Stephen’s Avenue and Calgary Stampede grounds are just five minutes away. These are just a few attractions around, check out our exclusive guidebook for the full details for an array of recommendations curated for our guests.
