name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to Urban Outpost + Terrace—a uniquely styled, western-inspired retreat in the heart of Calgary’s vibrant Beltline. Whether you’re here for Stampede, exploring downtown, or just passing through Alberta’s cowboy country, this chic condo offers the perfect blend of comfort, character, and outdoor space.The spaceStep inside to discover curated cowboy-chic design, layered textures, and playful artwork that nods to the spirit of the West. Then step out onto your rare 325 sq ft private terrace—perfect for morning coffee, sunset wine, or late-night stargazing. The living room also features a sofa bed suitable for one guest, providing extra sleeping flexibility during your stay.What You’ll Love:    •    Spacious private terrace with café seating.     •    Queen bedroom with hotel-quality linens    •    Bonus twin daybed in the office     •    Fully equipped kitchen with stylish essentials    •    Fast Wi-Fi, Smart TV, and keyless check-in    •    Steps from 17th Ave, coffee shops, dining & nightlifeStay in style. Kick off your boots. Take in the skyline.This is your Urban Outpost + Terrace.Guest accessYou have access to the entire condo and the attached private patio. The building also has a shared gym and shared pool. You will have one assigned parking stall.Registration DetailsBL000000
reviews:
The area is nice, the apartment is ideal and simple but has everything needed.
I was surprised to see so many rules at check in page and not the Airbnb advertising which was a bit confusing because I could only read them after checking in. Besides that small wave of information, everything was perfect

We had such a great stay at Beth’s place! The location was awesome, walkable to so many restaurants & shopping!
Big bonus that it had parking for our rental car
Instructions for every part of check in and check out were so clear, and easy to follow :)
Would definitely stay again — thanks Beth for hosting us🤗

We were very happy with our stay. The location is close to many restaurants, shopping etc. Beth was an excellent host who was quick to respond and courteous.. Would highly recommend when staying near the downtown core.

I had a great stay here! The apartment was very clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. The huge private patio was such a great feature and made the place feel extra special. The location was excellent, with so many great spots to eat and shop nearby. The hosts were wonderful, super friendly and quick to respond to any questions I had, which made everything easy and stress-free. I’d definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Calgary and would stay again!

After being let down by Airbnb one day before our stay in Calgary we found this lovely apartment and it didn’t disappoint
Everything was spotless and clean with plenty of utensils and a great balcony.
Short walk to downtown Calgary.
Uber’s were never more than 2 minutes away if you need them.
We were very fortunate to be the first people staying here.
The condo was lovely and easy to get to, with clear instructions for check-in. It’s in a great area with lots nearby, very clean, and has a nice balcony. I’d definitely recommend staying here!!!

Beth was a wonderful, responsive host. We booked this property as a family of four and I will say it's on the smaller side and probably wasn't the best fit for us. The pool is quite a bit smaller than anticipated but the patio on the deck is accurate to description. If you plan on visiting and being on foot I would be cautious of the heavy homeless population due to the bottle depot being next door, otherwise for us travelling in a vehicle, this wasn't an issue.  Check in and check out was straight forward and the property was cleaned and well maintained.

The location was great as it was close to everything you might need and within easy reach of some of Calgary’s coolest neighborhoods. The place was clean and very comfortable, with all the basic kitchen essentials provided. Everything in the kitchen was new and stylish, which made cooking easy and enjoyable. The balcony is also a nice spot to relax.
Although the description and house rules use somewhat strict, security-focused language that feels a bit off at first, the actual stay was very comfortable and pleasant.
Great communication, super easy check in process. The condo itself was very spacious and beautiful with a massive patio.
The apartment is very nice in a convenient and walkable area of Calgary. Beth was very responsive and helpful. Had a great stay and looking forward to coming back!
Great location great outdoor space if you like having private to work or chill
We had the best time and the apartment and location was a major part of that!  We will be back for sure!
Super clean and great location.
Central location, responsive host, clean place

It is a very tidy and modern accommodation within walking distance of the city center! It was also convenient to use Uber! The rooms are separated, so it seems suitable for 2-3 people. It was very clean and well-equipped with cooking utensils, so it was great! (There were also two coffee machines) It was a very satisfying stay because you quickly resolved the things I was curious about! I recommend it! :) **Oh, the swimming pool was so small that I didn't use it!
Clean, organized space with great instructions!
this is my second time staying at this property and it was great again.
Location was fun
everything was amazing!

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Step outside and you’re in the vibrant Beltline district, one of Calgary’s most walkable and energetic neighborhoods. You'll be:Just 25 minutes on foot to the Calgary Stampede grounds and the BMO CentreSurrounded by a mix of trendy cafés, restaurants, boutiques, and nightlifeMinutes from Central Memorial Park and the popular 17th Ave retail and dining sceneAnd if you're in the mood for adventure, Banff National Park is just a 90-minute drive awayWhether you're visiting for work, play, or a bit of both, this unit is your all-in-one hub for an unforgettable Calgary stay. From the private patio to top-tier building amenities and unbeatable location—you’ll have everything you need and more.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.55 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
description: This gorgeous, remote-work-friendly, 2 bedroom condo is large enough to host 4 guests at a time. There are 2 King sized beds, plus fold out sofa-bed in the living room. Enjoy the city views and all the natural light that the floor-to-ceiling-windows offer. Featuring an open concept design, fully equipped kitchen (with a dishwasher), in suite laundry machines, and dedicated workstation with free wifi.  We're walking distance from Stampede Park; in the Beltline neighbourhood.The space• 2 bedrooms with King sized beds• 1.5 bathrooms• Fully equipped kitchen with high end appliances• Dining table with seating capacity for 4, plus additional dining space for 4 at the kitchen island bar• 55" Smart TV with Netflix in the living room• Dedicated laptop friendly workstation• High speed internet service• Central air conditioning• In-suite laundry machines• 814 sq.ft• Private balcony• Secure, gated underground parking (for an additional fee)For everyone’s comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels — not conversations — to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained.This bright and airy apartment is in the perfect location! Only steps away from outdoor tennis courts and public parks, and walking distance from Stampede Park! You'll be just a few blocks from downtown, in the Beltline neighbourhood of Calgary's Design District. The open concept design feels even more spacious with the floor to ceiling windows, offering loads of natural light. The living room has a pull out sofa bed and a 55" smart TV with Netflix. There is a dining table with space for 4, plus additional seating at the kitchen island bar. The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. And that's not all! There's also in suite laundry machines, free to use for our guests. You'll find a powder room bathroom beside these. Just down the hallway behind the kitchen you'll find a King sized bedroom. This bedroom has a smart TV, and the whole condo is connected to high speed internet service. Outside of this bedroom is the main bathroom which features a shower/tub combo. The other bedroom is next to the living room, and is separated by a sliding glass door. This King sized bedroom features a private balcony patio, a dedicated laptop-friendly work-station and floor to ceiling windows. Pack your bags and hit the booking button – adventure awaits!Guest accessYou will have exclusive use of this apartment. reviews: The place is beautiful and comfortable. Loved living in the heart of Downtown. Apartment had more space than we expected. Perfect for family stays…will definitely love to stay again in future.

Had a great stay! Was easy to access instructions on check-in were clear. We did have one hiccup on check out though as we were instructed to leave the keys in the unit but it was not made clear that you need to get your car out of the parkade before leaving the keys behind. We got stranded in the lobby and couldn’t get back up to the unit as we didn’t have the fob, also couldn’t get down into the parkade without the fob. Luckily a gentleman who lives in the building was nice enough to let us into the parkade to get our vehicle. Other than this the unit was decent and overall quite clean. I would happily stay here again.

This was by far the worst Airbnb I’ve stayed in & I do not recommend it. After booking, we learned check-in required walking 10 minutes to another location to pick up keys. The provided link for underground parking was useless; no payment option existed so we had to park on the street. Upon entry, we were met with an overwhelming odor of cigarette smoke & a hockey gym bag that lingered in the bedding, towels & furniture. Cleanliness was nonexistent - crumbs, stains, a dirty Kleenex under the uncomfortable couch that had a metal rod running throughout. Hair & dirt on the rug, random stains on the bedding, walls & ceiling, & dust on nearly every surface. A sticker on the fridge telling guests to leave high ratings felt highly inappropriate. After only 2 hours, we left & booked a hotel at 3 a.m. Hosts showed zero concern for our experience & only cared about the keys.Unclean, unprofessional - never again. Only pro was location. I’d have a lot more to say more if there weren’t a word count
Really enjoyed my stay the place was great great location very clean. Everything worked. Would love to stay again.

Well,I found this place is very affordable and close to all locations like restaurants,mall and so many places to visit.
Place is really nice and peaceful.Everything well organized and I will definitely love to rebook if I get a chance to come to Calgary again.
Will come again soon! Samantha is awesome host!!!!
Great place and close to everything. Would easily come back if visiting Calgary again

Pros: Great location—walking distance to bars, restaurants, and downtown/17th Ave. The unit is clean, well-maintained, and looks like the photos. Secure building with easy check-in.
Cons: The unit lacks warmth and feels bare. The couch is stiff and uncomfortable, with metal bars running through the cushions. The kitchen is poorly stocked—no ice trays and minimal essentials, making it impractical for cooking.
The real issue? Greed. I had a medical emergency during the first night and had to leave for the hospital, meaning I never even stayed in the unit. Despite this, the host refused a date change, even though it was Valentine’s Day weekend and could have been rebooked. Worse, they changed the door code without notice, locking me out for 1.5 hours when I returned for my luggage. I was still charged a full cleaning fee for a unit I barely used.
Overall: The unit itself is decent, but the host’s lack of empathy and money-first attitude left me with a bad impression :(
Amazing place great host would stay again
Great apartment!

We had an amazing stay, and would stay here again in the future if able to, the place is even better in person and is right in the heart of downtown Calgary making it very easy to get around the area with plenty of things to do.

Hosts were quick to respond when we messaged and checked in later that day to make sure everything was going alright.
Great hosts and a nice place in a convenient location.
Overall really great stay!! So much to do in the area, great location to walk from, enjoy restaurants and downtown. Ample towels and other amenities.  Great value, great location and would recommend.

From start to finish this was a pretty terrible experience. The hosts was not flexible with the check-in time and only provided check-in instructions 2 hours or so before the designated time. There was only 1 set of keys available for 3 people which was very surprising given that the place is listed to accommodate 4. The host was unable to provide an extra set of keys despite asking for this in advance. Then, the AC was broken and the condo was at 28.5 degrees, which was completely uninhabitable. For 4 (business) days the host was saying it was being repaired and a technician was coming, but no one ever showed up. The host clearly had no intention of ever fixing anything and I am pretty sure I was speaking with an AI for the most part. Would not recommend, it was completely unreasonable to live in a condo at 28.5 degrees and the host misled us in saying it was being repaired.
Great location. Host was helpful. I would stay here again. Thank you

listing_title: Modern 2BR Condo—Steps from Stampede Park
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park, while nearby Stampede Park is known for the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Nearby Family Attractions:Calgary Tower ~ 700 mDevonian Gardens  ~ 1.0 kmCalgary Stampede ~ 1.4 kmPrince's Island Park ~ 2.0 kmTELUS Spark Science Center  ~ 4.4 kmCalgary Zoo ~ 4.1 kmHeritage Park ~ 8.4 kmCalaway Amusement Park ~ 23.5 kmNearby Other Attractions:Cowboys Casino ~ 850 mLindsay Park ~ 850 mScotiabank Saddledome ~ 1.3 kmGlenbow Museum  ~ 850 mOlympic Plaza ~ 1.0 kmShaganappi Point Golf Course ~ 4.9 km

description_by_sections.value: This gorgeous, remote-work-friendly, 2 bedroom condo is large enough to host 4 guests at a time. There are 2 King sized beds, plus fold out sofa-bed in the living room. Enjoy the city views and all the natural light that the floor-to-ceiling-windows offer. Featuring an open concept design, fully equipped kitchen (with a dishwasher), in suite laundry machines, and dedicated workstation with free wifi.  We're walking distance from Stampede Park; in the Beltline neighbourhood.

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: • 2 bedrooms with King sized beds• 1.5 bathrooms• Fully equipped kitchen with high end appliances• Dining table with seating capacity for 4, plus additional dining space for 4 at the kitchen island bar• 55" Smart TV with Netflix in the living room• Dedicated laptop friendly workstation• High speed internet service• Central air conditioning• In-suite laundry machines• 814 sq.ft• Private balcony• Secure, gated underground parking (for an additional fee)For everyone’s comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels — not conversations — to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained.This bright and airy apartment is in the perfect location! Only steps away from outdoor tennis courts and public parks, and walking distance from Stampede Park! You'll be just a few blocks from downtown, in the Beltline neighbourhood of Calgary's Design District. The open concept design feels even more spacious with the floor to ceiling windows, offering loads of natural light. The living room has a pull out sofa bed and a 55" smart TV with Netflix. There is a dining table with space for 4, plus additional seating at the kitchen island bar. The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. And that's not all! There's also in suite laundry machines, free to use for our guests. You'll find a powder room bathroom beside these. Just down the hallway behind the kitchen you'll find a King sized bedroom. This bedroom has a smart TV, and the whole condo is connected to high speed internet service. Outside of this bedroom is the main bathroom which features a shower/tub combo. The other bedroom is next to the living room, and is separated by a sliding glass door. This King sized bedroom features a private balcony patio, a dedicated laptop-friendly work-station and floor to ceiling windows. Pack your bags and hit the booking button – adventure awaits!

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: You will have exclusive use of this apartment. There is dedicated parking in the secure, underground parking garage for one vehicle at a cost of $20.00/night. There's also paid street parking nearby. The building is wheelchair accessible with a ramp at the entrance and an elevator to take you to your floor.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bathroom
description: Experience luxury at Lux Downtown Condo, ideal for couples and business travelers. Enjoy breathtaking city views from your private balcony and relax in the exclusive rooftop pool and patio. This cozy 1-bedroom suite is steps away from top restaurants and attractions in Calgary. With high-speed WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, and a stylish living space, you’ll have everything you need for a comfortable stay in the heart of the city.The space★ Key Features ★Breathtaking City Skyline Views: Enjoy panoramic sights of Calgary’s skyline from your private balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows.Prime Downtown Location: Steps away from Calgary Tower, Saddledome, Stampede Grounds, top restaurants, and trendy cafes.Exclusive Amenities:Rooftop Pool & Patio with BBQFitness Studio & Community LoungeComfort & Convenience:High-speed WiFi (500+ Mbps)Smart TV with Netflix & streaming optionsFully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliancesIn-unit washer/dryer and complimentary toiletriesOverall Space:Welcome to your cozy retreat in the heart of Calgary. This modern 1-bedroom condo offers a stylish and comfortable living space with floor-to-ceiling windows that bring in plenty of natural light. You can enjoy breathtaking views of the city skyline from your private balcony or the rooftop pool and patio area, providing a truly unique experience.Amenities:The condo features excellent amenities designed for your comfort. You can take advantage of high-speed WiFi, a smart TV with streaming options, and a fully equipped kitchen that makes dining in a pleasure. The state-of-the-art fitness studio and community lounge offer additional space to relax or stay active during your stay.Bedroom & Sleeping Arrangements :The bedroom is designed for a restful night's sleep, complete with high-end furnishings and ample storage. Equipped with a pull out queen sofa bed in the living room, our condo can accommodate up to four guests, making it a great option for small families, couples or business travelers looking for convenience and comfort.✔ Exclusive Rooftop Pool & Patio✔ Located in vibrant downtown Calgary✔ Fully equipped kitchen with high end stainless steel appliances✔ High-speed WiFi (500+ Mbps)✔ Smart TV with Netflix & streaming options✔ In-unit washer/dryerGuest access★ Amenities ★Private Condo Access: Entire suite, no sharingRooftop Pool & BBQ Patio: Seasonal access (June to September)Community Sky Lounge: Cozy indoor area with workstations, TV, and kitchenFitness Studio: Fully equipped, open daily from 5 AM to 11 PMHigh-Speed Internet: Ideal for work-from-home or streamingGuests will enjoy exclusive access to the whole condo, including the stunning rooftop pool and patio where you can unwind and take in breathtaking views of Calgary's skyline. You'll also have access to a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for preparing meals at your convenience, and a comfortable living area with a Smart TV for your entertainment. With a state-of-the-art gym available, you can maintain your fitness routine during your stay. Additionally, the cozy bedroom ensures a restful night’s sleep. Please note that the rooftop amenities are for guests only and shared with other residents.Other things to note★ Additional Notes ★Longer Stays: For stays over 28 days, a rental agreement and self-maintenance are required.No Smoking or Parties: Smoking or hosting events is strictly prohibited and will result in additional fees.High Standard Sanitization: Thorough cleaning is performed before each stay for your safety.★ Why Stay at Lux Downtown Suite? ★Whether you’re in Calgary for work, leisure, or a romantic getaway, our suite is perfectly designed for:Couples seeking a romantic retreatSolo Travelers or small families exploring the cityBusiness Professionals needing a functional workspace with blazing-fast internetAs we embrace winter in Calgary, this is the perfect time to enjoy the festive atmosphere that the season brings. With New Year's Eve just around the corner, you can experience the vibrant celebrations downtown, including fireworks and festivities. In mid-January, Calgary hosts the famous Calgary Ice Magic Festival, an event showcasing stunning ice sculptures. Additionally, Family Day in February is a wonderful opportunity for you to soak in the local culture with activities that bring families together. This Lux Downtown Condo offers an ideal home base to help you make the most of these seasonal celebrations, immersing you in the warmth and excitement of winter in the city.Registration DetailsBL287620
reviews:
I had a wonderful stay at this location. It was just me and my son and there’s lots of restaurants around right downtown so we could go shopping and there was a perky that was very cheap right across the street for us to park in for the weekend.
Everything in her apartment was very clean and she also had Netflix, which was a plus . I would recommend this place to anybody.
Great stay. The place was cozy, clean, and perfectly located. Everything was walkable and easy to access. Maria was incredibly communicative and helpful throughout. Would definitely stay here again.

We had a fantastic stay during the Calgary Stampede! The location was perfect, just a short walk to all the main attractions and events. It was super easy to get around, and the host was incredibly responsive and helpful with any questions we had. Highly recommend!

We stayed at Maria's place over Stampede and the location was excellent for walking to the grounds and many wonderful local restaurants (our favourite was Ten Foot Henry). We found the unit fairly tight for 3 people but it would be great for a couple. During Stampede it's worth noting the windows aren't soundproofed, and they rattle with the local music which runs until around 2am each night. As we have a 10 year old, we were all in bed by 9pm, but if you plan to attend the late night events, it's likely a perfect location for you!
It was clean, easy to access and quiet. Very good option if you’re wanting to experience downtown Calgary everything is in walking distance.
I loved it!! Even though I was downtown it was a very quiet peaceful sleep.  I loved the restaurant below and Bridgette’s down the street — thank you!

Place is a bit on the small size wise. But for a couple of travellers I would say it’s perfectly perfect. Maria was a very responsive host. I would recommend her place to anyone spending some time in Calgary. Every thing you could possibly need from great restaurants to entertainment is all walkable.

This place is a gem! So cozy and comfortable - you feel at home the moment you walk in! Maria took care of every little thing you can think of - from the hook for your coat and place to put your purse to the barbecue on the balcony. The location is great and you can find a lot of things to do, places to eat, attractions to visit. Million stars out of ten.✨
Superb host. I needed some extra flexibility and Maria was an absolute star.

The apartment is fantastic. It has a nice modern style. The view is great into the city. The glass front lets a lot of light in, but can be covered. Location is very central.
I would book the same place anytime again.
This is my second stay at Maria's! It is very walkable and easy for my business trips!
Clean tidy place, good neighborhood, very responsive and kind host
Clean and cozy
Great stay! Exactly as pictures showed it.
was a super good stay but even better, when i went to refill my water bottle - had ice on hand and was super happy with the extra thought:)
Great place!
Great stay at Maria’s!
Good place

You'll also have access to a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for preparing meals at your convenience, and a comfortable living area with a Smart TV for your entertainment. With a state-of-the-art gym available, you can maintain your fitness routine during your stay. Additionally, the cozy bedroom ensures a restful night’s sleep. Please note that the rooftop amenities are for guests only and shared with other residents.

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: ★ Additional Notes ★Longer Stays: For stays over 28 days, a rental agreement and self-maintenance are required.No Smoking or Parties: Smoking or hosting events is strictly prohibited and will result in additional fees.High Standard Sanitization: Thorough cleaning is performed before each stay for your safety.★ Why Stay at Lux Downtown Suite? ★Whether you’re in Calgary for work, leisure, or a romantic getaway, our suite is perfectly designed for:Couples seeking a romantic retreatSolo Travelers or small families exploring the cityBusiness Professionals needing a functional workspace with blazing-fast internetAs we embrace winter in Calgary, this is the perfect time to enjoy the festive atmosphere that the season brings. With New Year's Eve just around the corner, you can experience the vibrant celebrations downtown, including fireworks and festivities. In mid-January, Calgary hosts the famous Calgary Ice Magic Festival, an event showcasing stunning ice sculptures. Additionally, Family Day in February is a wonderful opportunity for you to soak in the local culture with activities that bring families together. This Lux Downtown Condo offers an ideal home base to help you make the most of these seasonal celebrations, immersing you in the warmth and excitement of winter in the city.

cancellation_policy.cancellation_value: Partial refund if you cancel before 15:00 on 11 November. Get back every night but the first one. No refund of the first night or the service fee..

reviews_details.review:
I had a wonderful stay at this location. It was just me and my son and there’s lots of restaurants around right downtown so we could go shopping and there was a perky that was very cheap right across the street for us to park in for the weekend.
Everything in her apartment was very clean and she also had Netflix, which was a plus . I would recommend this place to anybody.
Great stay. The place was cozy, clean, and perfectly located. Everything was walkable and easy to access. Maria was incredibly communicative and helpful throughout. Would definitely stay here again.

We had a fantastic stay during the Calgary Stampede! The location was perfect, just a short walk to all the main attractions and events. It was super easy to get around, and the host was incredibly responsive and helpful with any questions we had. Highly recommend!

We stayed at Maria's place over Stampede and the location was excellent for walking to the grounds and many wonderful local restaurants (our favourite was Ten Foot Henry). We found the unit fairly tight for 3 people but it would be great for a couple. During Stampede it's worth noting the windows aren't soundproofed, and they rattle with the local music which runs until around 2am each night. As we have a 10 year old, we were all in bed by 9pm, but if you plan to attend the late night events, it's likely a perfect location for you!
It was clean, easy to access and quiet. Very good option if you’re wanting to experience downtown Calgary everything is in walking distance.
I loved it!! Even though I was downtown it was a very quiet peaceful sleep.  I loved the restaurant below and Bridgette’s down the street — thank you!

Place is a bit on the small size wise. But for a couple of travellers I would say it’s perfectly perfect. Maria was a very responsive host. I would recommend her place to anyone spending some time in Calgary. Every thing you could possibly need from great restaurants to entertainment is all walkable.

This place is a gem! So cozy and comfortable - you feel at home the moment you walk in! Maria took care of every little thing you can think of - from the hook for your coat and place to put your purse to the barbecue on the balcony. The location is great and you can find a lot of things to do, places to eat, attractions to visit. Million stars out of ten.✨
Superb host. I needed some extra flexibility and Maria was an absolute star.

The apartment is fantastic. It has a nice modern style. The view is great into the city. The glass front lets a lot of light in, but can be covered. Location is very central.
I would book the same place anytime again.
This is my second stay at Maria's! It is very walkable and easy for my business trips!
Clean tidy place, good neighborhood, very responsive and kind host
Clean and cozy
Great stay! Exactly as pictures showed it.
was a super good stay but even better, when i went to refill my water bottle - had ice on hand and was super happy with the extra thought:)
Great place!
Great stay at Maria’s!
Good place

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.64 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: *NEW* Welcome to Colours!Steps away from Shops, Eats & NatureBright & Open Living Room AreaFully Equipped + Stocked KitchenOffice Space + High-Speed WiFiOnsite Secured Parking IncludedClean & Sanitized After Every GuestNetflix, Prime Video & Disney+(Please use your own account)Onsite Washer + Dryer Free 2 UseNearby 17 AVE + Sights to seeWalk Score 96 - Walker's ParadiseOutstanding Urban Oasis*Feel free to let us know if you need anything in particular during your stay*The spaceWelcome to this amazing west facing 2 bedroom unit. Colours by Battistella has views of downtown Calgary and a location that can't be beaten.Fun, Friendly, Vibrant and Walkable!Take the elevator up to the 4th floor where your lovely accommodation awaits.As soon as you walk in, you welcomed by the spacious open living room. complimented by floor to ceiling windows and flooded with sunlight.Come sit down and relax in while admiring the great views Calgary has to offer. Turn on the 50" UHD 4k Smart TV to Netflix and Chill.The large kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. It is perfect for the gourmet chef and entertaining friends/family. A frosted glass sliding partition creates separation for the master bedroom. It ensures optimal open concept living. Central air conditioning, ensuite laundry and washer are available. We also offer underground parking stall and bike storage.Beautiful interior colour palettes and European-style fixtures are present in this unit.Act on it and book a top-rated rental in Calgary!Easy booking. Easy living. Instant confirmation.Other things to noteA host may require to ask for a government-issued ID to confirm the guest's identity prior to check-in.Registration DetailsBL268528
reviews: I had a good stay overall, unfortunately I ran into a number of issues where all drain pipes were clogged from the kitchen to the bathroom for a couple days after my arrival until it was fixed. The towel rack in the bathroom is completely ripped off the wall and missing, and missing light bulbs in the bathroom make the lighting horrible, far from being as bright as in the pictures but much more dimmed. The floor was also sticky so I'm glad I had packed a pair of slides to walk around. The kitchen only has the basics which was not always great for cooking. The balcony definitely needed a cleanup so I never used it. Like other comments said, the bed in the main bedroom is very uncomfortable but I didn't have to use it fortunately. I mostly liked the area which is great and very walkable, with a decent number of coffee shops and restaurants around.

From the smooth check in to our departure, this was a delightful experience
The variety of restaurants was a surprise. Good food.

Jo, Mary and Amber are great hosts respectively. We did have a number of issues but communication was so well respected between us. They just took care of all our problems. It's been a coincidence that I am booking with them for the second time, but now I will look out for their ads whenever I book in Calgary.
Thanks n Kudos to all of you!
Friendly and quick-responding host, cozy accommodation in a good location! Recommended!

Me and my husband stayed for one month at Joe and Marie’s apartment, and we were totally happy we had chosen it.
The location was great and convenient, few steps away from the best restaurants, a big shopping center and the most of attractions. The view was amazing. And the apartment itself was everything we could expect and more.

I lived in the apartment for a whole week , the apartment is very nice and located in the very center.
Clean, coffee was there, bed and towels smelled nice.
The host was quick to respond to questions.
Every thing it was very good.
The only disadvantage was the clogged sink in the kitchen, but perhaps this problem is in the house itself.
Thank you very much for your stay, we will definitely stay again.

We had a pleasant stay overall, but there were a couple of areas for improvement. Communication with the host could have been better; I requested a second key to facilitate logistics since there were two of us staying, but I didn’t receive a response. Additionally, the mattress in the main bedroom was quite worn and uncomfortable, deforming during the night to the point that I had to sleep on the couch for half of the stay. Addressing these issues would enhance the overall experience. Otherwise, we appreciated the property and its amenities.

this was a great location but, the place is not in great shape. missing light bulbs, closet doors that don't function, the master bed has a problem, it sinks in the middle. the balcony could you use a clean, cigarette butts, Etc. kitchen had only the basics.
Nice place
The place is very nice and clean. The hosts are very friendly and helpful with the information about the place. Would recommend for a visit to Calgary
Very nice place! It was all clean and the host is really kind.
Great location, bright open apartment & fantastic hosts.

You have to make small compromises, especially there was a problem with the elevator that required a lot of waiting time. There are certainly luxurious apartments, but the value for money is unbeatable. That's why the conclusion – highly recommended.

We stayed in the apartment for three weeks. The apartment has a very convenient location in the city center, close to C-train, restaurants, shops. Convenient parking space in the parking lot. I was pleased with the gorgeous view. There were questions about cleaning the apartment, but the host quickly resolved this issue! In general, I recommend it.
Very clean and great place for a super great price since your only 10-15 minutes away from downtown

Mary, Joe and Amber were amazing hosts! This was my very first Airbnb booking and things couldn’t have been easier.
Our hosts were EXTREMELY responsive and friendly and made things very easy for myself and family (I was travelling with my parents who are in their 70s).
Considering that this location was in a busy part of the downtown area, you couldn’t hear much of the outdoor noise (minus a few revving engines and sirens), which made for restful nights. We were able to walk to Stampede Park, which was an added bonus.
Again, this is in the downtown core, so be prepared to experience some of the eccentricity that comes with that, however, we did not feel unsafe at any time.
The space was clean and there was plenty of storage space. An extra key/fob would have been great since there were times when we were not all together as a group and maybe access to a fitness room (if allowed).
Would definitely consider booking here again!
Place was good. Check in was a complete disaster unfortunately but everything else was good.
Good apartment, position and host!
Great location! Nice view and hosts were very responsive.
Great location. We enjoyed our stay.
Lovely condo and would book again when in the area.
The house is clean, in a good location, and the apartment is walking distance to restaurants and supermarkets.It would be better if there was a large lamp in the living room.

reviews_details.review: I had a good stay overall, unfortunately I ran into a number of issues where all drain pipes were clogged from the kitchen to the bathroom for a couple days after my arrival until it was fixed. The towel rack in the bathroom is completely ripped off the wall and missing, and missing light bulbs in the bathroom make the lighting horrible, far from being as bright as in the pictures but much more dimmed. The floor was also sticky so I'm glad I had packed a pair of slides to walk around. The kitchen only has the basics which was not always great for cooking. reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We’re glad to hear you enjoyed the area and found the location convenient. We sincerely apologize for the maintenance issues you experienced during your stay — including the clogged drains, lighting, and towel rack. These have since been addressed, and we’re taking additional steps to ensure they don’t happen again. We also appreciate your notes about the balcony and kitchen setup, as they help us identify where we can improve. We value your feedback and hope to have the chance to provide a smoother stay in the future.

Чисто, кофе было, постель и полотенца пахли приятно.
Хозяин отвечал на все вопросы быстро.
Все было очень хорошо.
Единственным минусом была забитая мойка на кухне, но возможно эта проблема в самом доме.
Спасибо большое за проживание, обязательно остановимся ещё.

Man muss kleine Abstriche machen, vor allem gab es ein Problem mit dem Aufzug, dass viel Wartezeit erforderlich machte. Es gibt sicherlich luxuriöser Wohnungen, aber das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist unschlagbar. Deshalb das Fazit – sehr zu empfehlen.

Мы проживали в апартаментах три недели. Квартира имеет очень удобное расположение в центре города, близко С-трейн, рестораны, магазины. Удобное парковочное место на паркинге. Порадовал шикарный вид из окна. Были вопросы по уборке квартиры, но хозяин быстро решил этот вопрос! В общем рекомендую.
Very clean and great place for a super great price since your only 10-15 minutes away from downtown

name: Condo in Calgary · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Enjoy a relaxing and cozy stay at Sojourn Aria 🌸 with Calgary Tower and downtown views! 🌃You will be centrally located in Beltline by Downtown. Trendy restaurants 🍱, bars & pubs🍸, night clubs 🪩, shops 🛍️ and attractions including Stampede venues are a walk away!🚶‍♂️The Bow River, Prince’s Island Park and Stampede Grounds are an 8 min ride away 🚕Please book only if you plan to arrive prior to 11pm 🕚 as the building front doors lock 🔒 at that time. We require ID 🪪 prior to the stayThe spaceReturn from an abundance of exciting activities in Calgary ☀️ and the Rockies 🏔️ to a restful space 😌Here are a few features to note:- Central A/C and heating- High-speed WIFI- Fresh linens & towels- Housekeeping before & after stay- Complementary Nespresso coffee, water bottles and snack barsLiving Room 🛋️:- Sofa (or double bed, memory foam, read below)- 55” Smart Frame TV with Free Netflix (no ads) Kitchen🧑‍🍳:- Dishwasher & detergent- Cleaning products & hand wash- Gas stove, fridge, freezer and deep sink- Cookware, dinnerware, silverware, knife block & steak knives, baking sheet, cutting board, charcuterie board, kettle, utensils etc.- Olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, spices, paper towelsLaundry 🧺:- Washer- Dryer- DetergentBedroom 🛏️:- Queen bed (memory foam)- Chargers (usb & usb-c) on bed frame- Light switches under night stand- Iron and ironing board in closet- Extra blankets Bathroom 🛁:- Tub with glass door- Pharmacopia shampoo, conditioner, body wash & body lotion- Hair dryer hair- Hand wash, tissues & toilet paperBalcony 🌃:- Patio furniture (seasonal)- Wood deck- Hedge wall & lightsWe require the Guest to review and complete a Rental Agreement ✍️ and send photos of each guest's ID 🪪 within 48 hours of the confirmation of the reservation. If you are booking 96 hours or sooner in advance of your stay, please review and complete the Rental Agreement ✍️ and send photos each guest's ID 🪪 within 2 hours of receiving instruction. Details of the Terms can be found in the House Rules sectionGuest access- Private access to the entire condo unit 🌇- Shared gym 🏋️‍♂️, common area 🛋️, outdoor pool 🏊‍♂️ (seasonal), bbq grill and patio (seasonal)Other things to noteParking Recommendations 🚗:- Street Parking🚦: Free in evenings and on Sunday, paid parking during other times (find more details on MyParking app by the Calgary Parking Authority)- Surface Lot 🅿️: Across the street from the condo, Indigo lot C207 offers paid parking (find more details on Indigo Neo app)- Underground Lot 🅿️: Across the street from the condo, underground Indigo lot C156 (in the Marriott SODO building) offers paid parking (find more details on Indigo Neo app)Second Bed 🛋️ ➡️ 🛏️:The sofa will be prepared as a double bed if you book 3 or more guests If you wish for the bed to be prepared with less than 3 guests, please book as 3 guests and message meIf you wish the sofa to not be prepared as a bed with 3 or more guests, please message meRegistration DetailsBL290813
reviews: This place was definitely worth the stay! It looked exactly like the pictures, clean, comfortable, and well-kept. The location was great too, with plenty to do around the area like restaurants. I’d definitely stay here again!

This was one of the best, if not the best Airbnb that I’ve stayed in. Adam was an amazing host - extremely informative, responsive and helpful. The attention to detail in the apartment was on point. Everything was as described and even better in person. The apartment was spotlessly clean and really was like a home away from home with everything that we needed. The location was also really convenient and within walking distance to many areas in Calgary, there were also lots of restaurant choices nearby.

Overall, great stay. Apt was a little smaller, then what I anticipated but the bathroom was a great size, which was a plus.
Home was upscale. Extremely clean. Had everything needed.
My GPS did bring me to the Marriott so if you arrive at the Marriott, you’ve gone too far. Be prepared to pay for parking.
The views from the bedroom and patio were beautiful!
If you’re into Italian, highly recommend Toscana. 10/10 I had the chicken parm with pene.
Overall, would stay again.
Would stay again.
Excellent location in downtown Calgary! Super clean! Adam was super helpful and went out of his way to help us out after hours as our flight arrived late. Would stay here again in the Calgary area!

Very nice condo. Adam was amazing and even helped us out when we had a small issue (unrelated to the condo).
Beautiful view that we enjoyed from the balcony. Extremely clean, well stocked. We would 100% stay again.

A very enjoyable stay access to everything I needed. The unit includes some lovely additions features. Felt right at home.
Would recommend this little appartment with an amazing view

We loved the beautiful flat which was well located. Safeway close by and a short walk to the Core shopping mall. Loved having some restaurants right there and within walking distance. Would definitely stay again. Thank you Adam

Everything was perfect. Nicely decorated and SO CLEAN!! LOVED the balcony. Comfy bed. The bathroom felt like a spa with the nice smelling shampoo etc provided. I like that the sheets and towels are all white - makes it feel extra clean. Walkable location. Good communication from host. Check in might be a little tricky for someone not techy because you use your phone, but wasn't a problem for us. Paid parking lot right across the street. Definitely going to stay here again next time I'm in Calgary.

Great place to stay at! The view was amazing, clean & aesthetic, had plenty of amenities for our stay. It was easy to locate and the front security was helpful in check in process. There was ample of parking, which we were worried about since it was downtown. Adam was accommodating during our stay and we tried one of his recommended locations which turned out to be the most delightful dinner we’ve had.

I had a great stay! The place was comfortable, clean, and exactly as described. The location was perfect ☺️ close to everything I wanted to explore, with easy access to public transport and local spots. Highly recommend for anyone visiting the area! ☺️⭐️

The condo was immaculate and very comfortable with a great balcony which had such a good view of the Calgary Tower. Very well located for downtown and not too far a walk from the river. Adam was a really responsive host.
We enjoyed our recent stay in Calgary! Everything was on walking distance. Adam was a super host, very responsive. The place is gorgeous and relaxing. We would stay here again!
Had a wonderful stay at Sojourn Aria and I couldn’t fault a single thing. The apartment has been carefully considered for guests and has everything you could possible need.

Absolutely wonderful, cosy and well equipped place to stay in the heart of Calgary. Adam is providing all information and is always available in case of questions. Lovely details in this brand new apartment; felt like being home from the first second on. Would come back for sure. Thanks a lot!
Great place, so clean. Only issue is building is locked from 11pm-7am. Not the fault of the host, but sucks if your flight or travel plans are delayed.
Adam was very communicative and very helpful! Place was beautiful and a nice transitional stay.
What a nice place to stay! The location is great, everything is comfortable and it's a stylish unit! We especially liked the shower and the balcony.
I had a great stay at Adam’s place! The location was great and walkable. Adam was responsive when I needed assistance and was a great host. Will definitely stay again!

This place was beautiful, spacious, very well equipped, and full of natural light. Perfectly located in downtown Calgary, with lots of things to do within walking distance. The host was kind and attentive to any questions I had. Without a doubt, this will be my go-to place every time I visit Calgary. I would choose it again and again!
Such a beautiful space to relax and rewind in! Clean, comfortable and felt very luxurious.
Nice apartment,  clean, modern,  nice amenities and a comfortable bed. Would recommend
Great location and building. Stunning tower view and very clean!
Absolutely loved staying here, the apartment was pristine and gorgeous too! Adam was quick to respond to our questions and had a great list of local recommendations!
The place was superb. Feels like home actually better than our home ☺️ We got the perfect spot of a city vibe. I love the place so much.

description_by_sections.value: Return from an abundance of exciting activities in Calgary ☀️ and the Rockies 🏔️ to a restful space 😌Here are a few features to note:- Central A/C and heating- High-speed WIFI- Fresh linens & towels- Housekeeping before & after stay- Complementary Nespresso coffee, water bottles and snack barsLiving Room 🛋️:- Sofa (or double bed, memory foam, read below)- 55” Smart Frame TV with Free Netflix (no ads) Kitchen🧑‍🍳:- Dishwasher & detergent- Cleaning products & hand wash- Gas stove, fridge, freezer and deep sink- Cookware, dinnerware, silverware, knife block & steak knives, baking sheet, cutting board, charcuterie board, kettle, utensils etc.- Olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, spices, paper towelsLaundry 🧺:- Washer- Dryer- DetergentBedroom 🛏️:- Queen bed (memory foam)- Chargers (usb & usb-c) on bed frame- Light switches under night stand- Iron and ironing board in closet- Extra blankets Bathroom 🛁:- Tub with glass door- Pharmacopia shampoo, conditioner, body wash & body lotion- Hair dryer hair- Hand wash, tissues & toilet paperBalcony 🌃:- Patio furniture (seasonal)- Wood deck- Hedge wall & lightsWe require the Guest to review and complete a Rental Agreement ✍️ and send photos of each guest's ID 🪪 within 48 hours of the confirmation of the reservation. If you are booking 96 hours or sooner in advance of your stay, please review and complete the Rental Agreement ✍️ and send photos each guest's ID 🪪 within 2 hours of receiving instruction. Details of the Terms can be found in the House Rules section

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: - Private access to the entire condo unit 🌇- Shared gym 🏋️‍♂️, common area 🛋️, outdoor pool 🏊‍♂️ (seasonal), bbq grill and patio (seasonal)

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: Parking Recommendations 🚗:- Street Parking🚦: Free in evenings and on Sunday, paid parking during other times (find more details on MyParking app by the Calgary Parking Authority)- Surface Lot 🅿️: Across the street from the condo, Indigo lot C207 offers paid parking (find more details on Indigo Neo app)- Underground Lot 🅿️: Across the street from the condo, underground Indigo lot C156 (in the Marriott SODO building) offers paid parking (find more details on Indigo Neo app)Second Bed 🛋️ ➡️ 🛏️:The sofa will be prepared as a double bed if you book 3 or more guests If you wish for the bed to be prepared with less than 3 guests, please book as 3 guests and message meIf you wish the sofa to not be prepared as a bed with 3 or more guests, please message me

reviews_details.review: This place was definitely worth the stay! It looked exactly like the pictures, clean, comfortable, and well-kept. The location was great too, with plenty to do around the area like restaurants. I’d definitely stay here again!

This was one of the best, if not the best Airbnb that I’ve stayed in. Adam was an amazing host - extremely informative, responsive and helpful. The attention to detail in the apartment was on point. Everything was as described and even better in person. The apartment was spotlessly clean and really was like a home away from home with everything that we needed. The location was also really convenient and within walking distance to many areas in Calgary, there were also lots of restaurant choices nearby.

Overall, great stay. Apt was a little smaller, then what I anticipated but the bathroom was a great size, which was a plus.
Home was upscale. Extremely clean. Had everything needed.
My GPS did bring me to the Marriott so if you arrive at the Marriott, you’ve gone too far. Be prepared to pay for parking.
The views from the bedroom and patio were beautiful!
If you’re into Italian, highly recommend Toscana. 10/10 I had the chicken parm with pene.
Overall, would stay again.
Would stay again.
Excellent location in downtown Calgary! Super clean! Adam was super helpful and went out of his way to help us out after hours as our flight arrived late. Would stay here again in the Calgary area!

Very nice condo. Adam was amazing and even helped us out when we had a small issue (unrelated to the condo).
Beautiful view that we enjoyed from the balcony. Extremely clean, well stocked. We would 100% stay again.

A very enjoyable stay access to everything I needed. The unit includes some lovely additions features. Felt right at home.
Would recommend this little appartment with an amazing view

We loved the beautiful flat which was well located. Safeway close by and a short walk to the Core shopping mall. Loved having some restaurants right there and within walking distance. Would definitely stay again. Thank you Adam

Everything was perfect. Nicely decorated and SO CLEAN!! LOVED the balcony. Comfy bed. The bathroom felt like a spa with the nice smelling shampoo etc provided. I like that the sheets and towels are all white - makes it feel extra clean. Walkable location. Good communication from host. Check in might be a little tricky for someone not techy because you use your phone, but wasn't a problem for us. Paid parking lot right across the street. Definitely going to stay here again next time I'm in Calgary.

Great place to stay at! The view was amazing, clean & aesthetic, had plenty of amenities for our stay. It was easy to locate and the front security was helpful in check in process. There was ample of parking, which we were worried about since it was downtown. Adam was accommodating during our stay and we tried one of his recommended locations which turned out to be the most delightful dinner we’ve had.

I had a great stay! The place was comfortable, clean, and exactly as described. The location was perfect ☺️ close to everything I wanted to explore, with easy access to public transport and local spots. Highly recommend for anyone visiting the area! ☺️⭐️

The condo was immaculate and very comfortable with a great balcony which had such a good view of the Calgary Tower. Very well located for downtown and not too far a walk from the river. Adam was a really responsive host.
We enjoyed our recent stay in Calgary! Everything was on walking distance. Adam was a super host, very responsive. The place is gorgeous and relaxing. We would stay here again!
Had a wonderful stay at Sojourn Aria and I couldn’t fault a single thing. The apartment has been carefully considered for guests and has everything you could possible need.

Absolutely wonderful, cosy and well equipped place to stay in the heart of Calgary. Adam is providing all information and is always available in case of questions. Lovely details in this brand new apartment; felt like being home from the first second on. Would come back for sure. Thanks a lot!
Great place, so clean. Only issue is building is locked from 11pm-7am. Not the fault of the host, but sucks if your flight or travel plans are delayed.
Adam was very communicative and very helpful! Place was beautiful and a nice transitional stay.
What a nice place to stay! The location is great, everything is comfortable and it's a stylish unit! We especially liked the shower and the balcony.
I had a great stay at Adam’s place! The location was great and walkable. Adam was responsive when I needed assistance and was a great host. Will definitely stay again!

This place was beautiful, spacious, very well equipped, and full of natural light. Perfectly located in downtown Calgary, with lots of things to do within walking distance. The host was kind and attentive to any questions I had. Without a doubt, this will be my go-to place every time I visit Calgary. I would choose it again and again!
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you Rocio! It was our pleasure to have such wonderful guests! Would love to have you back anytime :)

reviews_details.review: Such a beautiful space to relax and rewind in! Clean, comfortable and felt very luxurious.
Nice apartment,  clean, modern,  nice amenities and a comfortable bed. Would recommend
Great location and building. Stunning tower view and very clean!
Absolutely loved staying here, the apartment was pristine and gorgeous too! Adam was quick to respond to our questions and had a great list of local recommendations!
The place was superb. Feels like home actually better than our home ☺️ We got the perfect spot of a city vibe. I love the place so much.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.50 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 bathrooms
description: Welcome to your professionally designed 2-bedroom corner condo with breathtaking mountain and skyline views — the perfect home base in the heart of Calgary’s vibrant Beltline.This bright and modern unit is just steps from 17th Ave’s top restaurants, cafes, shops, and bars, and only a 5-minute drive to the Stampede grounds, Saddledome, and the river. Whether you’re here for work or leisure, you’ll love the location, comfort, and amenities.*** POOL is closed for the winter.The spacePlease be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.•Unobstructed city + mountain views from a private balcony•Professionally designed space with upscale decor & finishes•2 comfortable queen beds with fresh linens•2 full bathrooms with towels, toiletries, hair dryer, iron & steamer•Oversized heated underground parking stall right next to the elevator•Floor-to-ceiling windows with tons of natural light•Fully equipped kitchen + complimentary coffee•In-suite laundry (detergent & dryer sheets provided)•Board games for cozy nights in•55” Smart TV with Netflix and cable•High-speed Wi-Fi•Full access to building amenities: gym, pool, rooftop patioID Verification Required for our property.All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.Guest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.*** POOL is closed for the winter.Other things to noteAfter 10pm, building doors are locked. If checking in after 10pm, keys must be picked up at a nearby secondary location.Balcony doors may lock automatically — please use caution when stepping outside.ID verification is required for all bookings.Registration DetailsBL290707
reviews: Kyle and Andrew were very responsive and I appreciated their check-ins. Their place was so cozy and stunning. I absolutely love having the balcony and enjoyed the views. The beds were pretty comfy and the kitchen was definitely stocked with necessities which made it easy to cook. I will definitely come back!

Stayed here for 2 weeks and had everything we needed available.  Many restaurants a short walk away, grocery store just down the street.  View of the city and mountains was mesmerizing and sometimes included hot air balloons in the distance.  Garage parking space is very conveniently located near the entrance and near the elevators.  Communication with property owners was timely and informative.  Great place!

We LOVED, LOVED, LOVED our stay in Kyle & Andrew's apartment / condo. We called it the "Angel Pad" ... it felt light, sunny, joyful and full of positive vibes. We loved waking up to and coming home to the views. The sunrises ... amazing! There for 9 days, it came to feel like home away from home. We loved our two "stay-home" dinners, just relaxing and enjoying the gentleness - the tone set by the beautiful, light decor. Scarpetta's Italian Restaurant, in the condo building, was delicious. Safeway is a 5 minute walk away. Kyle and Andrew, thank you for a wonderful stay!

Thank you so much to the host ! This place was absolutely amazing with beautiful views! We had a small family getaway and would definitely rebook! The host was also quick to respond and very friendly. Location is super close to restaurant, supermarket and more. 10/10 would recommend

The apartment itself is as per the photo's/description, actually nicely presented and comfortable, it could do with some better blinds; access is somewhat difficult through a slightly difficult to operate entrance interface, b
ut once in there's a key fob which makes this a lot easier.
Unfortunately for us there was a major international open air Electronic Dance music festival adjacent to the apartment occurring at the same time as our visit making it impossible to sleep in the apartment before 02;00. This, was not advised in advance of our visit.

We had a wonderful stay at Kyle and Andrew’s place and couldn’t recommend more!
The apartment was even better than the pictures showed - spacious, extremely clean and comfortable. It had everything we needed, even down to washing powder for our clothes. The washer and dryer are huge and great for piling the active wear in if you’re visiting Banff National Park.
The building itself is really modern and we loved the patio/pool area (pool is heated to 84 degrees so was comfortable even on cooler days!). We also spent lots of time admiring the view from the balcony out over Calgary and to the mountains on a clear day.
Other reviews mention it being noisy, however this is to be expected if you want to stay in a great city centre location. You’re a stone’s throw from the bustling 17th ave, with loads of great bars and restaurants nearby.
Finally, Kyle and Andrew were extremely attentive with messages and questions. Thanks again for a perfect stay!

Stayed for a few days with my family. The space was fine, but check-in was a problem. We messaged the host 15 minutes before arrival (arrival for 10:02 pm) and were told we couldn’t check in because doors closed at 10 pm and it was our fault for not reading the instructions and that we wouldn’t get a refund. We pointed out that the host’s own previous message said 2 am as the cutoff and sent him a screenshot. After realizing his mistake, the host stopped responding, repeatedly typing and deleting messages which we could see in the chat. He also ignored two calls to the emergency number which he provided. We were stranded outside until a passerby who lived in the building helped us get in and we buzzed the landlord’s number. The landlord was able to message us "did you buzz in" the second we did which furthered that he was on his phone and just ghosting us because of his mistake. There were no issues after this point but was disappointed in the way the issue was handled.

The property was even nicer than pictured. It has an amazing city view from all of the floor to ceiling windows which we sat in front of on a nightly basis to admire the city lights. It has an expansive balcony with comfortable chairs where you can sit and watch the city go by! Kyle & Andrew went above and beyond with all of the necessities for daily living. All we had to buy were a few groceries for our 9 day stay. The condo was well furnished and very clean. It was also great to have a full size washer, dryer and dishwasher at hand.  We felt very safe as there is excellent building security.  I would recommend staying at Kyle & Andrew’s property and we will definitely stay there again.
Great condo. Location is close to everything. Good commication with renters
stay was great. check out was a bit rocky but that was not kyle's fault.

Condo is nice and well located.
Kyle is very responsive and condo way as describe.
Great place to stay. Amazing views and I highly recommend.
MAGICAL !!! Love the place ! Very convenient and nice and luxurious
The location is good.However, the host's responses seem to be AI, not human.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.90 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Welcome home!This stylish suite has features floor to ceiling glass windows, breathtaking city views, kind bed, corner unit, comfy living area, a dedicated work space, UG parking, high speed internet, private patio and more.When you stay with us you’ll experience all the comforts of home, in a professionally decorated downtown condo.Perfect for diverse groups of travellers, including; business, couples, families, friends and even solo travellers looking for extra space.The spaceWithin walking distance to 17th Ave, Saddledome/Stampede grounds and downtown core. Steps away from Calgary's trendiest restaurants and best nightlife such as St James corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, endless pubs, popular 8th, 10th and 17th Ave, Starbucks and a yoga studio a stone throw from front entrance.Notable Features:-King bed-Work Station-Dining Table-Balcony with spectacular skyline view-Fresh beddings & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-Eating Bar-High-speed WiFi-Free underground parking-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machineID Verification required for our property.We do not accept arrivals 2am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time please refrain from booking. Thank youGuest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.Registration DetailsBL289265
reviews: It was my first time to stay at a luxury airbnb, and I called this place my penthouse. From the mesmerizing view to spacious area, everything was perfect and very cozy. I felt very safe staying there alone with the building strict access system. I will definitely choose this airbnb if I ever visit Calgary again! Thank you for the great stay.

Kyle’s place was excellent, from the beginning communication was clear and concise. The condo was in great shape and an excellent location. The View! The pictures in the ad did not do this justice, waking up and having a cup of coffee while looking at the mountains was excellent. I would highly recommend this unit to anyone

Had a wonderful time in this stunning condo! It was centrally located, very spacious, and clean. Both mornings I woke up to  beautiful views of the city and air balloons over the mountains from a distance. Just steps away from pubs and restaurants, meaning I didn't have to stray too far if I didn't want to. I'd highly recommend this one, and can't wait to come back!

When I booked this place, I thought it was too good to be true.  The location, view and luxurious feel was even better than the photos. I will be back and strongly recommend this place, you won’t regret it!

Nice place, plenty of windows like my own home.  Minimalist designed. Fantastic neighborhood.  Tons of food choices, Starbucks across the street, and nice bars.  I felt very safe.  Directions for access very easy.

Table was set for my girlfriend and I when we arrived. The view is magnificent yet the place still allows for privacy with use of the blinds. Hosts were always available by text if we needed anything. Would definitely stay there again.

It was such a convenient place to stay in relation to the city center. The views were marvelous. We had everything we needed to feel at home. Kyle was extremely quick to reply to any message. I would recommend his place to anyone interested.

We had such a wonderful stay! The place was spotless, comfortable, and had everything we needed. Communication was smooth and check-in was super easy. The location was perfect and made our trip even more enjoyable. Absolutely no issues at all, we’d definitely stay here again! Highly recommend.
Truly a fantastic stay. The place exceeded expectations—spotlessly clean, well cared for, and exactly like the photos. Excellent value and a convenient location. I’d definitely return!

Great place with a perfect location downtown close to everything in the city. Had a couple of hiccups particularly with the AC which doesn’t seem to cool down on hot summer days but Kyle was very rapidly responsive and though we couldn’t get the temperature cooler he was very helpful.

We were pleasantly surprised how spacious the living space was - windows everywhere makes the place feel grand!
Location is perfect for hitting the CTrain, Calgary Tower, Core Downtown shopping.
Everything about the place made us want to stay longer.
Super close and convenient for a conference downtown. Very quick walk to the Hyatt, tons of restaurants, beautiful condo, and secure parking. Perfect.
All smooth! Would stay here again. Fantastic location with great restaurants and cocktail bars within super close walking distance.
Kyle was an accommodating host. Very responsive. The property was very nice. Great neighborhood with lots of nice restaurants within walking distance. Will return

We had such a great experience in Calgary and part of that was because of this apartment. Cozy and quiet, clean and airy. Loved the glass window wall; hot water; great location for walking to all the things including delicious neighborhood eateries, Thai massage and grocery store. Kyle’s communication was superb. I’ve already recommended to a friend who booked a stay and will certainly return. 18 min walk to the Saddledome. Go Flames!
A very well located and tidy home! Excellent communication from the hosts.
Kyle’s place is in a great location with lots of restaurants nearby and easy to get to downtown areas.
Kyle & Andrew were great hosts. Checked in and made sure we had everything we needed. Thanks again for the great stay!
A beautiful condo with stunning views, clean, as advertised. Location is absolutely perfect and close to all kinds of restaurants and bars.
Perfect condos! Lots of windows for natural lighting! Perfect location close to 17th avenue, and lots of nice restaurants near the area! I would definitely book this place again!!
Our stay was great, everything we needed, and great location. Would stay again
Amazing stay, would definitely book when we are back in town. Thanks again!
Great place, cool view, easy to get into and underground parking was great 👍
we have stayed in their properties a few times and it's been great everytime this time included. we will be back!
