Both mornings I woke up to  beautiful views of the city and air balloons over the mountains from a distance. Just steps away from pubs and restaurants, meaning I didn't have to stray too far if I didn't want to. I'd highly recommend this one, and can't wait to come back!

When I booked this place, I thought it was too good to be true.  The location, view and luxurious feel was even better than the photos. I will be back and strongly recommend this place, you won’t regret it!

Nice place, plenty of windows like my own home.  Minimalist designed. Fantastic neighborhood.  Tons of food choices, Starbucks across the street, and nice bars.  I felt very safe.  Directions for access very easy.

Table was set for my girlfriend and I when we arrived. The view is magnificent yet the place still allows for privacy with use of the blinds. Hosts were always available by text if we needed anything. Would definitely stay there again.

It was such a convenient place to stay in relation to the city center. The views were marvelous. We had everything we needed to feel at home. Kyle was extremely quick to reply to any message. I would recommend his place to anyone interested.

We had such a wonderful stay! The place was spotless, comfortable, and had everything we needed. Communication was smooth and check-in was super easy. The location was perfect and made our trip even more enjoyable. Absolutely no issues at all, we’d definitely stay here again! Highly recommend.
Truly a fantastic stay. The place exceeded expectations—spotlessly clean, well cared for, and exactly like the photos. Excellent value and a convenient location. I’d definitely return!

Great place with a perfect location downtown close to everything in the city. Had a couple of hiccups particularly with the AC which doesn’t seem to cool down on hot summer days but Kyle was very rapidly responsive and though we couldn’t get the temperature cooler he was very helpful.

We were pleasantly surprised how spacious the living space was - windows everywhere makes the place feel grand!
Location is perfect for hitting the CTrain, Calgary Tower, Core Downtown shopping.
Everything about the place made us want to stay longer.
Super close and convenient for a conference downtown. Very quick walk to the Hyatt, tons of restaurants, beautiful condo, and secure parking. Perfect.
All smooth! Would stay here again. Fantastic location with great restaurants and cocktail bars within super close walking distance.
Kyle was an accommodating host. Very responsive. The property was very nice. Great neighborhood with lots of nice restaurants within walking distance. Will return

We had such a great experience in Calgary and part of that was because of this apartment. Cozy and quiet, clean and airy. Loved the glass window wall; hot water; great location for walking to all the things including delicious neighborhood eateries, Thai massage and grocery store. Kyle’s communication was superb. I’ve already recommended to a friend who booked a stay and will certainly return. 18 min walk to the Saddledome. Go Flames!
A very well located and tidy home! Excellent communication from the hosts.
Kyle’s place is in a great location with lots of restaurants nearby and easy to get to downtown areas.
Kyle & Andrew were great hosts. Checked in and made sure we had everything we needed. Thanks again for the great stay!
A beautiful condo with stunning views, clean, as advertised. Location is absolutely perfect and close to all kinds of restaurants and bars.
Perfect condos! Lots of windows for natural lighting! Perfect location close to 17th avenue, and lots of nice restaurants near the area! I would definitely book this place again!!
Our stay was great, everything we needed, and great location. Would stay again
Amazing stay, would definitely book when we are back in town. Thanks again!
Great place, cool view, easy to get into and underground parking was great 👍
we have stayed in their properties a few times and it's been great everytime this time included. we will be back!

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome Home!This Luxe Condo located in a prime central downtown location with spacious and stylish living.Welcome to your luxury stay at the heart of Calgary! This stunning apartment, located on the 12th floor, offers a unique experience of comfort and sophistication. With breathtaking views of the city, this apartment is designed for those who seek the best in urban living without sacrificing a peaceful and cozy atmosphere.The spacePerfect for diverse groups of travellers, including; business, couples, families, friends and even solo travellers looking for extra space.With walking distance to C-Train, 17th Ave, Stephen Ave, coffee shops & a variety of notable trendy restaurants, this location is in a prime location for you to explore the city with ease and comfort!This is also a prime location for travellers visiting for Calgary Stampede - with Stampede Grounds being a short walk away!Notable Features:-Private balcony with city views-Queen Bed & Double Bed Pull Out-Fresh bedding & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-65" Smart TV -Bright living room w/ large sofa, coffee table & accent chair-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-High-speed WiFi-Free parking spot in the buildings parkade (see note below)-Complimentary coffee and coffee machineGuest accessFull access to private Condo & private balconyOther things to notePLEASE NOTE HOUSE RULES :1. No parties or events allowed. No unregistered guests allowed.2. No smoking allowed. Any remnants or smell left behind will result in a $500 fine charged to your Airbnb account.3. No pets allowed.4. Please respect noise levels and noise curfew. 10PM on weekends and 9PM on weekdays.5. Please take care of your fob keys. Lost Keys incur a replacement cost.6. Please take care of the space. You must pay the appropriate cost for any damages or theft caused on the property.7. No illegal substances allowed on the premises. You will be asked to leave with no refund.Registration DetailsBL286039
reviews: Alizeh was a great hostess!!! Very responsive with communication and so patient with me as I had a hard time with the door code. The place was beautifully decorated. Appreciated the coffee, creamer and sugar. Bed was super comfortable! Great location with lots to do; terrific restaurants and coffee shops.

Alizeh’s unit was the perfect size for a couple and 1 or 2 children.  The location is right in the downtown with restaurants and bars, entertainment, and nice areas to walk by the river.  There’s a fantastic view from the 12th floor with floor to ceiling windows.   Visiting Calgary was made all the better by this lodging’s location.  We highly recommend Alizeh’s AirBnB.
Our stay at Alizeh’s place was great - The instructions for check in were clear, the apartment looked exactly like the photos, and everything went smoothly! Definitely recommend booking!
Had a great weekend stay here! Beautiful home and location with tons of walkable restaurants. Dedicated parking spot made the stay convenient! Would love to book if I find myself in Calgary again

Alizeh was very responsive from booking through to departure. The condo looked exactly like the photos. It’s within walking distance of downtown, the Calgary Tower, and other attractions. There’s a Starbucks right across the street and plenty of restaurants nearby.

Perfect location and a beautifully furnished apartment—exactly as pictured. We loved the thoughtful touches and how comfortable everything felt. The host was incredibly responsive and accommodating from check-in to checkout, which made the stay seamless. Would absolutely stay here again!

Overall, our stay was great. Alizeh was incredibly responsive - quick, thorough, and very helpful. The location was incredibly convenient.
A few notes if folks are staying on the couch:
- Bring an eye mask (the blinds are very thin).
- The bedroom has a sliding door and an opening to the kitchen near the ceiling, so bring ear plugs.
- You have to go through the bedroom to get to the bathroom.
- But the pull out couch is pretty big and comfy!

This place is STUNNING! It is my new favourite place to stay in Calgary. It’s so cozy and felt like a home away from home. The parking stalls in this building are usually quite tight but this one seemed more manageable than others. Alizeh was very wonderful and responsive as well! I can’t wait to go back!

I stayed for five nights in the apartment and had a great stay. Alizeh is very helpful, proactive, and accommodating.
The condo came with all mentioned amenities and was clean.
The neighbourhood is in walking distance to downtown and the stampede grounds, with all required amenities (groceries, etc.) in the vicinity.
Would definitely recommend staying in the condo when looking for accommodation in Calgary.
Great location! Walking distance from bars, restaurants and stampede. Glad the place came with a parking spot for our day trips out of town. Very clean, beautiful place with view. Would stay again.

We had a wonderful stay at Alizeh’s. The place is lovely with a great ambience and very comfortable. Great neighborhood, walkable to good eateries and to shopping.
Alizeh is so responsive to messaging it makes planning a breeze. Would definitely stay again!

Excellent condo, great location and awesome host. Alizeh was very responsive and super helpful when we had to make adjustments to our plans. The unit is beautiful and very quiet, didn’t hear any noise from inside or outside. Location is great, lots of bars and restaurants in walking distance.
Alizeh place is very beautiful and very clean definitely will book it again amazing host very responsive
Fabulous apartment in the heart of town. Couldn't have asked for more, Alizeh is a fantastic host. Made the trip from Scotland all the better!
would definitely come back the apartment was beautiful and so was the view the location was super nice too and close to starbucks and other food places!

This Airbnb is on my short list for Calgary visits. I love the neighbourhood - close to scenic park, a variety of delicious dining, and wonderful view from the room. The decorating was also gorgeous and ammenaties was exactly what I needed. Not to mention clean space, and a kind and responsive host.

It was a wonderful experience staying in this apartment. The apartment is cozy and functional for staying a few days or longer, with a convenient location and everything just like in the photos!
Many thanks to the host for the quick responses to messages and for the help with arrival and some questions!

This place really is a gem! 💎 I love to stay places that are unique with thoughtful decor, and every detail was thought through! It’s honestly stunning! I took notes for styling my own home 🙈 The location was perfect with lots of walkable restaurants. The host is also very kind and responsive! I really enjoyed my stay! 10/10 would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family 🖤

I had an incredible stay at Alizeh’s place! From start to finish, everything exceeded my expectations. The property was spotless, beautifully decorated, and equipped with all the amenities I could possibly need. Alizeh was incredibly responsive and went above and beyond to ensure I had a comfortable and enjoyable experience. I truly felt at home and can’t recommend this place enough. Looking forward to staying here again in the future!
Fabulous location, spectacular host, lovely and comfortable apartment, easy access, great amenities, lovely view, close to bars and restaurants and grocery, safe

Great place in downtown Calgary, easy access and parking. Alizeh is super responsive, very good experience.
We will be back!
This place was great, had everything I looked for both inside the unit and out in the neighborhood.
We had a really great stay at Alizehs place. She is a super nice host that made sure our stay was super comfortable and peaceful. The space is so clean and the aestheticly pleasing. Thank you Alizeh.

Alizeh’s was really nice and it was in a good location. Her place was clean and beautiful, looked exactly like the photos. She was very responsive and explained the check in instructions really. Would stay at her place again! :)

name: Condo in Calgary · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Comfort and convenience in Calgary’s vibrant Beltline district. Enjoy the breathtaking city skyline with floor to ceiling windows in this bright and airy 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom suite, with in-suite laundry and one free heated underground assigned parking stall. A prime location just walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, pubs, parks, public transportation, Stampede grounds, The Saddledome, BMO Convention centre and 17th Ave.The spaceThe main bedroom features a queen size bed, plenty of closet space, ensuite bathroom with tub and blackout curtains. The secondary bedroom is a bright open room with a queen size murphy bed, dresser, sun shades and a desk/vanity. The second bathroom includes a shower stall and in-suite laundry (pods and sheets provided). There is a bar height dining table with seating for four in the open concept living room and a fully equipped kitchen to enjoy home cooked meals or indulge in a local treat with take-out from the many surrounding restaurants. The private balcony provides a small outdoor space with café lights and seating perfect for your morning coffee or enjoying some wine as the sun sets.An array of food options at your doorstep from Starbucks, to multiple vendors at the First Street Market, a pub in St James Corner, or fast and convenient at Subway and Fresh Slice Pizza. Fancy an Italian or Indian, check out Ten Foot Henry’s and the Calcutta Cricket Club down 1st SW, or indulge in delicious family style eating at Pat & Betty. As well as many more options in the surrounding blocks or head over to 17th Ave to discover a diverse dining area with everything from bakeries to award winning restaurants and everything in between. 17th Ave is a lively area to eat, shop, play and explore.Guest accessColours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no services or amenities for rental guests.Other things to noteRules, bylaws and regulation must be read, agreed and signed by the guests prior to occupancy is authorized. Hard copy will also be available to the guests inside the condo unit. Additional rules details will be sent out to the guests for review and agreement once booking is completed and approved.Registration DetailsBL290452
reviews: I can’t say enough about this place and the host. Beautiful inside and the views are stunning. Very clean and the hosts know exactly how to set up an air bnb with everything you need. The communication was fast and easy. If you are looking to stay in the downtown area this place cannot be beat. I highly recommend it!!

The apartment was absolutely lovely — clean, comfortable, and beautifully designed. The views of the city skyline were stunning, especially at night! The location was very central, with easy access to restaurants, shops, and public transport. It was the perfect base for exploring the city. Highly recommend!

The appartment looked good and smelled even better. Very clean, with all the amenities, and then some (hand cream, y’all!). Better than at the hotel. Hosts were kind, quick to reply, and very accomodating to us. Perfect location, breathtaking view. Highly recommend.

Incredible host and an incredible place! Everything was spotless, comfortable, and exactly as described. The host went above and beyond to make sure my stay was perfect. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone and would love to come back.

This was the perfect stay for us in Calgary ! Jessica's suite is beautiful, exactly as described and located perfectly to enjoy Calgary. Everything you need and more, with stunning views and access to downtown outside your door. Would book every time!

The apartment was well stocked and perfectly situated. The hosts were gracious and responsive. A nice to have is repositioning the hallway mirror to body length and dark out shades for the exterior bedroom.
We had a great stay here. Communication was perfect. Instructions were clear. The unit was super clean and the view from the unit was amazing.  That on its own is an experience. 5star all the way.
Apartment was great. It is surrounded by full window walls, so if you’re sensitive to sunlight, you should know that the blinds don’t block out the sun 100% in the morning..
Such a cute little spot with a PHENOMENAL view of the city and Calgary tower. The apartment was extremely clean, and the hosts were accommodating and super sweet! Would 10/10 recommend to others!!

I couldn’t have asked for better accommodations while in Calgary. The location is perfect as anything you would want to do in downtown Calgary is within walking distance. The city views from the suite alone are amazing. It was super clean, tidy, and organized. Jessica and Mark’s instructions and communication are superb. I would highly recommend staying here when visiting Calgary.
The place was very nice—clean, tidy, and well-equipped with all the necessary amenities. It made for a comfortable and enjoyable stay overall. Would definitely recommend!
The place was even better in person. The night views are amazing!
Felt right at home, very clean place. Loved every minute of it. Has some beautiful views and it’s close to the things we wanted to check out. Would definitely stay again
Great place in the heart of Calgary, very impressed with the Condo.
Great location and apartment with a very responsive host
Always a favorite!  Highly recommend.
excellent hosts and a beautiful property. highly recommend!
it was amazing time living in!
Clean place would definitely rent again

Excellent place, good location, downtown is close to restaurants and bars.
Very beautiful night view of the city!
I recommend it.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our sleekly designed one bedroom downtown condo with views of the downtown skyline including an unobstructed sight of the Calgary Tower. Located in the heart of the Beltline.Walking distance to everything such as restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores and all popular/trendy avenues. 5 minute drive to the river,Stampede grounds and the Saddledome.Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night. Parking stall not included with unit. name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.88 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️☎️ 24/7 Host availability.🛜 WIFI, Netflix. Disney+, Crave.🧹 Pro cleaners with 60-point checklist.🏠 Private balcony, kitchen, underground parking, laundry.⏰ Book your dates before they’re gone!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Our business number is 16121048.The spaceHere Are A Few Kind Words From Our Past Guests:"We really enjoyed our stay here! The communication with Tina is super easy and fast, which was very helpful. We got all the information we needed to get into the apartment and parking garage before we arrived. The parking spot is wide enough, even for bigger cars. The apartment itself is nice and new and the location is great! Would definitely recommend staying here!" -Anja Schmelzle This stylish 1 bedroom + Open den, 1 bathroom condo is perfect for tourists and business travelers. The design is newly updated, featuring a full kitchen, wifi, TV, and a very comfortable bed! **BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS**Bedroom 1: Features a queen-size bed, a sliding door for added privacy, and an ensuite bathroom.Bedroom 2: An open-concept den with a cozy queen bed and direct access to a private balcony, perfect for enjoying fresh air and relaxing views.**LIVING ROOM AND KITCHEN**There is an open kitchen with all the essentials to prepare your favorite meals. You will find the following amenities:- Stove.- Fridge.- Coffee maker.- Hot Kettler.- Microwave.-Dishwasher.- Kitchen utensils.- Toaster.Have a game night in the large living room that is open to the kitchen and dining with an incredible view to have a memorable stay. After a big day of adventure, watch your favorite movies with your loved ones on the large TV.We include the following premium streaming services during your stay:*Netflix*Disney+*Crave (which includes originals from Crave, HBO, HBO Max, and Showtime along with Hollywood blockbusters).Enjoy more than 1000 shows and movies after a long day of exploring the area!**OUTDOOR SPACE**The unit has a private patio with a stunning city view to enjoy a cup of coffee during a lovely morning.**LOCATION **Calgary International Airport is around a 23-minute car trip from the property and 1 Street Southwest/Centre Street Station is within walking distance. Suncor Energy Centre, the Calgary Public Library, and The Bow are a brief stroll away.Every unit is sanitized and professionally deep-cleaned after each stay to ensure the health and safety of all of our guests. ★☆ Book Today & Let Us Take Care Of You In Calgary! ☆★ I am available 24/7! If you have any questions before booking and during the stay, please feel free to call or message us anytime!Our business number is 16121048. Please keep in mind that all listings in Calgary are required by law to have their business license number in their description. If a listing does not have it, there is a risk that it is not compliant and may be shut down by the city.Guest access- Guests have access to the entire condo except for a cleaning closet.Other things to note- The underground parking has a maximum height capacity of 6’10”.- We require our guests to pick up a keyfob to enter the unit's building nearby. This location is 7 minutes driving time away from the unit if you plan to check in after 10 PM.-Late departure luggage drop-off is not allowed.- The unit has a monitoring device called Noiseware. It does NOT record conversations. It only measures decibel levels to help us prevent loud music and noise complaints.-One bedroom is an open den with a cozy queen bed. See photos for details!Registration DetailsBL279843
reviews: Tina and Steve were AMAZING! They were so responsive to communication and any questions that I had. The space was super clean, conveniently located, and exactly as described. This would be a great space for a travelling professional to stay or a group of friends visiting the city, as there is a lot of space and the location is great! Overall, highly recommend staying here!

We used Tina and Steve's airbnb as my bridal suite, it was close to the venue, it had a beautiful view, it was clean and the space worked for what we needed it for. It was a bit small for the amount of people we had getting ready but we enjoyed our time there regardless! The only complaint we had was relying on the key fobe so much and the initial check in/parking situation, other than that the space is beautiful and perfect.

This place was as advertised. Comfortable beds everything was clean and the kitchen was well equipped. Very responsive hosts. Would stay again in a heartbeat.  close to shopping, bars, and restaurants. There is a bottle depot and a safe injection site in close proximity, so there are a few people who are strung out in the area. This is not uncommon and big cities and didn’t bother us.

While the unit was well taken care of and in a good location, the check-in and check-out process was confusing and difficult. The sheer number of instructions for the check-in was cumbersome, yet somehow lacked any amount of clarity for the check-out process. In particular, the process for picking up and returning the keyfob for the building added unnecessary stress and time to our stay. While it is clear the hosts have put effort into making the process easier to understand, it still needs significant streamlining and refinement.

The unit was super cute and just the right size for us four girls, the location was great and Tina and Steve communicated good. We just had a little problem with the FOB when arriving which made check in a little difficult but it all worked out in the end! We enjoyed our stay
We loved our stay in Calgary! A great city, the apartment was close to everything we needed within walking distance. We loved our stay - the large balcony and view of the city was a highlight!

Tina and Steve were very proactive and communicative every step of the way. The check-in process was super easy, the location was perfect (walkable to the event we were in town for) and the place was as described and squeaky clean. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Thanks!

Thanks for a fantastic stay, Tina and Steve - communication was clear, and the hosts were so responsive and kind. The space was great, kitchen was well-equipped. Location was walkable. Really enjoyed a stay!

Tina and Steve are great hosts. Was my first AirBnB stay and they were great and always quick to respond in case of any assistance needed. The place was super clean and organized. Would definitely stay with them when visiting again.

We had a great stay. Was very easy to manage with kids in tow. Very easy to walk downtown to the c-train or around the neighborhood for a good breakfast stop. Unfortunately there are quite a few homeless gathering spots close by but they didn’t bother us nor our overall stay. We will definitely stay again

I had a wonderful stay at this place! The home was exactly as described—clean, comfortable, and well-equipped with everything I needed. The location was great, close to calgary downtown. Communication with the host was smooth and responsive throughout. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting the area, and I’d be happy to stay here again!

10/10 ! Would definitely stay there again :) they were super nice, gave easy instructions,
And Fast response, great communication, was easy to get in and looked just like the pictures. Highly recommend staying here :)
The Airbnb was exactly as described and the hosts were extremely friendly with plenty of proactive communication. Was able to walk 15 minutes and be at the stampede which is awesome.

Absolutely loved my stay here! The hosts were incredibly responsive and provided detailed instructions that made everything easy from start to finish. The place was immaculate! seriously one of the cleanest Airbnbs I’ve stayed in and looked exactly like the photos. The location was perfect, close to everything I needed, and the parking was super convenient. You can tell the hosts really put thought and care into the space. Would 100% recommend and stay again!
Such a lovely stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was friendly and responsive, would definitely stay again :)
Tina and Steve were very helpful and responsive , they were accommodating and understanding. I highly recommend theyre place . The hospitality was 5 star
Simply put a home away from home. Tina and Steve are great hosts. They are super responsive, and the unit was super amazing.
We had a wonderful stay at Tina and Steve's place. The location is perfect and the apartment was clean and had everything we needed.

An amazing place to stay. The building is user friendly, quiet, and the unit is filled with anything you may need on your trip. Location is 10/10. Very walkable city with access to so many amenities. The private underground parking is a great plus, we didn’t drive anywhere our entire time here. No complaints, we will absolutely be back! Also, awesome views from the balcony!

This was a great experience and me and sisters loved it. Very beautiful and amazing view to wake up in the morning at.
The hosts were amazing and everything was well explained and easy access. I loved how safe the building is, we had nothing to worry about if we left our things in the apartment. Overall Beautiful
Thank you so much

The apartment was fantastic, and Tina and Steve were very communicative. Our only issue was that the instructions didn’t make it clear that the keyfob collection point was not an easy walk to the apartment (not in minus 17 winds anyway!). If we’d realised, we’d have asked our Uber to wait whilst we collected the key.

My family and I totally recommend staying at Tina and Steve’s place in Downtown Calgary! The instructions they provided were very clear and detailed, great overall communication! It’s conveniently located to several tourist spots. We especially liked that there’s a parking space inside the garage as well as the balcony view! Thank you for everything!! :) ❤️
location was great and me and my friends had a really great time! host were great when it came to responding and helping with any questions
Great quiet place situated a few minutes walk to downtown Calgary. Definitely recommend.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.60 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to your modern urban escape in the heart of downtown Calgary! This bright and sophisticated 2-bedroom condo, complete with a cozy sofa bed in the living area, offers the perfect blend of comfort and contemporary elegance. With floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing breathtaking city views, high-speed internet, and air conditioning, this stylish space is ideal for business travelers, couples, or small groups looking for an unforgettable stay.The spaceStep inside to a thoughtfully designed, open-concept layout featuring sleek furnishings, polished concrete floors, and abundant natural light. The living room boasts a plush sectional sofa, accent chairs, and a mounted Smart TV, making it the perfect place to unwind after a day exploring Calgary. A designated workspace with a minimalist desk setup ensures productivity for remote workers.The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, dark wood cabinetry, and a chic dining area with seating for four—perfect for home-cooked meals or takeout from one of the nearby acclaimed restaurants.Both bedrooms are designed for relaxation, featuring premium bedding, stylish decor, and ample storage. The primary bedroom offers a luxurious retreat with a queen-sized bed and a serene atmosphere, while the second bedroom is equally inviting with a queen bed and pops of color for added charm. The bathroom is sleek and modern, stocked with fresh towels and essentials for your convenience.Amenities Include:✔ 2 Comfortable Bedrooms + Sofa Bed in the Living Room✔ High-Speed Internet & Smart TV✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen✔ Air Conditioning & Heating✔ In-Suite Laundry✔ One Assigned Parking Stall✔ Professionally Managed by the #1 Rental Management Company in CalgaryGuest accessYou will have access to the entire condo.Other things to noteNot every vehicle will fit in the condo parkade. Please be mindful of you vehicle size.Registration DetailsBL290304
reviews: We had an amazing stay! The apartment is beautiful, clean, and very centrally located — close to plenty of great restaurants and cafes. The host was very responsive and helpful throughout our stay. A few lights in the kitchen were burned out, and the heater occasionally went on and off, but these were minor issues and didn’t affect our overall experience. We’d definitely stay here again!

This apartment is in a great location to downtown. It had everything you need to make your stay easy, especially the kitchen was very useable and everything in great condition. Plus washing machine is a bonus as we stayed almost a week.
I note that you do need to meet the host for checkin, this was a very smooth process and they were very responsive when we needed to slightly tweak our dates due to a late night flight. Great stay, definitely stay again!

advertised as air conditioned but was not working, seems to be a common issue throughout the reviews. maybe it should not be advertised as ac if it rarely works. made for warm days and uncomfortable nights.

The apartment was clean, comfortable, and well located. However, during my stay my car window was broken while parked in the underground garage. The building had security cameras, but the host told me there were none. This was disappointing, as I had assumed the garage was secure. Guests should be aware that even in the underground parking, incidents can happen.

It was a pity the problems with the air conditioner were not communicated prior to arrival, on arrival the site manager too did not advise, plus damage internally to walls and bedding was inadequate, they did react quickly to repair and restore the next day, but the value and confidence had already been lost.

Host is incredibly responsive and kind
Clear instructions on check in/out and parking
Place is clean
Able to offer temporary solutions
Pictures are relatively clear
Many in apartment amenities
Cons:
When I visited there was no central A/C, left the windowless room very stuffy and overall very hot
They sent someone over, tried her best but was clearly didn’t know much about A/C
Thanks for the stay! Great location. Pullout couch is not very comfortable if sleeping 2 on it (the one side is basically just pillows). The decor inside was nice, and place was clean!

Had no A/C and no window to open.  It was HOT.  Otherwise, PERFECT location and great place to stay.  A temp air conditioner was blocking access to cooler night air which would have helped.  EASY to walk around and access nice things in Calgary. Hope to return and I would just make sure we have air conditioner.  It was hot in July and almost 80F in the unit.  Survived.  Made us get out and walk more.  Would rent again.  Can't beat the location for our needs.  Super cute place too.

A perfect location -walkable to the Calgary tower and convention centers.
Beth was very responsive and helpful asi arrived at 1 in the morning-
The beds are very comfortable and the kitchen area has what you need to eat in.
Mahalo Beth

Our stay started out okay. There were a few cleaning issues, i.e. the toilet and the sheets being dirty, but once we brought that up to Your Key, they were proactive, responsive, and quick to address our concerns which we greatly appreciated. Overall, the unit itself was nice and a good place to stay.
However, one thing to note about this specific building: similar to a previous review, our driver's side car window was completely smashed into while parked in the locked underground parking garage and we had stuff stolen from our vehicle.
While this was *not* the fault of the hosts (they were also quick to respond with resources to report the incident to the Calgary Police Service and to offer any assistance they could), it is something to be extremely wary of if you are bringing a vehicle to this Airbnb.
Wonderful space ! Host was amazing, and instructions were very clear. This place was in a wonderful location, within walking distance of a lot of places !
Loved the place, the area and the aesthetic of the apartment!! It was an amazing stay. Made me want to extend our trip!
Clean room and comfortable location! Also room condition and mood is so nice!! I love this room😆

Condo was good. Clean & tidy. Great location. Nice restaurants near by (walking distance). Easy check-in. We stayed there for 4 nights in Aug 2025. First night was a bit rough as there was an issue with the central AC (was working very slow & not blowing out cold air). Beth's team responded well to the issue. However, the first night it could not be fixed & we were provided with extra fans. Because of the heat wave fans couldn't keep up with the cooling though. Next day there technicians fixed the central AC & also installed an additional portable AC (our last 3 nights were cool & comfy). Thanks! Some minor issues with the light bulbs (not working) in the kitchen, window blinds in the bedroom not working properly which were fixed in a timely manner. Their team was very quick to respond to any issue. Kitchen had all the utensils you would need for a short stay. Stove/Microwave/Dishwasher/laundry/dryer were all in a good working condition. Overall our stay & Beth's team were both great!

Great location in Calgary's Beltline neighbourhood and walking distance to downtown. Very clean and comfortable. The comprehensive guest manual shared in advance made everything a breeze. The included parking in the building was a huge plus. Compared to nearby hotels, it was definitely the right choice for us to stay here. The building clearly has many short term rentals operating here but there was never any issues with noise or cleanliness of the building's common areas. Beth and her team were super proactive and professional, and communication was always prompt. I would not hesitate to stay again.

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Nestled in Calgary’s dynamic Beltline district, this location offers the ultimate urban experience. The city's best dining, shopping, and entertainment are all within walking distance. Indulge in top-rated restaurants such as Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues Taqueria, and Model Milk, or grab a craft cocktail at one of the many stylish bars in the area.Shoppers will love the nearby CORE Shopping Centre and boutique stores along 17th Avenue, a lively street known for its trendy vibe. As the sun sets, explore the thriving nightlife scene with popular venues like The Palace Theatre, Greta Bar, and National on 10th.For event-goers, this condo boasts unbeatable proximity to the Calgary Stampede Grounds and the BMO Convention Centre, both just a short walk away! Whether you're attending the world-famous Calgary Stampede, a concert, or a major conference at BMO, you'll love the convenience of staying so close to the action.

reviews_details.host_response:
Hello Eureka,
Thank you for your thoughtful review and for recognizing our team’s professionalism, communication, and quick response. We truly appreciate that. We are very sorry that one linen and a bathroom detail didn’t meet our usual high standards. While the mark shown was faint and fully washed, it’s not the perfection we expect. All of our linens are professionally laundered off-site in commercial-grade machines using high-quality, scent-free products and disinfecting high-heat cycles. Each setup is inspected and photographed before guest arrival, and we’ve reinforced additional checks to ensure consistency across every stay.
When we learned of your concern, our team attended the property immediately to make it right and ensure your comfort. We also provided additional support and flexibility beyond standard policy, because ensuring our guests feel valued and cared for matters most to us.
We are truly sorry about what happened in the shared underground parking garage. As you mentioned, this was an unfortunate event in a communal facility that we don’t manage. While incidents like this are rare, they can happen anywhere, and we always encourage guests to keep valuables out of sight. We were glad to assist right away with resources and guidance for filing a report with Calgary Police Service.
We are grateful you found the unit itself comfortable and appreciated our team’s efforts throughout your stay. Your feedback helps us continually strengthen our operations and uphold the reliability, cleanliness, and integrity that both guests and homeowners can trust with Your Key.

description: Indulge in stylish urban living with this exceptional 2-bed condo offering stunning downtown skyline views! With full height windows, chic furnishings, and a fully stocked kitchen, you're not going to want to leave! Marvel at Rocky Mountain sunsets from your living room!Walk to Calgary's best restaurants, nightlife, and events. Close to Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, 17th Ave SW, Calgary Saddledome & Stampede Grounds! Don't miss this chance to experience Calgary's finest!The space- FREE parking for one vehicle in the heated underground parkade! - Modern condo with stunning views!- Breathtaking downtown view!- Floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light!- Air conditioning for optimal comfort!- Granite countertops and polished concrete floors!- Tastefully furnished bedrooms!- Plush mattresses and pillows!- Ample closet space!- Dedicated work area!- In-suite laundry!- Fully equipped kitchen! - Comfortable living room!- Shower essentials provided!- Dedicated workspace!- Located in the prestigious Colours building!- Developed by award-winning Batistella Developers!We look forward to hosting you! reviews: Both Tristian and Kenzi were super helpful checking in! Older building so some finesse required to use the intercom (disconnects) but Tristian and Kenzie were there to safe the day and do a work around. Super grateful for their prompt response after my gfs and I decided our BC road trip needed a rest stop in Alberta before we continued on. Good call on this air bnb!

I stay here frequently for business and always enjoy the place. listing_name: Entire apartment in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
location_details.value: The location of Victoria Park is incredibly central, steps to a c-train station, restaurants, coffee shops, 17th Ave, grocery stores, the Saddledome, Calgary Public Library, and lots more.Situated on the East side of downtown, providing quick access to major corridors like Mcleod Trail to Glenmore or Deerfoot.Victoria Park is the closest you can be to the Stampede Grounds/Events Centres. Theres a mixture of new and old development.This property specifically is situated on 1st street which is incredibly trendy!

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Parking is made easy here with a heated underground parking stall included with your stay. If you need additional parking there are lots of paid parking lots close by. Most things are a close walk from you here, but if you need to go further there is good access to Calgary's C-Train system and bus routes.

description_by_sections.value: Indulge in stylish urban living with this exceptional 2-bed condo offering stunning downtown skyline views! With full height windows, chic furnishings, and a fully stocked kitchen, you're not going to want to leave! Marvel at Rocky Mountain sunsets from your living room!Walk to Calgary's best restaurants, nightlife, and events. Close to Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, 17th Ave SW, Calgary Saddledome & Stampede Grounds! Don't miss this chance to experience Calgary's finest!

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: - FREE parking for one vehicle in the heated underground parkade! - Modern condo with stunning views!- Breathtaking downtown view!- Floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light!- Air conditioning for optimal comfort!- Granite countertops and polished concrete floors!- Tastefully furnished bedrooms!- Plush mattresses and pillows!- Ample closet space!- Dedicated work area!- In-suite laundry!- Fully equipped kitchen! - Comfortable living room!- Shower essentials provided!- Dedicated workspace!- Located in the prestigious Colours building!- Developed by award-winning Batistella Developers!We look forward to hosting you! Feel free to reach out and inquire if you have any additional questions about the unit :)

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: - Secure smart lock!- Elevator to your floor!- Private and exclusively yours apartment!- Assigned stall in secure underground parkade!- Wheelchair friendly!

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: - Missing keys incur a $250 replacement fee.- Respect condo bylaws, especially quiet hours after 10pm. - We use a noise monitoring device; It does NOT record actual sounds or conversations, it simply monitors the noise level (measured in decibels). Minut is 100% privacy compliant and is required on this property. If you have any questions, please ask! :)

cancellation_policy.cancellation_value: No refund if you cancel after 4:15 pm on 10 November. This reservation is non-refundable..

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Business License: BL257338Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally of Calgary's downtown. It is a SHORT WALK to all downtown attractions, bountique shops, and night life with a system of famous restaurants, coffe shop and bars, are the soul of the Calgarian. Stay in and experience our services with the exquisite furniture, a completed equipment & AN PORTABLE AIR-CONDITIONAL. A SMALL DOG/CAT friendly will be a plus.FREE UNDERGROUND PARKINGAnd a PLAYPEN will be provided with 20$ extra feeThe spaceOn the top floor of 6-storey building, you will be immersed in the gorgeous views of downtown of Calgary city, enjoyed fresh Tims roasted coffee and tea at our nice patio. And PET FRIENDLY and FREE UNDERGROUND PARKING.(*) Check-in by smart lock: 4pm-10pm (on the weekday); 4pm-11pm (on the weekend). If you need to check in outside of these hour, you will  need to contact with host to get the key in person and may be charged an extra fee of 30$(*) Check out time: 12pm(*) IMPORTANT NOTES:- Starting October 1, 2024, the tourism levy tax of 4% per one booking will be collected and remitted by us to Tax and Revenue Administration (TRA) of Alberta.- The extra fee will be charged for EVERY PET together with an additional cleaning fee (to be negotiated).(*)  Pets are allowed with rules:- No pet on the funiture/bed- Pick up your pet’s waste carefully- Bowls in the kitchen- Dogs must be leashed- Before you leave, pls sweep any pet hair and dispose of waste in outside trash.We offer plenty of space and comfortable beds, a full kitchen & bath room. The main bedroom features a comfortable and luxurious QUEEN BED and large WALK-IN closet. The living room is romantic area with the rustic funiture that you should love them like us. Extra bedding can be found in the closet for extra comfort. Get connected with ultra-high-speed internet with access to all your favorite streaming services on your 43 inch SMART TV. Please enjoy your night in this place like at your home.With the FULLY STOCKED KITCHEN, you have everything you need to make your go-to dish. Coffee and tea are avalible over on our small coffe bar for you to enjoy at any time of the day.Especially,  just a few minutes walk, you can reach the center of downtown - and enjoy the patio dinning at many kind of restaurants from Asia (Sushi, Chinese, Vietnamese) or French, Mexican style.And more...Guest accessOur guests will have access to the entire unit, please feel free to make yourself at home.There is one FREE Underground parking lot (No 108- 6 ft height) available and there are additional street parking, both paid and free zones, readily available on the surrounding streets.When checking in with a vehicle, please first park on the street, then come in through the front door. Press the code that was be sent to you by Host to get access into the building. (please text to us as soon as you can to get this code)There will be a separate code, given directly by the Host to access the unit. On the kitchen counter, will be the FOB for the garage’s access.Uber is also widely available in the city.Throughout the warmer months, there are scooters available right around the building.Other things to note(*) The bathroom, featuring a bathtub, is equipped with towels, toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, body wash) and a hair dryer to ensure your stay is as homely as possible.(*) Laundry ServiceWe do have a washing machine in unit, but not a dryer. So if our guest require additional laundry unit, please notify us. Please treat the space with respect and be noise-conscious of the neighbours. If anything arises, please reach out and we will do our best to take action as soon as possible. Events are not allowed. Be sure that the door is closed and locked when you leave. Any events/parties will lead to immediate eviction.Registration DetailsBL257338
reviews: Location was ideal for our appointments downtown. The place was smaller than we thought but still comfortable. Since I am somewhat of a neat freak, I did notice a few places that could have a quick wipe down and better attention to small repairs. The space was more on the warm side. Open windows during the night helped. Clear communication with host. Overall a good stay!

Good cozy spot with everything you need for a stay. Very clean and lots of restaurants around. Host was very nice just a little hard to get a hold of leading up to check in but overall a good experience.

Very lovely place to stay and in a great location! Had no issues: check-in was easy, home was clean, and the place had great amenities. Honestly I'd love to stay here every time I come to Calgary haha. Thanks again Emily!

In a really nice part of Calgary - good bars and restaurants close by and a reasonably short walk to the centre of town. The apartment was quiet and very airy in the quite warm weather. Because it's a corner apartment, when the windows are open the breeze really blows through. The balcony and walk in closet also make the apartment feel spacious. Basement car parking is a big plus too. Would not hesitate to return when we are next in Calgary.

Overall, it was a really great stay! The property was as described and in a really great neighbourhood, especially if you like Asian cuisine. However, the air conditioning was not working. Luckily it wasn't during a heat wave, but we would have appreciated a heads-up so we can make adjustments to our travel. Thanks for the great stay!

We have stayed in this building before because of its amazing location. It's walkable to the stampede grounds and the amazing strip of restaurants just a couple blocks away. We loved Emily's place - super clean, amenities as described, and the portable A/C worked well enough to keep it reasonable in the place on a 30+C day. Thanks for the great stay Emily!

This is a perfect place if you want to get a taste of downtown life with a bit of privacy. Extremely close to many restaurants and bars on 4th St or 17th Ave, and very walkable in all directions. The home has everything you would need and hosts were quick and responsive, and provided what the average traveler may need. Calgary was a wonderful place to visit and this was the perfect spot to base out of for the trip.

This was my second time at this place and once again, everything was perfect! The apartment is great clean, comfortable, and exactly like the photos. Communication with Emily is always easy and pleasant.
Nothing but positive experiences during our stay and would highly recommend. It was a great location within walking distance to great restaurants. We'll definitely be back!

Emily has really made it feel like a home. Everything you need is provided. The building and surrounding area is quiet and clean. The in-suite washing machine was very handy!  Lovely furniture, comfortable bed and beautiful views of the neighborhood. I would definitely stay there again!
Modern and well equipped,  Emily's apartment is ideally situated. Communication was smooth,  highly recommended
Great property in a nice area,  very responsive and friendly host and great value for money. Hope to be back again!
We really enjoyed our stay while visiting Calgary. It’s in a great location, walking distance to everything. It’s very comfortable, spotless and welcoming!

Great location! Really enjoyed staying here as it was walkable to all of our destinations. I should have read the listing more thoroughly as the parking garage has a 6ft height limit so I was unable to park underground which is a large part of the reason I booked this location. Other than that the host was very responsive and the place had everything I needed.
Emily's place was as listed, a great place to stay away from home.
Emily’s place was amazing for us especially the location as it was convenient and close to a lot of places we wanted to go to!

Emily's place was a lovely oasis in downtown Calgary. Spotlessly clean, comfortable, quiet, with a bathtub and balcony. Downtown Calgary is a bit rough, but this apartment felt safe. Emily was extremely responsive and accommodating. Highly recommend!

Everything was great! Emily was helpful and accommodating. The place was very comfortable, had a great view, and was very walkable. There was even a nice little balcony! The kitchen was also super well equipped and the bed was comfortable. Would come here again!

Lovely clean condo
Excellent location
Beautiful place and lovely location!

This is my first Airbnb!
The place was so comfortable and nice.
The kitchen, toilet, and bedroom were all clean
It was close to 17th Street and the surroundings were safe.
The parking lot was also convenient.
If I can go to Calgary again, I'd like to stay at Emily's house again!
Good stay for a short trip, close to many things!
We had a great stay.   The condo was nice and comfortable.
Lovely place, comfy bed, well equipped and great location. Communication was also excellent :)

description: Welcome to SoHo, a professionally designed 2-bed, 1-bath condo perched above downtown Calgary. Enjoy sleek style and floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic views of the Rocky Mountains and city skyline. Relax in two comfy bedrooms with hotel-quality linens, a chic living area filled with natural light, a fully equipped kitchen, and a pristine bath. Steps from 17th Ave, the Beltline, and top dining, SoHo is your stylish retreat for business or getaway.The space• 24 hour self check-in• Lightning fast internet w/ office• Exclusive Eau Claire downtown neighbourhood• Panoramic downtown views• One secure, heated, underground parking stall• Shared gym in the building• Professionally cleaned• Fully equipped kitchenGuest accessGuests gain access to the entire suite, privatelyGuests have access to the gym, parking garage, pool (open seasonally) and community lounge room which are shared with other residents of the buildingOther things to notePlease remember that you’re staying at an apartment, not a hotel. name: Townhouse in Calgary · ★4.81 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Welcome! Although there are many great things about this property, location is number one.We are only 3 short blocks from the 17th avenue entertainment district, walking distance from the Stampede Grounds, train station, and many other downtown hot spots.Our place has a separate entrance, laundry machine & dryer, rooftop patio, and we don't charge a cleaning fee. Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally located place.Portable aircon located in master bedroom.The spaceOur space is clean and private. A three level townhouse with two private bedrooms and a rooftop patio!The main floor consists of the entryway, one bedroom, and bathroom with washer/dryer unit. The next level has the kitchen, dining and living room area. The third level has the master bedroom, bathroom, and rooftop patio.Guest accessYou will arrive at the front door that contains a numbered lock and will have been given a code prior to check in. Once inside you will come into a lobby area with two doors- The door on the left will lead to your suite. Keys for the suite will be hung on the door for you.Other things to noteThe portable aircon is on the master bedroom only. There is a ceiling fan on the second level and a tower fan in the main level bedroom.Please let us know if you need parking and we can send you the instructions right away. There is a cafe table and patio available to you if you smoke or would like to sit outside!Our home is equipped with a video doorbell to ensure our guests' safety.Registration DetailsBL257269
reviews:
Taylor is always responsive. I texted him for questions at night and early morning for the temperature/ other issues, he always replies & solve it within minutes. Third floor room is tiny so I don’t recommend big luggage on that floor.
The neighbourhood is very walkable. The instructions are clear and easy access.

Lovely townhouse in Beltline, walkable to core downtown, on-street parking was readily available. Two nice bedrooms and spacious kitchen and living room. It had all the amenities that were expected and required.
The Sheldon M. Chumir Health Centre is close - expect the occasional ambulance driving by.

The location was awesome and the instructions were easy to follow
They had no more coffee and when I told the host they apologized and brought some right away even though I didn't mind going to Tim's
That was awesome of them
I would not hesitate to go back there if I return to Calgary
We very much enjoyed our stay here. It is in a walkable area to many restaurants. The host team was responsive and polite. Most importantly, the place was very clean! Highly recommend!

Great place to stay, very nicely maintained and Taylor & Geoff are excellent hosts.  Everything was clear and well communicated, would recommend their place to anyone looking for a downtown location to enjoy Calgary.

Taylor was friendly and responsive, and the place was spacious and as described. The location is perfect, being downtown, which makes restaurants and numerous grocery stores accessible on foot. I cannot recommend Taylor's place enough!

Beautiful airbnb! Super clean and spacious! The location is a short walkable distance from lots of stores and restaurants. The host was extremely responsive and proactive of the comfort of their guest. I felt like they definitely take the time to ensure their place feels like a second home for all their guest. Highly recommend booking this place.
Staying at Taylor and Geoff's was great. the layout worked perfectly for us, and the location was so perfect. They're very responsive and helpful hosts, would definitely stay again!

it was really nice place to stay

and Taylor send me all the information before I arrived
so there was no issues with stay

Geoff and Taylor’s place was lovely - great place to relax after a day of sightseeing, very easy to get to and plenty of places to eat nearby. They were very responsive hosts, and the parking was easy to sort. Would absolutely stay again!
The place was exactly as described. we had a toddler and there were toys and toddler plates which was nice. it was also easy to find parking on the street. the host was very responsive.

Taylor’s place was quite quaint and cozy!  The apartment is very clean. The bedrooms are a bit on the small size, making them slightly difficult to maneuver around, especially at night. The complimentary earplugs were a convenient touch, but we didn’t find that we needed them (thankfully). Shower heads sit too low in both showers. The front entrance is shared by two suites, including this one. Location is downtown, making parking at times very difficult (although free, if you’re able to get into the correct spot). Overall, a good stay!

We had a great stay at Taylor and Geoff’s place. They were very responsive and helpful! Check out their pub, Bottlescrew Bill’s. It was excellent!
Thank you Taylor and Geoff for everything!
This place was beautiful and in a great location. Although it's in the city, there was a nice, neighborhood feel to the particular area. The hosts were also great. I'd stay there again.

Beautiful little place in downtown. Exactly what i needed for a fair price. Very walkable and near where i needed to be, super sweet hosts whom were very accommodating and attentive. Parking was easy and neighbours are very nice as well. Definitely planning on staying again in the future!
The place had good access to downtown Calgary and nearby restaurants. We loved the living room with the fireplace!
Lovely little townhouse. Very clean. Taylor and Geoff were very responsive. Parking was a little confusing so pay close attention to the map the hosts send.

Everything was okay. Near to downtown.
But unfortunately some junkies in this area. Not the fault of the hosts but as a family a little bit scary

Great accommodation in downtown, close to amenities and walkable neighbourhood.
Comfortable beds!
Loved the location!  Nightlife, restaurants, and grocery store close by!!  We really enjoyed our stay and plan to rebook!
My mum and I stayed here for a few days whilst visiting family. Was in a great location very clean and had everything we could possibly need . Thank you so much

Thanks to Taylor for the wonderful hospitality in the Calgary city center. The house is spacious, easy to find and very well maintained. We thoroughly enjoyed the place and will recommend the same to all Airbnb community.
Our son enjoyed the electric fireplace and other games or play things which were thoughtfully kept.
It definitely felt like home, away from home.

Very responsive and proactive host!
Detailed instructions sent prior to arrival made for ease of check-in. There was also checking in by the host to ensure comfort and no difficulty upon arrival.
Very spacious and clean. Walking distance to restaurants and decent hangout spots in the Calgary downtown. Would definitely book again!

This was a great find in Calgary. The hosts were responsive and gave very clear instructions. It was comfortable and felt like home. I would stay here again.  They have ear plugs if needed, however I stayed in the upstairs bedroom and I didn’t hear any outside sounds. The hosts also made sure we knew where to park so we wouldn’t get a ticket. There is a fun wall in the hallway when you enter so that you can sign your name. The wifi worked great.

name: Apartment in Calgary · ★4.69 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bathroom
description: Stay in our stylish apartment in the heart of the very best neighborhood in the city. The location is a few steps away from trendy microbreweries, artisanal ice cream shops, must-try restaurants, and an upscale supermarket. Enjoy the panoramic view of our city or read a book on the spacious balcony watching the beautiful Calgary sunsets.The spaceLocation: This condo is located on 1ST SW in Beltline.Amenities Include:✪ Sleeps 3 – One Bedroom with Queen Bed. Bedroom mattress softness: Medium Hard/Soft. Another twin sized bed.✪ Couch also folds into bed for a 4th guest✪ Free Secured Parking ✪ High Speed Internet✪ Wi-Fi, Netflix, YouTube✪ Self Check-in (Arrive Anytime after 4!)✪ Full functioning kitchen (Oven/Fridge)✪ Normal Essentials✪ LaundryProximity to Attractions✪ Downtown Core/TD Square/C-train– 10 Min Walk✪ 17th AVE– 5 Min Walk✪ Stampede Park/BMO Centre/Saddledome – 10 Min Walk/3 Min Drive✪ Central Memorial Park – 5 min walkRegistration DetailsBL255099
reviews: In general, our stay was really good! We loved the place and especially the location. The only downside was that the toilet wasn’t working the first night we arrived, so we had to manage until the next morning. Thankfully, it was fixed right away and we were compensated for the inconvenience. Overall, everything else was great—if I were to come back a second time, I’d definitely give it 5 stars!

The couch is very dirty with visible stains , one will think twice before sitting on it, washroom didn’t have enough supplies - shower gel bottle was almost empty, bed sheets were smelly not sure if they were washed or not. View from the condo is nice - the only good thing about this place. Maintenance required - master bedroom closet door doesn’t close properly .

Overall we had a great stay. It was during prime stampede time and for that, the location was perfectly located. Beautiful view and Neil was a great host. Super easy check in, and he was always responsive. The Air Conditioning wasn’t great and it got fairly hot in the condo however we didn’t spend a whole lot of time inside. Little bit of wear and tear from past guests but overall fairly close to the pictures/description.

This is a great condo in a excellent location.  Lots of restaurants and things to do in walkable distance.  A few minor repairs are necessary but nothing that would hamper anyone’s stay.  The view at night is great.  Hosts are easy to reach and access instructions were straightforward and simple.  Thanks for a great stay.

The place is a good size, big enough for four adults. It has a stunning view of downtown at night and in a great location. Walking distance to great food and bars.
Bonus parking included in a garage.
Neighborhood felt safe as did the apartment complex.
Highly recommend.

Nice, responsive host, great view, nice central location, free parking, and close to Stampede.

reviews_details.review: In general, our stay was really good! We loved the place and especially the location. The only downside was that the toilet wasn’t working the first night we arrived, so we had to manage until the next morning. Thankfully, it was fixed right away and we were compensated for the inconvenience. Overall, everything else was great—if I were to come back a second time, I’d definitely give it 5 stars!

The couch is very dirty with visible stains , one will think twice before sitting on it, washroom didn’t have enough supplies - shower gel bottle was almost empty, bed sheets were smelly not sure if they were washed or not. View from the condo is nice - the only good thing about this place. Maintenance required - master bedroom closet door doesn’t close properly .

Overall we had a great stay. It was during prime stampede time and for that, the location was perfectly located. Beautiful view and Neil was a great host. Super easy check in, and he was always responsive. The Air Conditioning wasn’t great and it got fairly hot in the condo however we didn’t spend a whole lot of time inside. Little bit of wear and tear from past guests but overall fairly close to the pictures/description.

The view at night is great.  Hosts are easy to reach and access instructions were straightforward and simple.  Thanks for a great stay.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.83 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bathroom
description: This stylish condo with private parking is just steps from trendy shops, restaurants, and vibrant nightlife, yet tucked away in a peaceful setting. Featuring an equipped kitchen, bright living space, comfy bedrooms, and a dedicated workspace, it’s ideal for families, couples, or remote workers. As a bonus, we welcome well-behaved pets to join your stay. Experience the best of Calgary with convenience and comfort—your perfect retreat awaits!The space*Welcome to Your Home Away from Home in Calgary!****Location:**  Nestled in the heart of Calgary at 1029 14 Ave SW, our cozy apartment condo offers the perfect blend of convenience and comfort. Whether you're here for business, pleasure, or a bit of both, you'll find everything you need just steps away.**Property Highlights:**  - Prime Location: Situated in a vibrant neighborhood, you're just a short walk from popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping centers. Enjoy easy access to the best Calgary has to offer.- Comfortable Living: Our condo is thoughtfully furnished to ensure a relaxing stay. The bedroom features a comfortable bed and a fan to keep you cool.- Modern Amenities: Stay connected with Wi-Fi, and take advantage of our well-equipped kitchen for all your culinary needs.- Convenient Laundry: In-unit laundry is available for $10per load, with soap/softener included for your convenience.- Thoughtful Extras: For long stays, we provide extra bed sheets, allowing you to refresh your space as needed.**Local Amenities:**  - Grocery Stores:You'll find three major grocery stores—Save on Foods, Safeway, and Co-op—just two blocks away, making it easy to stock up on essentials.- Home-Cooked Meals:Our cohost Lina is a talented cook with permits to offer food. She provides delicious home-cooked meals and shares her weekly menu every Friday. Please let us know if you’re interested. - Public Transport: Convenient access to public transport ensures you can explore Calgary with ease.We look forward to hosting you and ensuring you have a memorable stay in Calgary. If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out!Other things to noteThis amazing condo, is a no parties allowed, suitable for tourist, professionals, friends upholding the highest standards of care and enjoyment of the city. If this sounds like you, this is your home away from home!Registration DetailsBL281451
reviews: Perfect location, close to downtown but quiet and safe neighbourhood. The host responded super fast and was very helpful! The place was exactly the same as described on the website and clean! Highly recommend :)

Absolute amazing stay, the apartment was incredibly clean and well supplied with all materials for cooking utensils and cleaning products. The hosts were so kind and let us come in earlier to settle in nicely. We really enjoyed our time with Naomi and will definitely be coming back again, it was such a perfect location to enjoy calgery especially when going to the stampede!!

We were so lucky to find this place during the stampede! Clean, great quiet neighbourhood, and really spacious and comfortable. Naomi and team were super helpful and responsive, would definitely stay here again!

The entire experience was very good.  I was anxious to have an ideal place to stay overnight with my brother on a family visit to Calgary. Finding this apartment seemed perfect and the communication with all 3 contacts was prompt and informative. As a result we had a brilliant time in the city knowing we had a ce trsl and perfect apartment to return to. It was also very fairly priced when compared with other apartments on AirBnB. I'd have no hesitation using again and would recommend to anyone seeking accommodation in central calgary

A fantastic spot to stay in downtown Calgary. Clean, comfortable, nicely decorated and has everything you need. Great location that is easily walkable to restaurants, stores, parks and attractions. Nice neighbourhood, and good outdoor parking lot that was easy to use. Building was clean and quiet.  Host is responsive, friendly and provides easy-to-follow instructions. Much better value than nearby hotels  Would definitely stay here again. Thanks for a great stay.
Pretty nice place,Super clean , and a great Location ,  i aslo forget the keys in the apartment Very late night and Naomi answered me quickly to buzz me in.  I recommend 👌
We stayed in Naomi’s place for a month for work in Calgary. Great location, very safe and comfortable neighborhood. Will definitely stay again!

It was about 15minutes away by walk to go to the main downtown so it was convenient to access stores, restaurants.
The area was peaceful and quiet so I liked it.
Also I stayed here with my cats, there were most of amenities I needed so I didn't have to buy anything to stay at first except food.
And she checked if I need any help or have any problem.
Comfortable place to unwind or walkable to all the bars and restaurants.  Bed was nice and soft with black out curtains.

With a great location, Naomi's put us where we wanted to be for our stay in Calgary. The apartment was clean except for a couple oversights from the cleaners but it didn't affect our stay. The welcome goodies were a nice touch and appreciated. The bathroom was clean although make sure you like a high pressure shower before you get in! Our only downsides to our stay was the second bedroom bed and the flooring in the main part of the house; which Naomi was happy to address both things when we spoke privately and they are aiming to fix these things for future guests. The bed in the second room was a very hard squeaky mattress and unfortunately that was the downside in our stay as my husband and I couldn't stay together on it. The floors need some repairs as some tiles were broken and loose, but Naomi let me know they are working on getting them fixed which can be appreciated. Naomi's response time was quick and professional. We will be back to stay in the future with the changes made.
Would definitely stay here again on a return trip to Calgary. In great downtown area close to grocery stores, bakeries, restaurants and shopping.
Naomi was very friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed. She even left us with some goodies.

Stayed for two nights, mixed experience. Nice aesthetics but lacks some basic needs. Hosts are friendly and helpful. They were communicative and also arranged a fan upon request, though we had to sleep in about 25-30 degrees on the first night.
Parking instructions are quite confusing, we kept second doubting until the host confirmed (this could be easily resolved with attaching a picture and annotating it).
Internet pretty slow for WFH.
No kitchen paper towels provided.
Most pots and pans don’t have lids.
Only 2-3 dishwasher pods were given and kept in the open near the sink, they all got moist and stuck together.
Black and dark blue towels are provided, which is inappropriate, you can’t tell if it’s clean, white is a standard for a reason.
Bathtub has dark shower curtains and there’s no light in the shower area.
Toiletries (shampoo and all) are poured into glass bottles, you don’t know what you are using on your body.
Hope this helps the host and guests:)
The flat is really nice and quite big, within walking distance from the city centre and various food options.

Naomi's place is so cozy!! You can't get any better for location, anything you could possibly need is only a few blocks away. Great host! I will be definitely booking a return stay next time I'm in town.
Easy and convenient. Clean and lovely!
great place and location and great hoste

It's a perfect place to enjoy the steam.
It was an accommodation. Not only that, but the downtown was also within walking distance, so it was convenient and nice. The kitchen and bathroom were clean and the interior was well done. The bed was comfortable, so I was able to sleep well. If I come back to Calgary, I think I'll definitely come back to this place.
Great location, nice large space, very clean. Would definitely stay here again!

Great accommodation to end our stay! Super cozy comfortable beds, super sofa for a relaxing evening, very quiet outside with beautiful views of the city, not far from the city center and the 17th, nice street for bars and restaurants hehe
We are delighted with our last days in Calgary!

Everything worked out well and I felt very comfortable right away. The apartment is very cozy, the area is very quiet and there are great restaurants nearby! I could reach everything quickly by bus and also on foot. I had a good time and would come back!
We enjoyed our stay!
Great location, central yet quiet, nice apartment for our family with 2 children
Quiet area close to center The apartment is suitable for groups of friends or family.

reviews_details.host_response:
Thank you for your feedback Anikesh.
the condo is in a concrete building that stays naturally cool and cools quickly with fans. As stated in the listing, there is no AC, which is common in Calgary.
We use black and navy towels for their quality and durability, and all linens are professionally laundered. Soaps and shampoos are provided in clearly labeled glass bottles as part of our eco-conscious approach. We only provide quality products.
Our cleaning care team follows the highest standards, and we pride ourselves on offering a spotless, well-equipped space.
Unfortunately, this guest left the unit dirty, left balcony doors open, and did not follow checkout instructions, creating safety and cleanliness concerns.
We remain committed to delivering a high-quality experience for respectful guests.
