name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.74 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Welcome to this beautifully designed one bed one bath condo located in the heart of downtown Calgary, where industrial style meets comfort and elegance. This stunning condo boasts incredible views of the city skyline, with the iconic Calgary Tower standing tall in the distance.The spaceAs you enter the condo, you'll be greeted by an open concept living space that seamlessly blends modern and industrial elements. Exposed and high concrete ceilings create a chic and edgy atmosphere that is softened by the warm, earthy tones of the furnishings.The living room is furnished with a comfortable sofa,  perfect for lounging and enjoying the stunning views of the city through the floor-to-ceiling windows. The sleek and modern kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, and all the essentials needed to cook a gourmet meal.The bedroom is a cozy retreat, featuring a plush queen-sized bed with luxurious linens and plenty of storage space in the built-in closet. The bathroom is stylishly designed with a deep bath tub, contemporary fixtures, and plenty of soft towels.This condo also features a private balcony, where you can sit back and relax while taking in the breathtaking views of the city. Other amenities include air conditioning, high-speed internet, and a smart TV for your entertainment needs.Located in the heart of downtown Calgary, this condo is just steps away from some of the city's best restaurants, bars, and shops. Whether you're here for work or play, this industrial-style condo offers the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and style.Guest accessGuests will have access to the entire suite plus Sky lounge/ fitness facility and poolRegistration DetailsBL267402
reviews: Clean place , amazing view and easy check in. Was al perfect lititle spot for our trip. If I could have changed one thing it was I didn’t realizie that the undergoing parking was not included and I didn’t like leaving my car on the street.  Other then that everything was great

Booked this BnB for a nice quiet gateway. The room was not so clean, had debris and dirt over the floors. The view was the only outstanding part of the apartment. We hardly got any sleep in due to the party happening. The closest was pre-broken when we got to the bnb, definitely does not match the pictures. I wouldn’t book again if I was looking for comfort. I will definitely book for the view. The communication between the host was smooth.

I had a fantastic stay here. The location is amazing - clear views of the Calgary tower from all areas of the condo.
The unit was clean, and communication from the hosts was very warm and near instant throughout the experience, which took a lot of stress off of the trip.
Kudos to the team, I enjoyed my stay and will be back.
Thanks again!
Great place and in a great location. Would definitely stay again

Pros... there are many:
Best thing about this place is the full view of the city from both the lounge and the bedroom - I couldn't get enough of it!
Place is much as pictured, photos are glossier and make it seem a bit bigger/ brighter. It's still a beautiful place, even without the gloss.
Check in was simple and contactless.
Everything was clean
Appreciated the Tim Hortons coffee pods every morning :)
Nice Japanese restaurant/ bento place nearby, and a convenient walk/ ride to Stephen Avenue.
Bed was very comfy, and there's loads of storage space.
-Shower head - please replace asap as that one is unusable - used the bottom tap which was frustrating.
- Soap dispenser - pump did not work throughout my stay
- Some sockets in bedroom don't work
- Not a major issue for me, but bedroom closet door is broken and leans on a wall
-Communication was prompt, except near check-out; requested delayed check out and had to follow up next day. Declined, so had to leave sharpish!
Place was wonderful. Right in downtown Calgary with amazing views of the city. Place was clean and tidy. I would definitely comeback!!
Pool area was a little underwhelming. Barely got any sun amd was undersized- no one uses this space but it has potential

Overall great place, it is common for elevator maintenance and operation to fluctuate affecting lift times, but other than that the space was clean, ready on-time, and cozy in the evenings. The team was available via messages 24/7. Would stay here again!
Nice place. Location is great, good view, smooth check in.
Definitely will stay again! Apartment have perfect view from the balcony and we liked it so much!
Really nice place definitely gonna come again
It was pretty chill and easy to get to
Great views of the city!!
Good location, place has nice views and pretty spacious!
The place was in good shape, and had a great view!
Beautiful apartment looked just like the pictures with a great view. Check in process was easy and I would stay here again . The apartment was very clean as well.
Nice view

Good bars and restaurants within walking distance. Check-in and out was easy and uncomplicated. Great view from the balcony, especially in the evening. If you have any questions, they responded quickly.
love it
Good stay
A few things were downsides but overall 9/10
Amazing time, no complaints would stay again ✨
Great place to stay with a nice view of the city.
amazing view

listing_title: Elegant • Comfortable Suite w/ Incredible DT View!
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: 8 minute walk to the nearest LRT station to get you anywhere you need to be in the city. 10th avenue goes directly onto two major highways (Macleod trail and Crowchild Trail). 7 minute walk to 17th avenue, Calgary number one hotspot for bars, restaurants and nightlife. Tons of street parking

description_by_sections.value: Welcome to this beautifully designed one bed one bath condo located in the heart of downtown Calgary, where industrial style meets comfort and elegance. This stunning condo boasts incredible views of the city skyline, with the iconic Calgary Tower standing tall in the distance.

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: As you enter the condo, you'll be greeted by an open concept living space that seamlessly blends modern and industrial elements. Exposed and high concrete ceilings create a chic and edgy atmosphere that is softened by the warm, earthy tones of the furnishings.The living room is furnished with a comfortable sofa,  perfect for lounging and enjoying the stunning views of the city through the floor-to-ceiling windows. The sleek and modern kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, and all the essentials needed to cook a gourmet meal.The bedroom is a cozy retreat, featuring a plush queen-sized bed with luxurious linens and plenty of storage space in the built-in closet. The bathroom is stylishly designed with a deep bath tub, contemporary fixtures, and plenty of soft towels.This condo also features a private balcony, where you can sit back and relax while taking in the breathtaking views of the city. Other amenities include air conditioning, high-speed internet, and a smart TV for your entertainment needs.Located in the heart of downtown Calgary, this condo is just steps away from some of the city's best restaurants, bars, and shops. Whether you're here for work or play, this industrial-style condo offers the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and style.

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: Guests will have access to the entire suite plus Sky lounge/ fitness facility and pool

host_details.name: Tommy
host_details.languages: Speaks Arabic, English, German, and Portuguese

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.77 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Cozy condo with stunning views of the mountains to the west and city all around below. On the 28th floor with brand new furnishings. A gym and an outdoor pool are available. Downtown with lots of character and stylish restaurants nearby for all types of palettes. Located in Beltline district, a seven minute walk to the free downtown C-Train will have you exploring the whole city with ease. Study, work or play, you will feel at home here.The spaceOne full bedroom with queen size bed, living room, full kitchen and full bathroom.Other things to noteStreet parking is $10/day and always lots of spots available.Registration DetailsBL262458
reviews: I received very specific instructions before my trip and what to expect. The front door wasn’t opening as described in the instructions. However, I messaged the host and they responded right away. The other tenants were quiet. The balcony had a great view. Very easy to get in and out of the building and the suite. Extremely satisfied with my stay. 100% would stay here again.

I had a great stay! The host provided very clear instructions about everything, which made check-in and navigating the place super easy. The apartment was clean, well-maintained, and equipped with everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The only slight downside was the nearby trains, but it wasn’t a big issue for me. Overall, a very positive experience and I’d happily stay again!

The elevator and entrance system can be a bit tedious, but as long as you carefully follow the instructions, it’s totally fine! Everything was great — clean, exactly as described, and the view was really nice! I highly recommend Troy & this place.
This was a comfortable, well-equipped apartment for my stay of 8 nights. I found the instructions clear and easy to follow and Troy responded to me when I had a couple of questions.

We really enjoyed our stay! The apartment was nice and had everything we needed. The view from the balcony was beautiful, and the location was perfect. As it’s in the downtown area, it can be a bit noisy at times, but it wasn’t too bad and didn’t affect our stay. Overall, a great place to stay!

Lovely apartment in the centre of town very close to bars and restaurants.
Plenty of space in the apartment to cook your own food and get a bit of peace from the busy city.
Check in and check out was very clear too.
Highly recommend over a hotel stay in the city!

The location is close to so much, lots of restaurants, convenient stores, a fun Ukrainian night club across the street that had fun people & good food. The place was clean, the pool was nice as well as the gym. 10/10 recommended and I will be coming back for sure :)
The apartment was clean and nice, the location is great, but take in mind that it’s downtown so it might get a bit noisy. It was nice having all the kitchenware so we could also make our own food.

Overall the place is excellent and Troy is great to deal with, and not just because we share the same name, lol.  The entry system at the front door and the initial entry before you get the key fob inside the suite is very difficult and doesn’t work well. There are alternative entrance instructions for later at night and I just simply used those even though it was during the day. I was able to enter from the Parkade. Minor in the big picture. I learned later the problem with the front intercom is quite well known and widespread; not the fault of the owner.
Troy’s place was great. We loved the 28th floor view of the city. The balcony was a great feature. Everything was super clean and very high quality. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Fantastic location with beautiful view! Walking distance to so much in downtown Calgary. Troy was also extremely friendly, responsive and welcoming. Book this place it will not disappoint!
Loved staying at this spot! Needed a quick stay for an easy drive to the airport after visiting Banff! It was perfect, super clean, amazing views and comfortable furniture. Would 10/10 recommend
A convenient location for those visiting Calgary. Clean , compact space great for a short stay as a couple or a extended stay as one person.
Great place. Would stay again. Super easy clear check in and check out. Building amenities were a nice bonus.

Stayed in Calgary for about 48 hours to visit Banff so I just need a space to crash. Perfect spot for the price. Very clean, nice view from the balcony, easy check in. The neighborhood just seemed a bit sketchy but that could just be me. Other than that it was everything I needed for a short stay. Would stay here again.

I had a great experience with Airbnb! The place was exactly as described—clean, cozy, and in a great location. Troy provided detailed instructions, making check-in and check-out very easy, even without meeting in person. Communication was clear and quick, which made my stay smooth and comfortable. I highly recommend this place to others!
Exactly as described, and in a great location! Perfect for our 4 day trip in Calgary
Great place to stay! Clean, convenient location. Close to lots of things.
Great location, walking distance to the events I had planned and good dinning as well from breakfast & dinner. Highly recommend if you enjoy the downtown atmosphere .
We had a short stay, but the apartment was clean and nicely decorated. The view from the balcony was an added bonus. Overall enjoyed our stay.
Wonderful Stay!!!! Beautiful balcony views of the city skyline, so so nice at nighttime!! Definitely worth what you pay, such a great deal!! Would definitely stay again!
The place was great! We were here for the Rotary Convention and it was very convenient to the BMO Center and Scotiadome.

The condo is exactly as described. However, the following details were not mentioned: Whether these points are important or not is up to each person:
1. The location in the middle of the city means it is incredibly noisy. There is a freight train railroad line right in front of the house (trains run 24/7). On weekends, loud gas-guzzling car enthusiasts roam the streets. This means that the condo's biggest advantage is also its biggest disadvantage.
2. You can hear the ventilation from the hallway in the apartment.
3. There is hardly any storage space in the bedroom. There are no shelves, and only a handful of clothes hangers. You are forced to live out of a suitcase.
4. The bed is max. 1.40 m wide.
5. The blinds barely darken the room. When it gets light outside, the bedroom gets light, too.
6. The cleanliness could be improved.
For those who are less sensitive to noise & light, the condo offers an ideal base from which to explore the city. Unfortunately, not for us.
Thanks for the great stay! Everything was exactly as described / shown in pictures. My sleep was great and I enjoyed waking up to the city sunrise!

name: Apartment in Calgary · ★4.82 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bathroom
description: Cozy one-bedroom unit right on 17th Ave. Very lively neighbourhood. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, shops, amenities, Saddledome, and the Calgary stampede.The space•free designated parking•Crave on 50” TV•Optic Fiber Telus Internet up to 250 Mbps•2 minutes walking distance to Laundromat•Noise monitor in place to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained•Extra bed (double) will be set up in living room for bookings with more than 2 people. Extra bed can also be set up for an additional $14/night upon requestOther things to note•A violation of the House Rules can lead to a fine and an immediate removal of all guests without refund, please read the House Rules carefully.•Balcony is not accessible to prevent pipes from freezing during the winter season.Registration DetailsBL280734
reviews:
Joseph was an amazing host.
This is a great place to stay if you plan to be out all the time and experiencing the neighbourhood.
I was here for a week-long work trip and was in mostly except for my daily meetings. The kitchen is great for bringing in food, but if you’re planning to stay long you’ll need to bring extra cooking supplies, and a coffee maker.

Great location on a busy strip of 17 Ave with loads of bars and restaurants that’s bumping most nights, especially over the weekend. Keep that in mind if you are a light sleeper, there is a decent amount of noise that comes in from outside, but fans in the room can help mask most of it. Apartment itself is very simple and bare-bones in an older building which didn’t affect the stay at all.
Location was great for as we were visiting at the stampede grounds . Very good bed, as for the kitchen we only had  light breakfasts during our stay .  Good spot  & restaurants very convenient.

all around great place to eat and Joseph was a wonderful host. Real quick and easy access to bars and right in the heart of the city so really ideal if you’re travelling through transit. Would definitely stay again if the opportunity arises itself.

Consistently great...!
I am a repeat guest and keep coming back because it’s consistently great. Joseph communicates fast, the home is immaculate, and little touches make it feel easy and welcoming.
Thank you, Joseph, for another great stay.
Unit is quiet and is as advertised. It is close to restaurants, pubs, and coffee shops. Joseph responds quickly. He gave good recommendations for local restaurants and pubs. Would stay again.

We stayed for three nights. Joseph was a fantastic host to deal with. Very responsive and accommodating. Joseph provided us with plenty of local suggestions on places to visit and eat out and was flexible when our plane was delayed and we arrived in two groups instead of one. I highly recommend staying here.

Stayed here for stampede, the location is incredible right on 17th Ave so easy walking distance to the grounds as well as everything 17th has to offer. The unit was clean and comforting, and had a great AC unit in the bedroom. Will definitely stay here again!

Such a convenient place to be if you want to explore down town Calgary! Will definitely be staying again for any future trips! Owner offered great recommendations and their communication was above and beyond! Super helpful and accommodating.

Host is very helpful and friendly, and the unit is definitely worth the price. It’s located in a very convenient and walkable area. The main downside is that the unit isn’t too soundproof; also the bathroom doesn’t have a vent.

Was right on 17th ave which is perfect for a street of pubs & patios.
Had a hiccup with a parking & he responded instantly to give us a new stall number.
Check in was super easy, the place was nice for a couple to stay in. AC in the room made all the difference!
Awesome place to stay, no complaints. The host was always fast to respond when I had questions and were very proactive as well. A place I would definitely come back to.

If you’re looking for a simple, easy and relatively affordable place to stay, this is a solid choice. The unit is almost exactly like the pictures, and its in a great location. The lack of a washer and dryer is a little bit annoying, but other than that and the slightly sticky floors, I have no complaints.
for a last minute deal, and a late late check-in, Joseph  was extremely helpful.
Super friendly, responsible, couple definitely in the future if it’s available for my next trip to Calgary I will be back there thank you so much .
As advertised, great location, really nice restaurants just across the street, within walking distance of all things needed during stampede time
The host was nice and cooperative. Truly a five‑star experience -I’d happily stay here again and recommend it to anyone visiting the area!😊
Nice place, it's what it looks like in the photos, Joseph all the time attentive. I recommend this place.
Joseph’s home was everything I needed for my stay in Calgary! Location was amazing being right downtown and the included parking spot was so nice. Would definitely stay here again!

Joseph was quick to respond, gave great recommendations, walking distance to great restaurant’s. The apartment was clean and looked just like the pictures. Highly recommend and will stay again when back in Calgary.

I really enjoyed my stay at Joseph’s place - the apartament was clean and had all needed items. Jospeh was a great hosts giving us advices where to eat and what to see, as also he was really helpful.
The only problem would be some noise from the neighbors but this is not really something that the host can maintain himself as it is a apartament in a bigger building.
Additionally I need to add that the bed was amazing and it was hard to leave it in the morning ;)
Thank you aJoseph for a great stay! :)
Excellent location. Clean unit and helpful host.
I recommend this place very clean and well situated!
Joseph was a great host and I had a wonderful time at his airbnb

host_details.name: Joseph
host_details.response_time: They typically respond within an hour

reviews_details.review:
Joseph was an amazing host.
This is a great place to stay if you plan to be out all the time and experiencing the neighbourhood.
I was here for a week-long work trip and was in mostly except for my daily meetings. The kitchen is great for bringing in food, but if you’re planning to stay long you’ll need to bring extra cooking supplies, and a coffee maker.

Great location on a busy strip of 17 Ave with loads of bars and restaurants that’s bumping most nights, especially over the weekend. Keep that in mind if you are a light sleeper, there is a decent amount of noise that comes in from outside, but fans in the room can help mask most of it. Apartment itself is very simple and bare-bones in an older building which didn’t affect the stay at all.
Location was great for as we were visiting at the stampede grounds . Very good bed, as for the kitchen we only had  light breakfasts during our stay .  Good spot  & restaurants very convenient.

all around great place to eat and Joseph was a wonderful host. Real quick and easy access to bars and right in the heart of the city so really ideal if you’re travelling through transit. Would definitely stay again if the opportunity arises itself.

Consistently great...!
I am a repeat guest and keep coming back because it’s consistently great. Joseph communicates fast, the home is immaculate, and little touches make it feel easy and welcoming.
Thank you, Joseph, for another great stay.
Unit is quiet and is as advertised. It is close to restaurants, pubs, and coffee shops. Joseph responds quickly. He gave good recommendations for local restaurants and pubs. Would stay again.

We stayed for three nights. Joseph was a fantastic host to deal with. Very responsive and accommodating. Joseph provided us with plenty of local suggestions on places to visit and eat out and was flexible when our plane was delayed and we arrived in two groups instead of one. I highly recommend staying here.

Stayed here for stampede, the location is incredible right on 17th Ave so easy walking distance to the grounds as well as everything 17th has to offer. The unit was clean and comforting, and had a great AC unit in the bedroom. Will definitely stay here again!

Such a convenient place to be if you want to explore down town Calgary! Will definitely be staying again for any future trips! Owner offered great recommendations and their communication was above and beyond! Super helpful and accommodating.

Host is very helpful and friendly, and the unit is definitely worth the price. It’s located in a very convenient and walkable area. The main downside is that the unit isn’t too soundproof; also the bathroom doesn’t have a vent.

Was right on 17th ave which is perfect for a street of pubs & patios.
Had a hiccup with a parking & he responded instantly to give us a new stall number.
Check in was super easy, the place was nice for a couple to stay in. AC in the room made all the difference!
Awesome place to stay, no complaints. The host was always fast to respond when I had questions and were very proactive as well. A place I would definitely come back to.

If you’re looking for a simple, easy and relatively affordable place to stay, this is a solid choice. The unit is almost exactly like the pictures, and its in a great location. The lack of a washer and dryer is a little bit annoying, but other than that and the slightly sticky floors, I have no complaints.
for a last minute deal, and a late late check-in, Joseph  was extremely helpful.
Super friendly, responsible, couple definitely in the future if it’s available for my next trip to Calgary I will be back there thank you so much .
As advertised, great location, really nice restaurants just across the street, within walking distance of all things needed during stampede time
The host was nice and cooperative. Truly a five‑star experience -I’d happily stay here again and recommend it to anyone visiting the area!😊
Nice place, it's what it looks like in the photos, Joseph all the time attentive. I recommend this place.
Joseph’s home was everything I needed for my stay in Calgary! Location was amazing being right downtown and the included parking spot was so nice. Would definitely stay here again!

Joseph was quick to respond, gave great recommendations, walking distance to great restaurant’s. The apartment was clean and looked just like the pictures. Highly recommend and will stay again when back in Calgary.

I really enjoyed my stay at Joseph’s place - the apartament was clean and had all needed items. Jospeh was a great hosts giving us advices where to eat and what to see, as also he was really helpful.
The only problem would be some noise from the neighbors but this is not really something that the host can maintain himself as it is a apartament in a bigger building.
Additionally I need to add that the bed was amazing and it was hard to leave it in the morning ;)
Thank you aJoseph for a great stay! :)
Excellent location. Clean unit and helpful host.
I recommend this place very clean and well situated!
Joseph was a great host and I had a wonderful time at his airbnb

reviews:
Place was great.
If I had to say anything, I would say the process of getting the key fob for the garage and the up and down is time consuming.
Having to add sheets and pillows to the bed was also a minor inconvenience, I’d also prefer to have less of the communication/info via a 3rd party website outside of Airbnb.
But no big deal will 100% stay here again.

I stayed one night, I wish I could have stayed longer. The location and view is very beautiful. Host is very responsive and easy to communicate. Lovely condo with high view, definitely will book again when in town.
Nomadic Vacation Rentals were great, they were friendly and able to respond and help right away.

We were very thankful to find a last minute rental. The location was convenient and the amenities were as listed. We did enjoy the outdoor patio and the beds were comfy. The company was very responsive the multiple times I had to reach out due to poor instructions (how to access the building / apt ) and the remote door lock not working. I also informed them of the bathroom light not working and missing towel rack in the second bathroom for which they were thankful for my messages. I did not have a chance to mention the dirty kitchen and fact that I had to put sheets on the bed, which was not expected especially when arriving at 3 am. I do hope they change this cleaning service and update their entry and garbage instructions. If so this could definitely be a 4 or 5 star.
Great location and property

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The Beltline community in Calgary is a vibrant and eclectic neighborhood known for its mix of residential, commercial, and cultural spaces. Located just south of downtown, it features tree-lined streets, historic buildings, trendy boutiques, art galleries, and a diverse range of dining options. The area is home to a young, dynamic population and offers a variety of parks, including the popular Tomkins Park. With its close proximity to downtown and an increasing number of modern developments, the Beltline is a lively and desirable place to live, work, and explore.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Getting around downtown Calgary is convenient and efficient, thanks to its well-connected public transit system and walkable streets. The Calgary Transit Light Rail Transit (LRT) offers quick access to key areas, with both the Red and Blue lines serving downtown stations. Buses are also widely available, making it easy to navigate the city. For those who prefer to walk or bike, downtown Calgary is pedestrian-friendly, with dedicated bike lanes and paths. Additionally, the downtown core is compact, allowing visitors and residents to easily explore restaurants, shops, and attractions on foot.

description_by_sections.value: Welcome to this 13th-floor condo in the heart of downtown Calgary, blending modern living and comfort. Head to the astro-turfed balcony to find a Napoleon BBQ, fire table, and cozy string lights—perfect for relaxing or entertaining. With restaurants and shops just moments away, this condo provides the ideal mix of style and convenience.

reviews: Good flat, responsive guest, clean. Only thing, be aware that the flat has wide windows open on the building's main terrace so not ideal if you want full privacy or unobstructed views.

Do not rent from these people!! Place is not clean with stains and mould. But the worst part is that the cleaners “cleaned” the unit a day before my departure, dumped all my clothes, shoes and toiletries bag in my suitcase, threw away my razor and shampoo and stole $300 that I had hiding in my toiletries bag!! Filed a report with Airbnb and the police. No help from the host and calling me a liar even though they admitted that the cleaners made a mistake with “cleaning “ the unit a day early. Absolutely furious! I asked for the name of the cleaner, so I can pass it onto the police, but they’re refusing to give it to me. Be aware!!! 11 years on Airbnb, never experienced something like this.

Awesome location! So many restaurants and options close by including a Starbucks right across the street.
Very responsive couple! Easy to follow instructions. The condo felt cozy and nice to have more space than a hotel room.
There were some issues that have been previously discussed. I think also we would’ve liked new towels and a second key. But other than that, it had everything we wanted and we would stay again! Thank you.
Nice big space in a great location. All of downtown is walkable from here.
Absolutely perfect location, right downtown. Perfect if you're not looking to drive everywhere. but looking for lots of dining and  entertainment  options
Location is the best, especially for the Banff trip pick up in Calgary. The place is also great for a family of 4 and also for long stays
Our stay at Joe and Marry was really amazing, excellent location,comfortable place you feel like home and excellent communication from the co host.
The place was very well kept, very convenient and walkable. Host was very responsive and accommodating, even had an extension of my stay which was provided without any hassle.

Beautiful & clean unit in the best location downtown Calgary. Instructions we're easy and clear to follow , communication was quick and efficient. Highly recommended and will book again if possible. Thank you.

Great location!!
Hosts very responsive!
I would recommend.
Was from the most good experience that I had.
Everything was smooth from check in to check out. The hosts were responsive and friendly. The place was clean and comfortable! Would definitely stay here again. :)
Good spot to to stay during stampede.
Was great place underground parking and around everything you need
Wonderful place to stay downtown. Would recommend and will stay again when visiting
Great central location with acsess ti a large walk out balcony
Thanks
It was an amazing stay at this place. Would definitely recommend.

Mary and Joe’s apartment is located in a great place, tons of local amenities including shops, pubs, restaurants, parks and more.
The residence itself had a lot of broken fixtures such as toilet paper holders, closet doors, the towel hook was hanging out of the wall with screws poking out, patio door was broken off. Many of the day to day necessities couldn’t be used which was difficult over a 10 day period.

It was conveniently located in the heart of downtown, making it easy to get around, with plenty of amenities nearby. The place was clean, and the detailed, friendly explanations were much appreciated!

The suite was immaculate, peaceful, and felt like home. It provided  the major things we needed for a comfortable and relaxing stay. The abundant natural light from the surrounding windows was a delight, and I liked the small yard that connected to the larger rooftop garden, which was creatively designed as the roof of the parking area. (Other suits on that floor, adjacent to the yard, had a small yard connecting to that area as well). A couple of minor issues were that the window handle was broken and needed repair, and the towel rack in the bathroom was missing.

This was all about LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION
Large enough for 2 couples or individuals to have their own separate space and yet still feel connected to each other….. Did I say LOCATION Yet….!!!

Great location. My group booked for the stampede and everything was within walking distance. However, the place itself needs a lot of maintenance work done (closet doors falling off, towel rack fallen off/holes in wall, patio door doesn’t have handle and screen was on the ground outside).

The apt is in a very good location with easy access to the train and many good restaurants within walking distance. The accommodation was comfortable and had all amenities for a short stay. The host was extremely responsive and welcoming.
However this apartment needs significant maintenance work. There are numerous broken fittings including the door handle which greets you on first entering. This could be a five star accommodation however the property requires better care and attention.

reviews_details.review:
The apt is in a very good location with easy access to the train and many good restaurants within walking distance. The accommodation was comfortable and had all amenities for a short stay. The host was extremely responsive and welcoming.
However this apartment needs significant maintenance work. There are numerous broken fittings including the door handle which greets you on first entering. This could be a five star accommodation however the property requires better care and attention.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.99 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: This top-floor, modern condo features a stocked kitchen, a balcony with views of the Stampede fireworks, and in-suite laundry. Located minutes from downtown and steps from trendy 17th Avenue and Mission. C-Train, groceries, river paths, gym facilities, and the Saddledome are within walking distance. Includes parking spot in our heated, underground parking.The spaceThis is a non-smoking condo.Whether you're in town on business or just visiting, this top-floor condo is an ideal home base for your stay. The rate includes a single car, underground, heated parking stall. Utilize our built-in desk if you work from home or enjoy cooking in our bright, open kitchen. You'll find everything you need, including oils, spices and condiments. Not a chef? You'll find virtually every type of cuisine within a few blocks or utilize one of the many food delivery services available. Access high-speed wifi throughout the entire condo. The unit has a smart TV with multiple streaming services, including Netflix, Disney+, Crave, Amazon, and Paramount+, for those nights you want to snuggle up on the sofa.The queen bed is extremely comfortable, and we have a selection of different styles of pillows for you to use. The large, walk-in closet makes longer stays comfortable. An oversized bathroom with a large soaking tub and glassed-in shower makes getting ready for the morning a breeze.Registration DetailsBL257403
reviews: The condo was wonderful - top story of the building meant almost no noise from neighbors and nobody above you. The location is amazing - close to several great restaurants and walking distance into the downtown core. Very responsive host and the place was really cozy and as described. Would return next time I'm in Calgary!

The apartment was just as described and shown in the pictures. The apartment had everything that's we needed and more. it's in a great location, within an easy walk of the Calgary Stampede, Scotiabank Saddledome and downtown. Stacey was very responsive and answered all queries quickly and clearly.

A lovely stay in Calgary - Stacey’s instructions were super clear and she was always responsive to messages! The apartment itself was perfect for our 3nights to explore the city and also near to shops and restaurants in mission/17th ave! Thanks so much for hosting us!

Absolutely amazing stay! Such an awesome location, everything was in walking distance and very close to amazing restaurants and bars but still private and peaceful. So friendly and just overall a beautiful space. Will definitely be back :)

Stacey was very responsive to all our questions, especially with our late check-in. The place looks just like the pictures, very clean and in a great location. Everything is easily accessible by walking.  We enjoyed our stay and would stay again next time in Calgary.

Well-appointed is an understatement! This immaculately clean apartment has everything you could possibly need. A very welcome change from the cheap furniture, sparse decor and wafer-thin pillows that have become the norm on this site. This place stands out as you really feel the hosts care about you and your stay. Super comfy bed, is definitely quiet, and being on the top floor there’s no one walking above you. Loved my stay here.

My daughter and I really enjoyed staying at Stacey’s place. Great convenient location with restaurants within walking distance. The place itself was very clean and comfortable and the host was very easy to communicate with and helpful. Also appreciated the host thoughtfulness to little details like leaving plenty of coffee for us, and even bottled water. Definitely recommend to others and would stay here again when in Calgary. 😊

The condo is very well situated in a great neighbourhood. Very convenient and walkable to downtown. You can find pretty much anything you need in the area. Host Stacey was very friendly and accessible if I had a question. The condo was clean and quiet with a comfortable bed, the perfect spot while I was in town on business. And the price was right. Thanks Stacey and Jeff! I'll be back for sure.
This was a great apartment, in a great location. We stayed 2 nights but would have happily stayed longer. Communication was great and very prompt. We would really recommend this apartment.

Enjoyed my stay at Jeff and Stacey’s place! It was perfect for a work trip, convenient to downtown and very walkable. I didn’t get to enjoy the amenities in the apartment while I was there but it had everything I needed. My biggest thing when booking a place for work is a comfy bed and a quiet location. This did not disappoint! In fact, I loved the details with multiple pillow options from soft to firm. I slept like a baby. Would absolutely book again!

We had a wonderful stay! The location was perfect-close to everything we needed. The unit is cute, cozy and clean! Stacey was incredibly kind and accommodating throughout our stay. Would definitely recommend!

Jeff's place was absolutely worth the stay, me and my lady had a wonderful time the location was clean, easily accessible, and had tons to do in the immediate vicinity! I would highly recommend staying with Jeff as the responses, instructions, and friendliness of the host were fantastic!

The property manager Stacy was super nice and helpful. She let me drop my bags early. She gave me a great recommendation of checking out the Calgary Stampede which was worth it! I never knew about it. The place was immaculately clean and spacious. It’s walkable to all the great restaurants and stampede. She gave me such good suggestions and was wonderful to engage in dialogue with.  I will definitely stay here next time when I am in Calgary. Thanks a ton Stacy!!

We really loved the apartment, super clean, organized, functional, the bed is super comfortable, we had quiet nights!
The location is great, we did almost everything just walking!
It’s a very quiet area...
The host was always very helpful, we liked it a lot! We really recommend this airbnb.

We enjoyed our stay at their condo. Very convenient(17th st restaurants/bars) and walkable to downtown. Excellent communications. Well equipped kitchen.
Highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay at Jeff’s place. It’s the perfect size for a couple, has a convenient layout, very bright and in a great location. What stood out to us was that it’s really well equipped, especially the kitchen. Would highly recommend!

A cosy apartment with a little balcony to enjoy our morning coffee. It was very clean & tidy; and perfectly situated at walking distance from the city and nearby restaurants/bars. Communication was very clear and friendly. Thank you Stacey & Jeff, we really enjoyed our stay in Calgary. :)

Very clean and well appointed condo. Very quiet building with underground parking. The location was great for us. Jeff and Stacey were proactive in reaching out. We could not have asked for more. Definitely the place to stay in Calgary.
Beautiful apartment. Nicely decorated, comfortable, great location. Really enjoyed our stay.
The host was very friendly and responsible. The condo is nice and clean and very close to downtown.

Despite an incident out of their control - a watermain break to the building - Stacey/Jeff  was extremely responsive and went above and beyond to get us situated the first night.   We appreciate all the extra effort Stacey  went to to ensure we could continue with our stay, we're comfortable and offered additional solutions for us.  The condo and its location (1 block  off 17th), we're perfect for us and even with the little glitch we truly enjoyed our stay.  The condo was super clean, well stocked for those who want to do some cooking and est in, had coffee already available for guests, and we found the bed very comfortable.   We look forward to  booking with Jeff and Stacey on our next Calgary visit!

The hosts were incredible! The space was absolutely fantastic. The sun coming into the apartment is unmatched, but if you don't dig the sun there are wonderful curtains to keep you happy. Very peaceful and just minutes a way from the vibrant city. 10/10 would recommend, and is officially on my radar for any of my stays in Calgary.

The pictures aren’t able to capture how at home this place is. Truly a cozy and comfortable space! Walking distance to anything you’d need in Calgary. Close to all the restaurants and bar. 17th Ave is right around the corner so there’s lots to do.
The host is super responsive and is extremely accommodating!

Jeff and Stacey’s place was super cozy and very clean. It is in an area that is very quiet and secluded from traffic. The location of their place is just walking distance to so many restaurants, stores, cafes, etc. that we hardly had to use our car to get anywhere. It had everything we needed, the washroom was spotless and the bed was very comfortable. Would definitely stay here again for future visits.

listing_title: Bright, Quiet & Close to Stampede & 17th Ave
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: This condo is perfect for a walkable lifestyle during your stay. Downtown, the Saddledome, and the Stampede grounds are all within a 15-minute walk, so you can leave the car in the secure underground parkade and save on parking costs! Within steps, you'll have access to the Mission area restaurant scene, one of Calgary's most popular areas. Just two blocks away, you can enjoy 17th Avenue, Calgary's main street, filled with food and drink, locally-owned shops, and popular stores. A few minutes walk gets you to the extensive river pathway system that runs through most of Calgary. If you like exploring, hop the C-Train or take a short drive to Chinook Mall or Kensington for more of the area’s great food scene and a full range of shopping options.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Besides our convenient location for walking, we are also close to public transportation, buses, and the C-Train. Uber and taxies are also easy to find close by. Downtown Calgary also boosts biking lanes which expand during the summer months. Downtown also is part of scooter-share programs, with them being found on most streets for rent.

Includes parking spot in our heated, underground parking.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.86 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description: Heart of Downtown Calgary | High Rise Panoramic Views  | POOL + GYM | FREE Underground Parking & FAST WIFI★Limited Time Weekly and Monthly Discounts Available★Experience luxury and breathtaking views at our rustic retreat in downtown Calgary.The spaceThis spacious 2 bedroom suite can accommodate 1-6 guests comfortably with the added benefit of an extra cozy sofa bed in the living room.Walk to the Bow River, Calgary Tower, Stampede grounds, Stephen Ave, 17 Ave, top restaurants and more!FLOOR TO CEILING windows with incredible Calgary Tower VIEWSIncludes:- Two bedrooms (both queen beds)- Sofa bed in living room- One full bathroom with tub shower combo- Fully stocked kitchen; with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans etc.- Shared gym in the building- LargePrivate patio and shared rooftop patio- Shared pool (seasonal) (Currently Open till September 2025)Go out for incredible downtown cuisine or dine in with Netflix in our fully stocked kitchen. Soak up the sun in the outdoor pool or enjoy views with friends and family in this peaceful and private space. Book now for an unforgettable stay!Guest accessIn the summer guests can enjoy access to the outdoor rooftop pool.The pool is currently CLOSED until Summer of 2026.Guests will also have access to one dedicated underground parking stall.Other things to notePets:No pets are allowed on the property. A violation of this rule will result in a fine of $500.Smoking and Illicit Substances:Smoking and the use of any illicit substances are strictly prohibited in the building and the unit. Violation will result in a minimum fine of $500.Parties/Events:Parties or events are not allowed on the property. Violation will result in a $2000 fine and immediate eviction.Keyfob Replacement:If the keyfob is lost or stolen, a $300 replacement fee will be charged.Deep Cleaning Fee:Our standard cleaning checklist includes disposing of your trash, washing your dishes, and clearing the fridge of any items you may have placed in there during your stay. We kindly ask guests to this maintain this standard and the property in the clean condition it was found in. Failure to follow will result in a $150 deep cleaning fee.Late Check-Out Fee (After 10 AM):A flat fee of $100 will be charged for late check-out.Registration DetailsBL278037
reviews: We had a wonderful stay at this apartment! The location was perfect — close to everything downtown and with a great view of the Calgary Tower right from the window. The space fit our family’s needs perfectly, offering plenty of comfort and convenience during our trip. We’d definitely stay here again on our next visit to Calgary!

This unit was very cozy and modern. The only downside was that there were homeless people lying on the grass in the building area, which made it feel unsafe to walk at night. It's a bit concerning. One of the best was, they have an Italian restaurant in the building that serves super delicious food, which made my daughter's birthday more special.

We loved staying at this apartment! The location couldn’t be more central, right in the heart of downtown Calgary, within walking distance to great restaurants, cafés, shopping, and key attractions. Being able to step outside and immediately be in the middle of everything was such a bonus.

We had a great stay! The place was very clean, and check-in was super easy. The view from the unit was beautiful, and we really enjoyed the swimming pool and gym facilities. The beds were comfy, and the location was perfect, close to everything we needed. The only minor inconvenience was the parking, which was on the 5th floor of the underground lot. A bit of a hassle, but honestly, not a big deal. Top of all, the instruction was super clear and consistent communication from the host made our check-in and out super easy. Would definitely stay here again!

I had a delightful experience at Misbah & Zubi’s place! The apartment was spotless and well equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
Location wise, it couldn’t have been better. The property is just a short walk close to restaurant and shops. We loved being able to explore the area easily.
Misbah & Zubi were incredibly responsive and helpful. Checking in and out was seamless, which we really appreciated.
I highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again on my next visit! Thank you, Misbah & Zubi for a wonderful experience!

Was a great place to stay!
Great hosts. Very responsive. Place was clean and perfect for our family of 5.
Thank you for providing a playard for our little one!
A lot of nice restaurants just walking distance away.
10 minute drive from Telus Spark and the Calgary Zoo.
Great view of the city

Overall great stay and a wonderful location. There is a ton of things to do right within walking distance. The apartment is well furnished and has everything you would need for a few nights. A couple things I would like to know if I were looking at booking: the pool is tiny- you will not be swimming, more like a large hot tub. Additionally, the check in requires a buzzer answer from the hosts, so if you are coming in late, make sure you let them know that. I would definitely stay here again though, just fyi.

It's a bit tricky to access the suite, but once inside it's a great apartment in a centrally located area of Calgary.
It is a bit lacking in terms of cutlery. And the patio door and the bathroom door didn't lock (faulty). On the plus side, Misbah and Zubi offered to send someone over during our stay to look at them. We declined.
The balcony was filthy and the bathroom floor had some accumulated dirt around the toilet, which I cleaned myself. There was lots of dust under the bed. Again, Misbah and Zubi responded well to my concerns... immediately sending a $50 rebate.
My family and I had a great time! Beautiful place and very clean! The host were so nice, very friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend
The place was as described, the hosts were friendly. They had very detailed and clear instructions for checking in and out.
A very comfortable apartment in downtown Calgary. Easy walking distance to supermarket and restaurants. The hosts were attentive and responsive. Highly recommended.
The host was responsive and the location is very central with lots to do within walking distance. Overall it was a nice experience.

The pictures are deceiving in terms of upkeep and cleanliness. Everything felt sticky. The cleaning rags reeked of vinegar, and, being sticky, had obviously not been washed. All the glass was filthy, and some of the bedding smelled. There were not enough towels, and I couldn’t wait to get home and take a shower in my own home.
When I contacted the host twice with questions, instead of answering them, he would ask, “Have you read the information package?” It was incredibly rude and unhelpful, especially during check-in when my hands are full of luggage and I have two small children with me.
I’m quite sure we left the place cleaner than it was when we arrived.
Good location, poor hosting.
Misbah and Zubi were great hosts and helped any issues we had

We really enjoyed our stay! It had everything we needed, great location, & the hosts were very thorough and kind.
Would stay here again.
Great stay, no issues. super central location and good view of the Calgary tower and surrounding city. Amazing resteraunts and stuff in a 5-20 min walk.
Great host, responsive, helpful, great location and apartment. Would definitely stay again.
We had a lovely stay. Misbah and Zubi were very helpful and friendly, which made our visit that much more pleasant.
Misbah and Zubi’s place is amazing! The communication was smooth and everything was perfect.

The place was clean, nicely decorated, and with great views. The hosts were very flexible with the check-in & check-out process. I needed some kitchen items, and they provided them right away. They were very responsive. Overall, great experience.

Thank you so much for hosting us in your beautiful home! It was even more stunning in person than in the pictures. The check-in process was seamless thanks to your detailed and thoughtful instructions. The place was spotless, cozy, and had everything we needed. We especially loved the breathtaking view, it truly made our stay special. There was also so much to do around the area, we were never bored. Highly recommend this stay to anyone visiting the area!

Perfect spot for doing limited time shows and work in Calgary, it was our perfect space to rest and relax in. My favourite thing was the view each morning when we had beautiful sunrise. Be aware you are in the heart of the city, so you can hear it all around. I will say our hosts are extremely responsive, we never got stuck or lost during our stay. The place was really nice and absolutely perfect for the four of us. Thank you Misbah and Zubi, for being great hosts.

We had a very good stay at Misbah’s and Zubi’s place. We checked in very late because of late arrival of our plane in Calgary and our hosts were there to help us check-in smoothly.
The flat is true to pictures: very comfy, with nice furniture and
gorgeous views on the Calgary Tower on one side and the Rockies on the other one.
Supermarket is a 5 minutes walk away. City centre 10 min. The area is really safe even in the evening.
Thank you Misbah and Zubi for this great stay ! We will definitely book your flat again next time we are in Calgary 😊
The place was great! It was clean, with extra linens and pillows provided. The location was beautiful, and the Calgary Tower was visible from the unit. The hosts were also very responsive🥰✨

listing_title: Modern Rustic Charm w/ Tower Views, Pool & Gym
listing_name: Entire rental unit in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Step into the heartbeat of downtown Calgary and discover the charm of the Beltline neighborhood!From cozy cafes serving up artisanal coffee to quirky boutiques brimming with unique finds, there's something here to delight every traveler's soul. Feel the rhythm of the city as you mingle with locals and soak in the vibrant atmosphere. And when it's time to unwind, retreat to your own slice of comfort in our welcoming modern, rustic getaway, where you can recharge and reminisce about your day's discoveries. Get ready to fall in love with Calgary from the heart of the Beltline!

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Getting around the Beltline neighbourhood couldn't be easier! With convenient access to public transportation including buses and the CTrain, exploring Calgary's vibrant downtown scene is a breeze. For those preferring to drive, we have a free underground dedicated parking space for guests and street parking is available throughout the area. Additionally, bike lanes and pathways make cycling a popular and eco-friendly way to navigate the neighborhood and beyond. Whether you're venturing out to explore the city's attractions or simply taking a leisurely stroll through the bustling streets, there are plenty of transportation options in the Beltline area.

Violation will result in a $2000 fine and immediate eviction.Keyfob Replacement:If the keyfob is lost or stolen, a $300 replacement fee will be charged.Deep Cleaning Fee:Our standard cleaning checklist includes disposing of your trash, washing your dishes, and clearing the fridge of any items you may have placed in there during your stay. We kindly ask guests to this maintain this standard and the property in the clean condition it was found in. Failure to follow will result in a $150 deep cleaning fee.Late Check-Out Fee (After 10 AM):A flat fee of $100 will be charged for late check-out.

reviews_details.review: We had a wonderful stay at this apartment! The location was perfect — close to everything downtown and with a great view of the Calgary Tower right from the window. The space fit our family’s needs perfectly, offering plenty of comfort and convenience during our trip. We’d definitely stay here again on our next visit to Calgary!

This unit was very cozy and modern. The only downside was that there were homeless people lying on the grass in the building area, which made it feel unsafe to walk at night. It's a bit concerning. One of the best was, they have an Italian restaurant in the building that serves super delicious food, which made my daughter's birthday more special.

We loved staying at this apartment! The location couldn’t be more central, right in the heart of downtown Calgary, within walking distance to great restaurants, cafés, shopping, and key attractions. Being able to step outside and immediately be in the middle of everything was such a bonus.

We had a great stay! The place was very clean, and check-in was super easy. The view from the unit was beautiful, and we really enjoyed the swimming pool and gym facilities. The beds were comfy, and the location was perfect, close to everything we needed. The only minor inconvenience was the parking, which was on the 5th floor of the underground lot. A bit of a hassle, but honestly, not a big deal. Top of all, the instruction was super clear and consistent communication from the host made our check-in and out super easy. Would definitely stay here again!

I had a delightful experience at Misbah & Zubi’s place! The apartment was spotless and well equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
Location wise, it couldn’t have been better. The property is just a short walk close to restaurant and shops. We loved being able to explore the area easily.
Misbah & Zubi were incredibly responsive and helpful. Checking in and out was seamless, which we really appreciated.
I highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again on my next visit! Thank you, Misbah & Zubi for a wonderful experience!

Was a great place to stay!
Great hosts. Very responsive. Place was clean and perfect for our family of 5.
Thank you for providing a playard for our little one!
A lot of nice restaurants just walking distance away.
10 minute drive from Telus Spark and the Calgary Zoo.
Great view of the city

Overall great stay and a wonderful location. There is a ton of things to do right within walking distance. The apartment is well furnished and has everything you would need for a few nights. A couple things I would like to know if I were looking at booking: the pool is tiny- you will not be swimming, more like a large hot tub. Additionally, the check in requires a buzzer answer from the hosts, so if you are coming in late, make sure you let them know that. I would definitely stay here again though, just fyi.

It's a bit tricky to access the suite, but once inside it's a great apartment in a centrally located area of Calgary.
It is a bit lacking in terms of cutlery. And the patio door and the bathroom door didn't lock (faulty). On the plus side, Misbah and Zubi offered to send someone over during our stay to look at them. We declined.
The balcony was filthy and the bathroom floor had some accumulated dirt around the toilet, which I cleaned myself. There was lots of dust under the bed. Again, Misbah and Zubi responded well to my concerns... immediately sending a $50 rebate.
My family and I had a great time! Beautiful place and very clean! The host were so nice, very friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend
The place was as described, the hosts were friendly. They had very detailed and clear instructions for checking in and out.
A very comfortable apartment in downtown Calgary. Easy walking distance to supermarket and restaurants. The hosts were attentive and responsive. Highly recommended.
The host was responsive and the location is very central with lots to do within walking distance. Overall it was a nice experience.

The pictures are deceiving in terms of upkeep and cleanliness. Everything felt sticky. The cleaning rags reeked of vinegar, and, being sticky, had obviously not been washed. All the glass was filthy, and some of the bedding smelled. There were not enough towels, and I couldn’t wait to get home and take a shower in my own home.
When I contacted the host twice with questions, instead of answering them, he would ask, “Have you read the information package?” It was incredibly rude and unhelpful, especially during check-in when my hands are full of luggage and I have two small children with me.
I’m quite sure we left the place cleaner than it was when we arrived.
Good location, poor hosting.
Misbah and Zubi were great hosts and helped any issues we had

We really enjoyed our stay! It had everything we needed, great location, & the hosts were very thorough and kind.
Would stay here again.
Great stay, no issues. super central location and good view of the Calgary tower and surrounding city. Amazing resteraunts and stuff in a 5-20 min walk.
Great host, responsive, helpful, great location and apartment. Would definitely stay again.
We had a lovely stay. Misbah and Zubi were very helpful and friendly, which made our visit that much more pleasant.
Misbah and Zubi’s place is amazing! The communication was smooth and everything was perfect.

The place was clean, nicely decorated, and with great views. The hosts were very flexible with the check-in & check-out process. I needed some kitchen items, and they provided them right away. They were very responsive. Overall, great experience.

Thank you so much for hosting us in your beautiful home! It was even more stunning in person than in the pictures. The check-in process was seamless thanks to your detailed and thoughtful instructions. The place was spotless, cozy, and had everything we needed. We especially loved the breathtaking view, it truly made our stay special. There was also so much to do around the area, we were never bored. Highly recommend this stay to anyone visiting the area!

Perfect spot for doing limited time shows and work in Calgary, it was our perfect space to rest and relax in. My favourite thing was the view each morning when we had beautiful sunrise. Be aware you are in the heart of the city, so you can hear it all around. I will say our hosts are extremely responsive, we never got stuck or lost during our stay. The place was really nice and absolutely perfect for the four of us. Thank you Misbah and Zubi, for being great hosts.

We had a very good stay at Misbah’s and Zubi’s place. We checked in very late because of late arrival of our plane in Calgary and our hosts were there to help us check-in smoothly.
The flat is true to pictures: very comfy, with nice furniture and
gorgeous views on the Calgary Tower on one side and the Rockies on the other one.
Supermarket is a 5 minutes walk away. City centre 10 min. The area is really safe even in the evening.
Thank you Misbah and Zubi for this great stay ! We will definitely book your flat again next time we are in Calgary 😊
The place was great! It was clean, with extra linens and pillows provided. The location was beautiful, and the Calgary Tower was visible from the unit. The hosts were also very responsive🥰✨

Very nice space, views were wonderful and location is very convenient to restaurants. Overall wonderful experience:)

This condo is walkable to everything. Mo is helpful and friendly.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our sleekly designed one bedroom downtown condo with views of the downtown skyline including an unobstructed sight of the Calgary Tower. Located in the heart of the Beltline. Walking distance to everything such as restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores and all popular avenues. 5 minute drive to the river, Stampede grounds and the Saddledome.Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.The spaceAdditionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, with an array of fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops within easy walking distance. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night. Notable Features:-Balcony with unobstructed view of the Calgary Tower-King bed-Dining table-Fresh bedding & linens-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-50" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix and cable-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-High-speed WiFi-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine-Patio Furniture (seasonal) ID Verification Required for our property.All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.Guest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.*** POOL is closed for the winter.Registration DetailsBL293934
reviews: My daughter stayed here and had nothing but positive things to say about the apartment. It was just like the photos and the host was attentive, quick to respond and helpful in answering any questions. Regarding the price, it was a little bit expensive for the size of the space, but worth it for the location. I would definitely recommend booking with these hosts!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Great stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. Kyle and his co-host was friendly and responsive. Would definitely stay again—highly recommended!
This place was very nice and a great location for central downtown. Clean location with an amazing view especially at night time. Would book again in a heartbeat!
Had a wonderful stay. Felt right at home and was a lovely introduction to Calgary - would definitely return/recommend.

Overall I had a wonderful stay! I’ve stayed in this building numerous times and it’s close to everything I love.
The only two things I would change about the airbnb is to have blackout blinds in the bedroom. There are blackout ones in the living room, which I was a tad confused by. It was hard to sleep in after the sun came up.
Also, I’ve never had a checkout time be 10am. It’s usually 11 or 12. So I was a bit rushed in the morning and had to go around downtown with my luggage due to a later flight.
With that being said I would definitely stay here again.
The bed was so big and comfortable, I was missing sugar for my coffee and Kyle had some delivered which I appreciated a lot.
I’m 100% coming back and will be booking through this host for sure.
Thank you!!
Looked exactly like photos and very clean! Patio was great to have with the weather. Coffee provided and walkable neighborhood.
Tidy, quiet and secure apartment conveniently located in the middle of the city. Host checked in regularly to make sure everything is OK. We enjoyed the stay.
This was a very nice unit in a good location. Host was proactive and helpful.
Really nice place and awesome hosts
Great host, very supportive. Super location, you should book today.
Great location, exactly what we needed.
Great place, very clean.
Great place. I would come back.
Impeccable accommodation. Great location and very clean. There's nothing missing! I'll definitely go back on my next visit to Calgary.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to this amazing south-west facing one bedroom unit. Fun, Friendly, Vibrant and Walkable!You will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located condo, close to Stampede grounds, famous 17 Ave, and Downtown. This space provides all you need for an enjoyable stay, including FREE underground parking, and easy access to Starbucks, bars, and restaurants at your doorstep!We are excited to welcome you to our condo!The spaceYou are welcomed by the spacious open living room. complimented by floor to ceiling windows and flooded with sunlight.  Turn on the 55" UHD 4k Smart TV to Roku, YouTube and others popular channels. Feel free to connect your iPhone, Android  to Smart TV using casting technologies and see/listen your favourite streams on TV.A frosted glass sliding partition creates separation for the master bedroom. It ensures optimal open concept living.In suite laundry and washer are available. We also offer underground parking stall and bike storage.Guest accessEntire space plus building amenities is included in this rental. Please, make yourself at home.Other things to noteColours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. Upon arrival the host willprovide you introduction to the building, bylaw and specific rules for Airbnb guests. Condo bylaws rules1. Upon arrival at Colours by Battistella, you must complete a “Tenant Undertaking Form” which provides management company (Equium Group) with basic contact information for emergency purposes and ensure that you have acknowledged that you understand and will comply with the Bylaws and standards of our community. 2. Our building is professionally managed by Equium Group. They will dispatch maintenance staff in the event of any emergency building-related service issues such as flooding, however they will not provide any additional services related to your  stay or your suite. Please contact your rental owner for any suite-related issues you may have.3. If your suite has any building-related service issues such as lack of hot or cold running water, water leaks, or lack of heat or air conditioning, these may be reported or by calling rental owner or Equium’s after-hours.4. You are responsible to help always maintain the security of our building by safekeeping your keys, and by not letting unknown people or vehicles follow you through doors into the building at any time. 5. As per City of Calgary Bylaws, no more than two guests per bedroom are allowed in your rental suite at any time. Inviting additional guests or visitors, hosting parties or any other social gatherings, is always prohibited.6. City Bylaws require observation of quiet time from 10:00 pm to 7:00 am weekdays and from 10:00 pm to 9:00 am on weekends, and building Bylaws restrict excessive noise that may disturb other residents at any time of the day.7. Use of units for activities which are illegal or that will be injurious to the reputation of the building are strictly prohibited.8. Smoking or vaping of tobacco or cannabis products is prohibited in all interior areas of the building including residential suites, hallways, elevators, parking areas, lobbies and all exterior areas always. Permission to smoke of tobacco products (and for clarity, not cannabis) on your balcony is at the discretion of your suite owner, provided they are following building bylaws.9. No cigarette butts, waste material or any other objects may be disposed of or thrown from your balcony at any time, as they can cause extreme danger from heights. Violations can result in City of Calgary Bylaw fines of up to $10,000 and/or criminal prosecution.10. Waste disposal, recycling and compost bins are available in the garbage room. All waste disposals must be in these areas, disposed of in well-tied, leak-proof bags or similar. No personal belongings or waste can be left in the common hallways outside your suite at any time.11. No signs, banners, laundry or any other objects may be hung or displayed from windows or balconies at any time.12. Exterior windows and balcony doors must remain closed in extreme cold weather conditions to prevent freezing of water lines or other damage to the building. You shall obey any rules made or posted by the Condominium Board regarding the use and care of the building, and any parking lot, balconies or common areas. Do not turn the thermostats in the unit to the “off” position. The interior unit temperature cannot be set below 15 degrees Celsius.13. Pets are not allowed in units which operate as short-term rental suites.14. Violation of building Bylaws or rules can result in fines, reporting to appropriate authorities, or eviction from Colours by Battistella In the event of any breach of the above Rules and Policies, any of the following actions listed below may be applied:FINE SCHEDULE• Noise Complaint – $500.00 fine.• Exclusive Space - $500.00 fine.• Illegal Garbage Disposal - $500.00 fine.• Please refer to Colours by Battistella Bylaws for a list of all offences.Registration DetailsBL268401
reviews: I had a wonderful stay! Lenovo was a great host — very friendly, helpful, and responsive. The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. The environment was peaceful and well-maintained, which made my stay even more enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place and would love to come back again!

One of the best airbnbs we have had the pleasure to stay in. Gorgeous views and exceptionally clean. Location is amazing, and the building itself is very quiet. Best host ever! Very helpful and responsive. Would definitely stay again.

Had a great stay in Alex‘s condo.  It was nice, clean and cozy with big windows.  It’s in an excellent location with first street market across the road. Everything you’re hungry for breakfast lunch or dinner. There’s also lots of other restaurants nearby and easy to walk anywhere you want to go.

This is a beautiful apartment, and larger than I expected. Walkable to downtown, and right beside some great spots to eat.  I made a mistake with my checkout date, which caused Alex the host some inconvenience for sure, but he was very gracious about it.

Alex was a great host, going above and beyond, even accommodating some special requests. It was our wedding anniversary trip and he made it special for us.
The place was well worth the price we paid, and then some - centrally located, near many good restaurants, coffee, pastry, Calgary Tower, parks, etc. We really like the security system, providing safe access to the building, unit, and parking garage.
I great place to stay when planning a trip to Banff as well. I highly recommend it!
Alex’s place was beautiful, clean, and very well equipped! It was a seamless check in / check out, and the place had everything you could need. I’d stay there again in a heartbeat.

Really nice and efficient apartment. Super clean and private. It was easy to access and it was outfitted with everything I needed. The garage parking stalls were really tight. Stampede festivities in the neighborhood made it difficult to sleep. It was awfully loud up to about 3 am. Alex kindly got me into the apartment early which was appreciated

Beautiful view you will not regret staying here even if it’s just to sit and stare at that amazing view! This place is pristine! Very clean and welcoming! It’s very central so you can get anywhere in the city without trouble! Alex was great with communication and made this experience amazing!  Would love to stay here again! Would be PERFECT for the stampede( we got to see the fireworks right from the couch)
Incredible find in the heart of Calgary. The place is perfect with amazing views of the city and totally walkable to do many restaurants and bars. Alex was friendly and responsive. Loved it!

I had a very nice stay at Alex's Airbnb. The location is great for exploring Calgary on foot and allows you to keep your car in a safe and free parking lot in the building. The apartment was very modern and clean, and Alex's instructions were easy to follow.

This place was amazing! Great location, gorgeous apartment and walking distance from many things. Very clear and detailed instructions on how to get into the apartment and parking space. Very helpful. Definitely recommend!
Ideal place to stay while in Calgary. Beautiful space with every thoughtful detail included. Love having the food market across the street. We highly recommend Alex as a host!
Thank you Alex for providing this beautiful and clean space for my stay during Stampede. It is in the heart of all the business of Stampede which was perfect. I will definitely stay here again!

Wonderful stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Great location and smooth check-in.And easy access to public transit which helpful for banff, canmore trip..!
Highly recommend!

We stayed at Alex's while attending a conference. Great location! Close to great restaurants. Walkable to the conference center. Parking was easy. Condo amenities were perfect for us. I would definitely want to stay here again.

Wonderful condo in a great location. Restaurants and pubs acrossthe road. Close enough to walk into Downtown and Stephens Ave pubs and restaurants and shops. Very comfortable bed,well equipped kitchen and great shower, bathroom.

What a view, and felt right at home! We had a car rental so it was nice being able to leave the car in the garage, and walk around downtown area. Bed was comfy. Spacious home. Perfect for two traveling. Also, Alex provides clear instructions and is very responsive! Highly recommend!

Had a great stay! The location is close to everything and there is lots to do. The apartment was clean and it’s clear of clutter. The views are amazing. Alex is an amazing host, fast responses and very accommodating! Well worth it and would highly recommend

it all started well. I arrived early so got to check in personally with Alex. he was very welcome and explained everything.
the rest of the stay went smoothly form there.
I'll definitely aim to stay here again on future trips.
The place had an amazing view and close to so many amenities. The check-in process was easy and well-communicated as well!
AMAZING place to stay! Felt very high end. Gorgeous view from the 11th floor. The bed was so comfy! The whole place was amazing. Was flexible with check-in time!
The building is in a great location, very walkable to downtown and restaurants. The unit was beautiful, bright, and spotlessly clean. Highly recommended!
This experience was exactly as advertised…modern/clean condo located in a vibrant section of the downtown core with great views…no complaints at all!
Alex is a great host.  Place is well furnished and a great location.
