location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: • 10 minutes to walk to Stampede area and Calgary Flames Saddledome  • Rent an e-scooter and explore theEast Village and Calgary’s riverwalkthat follows the Bow River as part ofa pathway system that extends over900 kilometres throughout Calgary.• Take in one of the many festivals andevents during the summer months atPrince’s Island Park and other areas ofCalgary.• Visit one of Calgary’s many top-ratedattractions such as:- Heritage Park, one of North America’slargest and most successful livinghistory museums.- National Music Centre featuring the Bell Stage and the King Eddy bar and music venue.- Glenbow Museum featuring Mavericks: An Incorrigible History of Alberta and numerous other permanentand temporary exhibits.- TELUS Spark Science Centre.- Calgary’s newest and burgeoning industry, microbreweries and brew pubs are located throughout Calgaryoffering award-winning beers in unique settings.- Walk and shop along Stephen Ave and 17th Avenue S.W., then stop to savour one of Calgary’s many greatrestaurants and bars.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Downtown Calgary, Stampede area,  Stephen Ave and 17th Avenue S.W, Prince’s Island Park, National Music Centre,   pathway system are at walking distance from condo location.  It will take 15-20 min to walk to any of those wonderful and most popular places in Calgary.

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: You are welcomed by the spacious open living room. complimented by floor to ceiling windows and flooded with sunlight.  Turn on the 55" UHD 4k Smart TV to Roku, YouTube and others popular channels. Feel free to connect your iPhone, Android  to Smart TV using casting technologies and see/listen your favourite streams on TV.A frosted glass sliding partition creates separation for the master bedroom. It ensures optimal open concept living.In suite laundry and washer are available. We also offer underground parking stall and bike storage.

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: Entire space plus building amenities is included in this rental. Please, make yourself at home.

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: Colours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. Upon arrival the host willprovide you introduction to the building, bylaw and specific rules for Airbnb guests. Condo bylaws rules1. Upon arrival at Colours by Battistella, you must complete a “Tenant Undertaking Form” which provides management company (Equium Group) with basic contact information for emergency purposes and ensure that you have acknowledged that you understand and will comply with the Bylaws and standards of our community. 2. Our building is professionally managed by Equium Group. They will dispatch maintenance staff in the event of any emergency building-related service issues such as flooding, however they will not provide any additional services related to your  stay or your suite. Please contact your rental owner for any suite-related issues you may have.3. If your suite has any building-related service issues such as lack of hot or cold running water, water leaks, or lack of heat or air conditioning, these may be reported or by calling rental owner or Equium’s after-hours.4. You are responsible to help always maintain the security of our building by safekeeping your keys, and by not letting unknown people or vehicles follow you through doors into the building at any time. 5. As per City of Calgary Bylaws, no more than two guests per bedroom are allowed in your rental suite at any time. Inviting additional guests or visitors, hosting parties or any other social gatherings, is always prohibited.6. City Bylaws require observation of quiet time from 10:00 pm to 7:00 am weekdays and from 10:00 pm to 9:00 am on weekends, and building Bylaws restrict excessive noise that may disturb other residents at any time of the day.7. Use of units for activities which are illegal or that will be injurious to the reputation of the building are strictly prohibited.8. Smoking or vaping of tobacco or cannabis products is prohibited in all interior areas of the building including residential suites, hallways, elevators, parking areas, lobbies and all exterior areas always. Permission to smoke of tobacco products (and for clarity, not cannabis) on your balcony is at the discretion of your suite owner, provided they are following building bylaws.9. No cigarette butts, waste material or any other objects may be disposed of or thrown from your balcony at any time, as they can cause extreme danger from heights. Violations can result in City of Calgary Bylaw fines of up to $10,000 and/or criminal prosecution.10. Waste disposal, recycling and compost bins are available in the garbage room. All waste disposals must be in these areas, disposed of in well-tied, leak-proof bags or similar. No personal belongings or waste can be left in the common hallways outside your suite at any time.11. No signs, banners, laundry or any other objects may be hung or displayed from windows or balconies at any time.12. Exterior windows and balcony doors must remain closed in extreme cold weather conditions to prevent freezing of water lines or other damage to the building. You shall obey any rules made or posted by the Condominium Board regarding the use and care of the building, and any parking lot, balconies or common areas. Do not turn the thermostats in the unit to the “off” position. The interior unit temperature cannot be set below 15 degrees Celsius.13. Pets are not allowed in units which operate as short-term rental suites.14. Violation of building Bylaws or rules can result in fines, reporting to appropriate authorities, or eviction from Colours by Battistella In the event of any breach of the above Rules and Policies, any of the following actions listed below may be applied:FINE SCHEDULE• Noise Complaint – $500.00 fine.• Exclusive Space - $500.00 fine.• Illegal Garbage Disposal - $500.00 fine.• Please refer to Colours by Battistella Bylaws for a list of all offences.

reviews_details.review: I had a wonderful stay! Lenovo was a great host — very friendly, helpful, and responsive. The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. The environment was peaceful and well-maintained, which made my stay even more enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place and would love to come back again!

One of the best airbnbs we have had the pleasure to stay in. Gorgeous views and exceptionally clean. Location is amazing, and the building itself is very quiet. Best host ever! Very helpful and responsive. Would definitely stay again.

Had a great stay in Alex‘s condo.  It was nice, clean and cozy with big windows.  It’s in an excellent location with first street market across the road. Everything you’re hungry for breakfast lunch or dinner. There’s also lots of other restaurants nearby and easy to walk anywhere you want to go.

This is a beautiful apartment, and larger than I expected. Walkable to downtown, and right beside some great spots to eat.  I made a mistake with my checkout date, which caused Alex the host some inconvenience for sure, but he was very gracious about it.

Alex was a great host, going above and beyond, even accommodating some special requests. It was our wedding anniversary trip and he made it special for us.
The place was well worth the price we paid, and then some - centrally located, near many good restaurants, coffee, pastry, Calgary Tower, parks, etc. We really like the security system, providing safe access to the building, unit, and parking garage.
I great place to stay when planning a trip to Banff as well. I highly recommend it!
Alex’s place was beautiful, clean, and very well equipped! It was a seamless check in / check out, and the place had everything you could need. I’d stay there again in a heartbeat.

Really nice and efficient apartment. Super clean and private. It was easy to access and it was outfitted with everything I needed. The garage parking stalls were really tight. Stampede festivities in the neighborhood made it difficult to sleep. It was awfully loud up to about 3 am. Alex kindly got me into the apartment early which was appreciated
reviews_details.host_response: Not sure what kind of noise and where you heard it. The unit has a noise detector and it shows the noise level was less than 45 db during the night on July 10-July 11,  so this is a lie. Moreover, all Stampede activity ends at 11.30 pm.  You also should know If anybody makes a noise after 11 pm you can call police or you can just notify me and I will the rest. The parking spot matches the standard size approved  by city. My guests sometimes parks big tracks there and you are the first guest who complained on it. I am just wondering what kind of vehicle you tried to park there

reviews_details.review: Beautiful view you will not regret staying here even if it’s just to sit and stare at that amazing view! This place is pristine! Very clean and welcoming! It’s very central so you can get anywhere in the city without trouble! Alex was great with communication and made this experience amazing!  Would love to stay here again! Would be PERFECT for the stampede( we got to see the fireworks right from the couch)
Incredible find in the heart of Calgary. The place is perfect with amazing views of the city and totally walkable to do many restaurants and bars. Alex was friendly and responsive. Loved it!

I had a very nice stay at Alex's Airbnb. The location is great for exploring Calgary on foot and allows you to keep your car in a safe and free parking lot in the building. The apartment was very modern and clean, and Alex's instructions were easy to follow.

This place was amazing! Great location, gorgeous apartment and walking distance from many things. Very clear and detailed instructions on how to get into the apartment and parking space. Very helpful. Definitely recommend!
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you Stephanie very much! You were a great guest and we will be glad to see you again!

reviews_details.review: Ideal place to stay while in Calgary. Beautiful space with every thoughtful detail included. Love having the food market across the street. We highly recommend Alex as a host!
Thank you Alex for providing this beautiful and clean space for my stay during Stampede. It is in the heart of all the business of Stampede which was perfect. I will definitely stay here again!

Wonderful stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Great location and smooth check-in.And easy access to public transit which helpful for banff, canmore trip..!
Highly recommend!

We stayed at Alex's while attending a conference. Great location! Close to great restaurants. Walkable to the conference center. Parking was easy. Condo amenities were perfect for us. I would definitely want to stay here again.

Wonderful condo in a great location. Restaurants and pubs acrossthe road. Close enough to walk into Downtown and Stephens Ave pubs and restaurants and shops. Very comfortable bed,well equipped kitchen and great shower, bathroom.

What a view, and felt right at home! We had a car rental so it was nice being able to leave the car in the garage, and walk around downtown area. Bed was comfy. Spacious home. Perfect for two traveling. Also, Alex provides clear instructions and is very responsive! Highly recommend!

Had a great stay! The location is close to everything and there is lots to do. The apartment was clean and it’s clear of clutter. The views are amazing. Alex is an amazing host, fast responses and very accommodating! Well worth it and would highly recommend

it all started well. I arrived early so got to check in personally with Alex. he was very welcome and explained everything.
the rest of the stay went smoothly form there.
I'll definitely aim to stay here again on future trips.
The place had an amazing view and close to so many amenities. The check-in process was easy and well-communicated as well!
AMAZING place to stay! Felt very high end. Gorgeous view from the 11th floor. The bed was so comfy! The whole place was amazing. Was flexible with check-in time!
The building is in a great location, very walkable to downtown and restaurants. The unit was beautiful, bright, and spotlessly clean. Highly recommended!
This experience was exactly as advertised…modern/clean condo located in a vibrant section of the downtown core with great views…no complaints at all!
Alex is a great host.  Place is well furnished and a great location.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.76 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to Skyline Loft—your downtown Calgary retreat! This modern 2-bedroom apartment sleeps 6 comfortably, with a cozy second bedroom, a spacious primary room, and a pull-out couch. Soak in stunning city views through the expansive windows, and enjoy the charm of sleek concrete floors. Located in the heart of the city, you're just minutes from the Stampede grounds, top restaurants, and attractions. Experience the best location Calgary has to offer with unbeatable urban convenience!The space- Kitchen:   - Stainless steel appliances  - Includes a dishwasher, fridge/freezer, Keurig coffee maker, tea kettle, toaster, bakeware, and cookware  - Spacious granite countertops  - Dining Area:   - Dining table with seating for 4  - Office Nook:   - Small office space located behind sliding glass doors  - Features a desk, chair, and lamp  - Living Room:   - 50" TV with access to Netflix and YouTube  - High-speed Wi-Fi internet  - Pull-out sofa bed that comfortably sleeps 2  - Large windows  - Extra linens provided  - Games available: Uno and Jenga  - Master Bedroom:   - Window with light-filtering shades  - Queen-sized bed  - Closet with storage space  - Extra linens and sheets provided  - Secondary Bedroom:   - Small room with no windows  - Queen-sized bed  - Side table with a drawer and lamp  - Closet with storage  - Bathroom:   - Includes a tub, shower, toilet, and sink  - Bathroom amenities: shampoo, conditioner, body wash  - Laundry:   - Washer and dryer  - Laundry detergent provided  - Iron and ironing board availableRegistration DetailsBL285582
reviews: This is a great place.   We enjoyed our stay. The view of the Calgary Tower at night was wonderful.  Great walking distance for local attractions, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Easy to access by car or Uber.  Condo was clean and comfortable.

Hosts were very responsive to messages. The place was clean and comfortable. It looked as advertised and location seemed good! Always a bonus to have a dedicated parking spot available as street parking in the area looked very busy, so was thankful for that.

Amazing stay! Right in the heart of downtown —walking distance to everything. The condo was spotless, modern, and so comfortable. The hosts were fantastic and made everything effortless. We can’t wait to come back!

The place has an excellent location and communication with the host is very good. They were always attentive and ready to answer my questions.
Something to keep in mind: if, for any reason, you arrive after 11 PM, there’s a $50 fee for late check-in. So if you have a night flight, consider this, as check-in is not 100% self-service.

We had a wonderful stay, everything looked the same as in the photos and we enjoyed the amazing view. The place was clean and has all the necessities. The location is convenient as it is in the heart of downtown Calgary, with lots of restaurants around.
The hosts were very clear in providing instructions and very responsive. Will definitely stay here again next time.

The location is great. Not too far and not too close from upper downtown where we spent most of our time.
However, with the windows closed, it is really calm in the apartment.
On the opposite side, the entrance door is not soundproof and if your neighbors do not respect the building rules in the middle of the night, you'll hear them!
Everything was as described and even better than expected. But there is one thing that could be annoying for people sleeping on the convertible sofa or in the primary bedroom: there are filtering curtains in the bedroom and in the living room except on the balcony glass door. Since the primary bedroom sliding doors are made of frosted glass, it lets light through somehow.
Overall, the stay was good.

The only thing I didn't like was the check in, as I arrived in the early hours of the morning because my flight was delayed. There should be something easier to access, regardless of the time you arrive. I paid $50 for this. Other than that, everything is ok.
Overall our stay was good. The apartment was very clean & had a nice layout. To enhance people’s stays they could definitely clean & add furniture to the balcony for summer the months.
Great location. This Airbnb had everything that was stated in listing. The AC would not cool to set temperature. So it got uncomfortably hot at times. Overall cute clean nice apartment.

We had an absolutely delightful stay. The property looked exactly like the photos—no surprises—and the stunning view made our experience even more enjoyable.
The location couldn’t have been better—it’s right in the heart of downtown Calgary, surrounded by a wide variety of restaurants and attractions, making it incredibly convenient for getting around and exploring the city.
The hosts were excellent—communication was clear and timely from start to finish. I’m already looking forward to staying here again the next time I’m in Calgary.
Excellent location, clean, nice decor and very responsive hosts. Would definitely stay here again!
Place is clean and location is good. Late night check in is a bit tricky. Second bedroom does not have window. Otherwise it is good.
Too much dust everywhere, it’s supposed to be 6 person max. But couch bed not okay for 2 people’s. But there is extra pillow & bed sheets was available

I had a great stay at this Airbnb! The check-in process was seamless and super easy, which made everything stress-free from the start. The location was great—close to restaurants and walking distance to downtown.  The view from the place was absolutely stunning! There was no iron or ironing board but when I requested one they were quick to provide it. Great stay, highly recommend!

I had an amazing stay at this beautiful downtown Airbnb! The downtown view was absolutely stunning, and the location made it easy to explore nearby restaurants and attractions. The hosts were responsive and thoughtful, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable experience. I would definitely stay here again!

Fantastic downtown location with easy access to everything. The unit was clean, well-stocked, and fully functional, except for the clothes dryer. Unfortunately, despite two repair attempts during my stay, it still didn’t work properly. While the hosts were responsive when contacted, the issue remained unresolved. Overall, a decent stay with some room for improvement.
Amazing place, great location, hosts were very good at communicating. Would definitely stay here again!
Everything was excellent.. My only comment is that you only have two beds and the third bed is a sofa.. Sometimes we don't agree on who will sleep on the sofa

Positives: Excellent location, clean, convenient parking, communicative hosts
Negatives: AC does not work well, polyester sheets feel quite cheap
We enjoyed our stay at this apartment! The location is great, the unit is clean and comfortable, with a nice view!
Really friendly and quick to respond, was In a great location for what we needed while at the stampede, would definitely go back !!!
Thank you for a great stay! The location is unbeatable - close to all the best restaurants, shops and the stampede. The place was clean and modern. Thanks again!
Beautiful, clean place and incredibly conveniently located. Great and communicative hosts. I would easily stay here again.

We were here for four nights on our first trip to Calgary! The location couldn’t be better, it’s very clean and they have thought of everything. The coffee and creamers were especially appreciated! Would stay again and recommend this unit to anyone wanting to visit Calgary!

reviews_details.review: The only thing I didn't like was the check in, as I arrived in the early hours of the morning because my flight was delayed. There should be something easier to access, regardless of the time you arrive. I paid $50 for this. Other than that, everything is ok.

Regarding early-morning check-ins, we ask for a set check-in time because our cleaners need adequate time to thoroughly clean and prepare the unit after the previous guest. We completely understand how this can be inconvenient with delayed flights and appreciate your suggestion about making check-in easier in the future. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again under smoother circumstances.

Hi Marissa,
Thank you for your feedback! We’re glad you enjoyed the cleanliness and layout of the apartment. We also appreciate your suggestion regarding the balcony—we’ll take this into consideration to make future stays even more enjoyable. We’d be happy to host you again anytime!

reviews_details.review: Great location. This Airbnb had everything that was stated in listing. The AC would not cool to set temperature. So it got uncomfortably hot at times. Overall cute clean nice apartment.

Hi Catalina,
Thank you for your honest feedback and for staying with us. We’re glad you found the location great and the apartment clean and well-equipped. We’re sorry to hear about the AC issue during your stay—this issue is now resolved for future guests. We wish you had let us know during your stay so we could have addressed it right away, but no worries, we checked and fixed it promptly. We appreciate you bringing it to our attention and hope to host you again!

Hi Susan,
Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed your first trip to Calgary and appreciated the little touches like the coffee and creamers. We’d be delighted to host you again anytime and truly appreciate your recommendation!

name: Rental unit in Calgary · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
description: Experience urban elegance in this stylish 1-bedroom downtown Calgary apartment. It features a cozy queen bed, two twin beds in the living area, and a private balcony with BBQ and city views. Enjoy building amenities like a pool, gym, and co-working space. Steps from the C-Train, supermarkets, Calgary Tower, and Stampede events, this warm and convenient retreat is perfect for families or guests—no car needed.Registration DetailsBL294110
reviews: The place was beautiful and always had a view of the sunset

The apartment corresponds exactly to the photos, and seems to be newly furnished. The decor is immaculate and as advertised. We were very pleased with little things, such as spices, cooking utensils, dishwashing and laundry detergent. The existing washing machine and dryer are also a luxury. There are also towels, spare linens and toiletries. Everything is lovingly arranged and decorated.
The apartment is one street south of downtown and the train tracks, so all downtown attractions and public transport are within walking distance.
The three of us lived in the apartment, the space was sufficient, but you had to juggle a bit and keep things in order so that you could move. Wardrobes are available, but only equipped with clothes rails, so you can't store wardrobe and other things well.
Supermarkets are within walking distance and the view is great!

description_by_sections.value: Experience urban elegance in this stylish 1-bedroom downtown Calgary apartment. Steps from the C-Train, supermarkets, Calgary Tower, and Stampede events, this warm and convenient retreat is perfect for families or guests—no car needed.

reviews_details.review: The place was beautiful and always had a view of the sunset

Die Wohnung entspricht exakt den Fotos, und scheint neu eingerichtet zu sein. Die Einrichtung ist makellos und entspricht der Beschreibung. Wir haben uns sehr über Kleinigkeiten gefreut, wie zur Verfügung gestellte Gewürze, Kochutensilien, Spül- und Waschmittel. Auch die virhandene Waschmaschine und der Trockner sind ein Luxus. Dazu kommen Handtücher, Ersatzbettwäsche und Badartikel. Alles ist liebevoll arrangiert und dekoriert.
Die Wohnung liegt eine Straße südlich der Downtown und der Bahnschienen, sodass alle Sehenswürdigkeiten und öffentliche Verkehrsmittel der Innenstadt einfach zu Fuß zu erreichen sind.
Wir haben zu dritt in der Wohnung gewohnt, der Platz war zwar ausreichend, aber man musste schon etwas jonglieren und Ordnung halten, damit man sich bewegen kann. Kleiderschränke sind zwar vorhanden, aber nur mit Kleiderstangen ausgestattet, sodass man Garderobe und anderes nicht gut verstauen kann.
Supermärkte sind in der Nähe fussläufig erreichbar und die Aussicht super!

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.91 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our bright, south-facing condo in downtown! Take advantage of complimentary underground parking and stay cool with the newly installed ductless AC during those hot summer days. You’ll be just a short walk from the famous Calgary Stampede, the lively 17th Avenue, and the shops and restaurants of 4th Street, as well as the Elbow River and the Saddledome!The spaceConveniently located near 17th Avenue, 4th Street, and the Elbow River, this unit offers easy access to some of Calgary's best attractions.Key Features:Soaring 9-foot ceilingsBright, south-facing unitSecond floorElevator accessQueen sofa bed for additional sleeping spaceFREE underground parkingPrivate patio for relaxationSpacious and well-designed layoutNewly installed ductless air conditioningAccommodates up to 4 guestsHigh-speed internet accessTwo 55” Smart TVsKeurig coffee maker with complimentary coffeeWasher and dryer with free detergent and dryer sheetsFresh linens providedLarge, fully stocked kitchenComplimentary shampoo, conditioner, and body washHairdryer availableSoft, plush towelsNearby Attractions:Elbow RiverStampede GroundsLindsay ParkMNP Recreation CentreRestaurants and bars along 4th Street and 17th AvenueSaddledomeLilac Festival (every June)Guest accessEntire home to yourselfOther things to noteUnderground parking included 6'6 heightRegistration DetailsBL270129
reviews:
Paul was a super responsive and friendly host. Very accommodating.
The place itself was perfect for what we needed. Very much walkable into the city centre whilst being out of the way enough to be quiet through the night.
Had all the amenities listed and everything was easy to use and worked as it should.
Would totally recommend :) Thank you!

We had a wonderful stay! The apartment was very clean, spacious, and comfortable. The location was perfect — there were plenty of great restaurants within walking distance, and every place we tried was delicious. We only wish we had more time to explore even more of the neighborhood. Overall, a fantastic place to stay, and we’d definitely book again!

This was a fantastic stay in a great unit. The location was central, with lots of nearby amenities, convenience, and ability to quickly make your way around Calgary.  The unit was as described, bright, airy and very well stocked for the whole length of our stay.

Perfect place for our stay in Calgary. Very easy to walk to downtown but also to go for walks in the park and along the water. Accommodation was exactly as expected from photos and had everything we needed for our stay including a washer and dryer.
Paul was always quick to respond to any questions we had ahead of our stay and was very accommodating in response to a few requests we had. Would definitely recommend!

Paul’s place was the perfect landing pad for a couple nights in Calgary! It’s a quiet and peaceful building on a pretty chill residential street close to the river, yet so close to food, shopping, Sled Island venues, groceries, etc. Paul was a very friendly and responsive host, and the space had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. We would definitely recommend and would book again!

Not exactly sound proof: walking noises from upstairs and traffic is a bit loud in the evening.
Fan is making noises.
It may be due to construction, the unit is a bit dusty.
Not enough supplies such as detergent.
Washing/drying machines need servicing. A lot of lint left on clothing after washing/drying.

Paul’s place was a homely & perfect apartment for us to relax in & to access greater Calgary.
It has everything one needs & the bed was very comfortable.
We had a little difficulty in accessing the property via the instructions but Paul was ready on hand to help us.
Thank you Paul for a lovely stay.

We have stayed in Airbnbs all over the world and this was one of our all-time favourites. A few things stood out: 1. You can’t beat the location. Mission is very close to downtown Calgary and walkable to the river, a fantastic fitness facility and many excellent restaurants and cafes. 2. The apartment itself is very clean, quiet, and well-appointed. It’s such a treat to arrive and discover a place has everything you need for a comfortable stay - coffee, shampoo, laundry detergent etc.. 3. A comfy bed and a great shower! 4. Responsive hosts. They literally reply to questions in minutes.
We have family in Calgary so will definitely stay again. Hopefully longer next time!

Location. Location. Location. This place was perfect for our trip. Nice and safe neighborhood. Walkable and near plenty to do. Paul was very responsive. Parking is tight in the garage but was very valuable to have.

Came to Paul’s Airbnb for a wedding and it was exactly what we needed. We had some questions and the host was very responsive and helpful. The place has everything you need and things are thoughtfully placed exactly where you would expect them. 10/10 would recommend !
Place was SPOTLESS and had everything we needed for our visit. Paul responded quickly to a few questions. Would definitely stay here on our next visit.
This is a spacious, peaceful apartment, just steps from tons of shops, cafes, and river paths.  It’s an easy walk to downtown, too. Paul is helpful and responsive.
My wife and I loved Paul's place! One of the best in Calgary so far. Spacious, nicely appointed, great kitchen, well designed space.
Check-in was smooth and well-instructed, and Paul’s communication was clear and polite. The hospitality was excellent and greatly appreciated.

This is a wonderful apartment in a nice building with everything you expect from the listing , only it’s even in more spacious and comfortable.
Great location very walkable.
Paul is the most responsive Airbnb host I’ve ever had!
It’s a gem and we’ll definitely be back when we are next in Calgary.
PS the Mission neighbourhood is very nice and very close to the Calgary Stampede grounds!

This was a very lovely condo and was extremely clean and tidy.  There was lots of extra bedding for the pullout couch and we even discovered that there were 3 different types of pillows depending on your preference.  It is in a very walkable neighbourhood with lots of shops and restaurants nearby.  We will definitely stay here again!

We enjoyed our stay at Paul’s place! The location was fantastic, and the place was exactly as described. It was very comfortable, and had a pretty well stocked kitchen so we were able to prepare a lot of our meals. Paul was very welcoming, left great instructions and was super responsive. Secure underground parking was a bonus. The building was quiet as well. Zero complaints and would definitely recommend!
We enjoyed our stay.  Paul was very responsive.  There was a problem with the parking spot and it was resolved quickly. The place was clean and had all necessities.
The place was immaculate and spacious and in a great location. Paul was communicative and helpful. Very much enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend this place!
Great spot, close to everything you’d need, super comfortable bed, clean and cozy. Would definitely stay again
We had a great stay! Love the location, and Paul is an excellent host. We’d happily stay again.

Paul’s place was everything we could have asked for and more ! He was very responsive and helpful. Great walking distance to many restaurants and the saddledome. Highly recommended and can’t wait to come back, hopefully soon!
The apartment was spotless and well-appointed. It’s within walking distance of numerous amenities including the Saddledome, cafes, and lots of restaurants. I would definitely stay here again!

An absolute gem! The place was spotless, stylish, and equipped with everything we needed. Paul was incredibly welcoming and responsive, making our stay effortless. Perfect location and cozy vibes – we’ll definitely be back!

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.68 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: This cozy and inviting condo features a spacious balcony with epic views of downtown. It comfortably accommodates  two guests but we can host up to three guests thanks to a pull-out couch. It boasts a prime location just off the vibrant 17th avenue, steps away from shopping, entertainment, nightlife, parks, transit, sports venues, and urgent care. **NOTE: The condo has recently had a fresh coat of paint and the art’s come down, but it still wraps you up in cozy vibes like a favorite sweater <3The spaceWhile small, the suite has a dedicated bedroom with a queen bed, and a pullout  couch in the living room. The entire unit would be yours for your stay, you do not share with other guests.Guest accessKeys and Access fob will be given upon check-inOther things to notePlenty of free street parking nearby. The Sheldon Chumir Urgent Care Centre is just a 5-minute walk away, as is Safeway for your grocery needs. You’ll also find a pharmacy and liquor store right across the street, along with a great selection of cafes and restaurants just around the corner. Overall, it’s a fantastic location for an inner city Calgary experience. If you’re visiting during Stampede, you can’t beat the location; walking distance to the grounds!Registration DetailsBL260632
reviews: Great location, great space. the furniture could use some updating but minor in the grand scheme of things. everything is very walkable, parking isn't too difficult to manage. I would absolutely stay here again. All the best!

Overall great experience! The condo was clean and homey. Very convenient location with lots of restaurants and bars around. A grocery store being walkable distance is also a huge plus. Had to park my car on the street but finding a spot wasn't too bad.

Torie and Tyler were super flexible with our plans. They responded quite quickly to any questions we had. Their place is walkable to a lot of amenities and funky restaurants. Street was quiet. Would definitely stay here again!
We had a great stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. The host was responsive, which made everything smooth. Perfect for a short trip. Would definitely book again!
Great place 👌🏾 Torie and Tyler  communicated well. Despite not being able to enjoy the area its in an excellent area for dining, walking and enjoying the 17 Ave vibe! Thank you 😊

Super convenient location and the condo was the perfect meet between everything you could have needed and the perfect amount of space!! Torie and Tyler were ever so accommodating. I really enjoyed my stay, thank you
Tone of voice host used was not professional. Location is good. Parking is fine but has handicap sign. Wasn’t sure if it was correct to park there. Nails popping out on table. No A/C.
Great location and perfect size. I’ll be staying there again whenever I’m back in the area. Very happy with everything.
Great place! Very clean, close to a lot of activities and restaurants but still in a quiet street.

Extremely clean and great view from the balcony!
I’ll definitely book again the location was amazing and the apartment has everything I’ll ever need
Great price for location. Check-in time of 5pm was a little abnormal but we made it work. Clean space and great balcony view.

easy check in instructions and very responsive! the apartment has a great view! plus the parking lot makes everything easier!
totally recommend!

Okay location- somewhat convenient. Apartment walls and doors were dirty, sofa bed was broken and uncomfortable. Parking was a nightmare, check-in and out was complicated. Host had their notifications silenced so we had to wait a bit for getting checked in, and they weren’t great with their response times. I don’t think I’d stay here again.
Great Apt close to 17th Ave and very walkable. Bed was comfortable and the place was spotless clean
Beautiful place, lovely interior. Torie and Tyler were amazing hosts and so responsive and flexible! recommend this place to everyone!

In the heart of the city.
Highly recommended!!
Comfortable and very clean place.
Beautiful views from the balcony.
Very nice location.
A wonderful spot to stay if you want to feel connected to the big Calgary city life. Comfy bed, warm shower and amazing restaurants nearby.
Tori and Tyler’s place was an absolute gem of a place. It was very clean and was just as pictured. They were super reliable and responsive and I would love to stay here again!

Our stay at Torie and Tyler’s place was fantastic! The space was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The hosts were super responsive, went out of their way to accommodate our schedule, and made check-in a breeze. The location was perfect for exploring Calgary. I’d definitely book again!

Clean, affordable, and very easy check in, not to mention it being smack dab in a beautiful location. Absolutely loved the cute cozy interior even though i wasnt there for very long, the place had everything youd need and it comes with a great view. Holing to visit again if im in calgary.

Beautiful high-end kitchen with all the amenities. Super clean. Stayed here one night with my son, and the neighborhood was filled with great restaurants and walkable. The hosts were really helpful with recommendations and considerations, and very friendly and responsive.
Only thing I would say is that I would recommend leaving any large suitcases in the car as there is not much space to move around inside the unit with all the decorations. not much space to move around in the kitchen once the chairs are placed around the table. No noise at all and a phenomenal view.
Great place, excellent location. Only stayed 1 night but came away very relaxed. Had a nice bath in their soaker tub, and enjoyed the beautiful view of the city lights. Thanks again!

Nice place, fantastic location with lots of nice bars and cafes nearby. Only thing was there are no blinds over the balcony door, so you will get a ton of sunshine in the morning, which could be an issue if you're a light sleeper.

We had such a wonderful time at your Airbnb! It was cute, comfortable, had everything we needed, and was in a great location. Thank you SO much!
The reviews about the place being small are a bit overblown. It’s a studio apartment and has everything you’d need. It’s far better than a hotel.
The other reviews about the check-in time seem strange. We found the host accommodating and friendly. They were clear about their check-in and check-out times. As a night owl it was perfect to have such a late check-out time.

listing_title: Tiny & Charming, Heart of 17th
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: 17th Avenue is a very desirable area of Calgary with an abundance of shops, cafés and entertainment nearby. Our condo is a  10 minute walk to  the downtown core and Stephen's Ave, where there is an upscale mall (with Holt Renfrew) and plenty of dining. The C-train, Stampede grounds and MNP Sports Centre are also a 10-15 minute walk.  Additionally, there are a variety of parks and river pathways in the area. Eau Claire Market and Prince's Island Park are about a 35 minute walk north, which is a gorgeous area to wander around in the summer - with shops, dining and a splash park for children to enjoy. The Elbow river is around a 15 minute walk south and is great for its running pathways, parks, outdoor pool, BBQ pits and rafting during summer months.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: The C-train is a 10 minute walk away, and all stops in the downtown core are free. Uber, Taxi's, buses can also be found along 17th avenue.

reviews_details.host_response:
Hi Tae,
Our message clearly states to please contact us as soon as there’s an issue so we can address it promptly. However, we didn’t receive any communication from you, nor did you respond to my follow-up messages.
Given the lack of outreach on your end, it’s unclear how the “tone” could be perceived as unprofessional when there was little to no communication to begin with. A three-star rating seems excessive considering no effort was made to allow us the opportunity to rectify any concerns.
We’re always happy to resolve issues when they’re brought to our attention, and we appreciate honest feedback but it’s most helpful when it comes with dialogue.
Best regards

Great place! Very clean, close to a lot of activities and restaurants but still in a quiet street.

Extremely clean and great view from the balcony!
I’ll definitely book again the location was amazing and the apartment has everything I’ll ever need
Great price for location. Check-in time of 5pm was a little abnormal but we made it work. Clean space and great balcony view.

easy check in instructions and very responsive! the apartment has a great view! plus the parking lot makes everything easier!
totally recommend!

Okay location- somewhat convenient. Apartment walls and doors were dirty, sofa bed was broken and uncomfortable. Parking was a nightmare, check-in and out was complicated. Host had their notifications silenced so we had to wait a bit for getting checked in, and they weren’t great with their response times. I don’t think I’d stay here again.
reviews_details.host_response:
Hi there,
I want to clarify that our notifications were not silenced. We actively chose not to respond because your communication towards us was incredibly rude. Based on our experience, we can confidently say that we would not host you again.
Kindness goes a long way in this world.
All the best.

reviews_details.review: Great Apt close to 17th Ave and very walkable. Bed was comfortable and the place was spotless clean
Beautiful place, lovely interior. Torie and Tyler were amazing hosts and so responsive and flexible! recommend this place to everyone!

In the heart of the city.
Highly recommended!!
Comfortable and very clean place.
Beautiful views from the balcony.
Very nice location.
A wonderful spot to stay if you want to feel connected to the big Calgary city life. Comfy bed, warm shower and amazing restaurants nearby.
Tori and Tyler’s place was an absolute gem of a place. It was very clean and was just as pictured. They were super reliable and responsive and I would love to stay here again!

Our stay at Torie and Tyler’s place was fantastic! The space was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The hosts were super responsive, went out of their way to accommodate our schedule, and made check-in a breeze. The location was perfect for exploring Calgary. I’d definitely book again!

Clean, affordable, and very easy check in, not to mention it being smack dab in a beautiful location. Absolutely loved the cute cozy interior even though i wasnt there for very long, the place had everything youd need and it comes with a great view. Holing to visit again if im in calgary.

Beautiful high-end kitchen with all the amenities. Super clean. Stayed here one night with my son, and the neighborhood was filled with great restaurants and walkable. The hosts were really helpful with recommendations and considerations, and very friendly and responsive.
Only thing I would say is that I would recommend leaving any large suitcases in the car as there is not much space to move around inside the unit with all the decorations. not much space to move around in the kitchen once the chairs are placed around the table. No noise at all and a phenomenal view.
Great place, excellent location. Only stayed 1 night but came away very relaxed. Had a nice bath in their soaker tub, and enjoyed the beautiful view of the city lights. Thanks again!

Nice place, fantastic location with lots of nice bars and cafes nearby. Only thing was there are no blinds over the balcony door, so you will get a ton of sunshine in the morning, which could be an issue if you're a light sleeper.

We had such a wonderful time at your Airbnb! It was cute, comfortable, had everything we needed, and was in a great location. Thank you SO much!
The reviews about the place being small are a bit overblown. It’s a studio apartment and has everything you’d need. It’s far better than a hotel.
The other reviews about the check-in time seem strange. We found the host accommodating and friendly. They were clear about their check-in and check-out times. As a night owl it was perfect to have such a late check-out time.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.94 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our stylish one-bedroom apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of the vibrant Mission community in Calgary. With its central location, you'll find yourself just minutes away from the world-renowned Calgary Stampede and the iconic Saddledome.Portable A/C in unitThe spaceThis modern and thoughtfully designed space is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers looking to experience the best that Calgary has to offer. Step outside and discover the trendy 17th Avenue, known for its lively atmosphere, charming boutiques, and diverse culinary scene. Additionally, the nearby Safeway ensures convenient access to any essentials you may need during your stay.Parking in the city can be a hassle, but worry not! Our apartment comes with the added benefit of underground parking, ensuring a stress-free experience for our guests.Notable features:- High Speed Internet- Sofa Bed- One FREE underground parking stall- Smart TV with FREE Netflix (No cable TV)- Keurig Coffee Machine with complimentary coffee- Washer/Dryer w/complementary detergent and dryer sheets- Fresh Linens- Large Fully Equip Kitchen- Complimentary Shampoo & Body Wash- Hairdryer- Soft towels- Iron & ironing boardID Verification is required for our property.We do not accept arrivals 2 am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time, please refrain from booking. Thank youGuest accessYou will have entire private access to the condo.For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.Registration DetailsBL269584
reviews: Well appointed apartment that in spite of being in proximity to a bustling street scene full of excellent restaurants and pubs, it proved to be exceptionally quiet providing for a restful stay. The kitchen was well stocked and everything was spotless. The hosts were very responsive to any questions I had. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Great apartment in the perfect location to visit Downtown Calgary. Comfortable, clean and well fitted out with everything you could need for your stay. Close to great bars and restaurants it was perfect for us.
5 stars in our books and highly recommended if you are visiting Calgary!
The condo is in ideal location in Mission. Very quiet at night. Kyle and Andrew had good communication, checked up a little bit after check-in to make sure everything was ok in the unit.
Clean and well equipped apartment. Great location easy check in process. Host was very attentive and responsive. Overall a great stay Thank you!
Great place- comfortable and very clean,  and we enjoyed the neighborhood.  We will try to get this unit again when we return to Calgary.

A big appartement next ti everything in a cool neighborhood.
The flat was quite spacious and made us really want to spend more time in it than outside

This is a lovely, clean apartment in a fun part of town.
The Keurig coffee machine wasn’t working and the hosts delivered a new one immediately.
I highly recommend.

This was the perfect place for what I needed. Cozy, clean, and peaceful! It was easy to walk everywhere, great restaurants and events nearby but still felt like a getaway. It's my new home away from home and will be my 'go to' when in Calgary! Thanks Kyle!

Kyle’s and Andrew’s place was exceptional. I was particularly pleased with the location being close to shops and restaurants so it was perfect! It was quiet and peaceful and most importantly a very comfortable sleep - A+  Thank you. I look forward to my next stay

Apt suited the two of us perfectly. Location terrific for getting around city but also for local eats/drinks as other amenities. Owners very helpful and quick to respond. Place well kept , easy and safe parking underground. Perfect short stay spot for enjoying Calgary.
Thank you for much for timely response! Clear instructions! I felt right at home! Comfortable sleep, and spacious counter! Good water pressure in the shower, very good hosts! Def will be back again!
It was awesome stay I enjoyed a lot
Lovely apartment, great location.
Lovely stay with amazing hosts! Would recommend to anyone!
Very convenient location with lots of restaurants nearby. The unit is spacious and exactly as shown in the photo.
Great apartment in a very happening area. I felt safe and comfortable staying there the week remote working. Highly recommend
Loved my experience here! So many great restaurants close by:)
cute place, easy check-in, urban location

Clear Instructions on how to use parking and get into the building. Kyle’s place was very convenient everything that I wanted to see in Calgary was a close walk or drive.
Paid attention to every detail with their amenities and always asked on how to make our stay even better!
Definitely recommend this place and will be coming back if ever in town.

I had an amazing stay, the place was spotless and equipped with everything I needed. The host was incredibly friendly and responsive, making the entire experience smooth and enjoyable. The location was perfect, close to all the local attractions. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay.
Great location!

I visited on a business trip, and it was so comfortable, cozy, and nice. It had everything, so it was easy to use, and the accommodation was clean and well maintained.
The host was quick to respond and provided us with everything we needed. If I ever come back to Calgary I would definitely stay there again. Highly recommend:)
A great place in Calgary, great access to the city, also by public transport. Hosts are always available and provide many instructions so you know what to do and or expect.
we had a really great time in Calgary, this airbnb was exactly like the description, felt very homey and safe. I will definitely be recommending to anyone who comes to Canada.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Top floor apartment with skyline views, full AC, in-suite laundry, private parking — right on 17th Ave. Enjoy a fully renovated space and ultimate comfort in Calgary’s most walkable downtown district.Free 2 vehicle parking on premises.The spaceApartment is located on the top floor of an 8-storey building. You are right on top of the “red mile” and a 10 minute walk from Saddledome and BMO centre!Guest accessGuests can access the building 24/7 with a set of unique entry codes.Other things to noteFull AC in every room of the apartment.Laundry drying machine has a heat pump with no vent - please empty water compartment (top left).Registration DetailsBL293867
reviews:
Serguei was a wonderful host and communicator and went above and beyond to make us feel welcome.
The condo itself is a gem. It's clear that a lot of care goes into maintaining it; everything was pristine and we immediately felt relaxed and comfortable. We enjoyed the awesome view and were so impressed by the beautiful bathroom.
I would 100% recommend this host and the condo to anyone. It was a perfect experience from start to finish.
Overall really good stay, right on the strip lots of bars. Super modern place with a nice design, AC was nice. Fairly priced for what we were getting and Sergei was super responsive.

Serguei is a great host. His place was very clean and very well decorated which makes your stay feel like just at home. He responds to all inquiries very quickly. The place is located in the heart of Calgary. Very close to the best restaurants.
I would recommend this place to everyone.

Listen. Sergueis place is amazing. We were the first to book so it was a little bumpy getting in but he called from out of the country and made sure we got in! Looks just like the photos, amazing smeg appliances. Amazing cabinets too lmao. It was great and so worth it.
Very cool place, super central. We’ll be back!
Host is very nice and helpful had no problems. What so ever would definitely recommend

The place is beautiful and there is a beautiful view.
I’ll recommend a 100%
Place was super clean, enjoyed my stay!
Most beautiful and cozy apartment I’ve stayed in 👍🏽
Amazing place

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.92 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Welcome to Colours by Battistella! Spectacular condo located in the prestigious neighborhood of Beltline, Calgary. This amazing 921 sqft condo (2 Bed+2 Bath) is in a great location just walking distance to shops, restaurants, pubs, parks, cafes, public transportation, 17th Avenue, Stampede grounds, The Saddledome, and its close proximity to the core. With two walls of ceiling to floor windows, you will see spectacular unobstructed downtown views. Relax and enjoy the amazing panoramic views.The spaceLocation Location Location!!. Colours by Battistella building is defined as a landmark in the Victoria Park area. This is because of its spectacular display of architectural exterior that matches with its interior. Whether you are visiting for business or pleasure, Colours by Battistella provides the best short rental destination for you, family and friends. Touring around the beautiful downtown Calgary, exploring 17th Avenue unique shops, or enjoying a memorable nightlife experience, are just some of the main highlights of this airbnb experience.  City Treasure on 13th - This beautiful condo unit offers more than you can imagine. Breathtaking City skylines and a cozy, elegant environment for your enjoyment. Features include polished concrete flooring, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and 9.5 foot ceilings. Sit on your balcony, relax and enjoy the amazing panoramic views. Enjoy the convenience of In-suite laundry and a heated underground parking.Guest accessThis condo is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself and family at home. Please note that all building/condo unit access information will be provided the day of check-in. The guests will also have access to an intimate promenade on the fourth floor, offering a space to connect and relax.Other things to noteColours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. All guests are require to observe and comply with the Host's rules and regulations.  Guests are also required to Agree and Comply with the Condominium Property Act, the bylaws and its rules and regulations of the condominium corporation during the duration of the guests' stay. Rules, bylaws and regulation must be read and agreed by the guests prior to occupancy is authorized. Hard copy will also be available to the guests inside the condo unit.Registration DetailsBL267340
reviews: We stayed with our Family and had a great time. Our daughter is 21 months old and there was a great park across the street for her. It is well located for activities and getting around downtown Calgary.

We had a wonderful stay at Lisbeth’s place. The place is very comfy and nice and was exactly as described. Beautiful view from the 12th floor. Kitchen was stocked with all the essentials. Great communication.

Nice place with very accessible restaurants and amenities.
Central enough that you don’t need a car for the local fare
The accommodation was clean and served the 4 guests well
I will definitely book this again if I return to Calgary

Lisbeth's place in Calgary not only matched, but exceeded my expectations! The views that you will get are just as pictured in the listing. The area is very walkable and the unit was spotless. Will definitely be back!
Lisbeth's place was quiet and very comfortable in a great location. She was a very responsive host and quickly answered all of our questions. We would definitely stay here again!

Amazing location with stunning downtown views!
We had a fantastic stay at Lisbeth’s place. The home is incredibly spacious, with modern furniture and a well-kept interior that made us feel right at home. Lisbeth was an outstanding host attentive, kind, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our stay. The location couldn’t be better: just a short 10-minute walk to Stephen Avenue and downtown, with food and shopping amenities close by. Highly recommended!
Lisbeth was a very gracious host. The apartment was comfortable and easy to access, and Lisbeth was very accessible whenever we had questions.
Lisbeth was an exceptional host with outstanding communication throughout our stay. Thank you, Lisbeth!

Thank you for hosting us, it was a wonderful location with lots of entertainment just at your foot step.
Beautiful views and alot of space for a DT condo.
Great location, beautiful apartment with very nice views of the city. 2 km to Princes Island / Bow river. Great place to run / walk.

This Airbnb is definitely in my top 5 places I’ve stayed. VERY good price for the location and quality of everything. Lisabeth has a very warm and welcoming aura. I will definitely be revisiting! I give her a 10/10, best host I’ve ever met :) 💖
The best condo ive stayed in calgary! Very cozy and not cheaply made. It’s a really nice place with great views! Lots of bars and good restaurants walking distance.
Lisbeth's place is very well located in the city.  Close to great restaurants.  The view is amazing at night with the city lights.
yes we had amazing stay and would definitely recommend
Beautiful place and great location!  Would recommend this place.  Thank you Lisbeth!
Good place to stay. Just note that beds are double it seems. Otherwise, very good.
The condo was beautiful and comfortable.

Great location, super neat and tidy condo. Lisbeth was an excellent host. Super easy to communicate with. Only thing was the AC wasn’t as cold as it should’ve been but then again, we ran into another couple and they mentioned how their AC wasn’t working as well so I think it’s just a building issue that was fully out of her control. Besides that, we had an amazing stay. Would totally come again in the future

Great location, in the heart of Calgary downtown, walkable distance to great restaurants. On top of everything , it has the most amazing views of all airbnb we visited. Lisbeth is amazing and respond pretty much immediately to all of our questions. Highly recommend and will definitely be back next time we visit Calgary. Thanks Lisbeth again!

Lisbeth was a great host.  She was very friendly, responsive, and easy to communicate with.  Home was very clean, nicely decorated, conveniently located to many places to eat & drink, and offered great views of downtown.  I wish i was staying for a longer period of time as this place was perfect for many reasons.

Out of all the air b&b I’ve stayed at this was top #1. She was so helpful in every way possible. Any obstacles I had she helped me around them. My plans changed last minute and she was there to help me. Everything was great, her place was beautiful and made me feel as if it was my own. 10/10 will stay or recommend to stay at her place. 5 stars really isn’t enough for what she did for me.

My second time staying here and like the first time it was absolutely wonderful!! Lisbeth is an amazing host. Always responsive and helpful.
The view of this airbnb is beautiful morning or night. The place is cozy, and fully equipped with everything I needed.
Walking distance from a couple restaurants, market, and subway and pizza place is just outside the building. Great location.
Will definitely visit again!

This place is top notch! It’s definitely worth it and it’s in the heart of the city. The view is remarkable. Lisbeth the host  is very easy to communicate with. It is accessible to restaurants and stores. Me and my partner really enjoyed our stay it’s very cozy! The view is so FANTASTIC! We will definitely come back to this special place 😊❤️ thank you so much for having us! ❤️‍🔥

This is a great place to stay. Really good location. Everything is nearby. Shopping and restaurants. Only about 3 blocks to Calgary tower and mall.
Would definitely like to rent this place again.

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Calgary Beltline Neighborhood"The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park, while nearby Stampede Park is known for the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo"

Please note that all building/condo unit access information will be provided the day of check-in. The guests will also have access to an intimate promenade on the fourth floor, offering a space to connect and relax.

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: Colours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. All guests are require to observe and comply with the Host's rules and regulations.  Guests are also required to Agree and Comply with the Condominium Property Act, the bylaws and its rules and regulations of the condominium corporation during the duration of the guests' stay. Rules, bylaws and regulation must be read and agreed by the guests prior to occupancy is authorized. Hard copy will also be available to the guests inside the condo unit.

reviews_details.review: We stayed with our Family and had a great time. Our daughter is 21 months old and there was a great park across the street for her. It is well located for activities and getting around downtown Calgary.

We had a wonderful stay at Lisbeth’s place. The place is very comfy and nice and was exactly as described. Beautiful view from the 12th floor. Kitchen was stocked with all the essentials. Great communication.

Nice place with very accessible restaurants and amenities.
Central enough that you don’t need a car for the local fare
The accommodation was clean and served the 4 guests well
I will definitely book this again if I return to Calgary

Lisbeth's place in Calgary not only matched, but exceeded my expectations! The views that you will get are just as pictured in the listing. The area is very walkable and the unit was spotless. Will definitely be back!
Lisbeth's place was quiet and very comfortable in a great location. She was a very responsive host and quickly answered all of our questions. We would definitely stay here again!

Amazing location with stunning downtown views!
We had a fantastic stay at Lisbeth’s place. The home is incredibly spacious, with modern furniture and a well-kept interior that made us feel right at home. Lisbeth was an outstanding host attentive, kind, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our stay. The location couldn’t be better: just a short 10-minute walk to Stephen Avenue and downtown, with food and shopping amenities close by. Highly recommended!
Lisbeth was a very gracious host. The apartment was comfortable and easy to access, and Lisbeth was very accessible whenever we had questions.
Lisbeth was an exceptional host with outstanding communication throughout our stay. Thank you, Lisbeth!

Thank you for hosting us, it was a wonderful location with lots of entertainment just at your foot step.
Beautiful views and alot of space for a DT condo.
Great location, beautiful apartment with very nice views of the city. 2 km to Princes Island / Bow river. Great place to run / walk.

This Airbnb is definitely in my top 5 places I’ve stayed. VERY good price for the location and quality of everything. Lisabeth has a very warm and welcoming aura. I will definitely be revisiting! I give her a 10/10, best host I’ve ever met :) 💖
The best condo ive stayed in calgary! Very cozy and not cheaply made. It’s a really nice place with great views! Lots of bars and good restaurants walking distance.
Lisbeth's place is very well located in the city.  Close to great restaurants.  The view is amazing at night with the city lights.
yes we had amazing stay and would definitely recommend
Beautiful place and great location!  Would recommend this place.  Thank you Lisbeth!
Good place to stay. Just note that beds are double it seems. Otherwise, very good.
The condo was beautiful and comfortable.

Great location, super neat and tidy condo. Lisbeth was an excellent host. Super easy to communicate with. Only thing was the AC wasn’t as cold as it should’ve been but then again, we ran into another couple and they mentioned how their AC wasn’t working as well so I think it’s just a building issue that was fully out of her control. Besides that, we had an amazing stay. Would totally come again in the future

Great location, in the heart of Calgary downtown, walkable distance to great restaurants. On top of everything , it has the most amazing views of all airbnb we visited. Lisbeth is amazing and respond pretty much immediately to all of our questions. Highly recommend and will definitely be back next time we visit Calgary. Thanks Lisbeth again!

Lisbeth was a great host.  She was very friendly, responsive, and easy to communicate with.  Home was very clean, nicely decorated, conveniently located to many places to eat & drink, and offered great views of downtown.  I wish i was staying for a longer period of time as this place was perfect for many reasons.

Out of all the air b&b I’ve stayed at this was top #1. She was so helpful in every way possible. Any obstacles I had she helped me around them. My plans changed last minute and she was there to help me. Everything was great, her place was beautiful and made me feel as if it was my own. 10/10 will stay or recommend to stay at her place. 5 stars really isn’t enough for what she did for me.

My second time staying here and like the first time it was absolutely wonderful!! Lisbeth is an amazing host. Always responsive and helpful.
The view of this airbnb is beautiful morning or night. The place is cozy, and fully equipped with everything I needed.
Walking distance from a couple restaurants, market, and subway and pizza place is just outside the building. Great location.
Will definitely visit again!

This place is top notch! It’s definitely worth it and it’s in the heart of the city. The view is remarkable. Lisbeth the host  is very easy to communicate with. It is accessible to restaurants and stores. Me and my partner really enjoyed our stay it’s very cozy! The view is so FANTASTIC! We will definitely come back to this special place 😊❤️ thank you so much for having us! ❤️‍🔥

This is a great place to stay. Really good location. Everything is nearby. Shopping and restaurants. Only about 3 blocks to Calgary tower and mall.
Would definitely like to rent this place again.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.81 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
description: Enjoy the fantastic views of the city from the floor to ceiling windows in our downtown condo! This 2-bedroom condo is large enough to host 6 guests at at time, since we have a pull out sofa bed in the living room!  The condo features an open concept design, fully equipped kitchen (with a dishwasher), in suite laundry machines, a private balcony patio, high speed internet access and available secure on site parking. We're walking distance from Stampede Park; in the Beltline neighbourhood.The spaceCity views, cozy vibes, and a killer location—this modern 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo in Calgary’s Beltline neighbourhood puts you right in the heart of the action. Steps from tennis courts, green spaces, and Stampede Park, you’ll be staying in the city’s vibrant Design District, just a short walk from downtown.For everyone’s comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels — not conversations — to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained. Whether you're here for business or exploring Calgary’s best, this bright and airy suite has everything you need for a comfortable and stylish stay.Chill, dine & unwind:• Private balcony with outdoor dining (table + 2 chairs)• East-facing views of downtown Calgary• Open-concept living space with floor-to-ceiling windows & laminate floors• Living room with 55" Smart TV & full-size pull-out sofa• Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances & granite countertops• Dedicated dining area (seating for 4)Rest easy in style:• Bedroom 1: King bed + 43" Smart TV + private ensuite bathroom• Bedroom 2: Queen bed + direct patio access• 2 full bathrooms (including 1 ensuite)• In-suite laundry for your convenience• Central air conditioning + high-speed Wi-Fi throughoutParking & perks:• On-site parking is available for one vehicle • Modern building in a prime walkable location• Steps from parks, public transit, and local cafesGuest access• You will have exclusive use of this apartment. • There is dedicated parking in the secure, underground parking garage for one vehicle at a cost of $20.00/night. • There's also paid street parking nearby. • The building is wheelchair accessible with a ramp at the entrance and an elevator to take you to your floor.Other things to note**Important Notice**KEY PICK-UP:• Please note that keys for the unit must be picked up at an alternate KeyNest location before 10:00 PM.• To help ensure a safe and trusted experience for all guests, ID verification may be required after booking.• The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All confirmed bookings indicate guest agreement to adhere to the property's residential bylaws and community standards.• Please note that we are not responsible for any unreceived parcel delivery or shipping orders. We encourage guests to avoid placing online orders during their stay as shipping times can vary. Even when the expected delivery date is within your stay, we do not recommend placing orders that must be shipped to your vacation rental property.• We offer on-site, underground parking for one vehicle at $20 per night. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass. You will need to park your vehicle temporarily outside the building upon arrival while you go up to the unit to collect the garage fob. Please obey all street signs.Registration DetailsBL266123
reviews: Great location, clean and well stocked apartment. Literally the only negative was a broken soap dispenser and the pullout bed is uncomfortable, but overall a great place to stay.

As far as Airbnb hosts go, Samantha and zahid were phenomenal and exceeded expectations. They were incredibly quick to respond, helpful, and very pleasant to interact with. The place was exactly as described and was easy to find. There were instructions for everything we needed during our stay. Would highly recommend staying at their Airbnb!

Samantha and Zahid’s place was nice and clean. It was very close to lots of places to eat. I love how responsive there were and they provided clear instructions from check-in to checking out. The view was a great bonus, and they always let me know of any information pertaining to the building in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Calgary.
The place was very comfortable. Everything we needed was there plus more. Value for money highly recommended.we enjoyed our stay
Amazing accommodation, felt right at home and very central. Easy to find and great amenities!

It was good wish faced the city but I forgot to ask dish washer smell gross could use a better cleaning in bedroom bathroom walls the outside of fridge and stove could have been cleaner and wasn't the best sleep as someone pulled a fire alarm but it was a very nice place felt at home and great hosts also daughter named the plant in the bedroom its name Thelma
Had a great time, nothing negative to say as I enjoyed the room, had a good view of the city, the room was clean, and the hosts were kind.
Perfect place to stay for a couples of nights. Excellent location, clean and comfy apt.
A good location in Calgary for a reasonable price.

Very conveniently located and clean space! A couple things were left to be desired (one single trash can, broken soap dispenser, surprise that second room had sliding not standard door), but these are small and not at all a big deal. The off-Airbnb extra app for check in instructions, including a surprise need to detour to pick up the keys from a corner mart 10 minutes away, was clunky and kind of annoying but ultimately easy enough to navigate (only accessible within a short window pre-check in, which made it difficult to plan ahead for this). Check out fortunately
was easy! This apartment did just the job for a one night pre-airport stay with my boyfriend and mom, but I may not have chosen to stay longer. This would be a great place for a small bachelor(ette) trip or the like!
liked everything about the apartment.
Overall good stay, bedsheets and towels were not clean
Good spot and good place to stay

The dish washer was broken, and a limited supply of dish soap. You have to be careful if you parking in this building. Firstly, the parking instructions were not clear. You get into the parking area, and they will tell you the parking spot after you pay ($20/day). Better they charge along with booking. There was a limit supply of garbage bags. When I contacted the owners, they said there is no one available. The unit filled up with the cigarette smell the moment we turn off the AC.
We had a great time, the place was amazing with a beautiful view. It’s near everything you need from pubs to restaurants and even parks.. will definitely stay here again.

This was a lovely place to come for a getaway. The apartment was beautiful, clean, very well thought out and well designed. A lot of time and effort has been put into it, which we appreciated. The hosts were very kind and excellent at communicating with us. The area was great to see, and to find places to eat. The only downside was that we had felt some standard kitchen items were missing - basic condiments and cooking supplies, tea, scrubber for dishes, foil, plastic bags, and more basic baking pans.
Overall a wonderful stay and would highly recommend.
Had a great stay.  Hosts were attentive and the condo is exactly as the pictures detail. I'd highly recommend this place and would book here again the next time I'm in town.
Great place
It was perfect
Great location
Only stayed for a night but a very good night it was nice and welcoming place with a great view would recommend
Great location, clean, modern space. would definitely stay here again, and hoping to in the future

Pros:
Perfection location, right in the middle of great food and bars.
Clean, newer building. Excellent view.
Parking stall was good, fit our SUV no problem.
Cons:
The property seems to be managed by a property manager without direct knowledge of the unit, which led to incorrect info. I had specifically asked whether the bedrooms had standard doors (for more privacy) instead of a sliding glass door, as the listing photos did not show doors but another listing in the same building had a glass sliding door. The property manager checked, then replied "rest assured each room is equipped with standard doors", so I booked this unit over the other listing despite this unit being more expensive and with worse check-in/out times. Unfortunately, once we stepped into the unit, we saw that it was indeed the sliding glass door. I informed the property manager about this and they did apologize and say they had mistaken it with another unit but nothing further was done.
Overall still a good unit.
The place is well organized and steps away from restaurants and shops. The location is great for a weekend away in Calgary!

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Downtown Calgary: Downtown is centered around the Calgary Tower, with its scenic views overlooking the skyline and Bow River. The CORE Shopping Centre features the tropical indoor Devonian Gardens and boasts many retail stores and boutiques. Learn regional history, culture and art at the Glenbow Museum. You'll also find many western wear stores, pubs and steakhouses! From great restaurants, live entertainment and festivals - Downtown Calgary really does have it all!

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Nearby Family Attractions:• Calgary Tower ~ 700 m• Devonian Gardens  ~ 1.0 km• Calgary Stampede ~ 1.4 km• Prince's Island Park ~ 2.0 km• TELUS Spark Science Center  ~ 4.4 km• Calgary Zoo ~ 4.1 km• Heritage Park ~ 8.4 km• Calaway Amusement Park ~ 23.5 kmNearby Other Attractions:• Cowboys Casino ~ 850 m• Lindsay Park ~ 850 m• Scotiabank Saddledome ~ 1.3 km• Glenbow Museum  ~ 850 m• Olympic Plaza ~ 1.0 km• Shaganappi Point Golf Course ~ 4.9 km

We believe that there are basic condiments and cooking supplies provided on the property. I'll make sure to have this clarified with our guests in the future. Thank you for recommending our place, and we hope to have the opportunity to host you again in the future.
