reviews: Joseph’s place locates at our favorite neighborhood in Downtown Calgary. Very walkable with a ton of restaurants and shops. We had a late check in and Joseph wait for us. He’s super communicative and the apartment is enjoyable for couples like us to stay. We will definitely stay here again when we visit Calgary.

Joseph was really kind and he answered all questions we asked so quickly that we could relax during our stay. Really appreciated. Hope to stay here again if we can get a  next chance to visit Calgary!

Great place and location.  Very clean and easy to check in and check out.  Very comfortable bed after a day out and about.  Quiet location but not far from a lot of restaurants and shopping.  Mission is a great community within Calgary.

Such an absolutely beautiful cozy home, place was super clean and our host Joseph was super friendly, he had messaged us movie recommendations and was quick to respond. had clear instructions for everything. Thank-you, we'll definitely be staying here again. 10/10 we do recommend.
:)

The place was very nice and clean. Very good location close to a lot of amenities and shops and restaurants and a nice park next to Elbow River. Philip was very attentive and responded to all my needs immediately. I’ll stay there again when in Calgary.
It was great coordinating with Joseph and the place was nice and clean. It was a good experience staying here.
Really nice place, clean and easy to find with good parking. Most affordable location during stampede !
perfectly located it is a pleazant apartment.  Joseph dent aove and beyond to help me solve a problem. Highly recommended
Good location and a nice little spot for a solo traveller. Joseph gave clear instructions and check-in/out was super easy.
Nice place, professionally cleaned, and Joseph was an excellent host.
Perfect space for 2 people, nice and clean place. Definitely recommend

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bathroom
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located place in the heart of downtown Calgary. This property is located in the highly desirable downtown west end, providing easy access to everything thatthe city has to offer. Take a leisurely stroll along the Bow River or explore the endless shopping and dining options that are just steps away from your front door. Commuting is a breeze with the LRT station only a block away.The spaceThe building offers a full-time concierge,  secured heated underground parking, visitor parking, secured bicycle storage, as well as a private gym providing a convenient option for staying active.Other things to noteThe couch is also a pull out bed.Registration DetailsBL270312
reviews: Kelli and Jiad were incredibly accommodating, quick to respond and super friendly. Very easy to work with and the apartment was clean, convenient and exactly what I was looking for. An absolute pleasure to stay here and I’ll definitely be back!

The space is very clean, the building felt safe, and everything is as described. There were plenty of towels and even full ice cube trays in the fridge. Jiad is very responsive and accommodated an earlier check-out time for my early morning flight. I had a wonderful stay, would highly recommend.

Jiad was a great host and very quick to respond. The neighbourhood felt safe and was a very short walk to the C Train as well as many shops and restaurants! I would definitely recommend his place and would stay here again in the future!

We had an amazing stay at Jiad's place. Everything was smooth since the beginning, and he was very accomodating to our requests. He was very responsive to questions, and often checked up on us during the stay. The location was perfect, close to many restaurants, supermarkets and dowtown. It was really easy to go anywhere because it was really close to the train station as well. All in all we have an amazing stay!
Thank you Jiad for the great stay! We appreciated how responsive you were and how you were happy to help resolve any issues we encountered. See you next time!

Location great
Nearby metro, just behind the building
Nearby everything: banks, government offices & very nice park.
Quite area and clean building

We had a great stay at Jiad’s place! The apartment was clean, cozy, and just as described. Perfect location — close to downtown attractions, restaurants, and the C-Train. An underground parking spot is available in the building. It can get a bit noisy at night from the train and yard, so light sleepers take note. Overall, I would highly recommend this place and would stay again.
We had a great stay, the bed was comfy and easy to walk around the area!
This condo was right in the centre of Calgary so good for doing things in the city. A dedicated parking space was a bonus for a city centre location
Jiad was an excellent host! Very helpful and prompt responses. The apartment was clean and welcoming. He was also flexible with our checkout process. Great value!
perfect location. small place but has everything. dusty but with having the windows open because of the hot weather that's to be expected. would definitely go back

We stayed at Jiad's place because we needed a location close to Dickens - this was perfect, a 5-minute walk. The check-in was very easy with the liquor store holding the keys. If you need to leave before 9am on check out, this place might be an issue - you have to drop the keys off at the liquor store when it opens. For us, it was not a problem. The unit had everything we needed and looked like the photos. The bed was comfy. There is an issue with the pull-out sofa at the moment but we did mention to the host, as we had a 3rd person in the apartment with us. The host was very responsive and helpful. We had a couple questions regarding the check-in but he responded right away and got in the unit quickly. Overall, I would stay here again! Thanks, Jiad for having us.

Jiad’s place is comfortable and well-equipped. It’s conveniently close to the station, making travel easy, and it offered everything we needed for daily life. We had a great time staying here and would definitely recommend it to others!

Jiad’s place is well located and clean. I stayed for a month and I had a great stay. There’s everything you need and the host is super easy to communicate with. The check in was smooth and easy to do. Recommend staying at Jiad’s place
It was a nice place to stay. Thanks to Jiad!
Great location to walk along the river and easy access in and out of downtown
He was nice and helpful.
Conveniently located to downtown and public transit
Wonderful stay at a great place! The host is very responsive, accommodating and friendly. Thank you!
Great suite and location.
Jiad was a hostess of the mostess.
Great location.
Very good spot, would book again
Amazing place, it's like being at home. I highly recommend it!

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Modern, comfortable and exceptionally located in Calgarys historic fashion and entertainment districts. Perfect for all travellers, professionals and vacationers.Welcome to our Airbnb! Keep it classy in your stylish apartment in Calgary’s downtown without settling for a bland hotel room.The spaceComfortably enjoy the view of Calgary skyscrapers from this chic, modern apartment.Guest accessYou will have access to the entire apartment, fitness room,  and pool (seasonal)Registration detailsBL268804
reviews: i had an awesome stay at ben and lily’s place. the condo was super clean, cozy, and decorated so cute! i love how modern it is and just had a really good vibe. the building is safe and secure. the views were unreal — seriously so pretty. perfect views of the mountains and downtown. sunrise was absolutely stunning on the balcony! i will be 100% be booking to stay here again next time i am in town!

Great place with a decent location, hard to find parking and the train right beside you is an inconvenience when it goes through the city 4 times a night. However minus this our stay was great and the hosts were very friendly and responsive, left very clear details on how to check in and all about the unit! Would stay again however I would bring earplugs this time!

Clean and nice. Walkable to downtown.
Communication could have been better and more prompt with regard to some things brought up with a broken piece of furniture.
Other than that, we would stay again and recommend the flat.

Nice place; however, received a request a week and a half later for $1000 regarding a missing key fob even though we left the fob where we found it. Hosts did not contact us with questions as to where we put it just left it to their management company to send us an accusatory message with the money request. I have since found similar reviews on their other properties. Not good practice and Airbnb should look into this!

Ben and Lily's place is perfectly situated right in the heart of downtown. It is modern and welcoming and very well kept. Ben and Lily were always available and easy to communicate with. I stay here for a little over 2 weeks and have nothing negative I could say about the place. Highly recommend.
Very clean and modern apartment in a fabulous location. Near everything you need. Host was very helpful and responsive when i needed help. Great place. Would stay again.
The place looked just like the photos. It was super clean, cozy, and had such a nice view!

I have stayed at this Airbnb and other apartments in this building several times. This is my favorite Airbnb. Yes, per the other reviews, there is a noisy train at night that runs several times, but it’s not that bad. My advice would be to bring earplugs or a loud fan if loud sound bothers you at night. PLEASE DO NOT let the train keep you from staying at this place, because it’s an amazing Airbnb. It’s perfect with a washer and dryer, nice deep bathtub and powerful shower, kitchen with everything you need, dining and living area, VERY comfortable bed and pillows, and a balcony that shows a beautiful view of Downtown Calgary. It’s only a 5 to 10 minute walk to the train. There are also many restaurants and pubs nearby, including a four story mall that’s in downtown. Thank you for another pleasant experience!
Lovely place, we really enjoyed our stay. Great and fast communicators, really appreciated that from Ben and Lilly! Great service. Really happy

It was a very good location, barely had to drive anywhere. As a student it was nice to be in the same city but feel like you weren’t in the campus atmosphere. It was very tidy and clean, they had very good communication and were easy to reach with any questions. They made it so easy to check in and out without any hassle. Definitely recommend if you want to have an effortless experience.
Great place. It was very clean and covered home necessities. Walking around the area at night was okay, but not the best. Overall I would definitely recommend it.
Very clean and easy to access. Beautiful view of downtown! Would definitely go back.

Listed on booking free parking however it was not. And place is smaller than I expected. Not worth the money I paid for in my opinion.
Nice location and clean.
Great hosts, accurate description and very responsive to questions.  The condo is exactly as described.
Stayed for birthday weekend. Did not disappoint! Heaps of bars and restaurants close by walkable distance to everything!! Would 100% stay again!

It was a very clean place with beautiful cityscapes. One problem we encountered was with entering the building and response/troubleshooting that could have been delivered in a more timely manner. The buzzly app that they use was not optimal for entering the airbnb and hosts had to resend the link. Not ideal. Otherwise the hosts were good at answering our questions prior to check in and the place was true to photos for the most part. Couch did have a huge tear unfortunately.

A beautiful place to stay! The view is amazing, and almost everything you could need is in walking distance! Ben and Lily were very well at communicating and making sure we were more then happy with our stay!

The view was beautiful, and the location was fantastic. Unfortunately, we encountered some issues during our stay. The bathroom was not clean, with hair on the bath, and the bed was extremely uncomfortable, preventing us from getting a good night's sleep. As a result, we felt sore for the next few days. Ultimately, we decided to cancel our reservation. The management was understanding and refunded the remaining nights while still charging us for the first night.

Fantastic Stay in Downtown Calgary!
I had an amazing stay at Ben and Lily’s apartment in downtown Calgary. The space was spotless, beautifully furnished, and had all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay. The location is perfect—within walking distance of great restaurants, shops, and public transportation. The check-in process was seamless, and Ben and Lily were incredibly responsive and accommodating. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Calgary and would definitely stay here again!
Felt very cozy and the house was so clean. It was very close to shopping mall, restaurants etc. so very convinient. The view was awesome and the hosts are very accommodating!

The apartment was decorated so beautifully and had the prettiest view of downtown Calgary. It was also very clean when we first entered. We had a wonderful time and for our next visit of city we definitely will be choosing to stay there again!
Just stayed for a night but it was amazing!! The bed is so comfy too
Amazing communication, beautiful view, good description of place
Easy to find. Clean with  great view. Definitely recommend. Super nice host also.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.52 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Welcome to YYC Skyline Oasis! Embrace urban living in Calgary's stylish Beltline area. Enjoy panoramic skyline views and a vibrant rock 'n' roll vibe. With personalized touches and proximity to hotspots, experience the best of the city. Whether for business or leisure, our prime location guarantees an unforgettable stay in the heart of it all.If available, late check-out can be arranged 24 hours prior to original check-out time at $35/hour.The spaceMajor attractions (less than 5-minutes away)- Stampede Grounds- Saddledome- Cowboys Casino- BMO Convention Centre - 17th AveAmenities within steps:- Liquor store- Cannabis store- Top cocktail bar- BarbershopFood & Entertainment within steps:- Starbucks- First Street Market with diverse food options- Calgary's best pubs: St. James Gate- Renowned dining spots: Ten Foot Henry, Calcutta Cricket Club- Sports bars: Home and Away Sports Bar, Leopolds Tavern- Hotel Arts Outdoor PoolNature & Fitness (Within Steps):- Anytime Fitness (Open 24/7) - Bow RiverLiving Room & Kitchen Area:- Inviting living room and kitchen area with a huge sectional sofa and 65” QLED smart TV (Netflix, Crave, Paramount+)- Large island with seating for four- The flex room serves as an office space and the second bedroom with a memory foam queen bed inside a sleep chest.- Second full bathroom with laundry facilities (washer & dryer) Master Bedroom:- The main bedroom features a comfy king-size bed and tons of storage options- Full ensuite bathroom - Blackout curtainsFree Parking- Convenient, secure, assigned, onsite underground parking for ease of stay.Guest accessGuests will have access to the entire condo during their stay, providing them with a comfortable and private retreat. Additionally, they are welcome to utilize the 4th-floor common area patio, offering a shared outdoor space for relaxation and enjoyment. Whether indoors or outdoors, guests can make the most of their stay, creating memorable experiences in both the private sanctuary of their condo and the communal atmosphere of the patio.Registration DetailsBL273314
reviews: Awesome stay, location is truly perfect, and this unit is very well equipped! My only complaint would be the lighting in the main bedroom and both bathrooms is very dim, which made doing my makeup a little challenging! Otherwise, amazing and we would definitely book again!
place in down town alot of restaurants  and actives to do. great spot 👌
Mitchell is a great host, the check in and out instructions were clear and easy and the place was clean. We enjoyed our stay at his listing!

Stayed at Mitchell's place for a girls night and the views were incredible!!! it was super cool to see the calgary tower from the windows. Very clean, had one parking spot. What could be improved for the future is more detailed instructions. For example, we didn't know where exactly to put the garbage before checking out because the location was unlisted. Overall, very satisfied with our stay 😃.

We had a fantastic 3-night stay here! The place is beautiful, cozy, and well-equipped with everything you need, from toiletries to a fully stocked kitchen. Mitchell, the host, was amazing—friendly, helpful, and very responsive. Plus, the recommendations for nearby activities and restaurants were spot on. Highly recommend!

Couldn't ask for a better location. The condo was so beautiful at night too, with the city lights. Can't beat this place especially with the parking spot. Loved the ice machine and the the filtered water tap! Speaker was easy to hook up tpo, and the welcome booklet was online and easy to navigate. Thanks!

The location is great. The place itself was also nice. The only issue is how to get inside the place. I had to ask a resident to get me through the garage and when i left the place on my last day I had to ask another resident to let me out haha.

Very cool place! Awesome views and walkable to many nearby restaurants and bars. Mitchell was a very responsive host who went the extra mile making sure we checked in successfully after we arrived later than expected. Would stay here again.
This was a very nice apartment style setting, with a great view of the city. Everything was clean, organized and aesthetically pleasing. Bed and couch were very comfortable.

Our visit when off without a hitch. Mitchell was responsive and very accommodating. The apartment was beautiful and very well located close to the Calgary stampede.
10/10 would recommend

I had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb in Calgary! The location is absolutely perfect, being within walking distance to the Stampede grounds and directly across from several great restaurants. The convenience of having such amazing dining options and entertainment nearby made my trip incredibly enjoyable. The host was very accommodating and provided everything I needed for a comfortable stay. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Calgary, especially if you want to be close to the action and enjoy the local scene. The airbnb was extremely clean which made a very comfortable stay.

Mitchell was an amazing host. Super responsive! The place was beautiful. It’s right in the center of Calgary and the place has pretty much everything you need! Amazing gorgeous place! Wish we could spend more time in this apartment. Highly recommend.

Very nice condo with easy access to many restaurants and the city.  We walked all over the city!  The condo was very clean.  Somehow we missed the door code in the instructions so it was a little difficult getting in but Mitchell was very responsive and got back to us quickly and we were in!  The second bedroom could use some better shades to darken it completely other wise the accommodations were excellent!  The other issue we had was leaving.  You need the key fob to get to the car park and to get out of the garage.  So you need to get the car out then bring all the keys back up and drop them off in the condo. We probably didn't read the instructions properly  :)    Don't forget that!!

The access instructions were clear but a bit complicated. Exiting from the unit to the car park was tricky, as you needed a fob that was inside the unit, which made leaving more difficult.
The unit matched the description, and the city lights and view were beautiful. The location is great, with a short walk to Calgary Tower and the nearby shopping mall.
However, there were a few issues during our stay:
- The main room bedding, particularly the ‘black sheets’ and bedding were dusty.
- The coffee machine had dirty pods left inside and wasn’t clean.
- The ice maker had stale water with an unpleasant smell.
- We found clothing from previous guests in the unit.
- There were old, used sheets at the bottom of the wardrobe.
Overall, it didn’t feel like the unit was fully prepared for our visit.
Nice and clean! Was very helpful and quick to respond when an issue arouse. Only there one night but was worth it! Beautiful view
Great place to stay very clean and the host was very responsive and helpful 10/10 would recommend staying here.

Place was left a mess and was not cleaned before we got there. Toilet was dirty and had poop stains, sheets had stains and another were wet. The beds were not made and since we were staying only one night was an inconvenience to have to wash ourselves. We ended up not staying there it was just too much. How we the host made it write and was apologetic and immediately offered to make accommodations and offered and immediate refund and then offered extra for our hassle. I don’t fault him at all, the place looked beautiful but given our short stay and the place not being up to anyone’s standards we chose another location. I would only ask the host be more thorough in checking on the services he uses to clean. Other than that the location and apt would have been great to experience.
Lovely place to stay.  Excellent communication with host.
Great location. Good set up inside. Cozy rooms.
Clean and cool location
Greet place  to stay and good view

reviews_details.host_response:
Thank you for your thoughtful feedback, Natalie. We’re happy to hear that you enjoyed the location, views, and the condo overall. We sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered during your stay. Maintaining high standards of cleanliness is crucial for us, and we’re sorry that we didn’t meet those standards during your visit. We’ve discussed your feedback with our cleaning team to make sure these issues are addressed and resolved for future guests.
We also understand that the fob process for the garage can be inconvenient. We’ve updated our instructions and check-out process to make it more straightforward for future guests. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us, and we appreciate you bringing these matters to our attention. We hope you’ll consider staying with us again, so we can provide you with a much-improved experience.

reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your feedback, Thomas. I'm very sorry for the inconvenience you experienced. Unfortunately, our cleaner claimed she completed the job, but clearly, she did not show up. We have since hired a new cleaner to ensure this doesn't happen again. I appreciate your understanding, and I'm glad we could resolve the issue promptly. I hope to have the opportunity to host you again under better circumstances.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.97 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Welcome to one of a kind corner unit 2b+2b, 886 SQFT, with extraordinary views of downtown Calgary. This corner unit boasts floor to ceiling glass windows   facing N and W facing the iconic Calgary Tower. Within walking distance to 17th,  Saddle-dome. and downtown.  Steps away from Calgary's trendiest restaurants and best nightlife,  St James corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, endless pubs,17th Ave SW, Also Starbucks and yoga. studio a stone throw from front entrance.The spaceLocated on the 13th the all-concrete condo tower in the Beltline neighbourhood of downtown Calgary. The beautiful interior and large open space provides a cozy place to work, from the desk and workstation or enjoy a glass of wine or champagne from the oversized balcony over looking Calgarys downtown. The space has a modern high end feel with the stunning decor and feel. Complimentary heated underground Parking.BL255628Guest accessSelf check in with smart lock Just confirm when you will arrive and we will buzz you up. Codes and info will be sent day of checkinOther things to noteWelcome to COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA! The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building, and all residents and guests are required to observe our Bylaws and community standards. Please read and observe the following rules during your stay to help maintain the common enjoyment of the building by all. ALL RULES MUST BE READ AND AGREED TO BEFORE OCCUPANCY IS AUTHORIZED. Rules are also in a binder inside the unit.Registration DetailsBl255628
reviews:
This was an absolutely beautiful place to stay with amazing views of the city from floor-to-ceiling windows in every room. The furniture was comfortable and thoughtfully laid out to maximize the space.
Eos was easy to reach out to for any questions.
We will definitely stay here again in the future.

Stayed at Eos’s place in Calgary and had a great experience.  Communication was great, it was exactly as listed and had amazing views.  The cocktail bar downstairs in the building was awesome too.  5-stars!!

Would definitely stay again at this condo! Great location and the owner was very responsive and accommodating.Close to Stampede Park and Stephen Ave. , which was nice. Some snacks and beverages provided at check in, plus a gift card to a restaurant across the street…nice touch! Thanks for everything!

My wife and I had the pleasure to see Calgary for the first time while visiting family who had recently moved there.
Fairly new with Air BNB however, we are getting the hang of it.
The condo unit was perfect, we felt right at home.
Clean, quiet, secure, great views and fantastic location.
Our host was quick to reply to any questions or concerns.
As we plan on travelling to Calgary more often, this place will be our first choice if available.

A beautiful apartment overlooking the City on a high floor exactly as pictured in their listing.  Hosts were wonderful and communicated immediately when we had a question.  Highly recommend while staying in Calgary.  Great location.

I loved this AirBnb accommodation. It is a gorgeous, light-filled space with beautiful furnishings and many thoughtful amenities like bottled water, chips, and a generous Starbucks gift card, and also body lotion and a blow dryer. The mattress in the main bedroom was super comfortable for me, as were the pillows (I tend to be very fussy). Honestly, I felt so comfortable and well, I didn't want to leave. As for the location, there's so much to get to within walking distance, including an excellent food court right across the street. Thank you so much. I felt like a queen.

Perfect location, walking distance to great restaurants and cafes, supermarket and liquor stores just downstairs. The place is well appointed, clean and very comfortable. I would recommend and book again.

Eos was a great host - very responsive and was flexible with the check in time when we needed it! Additionally, the complimentary snacks and the other additional supplies were much appreciated. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and if I come back to Calgary again, I’d stay again. 10/10 recommend!
We had the most wonderful stay! The apartment and views are superb. Everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Highly recommended!
Fantastic place to stay. Great area, such beautiful views of downtown, especially at night, and within walking distance of all the best spots!
we had a great stay and  we requested an extension and our host was very generous and let us stay and use his place for the day prior to our flight. thank you.
Very clean and cozy! Super close to bars, restaurants, and anything else you might need. Very walkable area with nearby parks and attractions. We loved our stay!

This is the 3rd year in a row that we have stayed here and it remains great. The location is fabulous - central to so much in the city with excellent restaurants close by. It has a great view of the city, is modern, neat and clean and very comfortable (the beds are very comfortable). Amenities are plenty and well thought out. Same time next  year, we'll be back.

We loved our stay at this condo - beautiful space, great location, very responsive and friendly host. The layout, furnishings and decor are a step above. The location is central with great restaurants, pubs, and parks close by. As well, walkable to both downtown and 17th avenue. It was perfect for our girl's getaway. Will definitely book again! Thank-you!

We absolutely enjoyed the condo and especially the views.
The unit is well decorated and the host provides little extras for the guests, snacks, water, laundry detergent, etc.
It was perfect for a short stay and would be great for a longer stay too.
Host was responded quickly and all the instructions were very clear.
Highly recommend if you enjoy downtown life.

Place was gorgeous, stunning views, amenities galore. Only small nitpick is having to park and go get the fob, then having to do the same when leaving. Also one elevator was down one of the days and it made it incredibly annoying to get in and out. Otherwise, it was exactly as listed, EOS was fantastic with communication and gave very clear instructions.

EOS was a wonderful host.. super quick response times and always available when I needed to get a hold of them! Checking in and checking out was simple and had easy instructions. The location was perfect, super close to tons of restaurants, bars, grocery stores, etc. The apartment unit itself was beautiful and clean. I really enjoyed my stay here and will definitely be booking again with this host.
Great location with amazing city views and free parking was a huge help !
Place was amazing.Clive was amazing too with timely communication and helping out when needed

Thank you for the stay! Great location, walkable to lots of bars and restaurants. Close to the stampede grounds.
Thank you for being so helpful and responsive.
Very nice accommodations, liked the view. Unexpected easy location to many amenities was a plus. Would stay here again w/o hesitation.
Fabulous condo with breathtaking city views.  Host responded to questions within minutes.  We plan to stay again.  Only positive things to say.

I had an amazing stay! The location was perfect, right downtown, close to tons of restaurants and cafes ,  all within walking distance. The view from the apartment was stunning.  The place was clean and comfy. I'd definitely book again.

Fantastic apartment in a great location.
Pristine with great views.
Really easy to check in.
Handy for the saddle dome and downtown
Loads of great restaurants and bars
Would recommend!!!!

The unit is well decorated and the host provides little extras for the guests, snacks, water, laundry detergent, etc.
It was perfect for a short stay and would be great for a longer stay too.
Host was responded quickly and all the instructions were very clear.
Highly recommend if you enjoy downtown life.
reviews_details.host_response: Thanks Sylvie we would host you guys anytime.

reviews_details.review: Place was gorgeous, stunning views, amenities galore. Only small nitpick is having to park and go get the fob, then having to do the same when leaving. Also one elevator was down one of the days and it made it incredibly annoying to get in and out. Otherwise, it was exactly as listed, EOS was fantastic with communication and gave very clear instructions.

EOS was a wonderful host.. super quick response times and always available when I needed to get a hold of them! Checking in and checking out was simple and had easy instructions. The location was perfect, super close to tons of restaurants, bars, grocery stores, etc. The apartment unit itself was beautiful and clean. I really enjoyed my stay here and will definitely be booking again with this host.
Great location with amazing city views and free parking was a huge help !
Place was amazing.Clive was amazing too with timely communication and helping out when needed

Thank you for the stay! Great location, walkable to lots of bars and restaurants. Close to the stampede grounds.
Thank you for being so helpful and responsive.
Very nice accommodations, liked the view. Unexpected easy location to many amenities was a plus. Would stay here again w/o hesitation.
Fabulous condo with breathtaking city views.  Host responded to questions within minutes.  We plan to stay again.  Only positive things to say.
reviews_details.host_response: Look forward  to having you guys back Robert

reviews_details.review: I had an amazing stay! The location was perfect, right downtown, close to tons of restaurants and cafes ,  all within walking distance. The view from the apartment was stunning.  The place was clean and comfy. I'd definitely book again.
reviews_details.host_response: Thanks Aysar welcome anytime

reviews_details.review:
Fantastic apartment in a great location.
Pristine with great views.
Really easy to check in.
Handy for the saddle dome and downtown
Loads of great restaurants and bars
Would recommend!!!!
reviews_details.host_response: Duncan thanks for caring for the condo always welcome

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.97 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome home!Our chic two-bedroom condo with a king bed and beautiful views of the downtown skyline including a view of the Calgary tower. Located in the heart of the Beltline.Walking distance to everything such as restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores and all popular/trendy avenues.5 minute drive to river,Stampede grounds and the Saddledome.Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.The spaceThis condo is only a 5 minute drive away from the Stampede grounds and the Saddledome!Notable Features:- Large balcony with a spectacular skyline view with unobstructed views of the Calgary tower-1 King bed w/ fresh beddings & linens-1 Queen bed w/ fresh beddings & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ floor to ceiling windows-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-Ensuite Washer/Dryer with detergent and dryer sheets-High-speed WiFi-Free heated underground parking-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee-Iron/Ironing BoardID Verification Required for our property.All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.Guest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.*** POOL is closed for the winter.Registration DetailsBL281894
reviews: A beautiful appartment right in the heart of Calgary. A spacious, clean, comfortable appartment in a great location close to all the amenities of the city. We felt right at home straight away and had a great stay. Kyle and Andrew responded very quickly to any query we had. We would definitely stay here again when visiting Calgary.

What a beautiful condo! It is right in the heart of Calgary and had all of the amenities and views. The parking and access was straight forward, and Kyle was a communicative host. Having an Italian restaurant downstairs was AWESOME. Highly recommend grabbing dinner there. Thank you for the recommendations and wonderful stay!

We really enjoyed our stay and the apartment looked exactly like on the photos! The view was amazing and we loved watching the sunrise und sunset from the balcony. Location-wise it was right in the middle between the river and the shopping/bar district which was great for walking and exploring the city on foot. Thanks again for letting us stay at your beautiful place!

This  booking was exactly what we needed, we came to Calgary to eventually go visit Banff but pricing out there is too much. Kyle’s listing was so central that we were able to go around the city by foot and quickly drive down to Banff less than 2hrs usually. The parking included was worth it and I highly encourage to book this place. The view from the patio is a great as it is in the picture and there’s a really good Italian spot around the corner. When we needed something (ie refill on laundry detergent) our host was so quick to provide. This was a great book and look forward to referring my friends here when they visit

We had a great stay! The apartment was immaculate and just like the photos. Its location is very convenient, close to shops, restaurants, and public transportation. Kyle and Andrew were very responsive and helpful throughout our visit.

I had an exceptional stay at this beautiful Airbnb in downtown Calgary. The apartment was spotless, well-organized, and thoughtfully set up for a comfortable experience. Waking up to the stunning view of the Calgary Tower each day was a real highlight. The location was perfect right in the heart of the city, with everything within walking distance. Communication with the host was smooth, and every detail was taken care of. Highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Calgary
I loved, loved, loved my stay at Kyle & Andrew's beautiful condo.  It was so lovely, well decorated and comfortable.  It looks even more stunning than the online photos.  I highly recommend it.
We found the beds to be really comfy and enjoyed the views from the apartment. Kyle's place is walking distance to great shops and restaurants.
Kyle & Andrew are great hosts, would definitely recommend and book again! Beautiful space and views

The suite is exactly as advertised with beautiful furniture and a great downtown view.  It was very tidy and well organized.  We stayed over a major cold snap so spent little time outdoors in the neighbourhood but I believe it is well located in the downtown area.  Safe and quiet. Hosts leave clear instructions and were kind enough to check in with us during our stay.

Beautiful stay and great vibes here! The photos and descriptions exactly match up to this Airbnb. Everything was very clean and well-stocked with linens, towels, and cleaning supplies. I would definitely rebook to this exact location or their other locations. Hosts are very communicative and respond in a timely manner.

We had such a great stay here! We loved it for our small family (two adults, one toddler.) It felt like just the right size and our little guy absolutely loved the incredible view and decor. We felt very spoiled staying here. Everything was so comfy and the included parking was extremely appreciated. Thank you for having us!!

Nice and cosy place that matches the description and has a nice view. Well equipped and good location to explore Calgary. We were 3 and with 2 bedrooms this was excellent. Very communicative hosts.
When air heating/cooling system is active, one can hear it well. We switched it off to sleep. Street noise with windows open, as expected in large city. With windows closed, it is OK.
Italiaan restaurant Scarpetta in the same building is very good. Also Thai Sa-On 2 blocks east is nice.

Great unit and a great location. Easy walk to the train which can get you to the zoo and many other kid friendly activities. Great restaurants all around. Very prompt and helpful communication from the owners. Would stay again.
Kyle and Andrew’s place was amazing. The place was extremely clean and was as exactly described. They were great hosts and were easy to communicate with. I would definitely stay again!

Thank you Kyle and Andrew for hosting my wife and I in your beautifully designed urban apartment. We enjoyed the immaculate facilities and homely decor. The views of downtown and outwards towards the Rocky Mountains were breathtaking.

A wonderful apartment, with meticulous attention to detail and clear instructions. It was also very clean and matched the description and images. Overall, the hosts were responsive and helpful. Enjoyed my stay.

Apartment looks exactly like photos although felt smaller than expected but still suited our needs. The view was amazing to wake up to every morning. Apartment was clean and had everything we needed. The kids loved the place!

The condo was perfect for our needs and had everything we could have wanted. Lots of electrical outlets in convenient places to plug in our devices, an incredible view, comfortable furniture, great lighting (especially in the bathroom) and an appealing modern aesthetic. We could walk to wherever we needed to go. Underground parking was a bonus. Getting into the building without the fob was a bit tricky but the security personnel were very helpful. And when I left the fob INSIDE the condo, Kyle was very quick to respond and help us fix our mistake. I would definitely stay there again.

Kyle’s place was very nice! The communication was great and everything was a breeze. The space had everything we needed to cook, watch great movies, and relax. The pics don’t do the place any justice. I’d definitely reserve again.

the apartment has a very good location if you want to do something in Calgary and want to look at the city. the apartment itself was very tastefully decorated with a personal style and modern, it was very clear and functional and yet also with a warm feel-good atmosphere
Great stay for our weekend away!
one of the cleanest places i’ve ever stayed at!
The view is amazing, clean comfortable place. The host was responsive and helpful will definitely book again.

die Wohnung hat eine sehr gute Lage wenn man in Calgary etwas unternehmen will und sich die Stadt anschauen will. die Wohnung selber war sehr geschmackvoll mit einem persönlichen Stil und modern eingerichtet, sie war sehr übersichtlich und zweckmäßig und doch auch mit einer warmen Wohlfühlatmosphäre
Great stay for our weekend away!
one of the cleanest places i’ve ever stayed at!
The view is amazing, clean comfortable place. The host was responsive and helpful will definitely book again.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: This incredible two-bedroom corner suite situated in Downtown's Beltline area boasts floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the space with sunlight during the early afternoons, showcasing stunning city skyline views. It comes with a cozy living area, a designated workspace, a sleek dinner bar, convenient underground parking, high-speed internet, and a private patio, this space offers everything you need.The spaceAn open concept space that ideal for a variety of travellers – whether you're here for business, a romantic getaway, a family vacation, a gathering of friends, or simply exploring solo and craving extra room – this space caters to allHere is a list of the few free things available to make your stay delightful:  King size bed Full Size bedBalcony with gorgeous skyline view Airconditioning Dishwasher pods Hairdryer UG ParkingHigh-speed WiFiQ-tipsLaundry soap & softener Salt and a few spices Body wash/Shampoo/Conditioner Sugar50 " Smart TV with free Disney Plus & Prime Dishes and Kitchen items Extra blanket Self check in And so much more....Just a stroll away from 17th Ave, the Saddledome/Stampede grounds, and the downtown core, this location places you at the heart of Calgary's vibrant scene. Explore the city's chic restaurants and lively nightlife, including favorites like St James Corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, along with numerous pubs along 8th, 10th, and 17th Ave. And for a quick fix or some zen time, you'll find Starbucks and a yoga studio just steps from the front entrance.Guest accessSelf Check InYou have a designated underground parking stall for your convenience.  Guests have exclusive access to the entire condo, there are no shared spaces.  Parking Details - Free underground parking is provided, suitable for a truck or large SUV.  - Please note: While most guests find the space comfortable, parking a larger vehicle may reduce the space between your vehicle and the neighboring one.  If you’d like to arrange an early check-in, feel free to reach out to confirm availability. A small fee may apply 😊Other things to noteIn the spirit of neighbourliness, building management requires the installation of a noise monitoring system, which solely monitors noise levels. Please note that it does NOT have the capability to record any audio, it is strictly for measuring volume to help maintain a peaceful environment for all residents.Registration DetailsBL275691
reviews: The apartment is in a great area, super close to some amazing restaurants. It’s also only a short walk to the downtown shopping area and other attractions like the river walk. The apartment itself was clean and comfortable and watching the sun come up and the city lit up at night from the enormous windows was incredible.

Honestly you can get more centrally located! In the Beltline area of Calgary there’s no lack of restaurants and landmarks to get to from the condo. The building is secure and we always felt safe. The views from the condo are amazing. Daytime or nighttime skyline views. There’s a bar called Proof right downstairs to grab a late night cocktail or a bite to eat too! It was a favorite. Drop off and pick up by Uber was easy to this location too!

This location is amazing! Parking is easy, safe and underground. The king bed is comfortable. The blinds let alot of light in, beautiful, but bring an eye mask if you’re sensitive to light for sleeping. Our host was very friendly and easy to communicate with. The apartment was quiet and felt very safe. Would definitely recommend.

Great stay, and awesome view. For a large building, unit was quiet, especially with having little ones. View itself was worth it, as had a good full view of Calgary Tower. Place was clean and as advertised for a unit in the downtown area of beltline. Communication with hosts was fast and any concerns or questions were immediately addressed. Would book again for sure!

All I can say is amazing, the bnb was beautiful and our trip to Calgary was so much fun. Perfect place to stay at and I definitely recommend staying with them!
All together definitely will be rebooking:)

The location is great, it has nice views, clean place, but it has a stale smell when you first walk in.  We had an issue with the bathroom door that wouldn't close all the way living an open gap, when I notified the owner she came to see the door and said go head and use it like that, but having  an open gap you have no privacy.  Also one of the couches was broken, they notified us that it was scheduled to be repaired. Hopefully the owner can repair this issues soon.

Great price for a clean, centrally located Beltline apartment with parking and a panoramic view.
Downsides: a broken, sagging couch; slow-draining tub; chipped paint, worn floors, and a torn balcony screen.
Check-in and checkout were cumbersome (grab fob from the unit, go back to the car, etc.). The house rules document sent at check-in was much stricter and fine-heavy than what was on the listing.
The host was pleasant and responsive but didn’t fix anything during the stay.
Overall: good value if you can live with the maintenance issues and the extra friction.
I loved getting the opportunity to book with Selase and would definitely book with them again! The space was comfortable, great views and ideal location. Selase was very communicative and helpful.
Amazing location for the Stampede! (Only a 15 min walk to the fair grounds) Very central to be able to walk to everything in Calgary. Very clean and comfortable, would definitely stay again!

Such a beautiful suite, master bedroom has an amazing view of the calgary tower & city skyline! Selase was very responsive and really sweet to speak with, the instructions on how to access   were very clear. loved every bit and plan on coming to stay again

Great hosts, good views of the city, nice parking space that fits an SUV/truck. Overal place has some signs of wear & tear. Not quite the luxury condo as advertised. Price is imo a bit steap. But it is as downtown as it gets. Bed is quite comfy, though the place gets very light.
Great location, easily walkable to amazing restaraunts. Easy check in and the place was as described.
I loved staying at this Airbnb. Amazing city views and close to many restaurants you can walk to. I would definitely come back again.

We had a wonderful stay at this condo! Selase was a great host, the condo was in a prime location very walkable to bars and restaurants right in downtown. The place was cozy and check-in was very easy. A plus that it came with parking as well. The city views from the condo were beautiful but it was never too noisy. Selase was responsive and helpful. I highly recommend a stay here!

We booked this last minute due to being unable to stay at a hotel we had previously booked, host was very responsive and we were able to book & check in very quick! Host was very responsive and checked in to ensure everything was going well in the unit! Super conveniently located with many places to eat and short distance to other amenities, would love to stay here again next time I visit Calgary

The place was clean, the couches were comfortable and the bed was a highlight.
Selase was quick to respond, check in and check out was a very simple process so thank you for that!
The neighborhood is also a secondary character to this place. Tons of restaurants and late night places outside that you can enjoy on the street level or from the wall to ceiling windows inside.
Had a great stay and would definitely recommend.

Amazing hosts that proactively were there to serve but also cared not to overburden. I will definitely be back. the space was clean with beautiful views plus central location to everything in the city. I can't say enough good things  about this Airbnb. from the check-in being straight forward with everything thought of, to the checkout where not much was asked. I loved my stay.

Great location and great views from the floor to ceiling windows. Busy area but being on sixth floor made it so it wasn’t noisy…..no trouble sleeping. And it was fun watching the world go bye below.
The condo was set up nicely, very comfortable and the beds were great.
It was spotless and very well equipped.
We will certainly stay here again when we return to Calgary.

Sel was very accommodating and was quick to reply to any questions and/or requests we had. The place was nice, great views of the city and the beds were comfortable. Cool bars and places to eat were literally across the street and getting to 17th Ave was easy.  Would recommend. Thanks for having us, Sel.
Amazing host. Lovely place. Couldn’t ask for a better experience
Great stay! Very comfortable, awesome city views, and walkable to everything. Good communication and easy check-in and check-out. Thank you!
We enjoyed our Calgary accomodation. Good location and good size. Has all you require and a very generous parking bay. The host was quick to respond and helpful.
Amazing location, beautiful apartment. Selase is a great host, very accommodating, communicative and proactive. Highly recommend.

Sel’s place just like in the photos. The place is walkable to downtown and has shop, bar, restaurant and grocery store around the neighborhood. Sel’s suite is clean and well-equipped. Thank you for hosting us.

Drop off and pick up by Uber was easy to this location too!

This location is amazing! Parking is easy, safe and underground. The king bed is comfortable. The blinds let alot of light in, beautiful, but bring an eye mask if you’re sensitive to light for sleeping. Our host was very friendly and easy to communicate with. The apartment was quiet and felt very safe. Would definitely recommend.

Great stay, and awesome view. For a large building, unit was quiet, especially with having little ones. View itself was worth it, as had a good full view of Calgary Tower. Place was clean and as advertised for a unit in the downtown area of beltline. Communication with hosts was fast and any concerns or questions were immediately addressed. Would book again for sure!

All I can say is amazing, the bnb was beautiful and our trip to Calgary was so much fun. Perfect place to stay at and I definitely recommend staying with them!
All together definitely will be rebooking:)

The location is great, it has nice views, clean place, but it has a stale smell when you first walk in.  We had an issue with the bathroom door that wouldn't close all the way living an open gap, when I notified the owner she came to see the door and said go head and use it like that, but having  an open gap you have no privacy.  Also one of the couches was broken, they notified us that it was scheduled to be repaired. Hopefully the owner can repair this issues soon.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your feedback. The issue with the door was due to expansion, which caused it not to close properly. We’ve since had someone come in to take care of it, and it’s now been fixed. Additionally, the parts for the sectional have arrived and the repair has been completed as well. Thanks again!

reviews_details.review:
Great price for a clean, centrally located Beltline apartment with parking and a panoramic view.
Downsides: a broken, sagging couch; slow-draining tub; chipped paint, worn floors, and a torn balcony screen.
Check-in and checkout were cumbersome (grab fob from the unit, go back to the car, etc.). The house rules document sent at check-in was much stricter and fine-heavy than what was on the listing.
The host was pleasant and responsive but didn’t fix anything during the stay.
Overall: good value if you can live with the maintenance issues and the extra friction.
I loved getting the opportunity to book with Selase and would definitely book with them again! The space was comfortable, great views and ideal location. Selase was very communicative and helpful.
Amazing location for the Stampede! (Only a 15 min walk to the fair grounds) Very central to be able to walk to everything in Calgary. Very clean and comfortable, would definitely stay again!

Such a beautiful suite, master bedroom has an amazing view of the calgary tower & city skyline! Selase was very responsive and really sweet to speak with, the instructions on how to access   were very clear. loved every bit and plan on coming to stay again

Great hosts, good views of the city, nice parking space that fits an SUV/truck. Overal place has some signs of wear & tear. Not quite the luxury condo as advertised. Price is imo a bit steap. But it is as downtown as it gets. Bed is quite comfy, though the place gets very light.
Great location, easily walkable to amazing restaraunts. Easy check in and the place was as described.
I loved staying at this Airbnb. Amazing city views and close to many restaurants you can walk to. I would definitely come back again.

We had a wonderful stay at this condo! Selase was a great host, the condo was in a prime location very walkable to bars and restaurants right in downtown. The place was cozy and check-in was very easy. A plus that it came with parking as well. The city views from the condo were beautiful but it was never too noisy. Selase was responsive and helpful. I highly recommend a stay here!

We booked this last minute due to being unable to stay at a hotel we had previously booked, host was very responsive and we were able to book & check in very quick! Host was very responsive and checked in to ensure everything was going well in the unit! Super conveniently located with many places to eat and short distance to other amenities, would love to stay here again next time I visit Calgary

The place was clean, the couches were comfortable and the bed was a highlight.
Selase was quick to respond, check in and check out was a very simple process so thank you for that!
The neighborhood is also a secondary character to this place. Tons of restaurants and late night places outside that you can enjoy on the street level or from the wall to ceiling windows inside.
Had a great stay and would definitely recommend.

Amazing hosts that proactively were there to serve but also cared not to overburden. I will definitely be back. the space was clean with beautiful views plus central location to everything in the city. I can't say enough good things  about this Airbnb. from the check-in being straight forward with everything thought of, to the checkout where not much was asked. I loved my stay.

Great location and great views from the floor to ceiling windows. Busy area but being on sixth floor made it so it wasn’t noisy…..no trouble sleeping. And it was fun watching the world go bye below.
The condo was set up nicely, very comfortable and the beds were great.
It was spotless and very well equipped.
We will certainly stay here again when we return to Calgary.

Sel was very accommodating and was quick to reply to any questions and/or requests we had. The place was nice, great views of the city and the beds were comfortable. Cool bars and places to eat were literally across the street and getting to 17th Ave was easy.  Would recommend. Thanks for having us, Sel.
Amazing host. Lovely place. Couldn’t ask for a better experience
Great stay! Very comfortable, awesome city views, and walkable to everything. Good communication and easy check-in and check-out. Thank you!
We enjoyed our Calgary accomodation. Good location and good size. Has all you require and a very generous parking bay. The host was quick to respond and helpful.
Amazing location, beautiful apartment. Selase is a great host, very accommodating, communicative and proactive. Highly recommend.

Sel’s place just like in the photos. The place is walkable to downtown and has shop, bar, restaurant and grocery store around the neighborhood. Sel’s suite is clean and well-equipped. Thank you for hosting us.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.99 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: FREE UG Secured Parking - 1 spot***Walk Score 96***Welcome to this downtown Calgary oasis, a perfectly positioned 2-bedroom gem designed both for both diligent worker on a business trip  and the adventure-seeking traveler visiting Alberta Rocky Mountains! The building is perfectly located in a walking distance to Stampede grounds, vibrant 17th avenue and Financial district of Calgary.The spaceThis peaceful corner unit features:- floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning panoramic views,  - modern sliding glass doors, - flowing layout,- fully equipped kitchen,- granite countertop, - dedicated workstation, - highspeed Internet, - Nostalgic Classic Turntable with records, - 58" Smart ROKU TV, - One designated underground parking lot.Our 2 bedroom condo can accommodate up your 4 guests and offers all amenities you need to feel like at home.Start your day in our bright, sunlit living area, with natural light pouring through the floor-to-ceiling windows. Prepare breakfast in the fully equipped kitchen and enjoy it at our dining table set for four, while gazing out at the cityscape or…Step out and start exploring downtown Calgary and crab the fresh morning coffee from the coffee shop right across the building! With a walk score of 96, you're just minutes away from the vibrant 17th Avenue, brimming with trendy restaurants, cafes, and shops. For those keen on sightseeing, take a short walk to the iconic Stampede Grounds and the state-of-the-art BMO Centre. The location is also perfect for working professionals as it is minutes walk to Calgary’s finance district.After long day return to this serene condo for a relaxing break. Lounge in the living area with a book or put on your favorite vinyl on the turntable, setting the perfect ambiance. The electric fireplace adds a cozy touch, especially on cooler days.As the sun sets, gather around again for dinner in the comfortable dining area or visit one of the fantastic restaurants in a neighbourhood! For some entertainment, explore our collection of records or simply gaze at the city lights through the expansive windows. The mood interior lighting sets the perfect tone for winding down.When it's time for bed, retreat to the master bedroom, separating it from the living area with a modern sliding door. You'll appreciate the blackout window coverings, ensuring a restful sleep. The second bedroom offers the utmost privacy and quiet—a perfect escape for those who value tranquility. Both bedrooms feature queen size beds with high quality cotton linens for utmost comfort. Being centrally located, you're in the heart of the action. From morning coffee runs to late-night adventures, everything you need is within walking distance! Whether you're here for business or leisure, our space is designed to cater to all your needs.Perfect for working professionals and travelers alike, our modern condo promises an unforgettable stay in dynamic Calgary!Guest accessYou will have access to the whole condoOther things to note“The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay.”BL280061Registration DetailsBL280061
reviews: We had a wonderful stay! The space was clean, cute, and cozy - just like the photos showed. Anna was incredibly welcoming and accommodating, with thoughtful touches throughout, including some yummy little treats! The location was convenient and made getting around easy. We’d definitely stay here again!

We loved the cozyness and warmth of the condo. We would definitely stay again on a future trip. Excellent location for Wordfest events.
Anna is a top notch host, responsive and helpful.

Anna was great to deal with, very friendly and responded very quickly. The place was really clean and looked just like the pictures. It was a nice walk to either downtown core or 17th Ave. Had a lovely stay.
Well located for those requiring a place to stay downtown with 2 x bedrooms & kitchen. Street can be a little noisy at night, but that is natural for a downtown apartment in a big city.

The location of the unit was GREAT, we walked to several restaurants, parks, playgrounds, etc.
The building and unit are dated, but seemed safe.
Check in was a little difficult, but after that initial time entering, it was super easy and convenient.
Same with the garage/parking situation, only tricky at first.
The host was quick and clear when communicating.
It was worth the cost.
Overall, I would recommend and stay at the unit again primarily because of location.

Lovely condo in a great area! So close to Stephen Ave and the saddle dome. We we were able to walk to all of our destinations!
Anna was easy to communicate with and check in was a breeze!

We cannot recommend this apartment enough. Anna was very responsive to all our questions about the property and surrounding area. The location is great, easy access to everything in the city as well as getting to the C train for trips further out. The apartment was just what we needed for visiting relations, plenty of space for a family of 4. A great kitchen, spacious bedrooms and great views. Thanks Anna 😃

Anna was an excellent host and her place was fantastic! Check in instructions were straightforward and easy to follow and her home felt very welcoming and clean. The beds were super cozy, especially when you’ve been outside exploring Calgary and beyond all day and there’s a lot of restaurants coffee shops bars and a nice little grocery store all within walking distance, definitely worth staying in her Airbnb, if you visit Calgary!

A perfect home base, for my family of 4 (children ages 12 & 14), while in Calgary, for a baseball tournament. Comfortable and homey. Anna, was attentive and friendly. Would definitely stay here again!

Fantastic stay during a challenging work trip. Perfect location with incredible food options within 1 block.  Restaurant market across the street has probably 15 delicious food options. Apartment was new, very clean and stocked with coffee, water, and snacks.  Beds were extremely comfortable. We had to extend 1 day due to work and Anna was extremely responsive.  Will try to stay with Anna in this neighborhood next time I'm in Calgary. Thanks Anna!!!
Great place - second bedroom doesn’t have a window although there is a lot  natural light in the rest of the apartment.  Immaculate presentation and we enjoyed our short stay.
Great stay at Anna’s place. Great location for downtown access and plenty of bars and restaurants nearby.
Anna's apartment is conveniently located and easy to get around, the apartment is clean and tidy, we had a very pleasant stay for three nights, highly recommended!
Great location, the apartment was clean and felt right at home. I would definitely recommend this stay!
My son and I had a great stay at Anna’s Place.  Beautiful space and we LOVED the neighborhood! Makes me want to live downtown.
Enjoyed our stay at Anna’s condo. The unit was clean and bright.  Great location—close to everything with easy, secure parking. Thanks Anna!

The apartment is located at a very convenient location, with really good restaurants and bars in the area. The apartment is a very cute space located in downtown, perfect for stay for a single person or a couple.
Anna is a wonderful host and promptly responded to all my messages. I’m definitely sharing this listing with other friends who will be travelling to Calgary.

Wonderful location, especially for going to an event at the Saddledome-just a 15 minute walk, albeit extremely cold, but that’s winter in Calgary! Good restaurant and grocery options nearby and the unit was great-so nicely set up. Anna was so helpful, especially in quickly resolving a TV issue when the prior visitor logged out of the unit’s Roku account. Would love to stay here again!
Anna’s place was exactly as described. Clean and tidy. Great restaurants around.
Very clean and nice apartment.  Looks just like the photos.  Nice neighborhood with lots in walking distance.
Amazing flexibility and communication, even got us an extra key to help with our unique travel situation. Definitely recommend!
Great location, lots great of restaurant and bars on 1st.  Place was spacious and clean. Beds were comfortable and it was nice to have the roki tv option.
My friends and I had a wonderful stay at Anna’s. The location was super central and access to the parkade was a huge plus. Would definitely stay again!
Anna was great! Clear communications, seamless check-in. The condo is clean and bright, and in a great location. 3-4 excellent restaurants within a block.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.95 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Located on trendy 4th street walking distance to the 17 avenue. Stylish 2 bedroom 1 bathroom with in-suite laundry has all amenities included. 2 queen beds with a built in Murphy bed in the second bedroom to be used as a work space. Couch converts to another queen bed in the living room. Fully stocked kitchen with all you may need for your stay. Heated underground parkingPremium Wifi, TV and Netflix.Balcony with a view of downtown. Business License # BL292056Guest accessVehicles above 6feet of height won’t be able to access parkade. SUV and minivans ok but no trucks unfortunately.paid steet parking available.Other things to noteLaundry will take long to dry, you can use the drying rack to make it faster.There are two fans in each bedroomRegistration DetailsBL247606
reviews:
A very comfortable and functional apartment. The galley kitchen has lots of counter space for making meals as well as all the utensils you need. The main bedroom is very well appointed and the den is bright and open with a comfortable murphy bed. Nice to have that option.
All in all, while the building is showing its age, this apartment is clean and has everything you need in a walkable location near great shopping and restaurants.

The location was absolutely perfect, right in downtown Calgary. Just a short walk took me to a lively street with great nightlife, yet the condo itself was peaceful and quiet with no noise coming in.
The condo was very spacious and equipped with everything I could possibly need. From the kitchen utensils to the mattress, everything was in excellent condition and made my stay so enjoyable.
Anastasiya was incredibly friendly and always quick to respond whenever I needed anything.
I highly recommend this condo to anyone visiting Calgary!

Anastasia‘s place was awesome and we loved it! Great location, clean, private and quiet. We never heard any neighbors so the walls are well insulated in the condo. I would definitely stay here again. Anastasia was also great at responding when I did have questions about check-in.  The assigned parking under ground was also great and very conveniently located right by the door and . Finally, she was awesome and allowed my three Pomeranian dogs.

Beautiful apartment in a great Location right near 17th ave (which has some of my favourite restaurants in the city). Also a very short Uber to the stampede grounds. The place was extremely clean and stocked with everything we needed. Anastasia was helpful and responsive to any questions we had. Thanks for hosting us. :)

Listing was exactly as posted! Anastasiya herself is extremely responsive, literally within minutes. I had some difficulty getting into the listing itself and she walked me through it and then even offered to send someone to the listing ASAP to help me get in (I did figure it out). Location is within walking distance of downtown and we felt safe doing so. Couldn’t hear any neighbors.
Perfect place for my visit. Plenty of restaurants and shops very close, and BMO Centre and Saddledome walkable. Anastasiya was helpful, kind, and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again.
Great condo for a quick stay. We loved the restaurants close by and very quick walk to our downtown location.

Was a great stay. I would have loved to stay at little longer.
Everything was clean and well organized.
Anastasiya’s place was perfect!! Great location, well-appointed, and spotless. I would definitely recommend it!
Everything was perfect- super clean, spare towels, easy to get in, great location.
Great location! We had 0 issues. Definitely recommend. Anastasiya was extremely helpful
Great location,  walkable to transit station, exactly as described.
Anastasiya’s spot was perfect for what we needed. It was clean, spacious and within walking distance to a lively downtown area with tons of good restaurants.
A truly lovely stay! The only thing I would’ve changed is my flight so that I could stay longer. Everything we wanted and more. Thank you for the hospitality!
Amazing host, very chill and friendly. Communication was excellent and she always helped work around my schedule!
Excellent stay, good area, and good details on how to get into the place
Very nice location that was very well-maintained

We stayed here for 2 nights.We highly recommend this cottage.It feels like home as soon as you enter the door, it is very clean and tidy, and the host also made furniture adjustments according to our needs.The Host also helped us quickly resolve minor issues and gave us a lot of local guidance and recommendations.Really great Host and accommodation, thank you for hosting us.
Everything in general was fine, there was only an uncomfortable smell in some rooms, I don't know if it was because of the rain or the ventilation of the building, or the apartment.

Only stayed one night but it was perfect. Easy to find, includes underground parking (for a small vehicle), close to everything we came for and it was just like the pictures. We were able to walk to the Saddledome for a concert and it’s only 2 blocks from 17th Ave. I would definitely stay here again.

Would recommend this place. Overall very good stay and value. Great and easy checkin. Two sets of keys with fobs - great. Clean place. Great kitchen. Comfy bed. Nice patio. Lots of places for food and drinks nearby. Furnishings are a bit dated and dimmer lights on kitchen counter wouldn’t stop flickering - minor things. Should be noted that 4th st where bedrooms face is quite noisy - bring earplugs if a light sleeper.

We had a great stay at Anastasiya’s place. We were there during the Calgary Stampede and it was in a fantastic location. It is close to bus stops to get to the stampede and to the downtown area. The place is also close to lots of great restaurants and there is a convenience store only a block away. We had a great time!

it's a nice place in the trendy Mission district of downtown Calgary. location is really good, near everything. Place was nice, clean. refrigerator was a bit loud, but it appears as pretty new, works fine. Has protected underground parking in an easy to navigate parkade. Would highly recommend to anyone.

My friend and I had a great stay at Anastasiya's place while visiting Calgary!  Everything was clean and comfortable and exactly as described. It was also in an excellent location - lots of great restaurants and trails within walking distance. I would recommend her place to anyone visiting the area.

listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Mission is a hip inner-city neighborhood that is centered on the 4th street. Its full of restaurants, pubs, artisan shops and galleries that add flavor to your living. With the night life of 17th Ave to the north and beautiful walking and running trail on the bank of Elbow River in the East - Mission offers a balanced lifestyle for everyone.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: 15 min walk to downtown 17 min to Calgary tower4 min walk to 17 ave12 min walk to Repsol Sports Center / Elbow river16 min to 4th street station LRTFrom Airport: 30 min driveTransit from Airport: take the bus #300 then at the end stop switch to either #7 or #3 bus going south
