reviews_details.review:
A very comfortable and functional apartment. The galley kitchen has lots of counter space for making meals as well as all the utensils you need. The main bedroom is very well appointed and the den is bright and open with a comfortable murphy bed. Nice to have that option.
All in all, while the building is showing its age, this apartment is clean and has everything you need in a walkable location near great shopping and restaurants.

The location was absolutely perfect, right in downtown Calgary. Just a short walk took me to a lively street with great nightlife, yet the condo itself was peaceful and quiet with no noise coming in.
The condo was very spacious and equipped with everything I could possibly need. From the kitchen utensils to the mattress, everything was in excellent condition and made my stay so enjoyable.
Anastasiya was incredibly friendly and always quick to respond whenever I needed anything.
I highly recommend this condo to anyone visiting Calgary!

Anastasia‘s place was awesome and we loved it! Great location, clean, private and quiet. We never heard any neighbors so the walls are well insulated in the condo. I would definitely stay here again. Anastasia was also great at responding when I did have questions about check-in.  The assigned parking under ground was also great and very conveniently located right by the door and . Finally, she was awesome and allowed my three Pomeranian dogs.

Beautiful apartment in a great Location right near 17th ave (which has some of my favourite restaurants in the city). Also a very short Uber to the stampede grounds. The place was extremely clean and stocked with everything we needed. Anastasia was helpful and responsive to any questions we had. Thanks for hosting us. :)

Listing was exactly as posted! Anastasiya herself is extremely responsive, literally within minutes. I had some difficulty getting into the listing itself and she walked me through it and then even offered to send someone to the listing ASAP to help me get in (I did figure it out). Location is within walking distance of downtown and we felt safe doing so. Couldn’t hear any neighbors.
Perfect place for my visit. Plenty of restaurants and shops very close, and BMO Centre and Saddledome walkable. Anastasiya was helpful, kind, and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for a wonderful review! If you ever look to come back - i am opening dates a month in advance, you can DM me and i will be happy to reserve the dates for you

reviews_details.review: Great condo for a quick stay. We loved the restaurants close by and very quick walk to our downtown location.

Was a great stay. I would have loved to stay at little longer.
Everything was clean and well organized.
Anastasiya’s place was perfect!! Great location, well-appointed, and spotless. I would definitely recommend it!
Everything was perfect- super clean, spare towels, easy to get in, great location.
Great location! We had 0 issues. Definitely recommend. Anastasiya was extremely helpful
Great location,  walkable to transit station, exactly as described.
Anastasiya’s spot was perfect for what we needed. It was clean, spacious and within walking distance to a lively downtown area with tons of good restaurants.
A truly lovely stay! The only thing I would’ve changed is my flight so that I could stay longer. Everything we wanted and more. Thank you for the hospitality!
Amazing host, very chill and friendly. Communication was excellent and she always helped work around my schedule!
Excellent stay, good area, and good details on how to get into the place
Very nice location that was very well-maintained
我们在这里住了2晚。我们极力推荐这家小屋。一进门就有家的感觉，非常干净整洁，房东还根据我们的需要做了家具调整。房东还帮助我们快速解决了小问题，给我们很多当地的指导和推荐。真的非常棒的房东和住处，谢谢招待了我们。
Todo en general fue bien, solo había un olor incómodo en algunas habitaciones, no se si era por la lluvia o la ventilación del edificio, o del apartamento.
reviews_details.host_response: hi Jennifer, I am very sorry to hear you encountered a problem of the smell, I wish you communicated - we could have found and fixed it earlier. it was the filter int he washing machine that clogged up and didnt drain water fully. we have now resolved it! i hope otherwise your stay was comfortable.

reviews_details.review: Only stayed one night but it was perfect. Easy to find, includes underground parking (for a small vehicle), close to everything we came for and it was just like the pictures. We were able to walk to the Saddledome for a concert and it’s only 2 blocks from 17th Ave. I would definitely stay here again.

Would recommend this place. Overall very good stay and value. Great and easy checkin. Two sets of keys with fobs - great. Clean place. Great kitchen. Comfy bed. Nice patio. Lots of places for food and drinks nearby. Furnishings are a bit dated and dimmer lights on kitchen counter wouldn’t stop flickering - minor things. Should be noted that 4th st where bedrooms face is quite noisy - bring earplugs if a light sleeper.

We had a great stay at Anastasiya’s place. We were there during the Calgary Stampede and it was in a fantastic location. It is close to bus stops to get to the stampede and to the downtown area. The place is also close to lots of great restaurants and there is a convenience store only a block away. We had a great time!

it's a nice place in the trendy Mission district of downtown Calgary. location is really good, near everything. Place was nice, clean. refrigerator was a bit loud, but it appears as pretty new, works fine. Has protected underground parking in an easy to navigate parkade. Would highly recommend to anyone.

My friend and I had a great stay at Anastasiya's place while visiting Calgary!  Everything was clean and comfortable and exactly as described. It was also in an excellent location - lots of great restaurants and trails within walking distance. I would recommend her place to anyone visiting the area.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.98 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: This spacious and beautifully appointed 950sf South-West facing condo offers 2 beds and 2 baths. Enjoy stunning views of the city skyline and the majestic Rocky Mountains right from your windows.Just steps from the Kerby LRT station (free fare zone), this condo is a short stroll to the scenic Bow River pathways, 15 minutes to the Downtown core, and close to the vibrant neighborhoods of Kensington and Eau Claire, known for their great selection of restaurants, boutiques, and cozy coffee shops.The spaceTake a break from your busy life in this stylishly furnished corner suite- Personal control over the Air Conditioner is with you in hot days- 2x fobs are provided on request for your convenience - 1x High chair and 1x travel crib are provided on request- Literally steps away (half block) from the Kerby LRT station which is on the edge of the Downtown Free Fare Zone- Relaxing balcony settings to enjoy the breathtaking Rocky Mountain views and almost a 1/4 of downtown city life and surrounding suburbs- All cabinets and drawers in the kitchen are properly labeled for your easy find - Dishwasher, toaster, water filter pitcher, electric kettle, Keurig Supreme Plus coffee maker- In-suite washer and dryer- Fire Extinguisher and First Aid kit are on hand in kitchen’s drawer- Free high speed internet, Standard TV channels, Amazon Prime & Netflix- Smoke free (not allowed inside or on balcony)- Pet free - Garbage room on the same floor- Free Gym- Free heated underground parking- Business licence: #BL289679Guest accessThe guest has access to the whole condo, including but not limited to:- fresh linens and towels- extra blankets- toiletries- condiments- coffee and teaRegistration DetailsBL289679
reviews: We were very comfortable at Rui's place, staying a couple of nights. The place is set up well for 2 couples. The place is spotlessly clean, good location with easy access, and private. The beds are very comfortable. We liked the labels on the cupboards, easy to find everything! Rui is very responsive and easy to communicate with. I highly recommend Rui's apartment!

Everything was as pictured. Great amount of space for two women going to a friends wedding- seperate bathrooms to get ready was a bonus. Very detailed house manual and the kitchen has everything you need.
The place was spotless when we arrived. The area is very convenient for driving around Calgary and getting to the airport and Banff. Thankful for the parking spot for our rental car. Lots of grocery stores nearby.
Would stay again!

Rae's place is simply amazing, in a nice area and the communication was great, we could leave our suitcases way before the check-in because of some flight cancellation issues and that was a life changer for us travelling with a child. the apartment is beautifully decorated and is ultra clean, wow. We loved it thank you again for an incredible stay.
Very clean and quiet 2 bed 2 bath condo that was perfect for our holiday. Very nice layout and the place was spotless when we arrived. Could not have asked for a better experience.
Felt right at home.  It's the little extras that made the difference - well-stocked kitchen, complimentary snacks, well-stocked toiletries, laundry, and cleaning supplies, back-up AC.

We loved our stay! Rae gave clear instructions (with pictures!) that made it easy to locate and get inside. Cupboards were clearly labeled so using the kitchen was a breeze - no checking all the drawers just to find a spoon. It was also well stocked.
We appreciated how clean Rae's apartment was! Spotless and comfortable, we enjoyed our stay and would stay again.
Rae was easy to communicate with and responded quickly. Thank you for a great experience, Rae!
Overall I think Rui’s place was the best place among all the four different Airbnb places that we stayed in Calgary. It’s easy to check in and also spaces are clean. Location is convenient

Rui's apartment was great! It was very complete with complimentary coffee and other goodies. We would have loved to stay longer but only had one night. The kitchen was well equipped and had a vast collection of herbs and spices. Bathrooms were also great, complimentary shampoos and soaps. One of the best Airbnb's I have stayed at.

Our family had an amazing stay at Rae's place. Everything went well, the appartement was clean, very well furnished and great view. Located in downtown west close to everything, very walkable and easy access to highways. Having access to the CTrain right downstairs was very convenient too.
Rae was always very responsive.
It was a very positive experience.

It was pouring rain when we arrived, in a city and tricky to drive. We couldn’t find the building right away, but once we did, instructions were easy to follow, lots of pictures and host was very responsive to helping us! Space was just as pictured. Great views of the city, easy to park, drive wherever needed. Beds were comfortable and bathrooms were clean. 5 stars.

We stayed at Rui appartment for a few weeks and really enjoyed our time here. The apartment was very clean, comfortable, and had beautiful views. We truly felt at home during our stay. The host was very kind and gave us clear and helpful instructions, which made everything easy. Highly recommended!

Terrific place, very clean and beautifully decorated.  Loved all the decor - someone has good taste. Appreciated the snacks, comfortable beds, great view, location, great fully equipped kitchen.  Plenty of space, spotless. Very nice building.  You won't regret the stay.

Rui is an excellent host. I liked the details Rui provided to access the property. They were very comprehensive. The house was good, spacious and well maintained. The location is perfect too, with two amazing Korean restaurants just outside the building. You can’t enter the property after 9 without a fob which I think is a great step to ensure  safety. Rui provided lot of amenities especially in the Kitchen which was great. You may not see the mountains well so just don’t choose if you plan to spend the evening looking at the mountains. Overall, it was a good stay.

This place was great! Close to what we needed, easy to access restaurants and grocery store. Pictures to locate and explain entry were phenomenal and much appreciated. Condo was beautiful and clean and had everything we needed for a couple of days.

Rae’s place was perfect for our group of two couples. It was within walking distance to restaurants and easy to get to. The condo was exactly as described and super clean! Rae was a very responsive host and gave clear instructions for check-in and parking. We would definitely stay again!

Rui’s place has everything and she was an excellent host. Place is super walkable to great restaurants and many amenities. Whenever I needed anything she was available within minutes. I would definitely stay again in future!
Very clean, well stocked and nicely styled condo. Handy if you need to access downtown Calgary.

Rae’s apartment looks even better in real life. It’s huge, full of natural light, and extremely clean. It’s noticeable that Rae thought of every detail: from labeled kitchen doors, clear instructions, amazing lining, great soap, snacks and everything ultra clean.
Top notch place! 10/10 would recommend.
The place was as described-very clean and spacious. The host was responsive and flexible.  I would definitely recommend it.
Very nice place. Well kept, great amenities, cozy place. The secure parking was awesome and really made us feel comfortable with a rental car in a downtown apartment.
The accommodation itself was very nice with everything you need. The tram outside is noisy but gives free transport.
Great location, excellent communication, and always responsive. Rae was very accommodating on our needs. Highly recommend to stay here during your next visit in Calgary.
This is a great place to stay in Calgary. The apartment has everything we needed and a big plus that it’s right next to the C-train stop.
really beautiful spot, with fantastic natural light and city and mountain views. great gym, private, and really good value. as nice and half the price as the other place i stayed in Calgary.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.71 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: This cozy travel accommodation is situated in the trendy downtown Beltline with amazing views of the city and mountains. Only three blocks away from the world famous Stampede grounds. Discover many fantastic restaurants, pubs and hot spots within short walking distance on 17th Ave, Stephen Ave or right out the door on 1st Street. Enjoy a revitalizing walk along the nearby Elbow River or take an adventurous road trip to Banff or Drumheller.》20 mins to airport》5 mins to Stampede ParkThe spaceThis spacious corner apartment is located on the 21st floor of the 'Colours by Battistella' building. ☞ Balcony☞ Location☞ Parking (onsite, 1 car)☞ 300 Mbps Rogers Xfinity wifi☞ 1 Smart TV w/ Netflix ☞ Fully equipped + stocked kitchen☞ Self check-in☞ Luggage storage available☞ Onsite washer + dryer☞ Air conditioningIt has a kitchen stocked with what you need for basic cooking. The open floor plan continues through the dining area into a big living room space and on to a workstation. The bathroom and bedroom are just off of the living room. The bedroom has a very comfortable queen size bed with luxurious linens for a great nights sleep.The most noticeable feature are the floor to ceiling windows that span for 60 feet along all the outside walls. If you come during Stampede (early July), you can watch the fireworks right from the suite!Guest accessMake yourself at home! The entire unit is your premium private apartment.You'll have access to the common rooftop patio that features colourful, artistic 'sunbrellas' and extensive raised gardens.We have one reserved parkade spot included in your stay but if you have visitors, paid street parking is available.Other things to notePro Tip:Add my listing to your wish list by clicking the ❤️ in the upper right corner.House rules will be sent upon booking.The neighbours are friendly and should be treated respect and consideration as they will treat you the same.The host may require to ask for a government-issued ID to confirm the guest's identity prior to check-in.BL290187Registration DetailsBL290187
reviews: I had a fantastic stay! Rihanna was an outstanding host, speedy to respond to any questions I had. The apartment was five-star quality and in a great location. I’ll definitely book her place again the next time I’m in town!

Unfortunately we had issues with the HVAC and despite it being cool in Calgary (1 degree at night) we couldn’t get the condo to cool down. Host did communicate with us throughout but she couldn’t get anyone to fix the issues over the 3 days we were there. So we weren’t comfortable the whole time.
Otherwise if the heating issue gets fixed it’s a great location, we have stayed in the same building before and it is our preferred location in the City. Unit is otherwise comfortable, clean and has everything you need for a short term stay.

We really enjoyed our stay at Heart of Victoria Park. It was very clean and comfortable and within walking distance to some outstanding restaurants . Rhiannon was an excellent host who provided clear instructions and gave us great restaurant suggestions. Her response time was great and directions very clear and helpful. We will definitely stay here again. Thank you Rhiannon for making our stay in Calgary comfortable!

Apartment was clean and as shown. Air conditioning was not working upon arrival, no one came to fix until the 4th out of 5th day I was there.
Host messaged me at 1:30 am upon my arrival stating I’d unplugged a noise detector (I thought it was a speaker and borrowed charging block) and asked me to plug it back in. That felt excessive and made me uneasy.
Very responsive, great location,  probably Calgary's best view of fireworks during Stampede!

The condo was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Great location with easy access to restaurants and shops. The host was very responsive and made check-in simple. Would definitely stay here again!
Everything was clean, great views
great place ,close to everything, clean, convenient. Will love to stay again
Amazing host, beautiful property and perfect location. I will definitely be back!!
It was really relaxing felt like home straight away.
Great stay, clear communication and loved my time there!
Wonderful condo in a perfect location - can’t wait to stay here again!
Great view, Beautiful place, Fantastic everything!
Great location, very nice condo.

listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Colours is situated on the edge of both Victoria Park and in the Beltline.Victoria Park is an up-and-coming area, with converted warehouses on 1st Street SW, now home to cool clothes designers and offbeat home decor shops. Eateries include casual cafes, laid-back global spots and Jewish delis, while bars and small music venues get lively after dark. The Saddledome arena hosts concerts and Calgary Flames hockey games, and the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo takes place at Stampede Park.The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: City transit (C-Train and bus) are available and stops are conveniently located nearby. Taxis, Ubers, bike and scooter rentals are also options. You'll find that you'll be able to walk to many of the local amenities. There are so many convenient restaurants, pubs, stores and things to do in close proximity.

description_by_sections.value: This cozy travel accommodation is situated in the trendy downtown Beltline with amazing views of the city and mountains. Only three blocks away from the world famous Stampede grounds. Discover many fantastic restaurants, pubs and hot spots within short walking distance on 17th Ave, Stephen Ave or right out the door on 1st Street. Enjoy a revitalizing walk along the nearby Elbow River or take an adventurous road trip to Banff or Drumheller.》20 mins to airport》5 mins to Stampede Park

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: This spacious corner apartment is located on the 21st floor of the 'Colours by Battistella' building. ☞ Balcony☞ Location☞ Parking (onsite, 1 car)☞ 300 Mbps Rogers Xfinity wifi☞ 1 Smart TV w/ Netflix ☞ Fully equipped + stocked kitchen☞ Self check-in☞ Luggage storage available☞ Onsite washer + dryer☞ Air conditioningIt has a kitchen stocked with what you need for basic cooking. The open floor plan continues through the dining area into a big living room space and on to a workstation. The bathroom and bedroom are just off of the living room. The bedroom has a very comfortable queen size bed with luxurious linens for a great nights sleep.The most noticeable feature are the floor to ceiling windows that span for 60 feet along all the outside walls. If you come during Stampede (early July), you can watch the fireworks right from the suite!

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: Make yourself at home! The entire unit is your premium private apartment.You'll have access to the common rooftop patio that features colourful, artistic 'sunbrellas' and extensive raised gardens.We have one reserved parkade spot included in your stay but if you have visitors, paid street parking is available.

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: Pro Tip:Add my listing to your wish list by clicking the ❤️ in the upper right corner.House rules will be sent upon booking.The neighbours are friendly and should be treated respect and consideration as they will treat you the same.The host may require to ask for a government-issued ID to confirm the guest's identity prior to check-in.BL290187

cancellation_policy.cancellation_value: Full refund if cancel within 24 hours after booking. Get back 100% of what you paid..

reviews_details.review: I had a fantastic stay! Rihanna was an outstanding host, speedy to respond to any questions I had. The apartment was five-star quality and in a great location. I’ll definitely book her place again the next time I’m in town!

Unfortunately we had issues with the HVAC and despite it being cool in Calgary (1 degree at night) we couldn’t get the condo to cool down. Host did communicate with us throughout but she couldn’t get anyone to fix the issues over the 3 days we were there. So we weren’t comfortable the whole time.
Otherwise if the heating issue gets fixed it’s a great location, we have stayed in the same building before and it is our preferred location in the City. Unit is otherwise comfortable, clean and has everything you need for a short term stay.

We really enjoyed our stay at Heart of Victoria Park. It was very clean and comfortable and within walking distance to some outstanding restaurants . Rhiannon was an excellent host who provided clear instructions and gave us great restaurant suggestions. Her response time was great and directions very clear and helpful. We will definitely stay here again. Thank you Rhiannon for making our stay in Calgary comfortable!

Apartment was clean and as shown. Air conditioning was not working upon arrival, no one came to fix until the 4th out of 5th day I was there.
Host messaged me at 1:30 am upon my arrival stating I’d unplugged a noise detector (I thought it was a speaker and borrowed charging block) and asked me to plug it back in. That felt excessive and made me uneasy.
reviews_details.host_response: We did our best to support the guest during their stay. While the A/C was working, it’s not as powerful as some may expect throughout the entire building. We had it serviced twice during their visit, but unfortunately couldn’t improve its performance further.  As for the noise detector, we simply asked the guest to plug it back in at his earliest convenience. This is just a a measure of security that we apply to all guests. In the end the guest expressed their frustration and requested a partial refund, which we agreed to provide as a gesture of goodwill. We always aim to be responsive and fair, even when facing unexpected circumstances.

reviews_details.review: Very responsive, great location,  probably Calgary's best view of fireworks during Stampede!

The condo was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Great location with easy access to restaurants and shops. The host was very responsive and made check-in simple. Would definitely stay here again!
Everything was clean, great views
great place ,close to everything, clean, convenient. Will love to stay again
Amazing host, beautiful property and perfect location. I will definitely be back!!
It was really relaxing felt like home straight away.
Great stay, clear communication and loved my time there!
Wonderful condo in a perfect location - can’t wait to stay here again!
Great view, Beautiful place, Fantastic everything!
Great location, very nice condo.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.73 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description: Experience exceptional urban living in this stunning high-floor corner unit, featuring a 1-bedroom + den layout. This meticulously designed condo offers unparalleled views and a warm, inviting atmosphere, ideally situated in the heart of downtown Calgary’s dynamic scene. Surrounded by premier restaurants, trendy shops, and vibrant entertainment options, you’ll be perfectly positioned to immerse yourself in the best the city has to offer.The spaceProperty Highlights:Seasonal Outdoor Pool: Refresh and unwind in the heated outdoor pool during the warmer months.Modern Fitness Center: Stay fit and healthy with our state-of-the-art gym facilities.Parking: Enjoy the convenience of one dedicated heated underground parking spot.Location Perks:Beltline District: Centrally located near a plethora of attractions.Walking Distance to:Stephen AvenueTD Core Shopping MallCalgary StampedeCalgary Flames - Saddledome17th Avenue (Red Mile)...and many more local highlights!Condo Unit Features:Private One-Bedroom + Den Condo: Spacious and well-appointed with a king bed, a queen Murphy/Wall bed, and a pullout couch to accommodate various needs.Modern Kitchen: Equipped with high-end appliances as well as an Nespresso coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans, utensils and all necessary items for preparing meals at home.Private Balcony: Enjoy panoramic views of the mountains to the west and downtown Calgary.Fitness Equipment: Yoga mat and small weights available in-suite for your convenienceAir Conditioning: Ensure comfort on warmer days.In-Suite Washer/Dryer: Provides the convenience of home for extended stays.High-Speed WiFi: Stay connected with reliable, fast internet.Smart 4K TV: 65” Smart TV with access to NETFLIX, Amazon Prime Video, Sportsnet, TSN, and select local channels.Mountain and City Views: Delight in stunning views from your corner unit floor to ceiling windows and private balcony.Automation: Blackout blinds will open and close automatically with the click of a button.Premier Host Support: Our team is available around the clock for assistance via the booking platform app, text, or phone.Additional Notes:Shared Amenities: Access to the gym and seasonal outdoor pool may be subject to maintenance or seasonal schedules. Please be aware that no refunds are provided based on amenity availability.Transportation: Enjoy convenient options including:WalkingC-Train+15 Walkway (just 2 blocks away)CabsUberTuroElectric scooters in the summer.For those with a car, one dedicated parking spot is provided.We look forward to making your stay exceptional—welcome to your home away from home!Other things to noteThe condominium offers a distinctive retreat, distinguished by its exceptional blend of comfort, style, and meticulous design. This property stands out in the short-term rental market due to the careful attention to detail that sets it apart from the ordinary.The interior of our condo features a sophisticated design that seamlessly integrates modern aesthetics with the functional convince of sleeping 6 comfortably. Each piece of furniture, color scheme, and design element has been thoughtfully selected to create a welcoming and harmonious atmosphere. Our focus is not only on luxury but on delivering an experience that feels like a true home away from home.Additionally, the condo is equipped with cutting-edge amenities designed to meet the needs of today’s discerning travelers. From advanced technology and high-end appliances to thoughtful touches that enhance convenience, we offer an experience that goes above and beyond expectations.Ultimately, our commitment is to offer more than just a place to stay—we aim to create unforgettable experiences. Our condo is designed to be the perfect setting for memorable moments during your visit.Registration DetailsBL283210
reviews: Had a great stay at Clint and Diana’s place for a girls weekend. It was the perfect size for four girls and very close to many bars in the city. Having a parking spot for this area of the city is also a great benefit. Clint and Diana were also very responsive as hosts. Would definitely recommend/stay here again.

So, Clint and Diana were very nice and super responsive, the place was clean and nothing was broken.
However, there wasn’t enough toilet paper or paper towels, No BBQ utensils, and only one key to get in and out of the building.
Lastly the pool was completely misleading.
Super small, and didn’t get really any sun.

Very clear videos on how check In and anything you may need help with during your stay. The apartment was beautiful and very comfortable. Quality furniture and linens. The building itself felt secure and safe. The pool was great for the kids to swim. Overall very happy with our stay, only downside was that the parking space is VERY tight for any larger vehicles .. we have a Toyota sienna van and ended up paying for parking at the Impark parking lot just across the street (no biggie it was very close) but just a heads up to anyone with a larger vehicle it might not fit.

Perfect stay complete with stunning views, ultra luxurious decor, quiet and secure building, access to a heated pool and fitness room, full kitchen and laundry, and walkable to all downtown attractions and activities! From the moment we booked, Clint and Diana were warm and welcoming, quick to respond, flexible, and ensured we had everything we need. We can’t wait to come back and stay here again! ❤️

If all AirBnBs were this clean, cozy and easy to navigate as a rental there would be no place for hotels ever again. Great hosts, that were quick to respond and offered suggestions regarding local amenities, as I wasn’t familiar with the city. Beautiful space! Bedding is a huge deal for me and everything was top notch quality and comfort. I couldn’t be happier.

Clint and Diana’s place is perfect for a stay in downtown Calgary. They are both really great to work with, they made check in seamless and had some really helpful videos to walk you through the process. Their apartment is gorgeous and well appointed with everything one would need for an evening dining in. I highly recommend their place for a stay In Calgary

Clint and Diana were very helpful, the check-in instructions even involved videos which I appreciated. The condo is bright and cheerful with beautiful views of Calgary and the mountains in the distance. We didn’t have any trouble getting to where we needed to go, it’s really central.
The kitchen is well equipped, the couch is per for looking out at the city with a beverage and the balcony is a really nice place to relax. The beds are comfortable, the sheets are soft and the pillows were not too hard or too soft.
All around a very enjoyable visit.

This downtown location is hard to beat and being on the 17th floor you get views of the mountains in the distance from the balcony. it was so nice to have a balcony with a bbq to use in the evening for cooking super as well as the two chairs provided on the balcony as well.

Great location, walkable, close to public transport, market and good restaurants. Recommended for travelers who like to explore…Great views to the west, secure building with amenities listed; would return on another visit to Calgary!

We had a great stay  and would have been happy to  stay longer. Clean bright stylish accommodation with all the facilities we could need. Good city views.   Communication was great and all the instructions were very clear. Good location and plenty of eating places nearby plus a good size supermarket Parking space included and was a good size. If you need parking for a large truck there areseveral parking lots nearby. We would have no hesitation at staying again.

Great cozy little condo that is well maintained and super functional.  Comfy beds and well stocked. Super building security. Walkable to 17th and downtown. Clint was very responsive and accommodating!  Didn’t have chance to try pool but it looked good.  Would definitely stay again.
The condo was the perfect location for everything we needed downtown. It was well taken care of, clean, and relaxing. Check in and out process was very clear and easy. We would stay again.

When we arrived at this Airbnb it smelled strongly of cigarette smoke. I contacted the hosts and while they said they could not smell any cigarette smoke, they were very responsive bringing us an air purifier. While I did appreciate they tried to remedy the situation and left some chocolates the place still smelled smokey for our stay.
The apartment was clean, had great views, coffee and a well stocked kitchen but it was very tight for three women. The sofa bed was very hard, and there were no sheets for it. There were some pillows in the closet but there were no pillowcases. So instead of each of us being able to have her own sleeping space we had to double up and share a bed which was not preferable.
The listing stated there is body soap and a bidet but there was not. I think this place has potential but it needs to be accurately listed and guests should set their expectations for a small place that would be good for two adults and maybe some small children.
We enjoyed our stay.  Super quiet and comfortable.  Great location.
It was a great location for downtown Calgary. Also, the bed was sooooo comfy!
Enjoyed our stay, beautiful condo; lots of natural lighting and more.
One of the best experience we had with Airbnb ever very kind people and the place is awesome
Convenient location! The place was clean. The kitchen was well stocked. The expectations for check out cleaning was difficult as there was not cleaning products.
Clint and Diana were wonderful hosts and we loved being close to excellent restaurants and shopping. Thank you!
Very clear guide lines! Absolutely loved the stay at their gorgeous condo. Clint was very responsive and even tried to get us an early checkin. Highly recommend!
If I come back to Calgary, I will definitely book same place
Very nice apartment with a great view of the city. We will stay there again next time
Great location. Clean comfortable space!
Great hosts. The detailed instructions were very helpful.

reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your feedback. We’re glad you enjoyed your stay and found us to be communicative. To clarify, guests are provided with two access devices, as the parkade remote also works for building entry in addition to the fob, apologies if that wasn’t clear. We’ll also ensure BBQ utensils, paper towels, and toilet paper are fully replenished, as we pride ourselves on keeping the unit well stocked. The pool size and layout are shown in our photos, though we understand it may have felt different in person. We’re not sure the times you were at the pool; however, the deck typically enjoys sun until mid- afternoon. We always want our guests to feel comfortable & at home, and we’re happy to keep making each stay even better than the last. Take good care and we welcome you back anytime.

We’d love to welcome you back anytime!

reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your feedback. We’re glad you enjoyed the views, coffee and appreciated our efforts with the air purifier & treats. While we didn’t notice any cigarette smoke ourselves - even after checkout - we trust your experience and hope the purifier helped ensure clean air for your stay. Bedding (duvet, sheets, & pillow with pillowcase) for the sofa bed can be found inside the sofa storage itself. Since bedding is such an important detail we’ll be sure to highlight this for future guests; however, we wish you had reached out - just as you did about the smoke - as it would have been a quick and simple fix to let you know where to find it. The square footage & floor plan are included in our listing so guests can ensure the space fits their needs, and we’ve corrected an oversight in the amenities list (bidet) to keep everything accurate moving forward. All the best with your future travels.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.91 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: ++++ NOTE +++As of April 1, 2021 the Alberta government has imposed a 4% Tourism Levy on short term rentals. If your Airbnb does not charge this, you may have an unpleasant surprise.No smoking or parties.Perfect for mobile and remote workers. One of Calgary's top Airbnb's. Check the reviews! Next to the 17 Ave and 4 St entertainment districts, but quiet as the apartment faces away. Steps from transit.Secure, heated, underground parking included.Rare for this area of Calgary - assigned, secure, heated, underground parking is included.This cozy apartment is a quiet, little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Calgary. It’s a carefully-considered space with modern furnishings, hardwood floors, and a south-facing balcony with ample natural light. You'll get to stay in one of Calgary's hottest neighbourhoods, 4th street/Mission/Cliff Bungalow, with a walking score of 95 (yes, you read that correctly!) Anything you need is just a few steps away from your home away from home. 17th ave is just around the corner and it's and within walking distance to the downtown core.Nearby amenities include shopping, groceries, a doctors office, nail salon, hair salon, barber, dentists, optometrists, banking, coffee shops, and the best restaurants in the city. Want to work up a sweat? The Elbow river path system is just down the street. You’ll find yourself connected to one of the most extensive urban pathway and bikeway networks in North America, which makes for endless opportunities to run or go for a beautiful nature walk! If the outdoors aren’t your thing, you can find a yoga studio, spin studio, and a barre studio down the street; Repsol Sport Centre and Goodlife Fitness are also a 10-15 minute walk away. What’s not to love? This amazing neighbourhood is a special place and we’re so glad to welcome you. Be sure to check out my guidebook (below) for some of my favourite places in Calgary!Calgary is home to the second-highest number of corporate headquarters in Canada. The Instagram-worthy backdrop of the Canadian Rockies (Banff National Park, Canmore/Kananaskis, and Jasper National Park) are only a few hours away by car! This apartment is perfect for people just visiting Calgary, business travellers, and couples on a getaway. It accommodates 2 people comfortably. This apartment is NOT perfect for you if you’re here to party, smoke, or are looking for a cheap place to crash in CalgaryThis apartment features:- Clean private bathroom with fresh towels, soap, shampoo, and hair dryer- Comfy queen bed and large walk-in closet- Modern decor- A small balcony for lounging in the summer- Free underground parking space- Fully equipped kitchen with everything you need to cook and dine- High speed wireless internet- TV, DVD- In-suite European style washing machine & dryer- Additional washer and dryer (pay per use) downstairs- Clean, safe building- Building is pet-friendly but no pets are allowed in this unitYou have access to the entire apartment and underground assigned parking. Feel at home and enjoy Calgary from an amazing location.NoteI am out of town frequently so have retained Calgary's premier host manager, Keith from Optimal Hosting, to ensure your stay is  comfortable. Keith will contact you about check-in and all details.Across the street from your flat is Shokunin, Chef Darren Maclean's acclaimed restaurant from Netflix's The Final Table. The 4th street-Mission-Cliff Bungalow area is one of Calgary's most vibrant neighbourhoods. With a walking score of 95 (yes, you read that correctly!) anything you need is just a few steps away from your home away from home. Cafes, restaurants, galleries, business services, yoga and exercise studios - what’s not to love? This amazing neighbourhood has it all.Seven major busses serve Urban Street within a one minute walk. The C-Train is a twelve minute walk. The Stampede is fifteen minutes by foot, 4 by car.1. No smoking in the unit or balcony or building. This includes e-cigarettes, vapes etc. See House Rules for  additional costs for smoking.2. No partying in the unit. This is a shared building, noise violations are in effect at all times. Urban Street is in the heart of the action, please enjoy but leave the party outside!3. Please turn off all the lights before you leave the apartment4. If you lose the key or key fob, there will be a $100 charge to replace it.5. Pets - we love pets and all animals but unfortunately can not host pets in the apartment. The building, however, does accept pets, so you may meet puppies in the elevator or the halls.6. The apartment has a small Euro-type washer/dryer. If you require a larger/faster wash and dry the building has commercial pay machines.The spaceRare for this area of Calgary - assigned, secure, heated, underground parking is included.This cozy apartment is a quiet, little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Calgary. listing_title: A Sunny Oasis, Five Minutes from Downtown & Stampede
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Across the street from your flat is Shokunin, Chef Darren Maclean's acclaimed restaurant from Netflix's The Final Table. The 4th street-Mission-Cliff Bungalow area is one of Calgary's most vibrant neighbourhoods. With a walking score of 95 (yes, you read that correctly!) anything you need is just a few steps away from your home away from home. Cafes, restaurants, galleries, business services, yoga and exercise studios - what’s not to love? This amazing neighbourhood has it all.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Seven major busses serve Urban Street within a one minute walk. The C-Train is a twelve minute walk. The Stampede is fifteen minutes by foot, 4 by car.

description_by_sections.value: ++++ NOTE +++As of April 1, 2021 the Alberta government has imposed a 4% Tourism Levy on short term rentals. If your Airbnb does not charge this, you may have an unpleasant surprise.No smoking or parties.Perfect for mobile and remote workers. One of Calgary's top Airbnb's. Check the reviews! Next to the 17 Ave and 4 St entertainment districts, but quiet as the apartment faces away. Steps from transit.Secure, heated, underground parking included.Rare for this area of Calgary - assigned, secure, heated, underground parking is included.This cozy apartment is a quiet, little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Calgary. It’s a carefully-considered space with modern furnishings, hardwood floors, and a south-facing balcony with ample natural light. You'll get to stay in one of Calgary's hottest neighbourhoods, 4th street/Mission/Cliff Bungalow, with a walking score of 95 (yes, you read that correctly!) Anything you need is just a few steps away from your home away from home. 17th ave is just around the corner and it's and within walking distance to the downtown core.Nearby amenities include shopping, groceries, a doctors office, nail salon, hair salon, barber, dentists, optometrists, banking, coffee shops, and the best restaurants in the city. Want to work up a sweat? The Elbow river path system is just down the street. You’ll find yourself connected to one of the most extensive urban pathway and bikeway networks in North America, which makes for endless opportunities to run or go for a beautiful nature walk! If the outdoors aren’t your thing, you can find a yoga studio, spin studio, and a barre studio down the street; Repsol Sport Centre and Goodlife Fitness are also a 10-15 minute walk away. What’s not to love? This amazing neighbourhood is a special place and we’re so glad to welcome you. Be sure to check out my guidebook (below) for some of my favourite places in Calgary!Calgary is home to the second-highest number of corporate headquarters in Canada. Feel at home and enjoy Calgary from an amazing location.NoteI am out of town frequently so have retained Calgary's premier host manager, Keith from Optimal Hosting, to ensure your stay is  comfortable. name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: HIGH up on the 21st floor, the condo is in the DOWNTOWN/TOURIST/BUSINESS CORE, ENJOY the WALKABILITY to all THE BEST RESTAURANTS, ENTERTAINMENTS, STAMPEDE, C-TRAIN, PARKS AND RIVERS, SHOPPING. PRIVATE and SPACIOUS BALCONY SHOWCASING THE CITY VIEWS to THE EAST and SOUTHFEATURES:•  Floor to ceiling windows, TRENDY concrete accent walls and ceilings• 10 ft. ceilings, AIR CONDITIONING, and deep soaker bathtub•  Fitness studio, ROOFTOP POOL and PATIO, indoor lounge.•  SECURE underground parkingThe spaceCondo HIGHLIGHTS:Total INDOOR space: 482 sq. ft.(Southern exposure, one bedroom, one bathroom, living room, full kitchen, dining and work areas)Balcony OUTDOOR space: 99 sq. ft.The bedroom with one Queen Bed and duvet, and gorgeous Window View.A CUSTOM-BUILT walk-in closet in the bedroom, equipped with an iron board and iron, extra blanket, pillows, bed sheets, a first-aid kit and fire extinguisher, and a 3-feet step ladder.Modern EQ3 furnishings in living room. EUROPEAN-STYLE kitchen with stainless steel appliances, GAS range, quartz counters and tile backsplash. The kitchen is equipped with a toaster, Keurig coffee maker, tea and electric kettles, rice cooker, dinnerware set, cookware and bakeware sets, utensils, wine and water glasses, cooking oil, and spices.Extra trays of utensils are in one of the dining nook drawers.Complimentary k-cup coffee with a Keurig coffee maker.52" smart TV. FREE NetflixOption to access Youtube and Amazon prime(Must sign into OWN account).Free WIFI with very FAST speed, suitable for working.Full size in-suite Washer and Dryer, and dishwasher.One full Bath, with a rain shower and deep soaker bathtub.Work area with an office desk and chair.Large CUSTOM-BUILT entry closet with extra bath and pool towels, and space for clothing and luggage.NEW black-out roll-up blinds are all through-out the suite to block sun rays and to provide privacy and comfort for our guests.Outdoor lounge chairs and table are provided for guest to relax on the Patio and enjoy the city views.There is a Garbage Chute on each floor for your convenience.Guest accessGuest access to: • The ENTIRE suite (NO sharing).•  Fitness studio (5 am to 11 pm daily).•  ROOFTOP POOL (opens from June to    early September, 9 am to 10 pm daily).•  Outdoor lounge with BBQ and fire pit (weather permitting).•  Indoor lounge with TV, kitchen, and    reading and work areas, FREE wifi    available (9 am to 10 pm daily).•  One SECURE underground parking    reserved for our guest(s).Other things to note•  LONGER-TERM RENTAL NOTICE     (Maximum up to 90 days):    1.  A rental agreement will need to be          signed for a stay longer than 28 days.    2.  STARTER supplies will be provided     3.  Guest(s) will be responsible for keeping           the suite clean during their longer- term           stay.•  This is a SMOKE-FREE building.•  For building Security: exterior cameras     (not inside the unit) that is monitored     by the building management are at:    main public entrances, lobby, elevators,     hallways, lounge and pool areas, and     parkade.•  Quiet hours are from 11 pm to 7 am     daily per building and city bylaws.•  One parking is reserved for guest(s).                     The VISITORS' parking is monitored     by the building staff and is NOT available     for ABNB guest(s)    (ticket and towing will occur).Registration DetailsBL269568
reviews:
Amazing views, amazing place, amazing host.
Completely unrelated to the flat I had a pretty terrible time during my stay (multiple personal issues at once), and I don't think I could've picked a better place to stay during this time.
Felt right at home and was a cozy little flat with amazing views.
Easily walkable in a very good location, everything you'd need and more inside the flat, and a very responsive and friendly host!

Fanny’s condo was perfect. The place was exactly what we expected and spotless. Fanny was exceptionally proactive in her communication and gave clear and detailed instructions for each part of our stay. We were able to walk to dinner and come back and enjoy our private space back in the condo. Highly recommended!
Even though we only had one night there, the views was fantastic and we were able to leave our luggage there for afew hours after we checked out before heading to the airport

Loved Fanny's place. It had everything we needed and more. Place was clean and the city view from the balcony at night is lovely. Fanny deserves her Superhost designation. We'll stay here again next time we're in the area.
A lovely apartment with great views and very central. Fanny was an excellent host, very easy to communicate with and very flexible. We’d highly recommend this to anyone wanting a stay in Calgary.

We had a great time staying here! Danny was very responsive, gave great check in instructions and was very responsive to questions.
The gorgeous view of the sunrise over the city from the bedroom window every morning was a lovely little bonus

We really liked our stay. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. The view was gorgeous. Fanny was helpful and responsive with clear instructions. We will definitely stay again if we need a place in Calgary.

Stunning apartment with a great view! Though the space is very small it has everything needed for a nice city stay in a very central location. We loved the walkable distance to both 17th Ave and the city centre. Having indoor parking at no additional fee is a great perk and hard to find!
Fanny made checking in and out very easy with clear and timely instructions. Would definitely stay again.

Fanny was an excellent host and her Airbnb rental was perfect for us. Checkin and parking was a breeze and we loved the views of the city. We only stayed one night but could’ve easily seen ourselves staying here for an extended trip.

Great place to stay in Calgary! Clean, comfortable appartment. Everything you need is there. What a view!! Own parking spot is very usefull! Fanny is always available to help out if needed. Highly recommended!

Fanny is a responsive  friendly host. The apartment is cute and comfortable. The location is great. Uber comes within three minutes. The location is great.  The view from the balcony is beautiful at night ❣️

Comfy and cosy apartment. Quiet area but easy level walk to downtown and Stampede stadium. Fanny also provided some ideas for getting to the stadium, providing screen shots and descriptions for walking and public transport which was very helpful.

Was a great place and very walkable to loads of restaurants. She had several local recommendations and found out information for me when I asked. Was very nice being able to sit on the balcony and not me too hot from the sun

Franny's condo/apartment was a perfect substitute for a hotel room for 7 nights. The room was cozy and felt very comfortable for my husband and me.
ONE TIP:
The condo is located on the 21st floor, so be prepared to wait for the elevator. If you are not renting a car, consider calling your Uber once you arrive in the lobby. Uber drivers are readily available around the building and typically arrive in under 3 minutes. Thank you, Franny, for a wonderful stay!

Fanny was a fabulous host and was super communicative and flexible with a late check-in due to our late flight in. The place was spotless and perfect for the two of us with a beautiful view out over the city. We only wish we had stayed longer!

Absolutely amazing view of the Calgary skyline! Was also very nice being able to walk to all the venues we planned on visiting. Host is very responsive and detailed with instructions and expectations. Would stay again!
Great place! It was a beautiful apartment with lots of amenities and close to restaurants and night life. Fanny was super helpful and clear with her instructions! We loved it)
Great place to stay to be close to everything! Clean, and easy check in with fannys instructions
Beautiful place!  Just shy of 500 sq ft so perfect for one or two people.  Great views and accessibility.  I would definitely stay again!
Fanny was an excellent host, the condo had everything we needed especially cooking equipment. Thank you Fanny!
We had a great stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and in a convenient location. The host was very responsive and helpful.
Great location! Fanny was really responsive and communicated instructions really clearly. Everything was super clean and overall it was a great stay.
Very nice apartment with great views from the bedroom. Fanny was super kind and showed me around, would definitely stay again!
Great space and easily accessible to downtown! Fanny was super helpful and the apartment was spotless.

listing_title: Modern Condo, Skyline views, & Parking in Downtown
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: This condo is situated in the DESIGN district of BELTLINE, ENJOY the WALKABILITY to:the BUSINESS core, all the BEST restaurants at the FAMOUS Stephen and 17th Avenue, Calgary Tower, the CLASSIC Jack Singer Concert Hall, Arts Commons-the performing arts Centre, the NEW Central Library, Bow River, Peace Bridge, Chinatown, the historic City Hall and other mid-20 century buildings from the post World War II, the Fort Calgary and Lougheed House Historic Sites, the well-known Saddle Dome at the Stampede Ground, BMO Convention Centre, Cowboy Casino, Studio Bell National Music Centre, the Contemporary Calgary Art Gallery, Flight Museum, and much more!NOTE:  Condo is close to the Main Stampede Entrance at:               1410 Olympic Way SE, Calgary               (Approx. 20 - 25 minute walk from condo. TIP: get a day stamp                 at any exit to RE-ENTER to the Stampede any time of the day.)Forget about the EXPENSIVE parking, just walk to the Saddledome to watch a hockey game, a concert, or for a convention.Calgary downtown has the world most extensive pedestrain skywalk network called the "Plus 15". This SKYWALK network with a total length of 16 kilometers and 86 bridges connecting to 130 buildings in downtown.The C-train is FREE to commute within the DOWNTOWN core areas.The must-visit Calgary Zoo is only two train stops away from downtown, and the Telus Spark Science Centre is only across the road from the Zoo.ON-IT Banff and Canmore Commuter is also available on the weekends in downtown (Summer only) for $10 each way to tour Banff and Canmore to view the Rocky Mountains!! The $10 fare also includes connected buses to other parts and parks of Banff for the day.Safeway and Co-op are both close by for shopping groceries.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Bus and C-train are close by. Or call an Uber or Lyft, or use Communauto (car share) for only 41 cent per minute (includes gas) within the city!Express Airport Bus 300 : from city to airport $3.65 CADfrom Airport to city (airport taxes applied) $11 CAD - purchase a day-pass for the same price to tour around Calgary for the day.                              ***C-train is FREE for commuting within the downtown core areas!Many pay street parking are available in downtown. Street parking is only FREE from Monday-Saturday AFTER 6pm and free all day on Sundays and holidays. ON-IT Banff and Canmore Commuter is also available on the weekends in downtown for $10 each way to tour Banff and Canmore (for Summer only).You can also purchase tickets to Lake Louise with ON-It.The Royal Tyrrell Museum of Palaeontology in Drumheller features one of the world's largest displays of DINOSAURS. It is about one and a half-hour drive from Calgary.Calgary to Banff - an one hour and 30 minute driveBanff to Lake Louise - a 38-minute driveCalgary to Lake Louise - a two-hour driveCalgary to JASPER - a 4.5-hour driveCalgary to Edmonton - a 3-hour drive

description_by_sections.value: HIGH up on the 21st floor, the condo is in the DOWNTOWN/TOURIST/BUSINESS CORE, ENJOY the WALKABILITY to all THE BEST RESTAURANTS, ENTERTAINMENTS, STAMPEDE, C-TRAIN, PARKS AND RIVERS, SHOPPING. PRIVATE and SPACIOUS BALCONY SHOWCASING THE CITY VIEWS to THE EAST and SOUTHFEATURES:•  Floor to ceiling windows, TRENDY concrete accent walls and ceilings• 10 ft. ceilings, AIR CONDITIONING, and deep soaker bathtub•  Fitness studio, ROOFTOP POOL and PATIO, indoor lounge.•  SECURE underground parking

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: Condo HIGHLIGHTS:Total INDOOR space: 482 sq. ft.(Southern exposure, one bedroom, one bathroom, living room, full kitchen, dining and work areas)Balcony OUTDOOR space: 99 sq. ft.The bedroom with one Queen Bed and duvet, and gorgeous Window View.A CUSTOM-BUILT walk-in closet in the bedroom, equipped with an iron board and iron, extra blanket, pillows, bed sheets, a first-aid kit and fire extinguisher, and a 3-feet step ladder.Modern EQ3 furnishings in living room. EUROPEAN-STYLE kitchen with stainless steel appliances, GAS range, quartz counters and tile backsplash. The kitchen is equipped with a toaster, Keurig coffee maker, tea and electric kettles, rice cooker, dinnerware set, cookware and bakeware sets, utensils, wine and water glasses, cooking oil, and spices.Extra trays of utensils are in one of the dining nook drawers.Complimentary k-cup coffee with a Keurig coffee maker.52" smart TV. FREE NetflixOption to access Youtube and Amazon prime(Must sign into OWN account).Free WIFI with very FAST speed, suitable for working.Full size in-suite Washer and Dryer, and dishwasher.One full Bath, with a rain shower and deep soaker bathtub.Work area with an office desk and chair.Large CUSTOM-BUILT entry closet with extra bath and pool towels, and space for clothing and luggage.NEW black-out roll-up blinds are all through-out the suite to block sun rays and to provide privacy and comfort for our guests.Outdoor lounge chairs and table are provided for guest to relax on the Patio and enjoy the city views.There is a Garbage Chute on each floor for your convenience.

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: Guest access to: • The ENTIRE suite (NO sharing).•  Fitness studio (5 am to 11 pm daily).•  ROOFTOP POOL (opens from June to    early September, 9 am to 10 pm daily).•  Outdoor lounge with BBQ and fire pit (weather permitting).•  Indoor lounge with TV, kitchen, and    reading and work areas, FREE wifi    available (9 am to 10 pm daily).•  One SECURE underground parking    reserved for our guest(s).

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: •  LONGER-TERM RENTAL NOTICE     (Maximum up to 90 days):    1.  A rental agreement will need to be          signed for a stay longer than 28 days.    2.  STARTER supplies will be provided     3.  Guest(s) will be responsible for keeping           the suite clean during their longer- term           stay.•  This is a SMOKE-FREE building.•  For building Security: exterior cameras     (not inside the unit) that is monitored     by the building management are at:    main public entrances, lobby, elevators,     hallways, lounge and pool areas, and     parkade.•  Quiet hours are from 11 pm to 7 am     daily per building and city bylaws.•  One parking is reserved for guest(s).                     The VISITORS' parking is monitored     by the building staff and is NOT available     for ABNB guest(s)    (ticket and towing will occur).

reviews_details.review:
Amazing views, amazing place, amazing host.
Completely unrelated to the flat I had a pretty terrible time during my stay (multiple personal issues at once), and I don't think I could've picked a better place to stay during this time.
Felt right at home and was a cozy little flat with amazing views.
Easily walkable in a very good location, everything you'd need and more inside the flat, and a very responsive and friendly host!

Fanny’s condo was perfect. The place was exactly what we expected and spotless. Fanny was exceptionally proactive in her communication and gave clear and detailed instructions for each part of our stay. We were able to walk to dinner and come back and enjoy our private space back in the condo. Highly recommended!
Even though we only had one night there, the views was fantastic and we were able to leave our luggage there for afew hours after we checked out before heading to the airport

Loved Fanny's place. It had everything we needed and more. Place was clean and the city view from the balcony at night is lovely. Fanny deserves her Superhost designation. We'll stay here again next time we're in the area.
A lovely apartment with great views and very central. Fanny was an excellent host, very easy to communicate with and very flexible. We’d highly recommend this to anyone wanting a stay in Calgary.

We had a great time staying here! Danny was very responsive, gave great check in instructions and was very responsive to questions.
The gorgeous view of the sunrise over the city from the bedroom window every morning was a lovely little bonus

We really liked our stay. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. The view was gorgeous. Fanny was helpful and responsive with clear instructions. We will definitely stay again if we need a place in Calgary.

Stunning apartment with a great view! Though the space is very small it has everything needed for a nice city stay in a very central location. We loved the walkable distance to both 17th Ave and the city centre. Having indoor parking at no additional fee is a great perk and hard to find!
Fanny made checking in and out very easy with clear and timely instructions. Would definitely stay again.

Fanny was an excellent host and her Airbnb rental was perfect for us. Checkin and parking was a breeze and we loved the views of the city. We only stayed one night but could’ve easily seen ourselves staying here for an extended trip.

Great place to stay in Calgary! Clean, comfortable appartment. Everything you need is there. What a view!! Own parking spot is very usefull! Fanny is always available to help out if needed. Highly recommended!

Fanny is a responsive  friendly host. The apartment is cute and comfortable. The location is great. Uber comes within three minutes. The location is great.  The view from the balcony is beautiful at night ❣️

Comfy and cosy apartment. Quiet area but easy level walk to downtown and Stampede stadium. Fanny also provided some ideas for getting to the stadium, providing screen shots and descriptions for walking and public transport which was very helpful.

Was a great place and very walkable to loads of restaurants. She had several local recommendations and found out information for me when I asked. Was very nice being able to sit on the balcony and not me too hot from the sun

Franny's condo/apartment was a perfect substitute for a hotel room for 7 nights. The room was cozy and felt very comfortable for my husband and me.
ONE TIP:
The condo is located on the 21st floor, so be prepared to wait for the elevator. If you are not renting a car, consider calling your Uber once you arrive in the lobby. Uber drivers are readily available around the building and typically arrive in under 3 minutes. Thank you, Franny, for a wonderful stay!

Fanny was a fabulous host and was super communicative and flexible with a late check-in due to our late flight in. The place was spotless and perfect for the two of us with a beautiful view out over the city. We only wish we had stayed longer!

Absolutely amazing view of the Calgary skyline! Was also very nice being able to walk to all the venues we planned on visiting. Host is very responsive and detailed with instructions and expectations. Would stay again!
Great place! It was a beautiful apartment with lots of amenities and close to restaurants and night life. Fanny was super helpful and clear with her instructions! We loved it)
Great place to stay to be close to everything! Clean, and easy check in with fannys instructions
Beautiful place!  Just shy of 500 sq ft so perfect for one or two people.  Great views and accessibility.  I would definitely stay again!
Fanny was an excellent host, the condo had everything we needed especially cooking equipment. Thank you Fanny!
We had a great stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and in a convenient location. The host was very responsive and helpful.
Great location! Fanny was really responsive and communicated instructions really clearly. Everything was super clean and overall it was a great stay.
Very nice apartment with great views from the bedroom. Fanny was super kind and showed me around, would definitely stay again!
Great space and easily accessible to downtown! Fanny was super helpful and the apartment was spotless.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.83 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome to our 2-bed condo with panoramic downtown skyline views perfectly overlooking the Calgary Tower! The space boasts expansive windows, luxury hardwood floors, and thoughtfully designed furnishings for a truly modern vibe.Perfectly located within walking distance to Calgary’s top restaurants, nightlife, and attractions, including Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, 17th Ave, the Saddledome, and Stampede Grounds. Experience the best of the city right at your doorstep!Registration DetailsBL296358
reviews: Loved the area we stayed at! It was wonderful to just be able to walk around and explore near the area and just find great restaurants. I was in town with my friends for a concert at the saddledome and its a 15min walk to and from. No need to drive or get an Uber! If you need a place for a small group of friends this cozy apartment in the core of downtown Calgary is amazing ☺️ Thanks again for letting my friends and I stay Thao!
ple: "We loved our stay at Thao ! The apartment was spotless, and the communication was excellent. The host provided great local tips, which made exploring the city so much easier. Highly recommend

Thao’s place is amazing, you got pretty nice view of Calgary tower and my family loved it. It is close to a lot of places. We liked how clean it is. Will definitely rebook this place in  the future. Our host is very responsive and kind!
Beautiful apartment downtown! So close to all the great restaurants! Great place to stay!
Everything was well. kitchen is stocked minimally
Wonderful place relax and peace we enjoy to stay ❤️

description: Heart of Downtown Calgary | High Rise Panoramic Views  | POOL + GYM | FREE Underground Parking & FAST WIFI★Limited Time Weekly and Monthly Discounts Available★Experience luxury and breathtaking views at our modern retreat in downtown Calgary.The spaceThis spacious 1 bedroom suite can accommodate 2-4 guests comfortably with the added benefit of an extra cozy sofa bed in the living room.Walk to the Bow River, Calgary Tower, Stampede grounds, Stephen Ave, 17 Ave, top restaurants and more!FLOOR TO CEILING windows with incredible Calgary Tower VIEWSIncludes:- One bedroom (queen bed)- Sofa bed in living room (sleeps 2 adults)- One full bathroom with tub shower combo- Fully stocked kitchen; with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans etc.- Shared gym in the building- Large Private patio and shared rooftop patio- Shared pool (May-Sept)Go out for incredible downtown cuisine or dine in with Netflix in our fully stocked kitchen. This fob is required to access the elevators and your floor, so please plan your daily schedules accordingly to avoid inconvenience.Registration DetailsBL279549
reviews: Misbah and Zubi were extremely prompt with communication, which I appreciated for a last minute stay. Place was well cleaned, well decorated and the kitchen is well stocked with kitchen utensils if you plan on cooking. Neighbourhood is perfect for quick access to downtown Calgary, and the apartment is very quiet despite being close to the action.

Hosts were very friendly and responsive.  They accommodated with a late check out. The space was just a clean as all the pictures and located in a perfect area of downtown Calgary.  Would definitely stay here again 10/10.

My daughter had an extended stay here while she did a co-op term.  She had early mornings and late nights and always felt safe walking to and from downtown.  The couple of minor issues that she had were addressed right away.
Great location. Would stay here again for sure! Hosts are very responsive and place was clean.
Great space, well worth the money! Didn’t bother me, BUT there is a train that runs pretty close by (you can see it)… so a train horn might wake you up
Great place to stay. In the very centre of Calgary, but still in a quiet area. Good pubs and restaurants within walking distance.

Great location. I stayed 2 weeks for work.. does get loud outside late at night..people leaving the bars. people above partied alot on the balcony...but has nothing to do with the hosts. The hosts were great to communicate with and helped make my stay comfortable. Deep bathtub so was good for an enjoyable soak. I would stay here again if they had space. Building is secure and I felt safe.
Host is willing to accommodate what has to be done for a comfortable stay.  Communicate  and you shall receive.

We had a great stay in Calgary! Misbah and Zubi were very responsive and helpful with anything we needed. The apartment was very nice and walkable to everything you needed in the city. We definitely recommend and would come back!

Mishap and Zubi were so helpful, quick with their responses and gave clear instructions with pictures on how to get into the apartment. I had such a comfortable stay with the full kitchen, washer and dryer and nice view of downtown. I would definitely stay here again when visiting Calgary.
Enjoyed our stay, being in downtown everything was in walking distance.
Great spot! Very cute building

We had a great stay at Misbah and Zubi’s 1-bedroom apartment in downtown Calgary. We visited during a cold spell, with temperatures ranging from -1 to -5°F, so it was definitely chilly, but we knew what we were getting into. The apartment itself is in a fantastic location—super close to shopping, great restaurants, and easy access to the train, which made it really convenient for getting around.
The space was modern, clean, and well-kept. My two young kids slept on the sofa bed, and honestly, it was more comfortable than I expected. They had no issues sleeping, which is always a win! The only thing I’d mention is that the bed in the main bedroom was a bit too firm for my liking. It wasn’t a huge deal for our short stay, but if we’d been there longer, I might’ve struggled a bit with comfort.
Misbah and Zubi were excellent hosts—easy to communicate with, responsive, and just genuinely friendly. They made everything smooth and hassle-free.
Overall, it was a wonderful experience!
We loved it! Super close and accessible to downtown Calgary and nice cozy place. Only an hour and a half from banff. Will definitely be coming back in the future!

The hosts were great and responsive, the address was wrong on there listing but they were very quick to respond and correct the error. This is not there fault but the unit was very shabbily put together as there was a big sliding glass door that was currently fallen off the track and could hurt someone. Lots of double sided tape hangers all over the walls with nothing hanging from them. Lots of grubby mirrors on the walls and a very drafty patio door. Again I don’t blame the hosts but the developer that built the unit used sub par trades. The bedroom is very small and I didn’t like the idea that the guest should clean and put away dishes because how do you know the person before you did a good job. They should ask you put dishes in the dishwasher and have a cleaner do the rest to insure cleanliness. There cleaning demands did not match the quality of the unit. If your a younger person this would be a fine place to stay but for my wife and small child we were disappointed.

This is a safe and secure condo building.The condo is clean and comfortable.We liked the pool and games room.We would book this again in the future, we also loved the underground parking spot.If I had anything to add,it would be a shelf or cupboard in the bathroom for the lady's toiletries.Misbah was very quick to answer any of our questions.

Nice place, well equipped kitchen, very clean. Unfortunately located beside inner city bottle depot and near busy train tracks so was noisy with lots of homeless people in neighborhood. Building itself was pretty nice but many noisy guests/occupants. Hosts very responsive and communicative but a bit of confusion with check in instructions. Overall pretty nice place but maybe better suited for younger guests who don’t mind noise so much.

Want to thank Misbah and Zubi for being wonderful hosts and loved staying here!! The extra towels, pillows and little touches were very much appreciated!
Misbah and Zubi are amazing and were so responsive, friendly and kind!! I had a situation where I needed to adjust my check-in and they were very kind and accommodating and I appreciate it so very much!!
Loved staying here and you will too!
Thank you Misbah and Zubi!!

The apartment and location was beautiful, the host was very friendly and helped me with organising a place to stay last minute. The only downside was that there was a slight few issues I encountered in the apartment and when I reached out to the host afterwards to let them know, I never received a reply.

We had such a great stay, the apartment has a lot of concrete which makes it super quiet which we loved. The city views from the balcony were also super pretty. They made sure everything was super clean and nice for our arrival and we were able to drop our stuff off early while the cleaner was still there which took a lot of stress off. We hope to visit again soon!
thank you for you cooperation and services
Great place and great view
The hosts were great!  The building was very secure and the condo was really nice.  The location was fantastic!  We would definitely stay there again.  Thank you so much, Misbah and Zubi!!

Amazing place! The hosts were very responsive and attentive! Just a thing to keep in mind, there is a coffee maker but no filters, but the location is amazing so you have safeway 5 min away, as well as a Tim’s, but overall is a great place and very central

listing_title: Luxe Downtown Hideout W / Skyline Views
listing_name: Entire rental unit in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Step into the heartbeat of downtown Calgary and discover the charm of the Beltline neighbourhood!From cozy cafes serving up artisanal coffee to quirky boutiques brimming with unique finds, there's something here to delight every traveler's soul. Feel the rhythm of the city as you mingle with locals and soak in the vibrant atmosphere. And when it's time to unwind, retreat to your own slice of comfort in our welcoming modern, rustic getaway, where you can recharge and reminisce about your day's discoveries. Get ready to fall in love with Calgary from the heart of the Beltline!

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Getting around the Beltline neighborhood couldn't be easier! With convenient access to public transportation including buses and the CTrain, exploring Calgary's vibrant downtown scene is a breeze. For those preferring to drive, we have a free underground dedicated parking space for guests and street parking is available throughout the area. Additionally, bike lanes and pathways make cycling a popular and eco-friendly way to navigate the neighborhood and beyond. Whether you're venturing out to explore the city's attractions or simply taking a leisurely stroll through the bustling streets, there are plenty of transportation options in the Beltline area.

They made sure everything was super clean and nice for our arrival and we were able to drop our stuff off early while the cleaner was still there which took a lot of stress off. We hope to visit again soon!
thank you for you cooperation and services
Great place and great view
The hosts were great!  The building was very secure and the condo was really nice.  The location was fantastic!  We would definitely stay there again.  Thank you so much, Misbah and Zubi!!

Amazing place! The hosts were very responsive and attentive! Just a thing to keep in mind, there is a coffee maker but no filters, but the location is amazing so you have safeway 5 min away, as well as a Tim’s, but overall is a great place and very central

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Enjoy this centrally located, fully furnished inner city condo in the Beltline near 17th Ave SW. Easy access to downtown and the Stampede grounds.
