reviews: I had a terrific stay here! The location was incredible, great walking distance to many good restaurants. The hosts were very responsive and very easy to work with. The space had all the essentials and made for a great vacation.
Great place, very clean,  in a quiet and convenient location. It had everything we needed, the host was very responsive. We would highly recommend and would stay again. Thank you.
Cody’s place was fantastic! It was spotless, super comfortable, and in a perfect location. Check-in was a breeze, and Cody was incredibly responsive and helpful throughout our stay. Thanks again!
Cody was great at responding to our messages during and before the stay. The place does look better than the pics as it’s quite cozy, clean and comfy. We recommend this place for sure!
The place was beautiful, great access for the calgary stampede. great please to stay with some friends!
this place has all the amenities and is in a great location

We had a great stay, the place is conveniently located (we went downtown on foot) and it had everything we needed to be comfortable. Cody was very nice and responsive. We definitely recommend this place!

Definitely renting here again. It felt like home, it was cozy, comfy, clean and quiet. The host was super nice, flexible and friendly. 100% recommended. Suitable for small group of friends. A good place to stay is important for any trip, and this is definitely the place. Thank you Cody!

I had a comfortable stay with children at Cody’s unit. Everything was clean and there were enough amenities including kitchen tools.
I would like to stay there if I have another chance to visit Calgary!
We had a nice stay here. Cody was very communicative and organized! Super comfy bed, would recommend. Very walkable neighbourhood. Close to many restaurants, coffee shops, and stores.

You could not ask for a better location! Cody's place was right in the heart of downtown and super easy to get to and find. Parking was so convenient all around and it stayed nice and cool being a ground floor/basement unit!

The suite is literally the same as in the photo, lots of sunlight for the basement, very walkable neighborhood in general.  Our host was helpful and responsive.  It's a great stay for a private getaway 👀

It was good. However, air conditioning in the unit was not working. It feels very hot when the drying machine is on.
When we arrived, the host hadn’t finished cleaning the bed linen, we had to finish cleaning it by ourselves. Not great.
Cody’s apartment is exactly as pictured, comfortable, and very clean. Excellent location, walking distance to many different activities and restaurants. Highly recommend!
Excellent host, very attentive to our stay, the place and the excellent location, everything you need very close. Very nice and quiet place. Cody thank you for everything.
Great accommodation, clean and spacious with everything you need. I would recommend it!
Great place, nicer than the photos - same place but newer couch and linens so looked more fresh. Everything worked great and very walkable location.
Cody’s place was amazing! Clean, comfortable, amazing location, and very easy check in. Cody was very responsive and helpful the entire time. Thank you!
For a basement apartment this place is FANTASTIC. large windows allow light and it is well furnished. Neighborhood is really nice too and walkable to almost everything.
Good place nice location and the bed was really comfortable! ☺️
Enjoyed our stay, was very beautiful and quiet for being in the city
Place was an awesome location nice comfortable and clean, hopefully back. Thanks Cody
Nice place, clean, good value, good location. Quirky artwork, but that's just me.
The apartment is wonderful. I recommend it.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.85 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Enjoy a modern stylish experience at this centrally located suite. Christmas decor will be displayed to give a cozy homey feel during your visit. Beautiful views of the city. The location is key to an enjoyable stay and unbeatable, with restaurants, shops and entertainment on the same street. All of this within walking distance, featuring a FREE SECURE PARKADE PARKING SPOT. Smooth virtual check in.  Bathrobe and slippers. Like a hotel, but a little more like home.The spaceApartment layout: This apartment unit has two private bedrooms connected with a hallway, each room featuring a queen size bed. One bathroom is communal off the hallway, accessible to all guests. One bathroom has private access through the Main Bedroom. Open concept main living room, kitchen and convenient, well lit work space, that can easily be tucked away. What is provided: Kitchen is equipped for basic cooking needs. Dishwasher included.  Nespresso pods, tea, hot chocolate are provided for your enjoyment during your stay. Private Washer and dryer are provided in storage room off of the main hall. Air conditioning for the warmer months. Fireplace for the creating a comfortable relaxing stay during cooler months, with the option of extra heat output! Ideal for business trips, couples looking for a romantic retreat, families on vacation, groups of friends, and even solo travellers in search of extra space.Bathroom: one bath towel per guest, face towel, hand towel and bath mat. Hand soap, Shampoo, conditioner and body wash included. Also included hair dryer and toilet paper.Toddler Friendly: pack'n'play, bin of toddler/baby toys, books, highchair with tray.Other things to noteServices below may require an additional charge and arrangements made, please discuss prior to booking. - late check in (past midnight)- additional towels- upgraded desk chair and stationary monitor - air mattress rental - additional baby gear - additional keysRegistration DetailsBL268824
reviews:
The location cannot be beat. you're surrounded by so many good restaurants that is within walking distance.
The apartment was super clean and we appreciated it. We were grateful that there was also a washer and dryer in the unit which helps immensely especially when you have little ones.
we'd definitely stay again should we ever visit Calgary a second time.
Fantastic location…walkable to concert at the Saddledome, lots of great restaurants and amenities just steps away and easily walkable to shopping downtown or on 17 Avenue. Loved our time here!

Amanda’s condo is in our favourite Beltline building but this was our first time staying in her unit, it will be our future go to! Her place is so clean, beautiful view and she is so friendly! My daughter forgot her computer and she messaged us right away and helped us make arrangements to get it returned to us. We were there for three nights and never used our car, everything is so close. Great big bathrooms with lots of counter space, comfy beds & couch, free Netflix. The units in this building are practically soundproof too which is lovely.

City Centre Suite is right on the beltline a short walk from BMO and the Stampede grounds. Everything was well thought out and the Nespresso coffee was awesome. The view at night of the city is beautiful and the place is just like the photos. Highly recommend!

We had a stress free incredible stay. So many options for food and entertainment right outside the door. Very clean and had everthing we required. The host was attentive to any messages and easy to deal with. Highly reccomend you stay here!!

This apartment is pristine - immaculate design, open plan, beautiful balcony. Plenty of space & privacy. The building is secure & easy to find/access. Plenty of food in the area and easy access to public transport. Kids playground across the street with plenty of squirrels & a resident large rabbit. The apartment was a great base to explore the city & a nice place to rest after a long day. Quality coffee machine and washer/dryer facilities were a great addition
Great location in the city! Close by lots of things to do, plenty of restaurants and coffee shops. Even though we had our car, we walked most of the time. Spacious apartment with a good view outside.

Amanda’s condo was great! It was clean, free of clutter, perfect location and most importantly for us it was kid friendly. Made travelling with our son significantly easier. I lf we ever find ourselves in Calgary again, I would 100% stay here again.

Terrible host: I texted already about the time I will reach (11 pm), and when I reached I called for access and their was no response  😑.  In midnight I was left stranded with my baby and family and lot of stress. I have to go to hotel and due this all this hasel my next went bad due to lack of sleep. Airbnb staff helped me on call to tackle as best as possible.

The apartment was great, centrally located. We were two different parties in the apartment so we appreciated having two bathrooms. Definitely a perk of the place, along with the great view. The building wad quiet as well.
Amanda was very responsive and all questions were answered in a timely manner.

Calgary Stampede Stay
We stayed at Amanda’s apartment as two couples before we set off on a road trip and found the location great. It was very handy for the stampede but also for some great bars and restaurants. We did a street art and beer tour and despite it raining the entire time we had a great time. The directions to access the apartment were spot on and communication was first rate. We would definitely recommend staying here.

We loved Amanda’s BnB. Great location! So many neat little shops nearby - bakery, coffee, markets, etc. as well as quick access to 8th avenue pedestrian street.
Enjoyed the bright and airy open concept living room/kitchen. The patio was an added bonus!
Beds were comfortable, space was very quiet, and having 2 bathrooms were a bonus.
Highly recommend, and we will look it up again if we’re visiting Calgary.

Good location for what our needs were. Area is a bit “sketchy “ depending on where you walked. Bed linens were adequate with terrible pillows. Bedroom with ensuite has no windows so felt like you were in a dungeon with 4 of us staying in the unit. No paper towels/napkins, no Kleenex, any extras were non existent. Washcloths had long black hair left in them from previous patrons.
Amanda’s place was perfect for our stay in Calgary for a wedding. Her place was spacious, clean, and the kitchen had everything we needed! The robes and slippers were also a nice added touch!

We had a great time in Calgary! The location is awesome and near to lots of nice bars/restaurants and in a very walkable neighborhood. The instructions for check-in were super clear and the apt is spacious

I stayed here with a friend for three nights for a conference. Place is beautiful and well appointed. The bedrooms are big for a condo and there’s two full bathrooms, which was nice. The only criticism I have is the building itself. There’s not a lot of soundproofing between units, so we could hear everything that was going on upstairs. People were having loud parties until 3 AM and we could hear if they dropped something on the floor. It was quite loud With almost no soundproofing and kept us up at night. Other than that, great place to stay.
Great place to stay, reasonable and good location. Would highly recommend this place to someone else
Very comfortable, beautiful unit. Area was a little sketchy to walk around at night but during the day is lively with many great restaurants and very walkable.
Loved the location.  Perfect for everything we planned to do over the weekend and we were able to walk.

beautiful stay, her recommendations for places and food in a book provided we’re all great. Definitely recommend Native Tongue & Beltliner for anyone looking to stay in the future. Balcony had amazing views favourite morning sunrise spot during stay. So close to lots to do downtown. A great stay 10/10
Nice apartment with a great view in a perfect spot. Will certainly come back!
Great stay — simple check-in, very clean, and perfect location.
The place is great, super comfortable, clean, and centrally located. Amanda was very friendly. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it 100%.
Amanda’s Airbnb is lovely, clean, cosy, in a great location and lets in so much natural light. Would recommend and would happily stay here again. Thank you!

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Lots of local restaurants, fast food, gym's, clothing shops, park, playgrounds, conference center, casino, etc.  This is in the heart of the city, with all the local excitement you desire.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Public Transit - Buses and C-Train system are available for a fee. You can pay by coins at the bus, or purchase a c-train ticket at the Station. This area is also very walkable, with lots of restaurants and stores close by.  Private Transport - if you have your own vehicle, you will be able to pay for street parking in many spots close by, each street is labeled with requirements. There are also a number of free street, or free hours for parking.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.69 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
description: Heart of Downtown Calgary | High Rise Panoramic Views  | POOL + GYM | FREE Underground Parking & FAST WIFI★Limited Time Weekly and Monthly Discounts Available★Experience luxury and breathtaking views at our luxe retreat in downtown Calgary.The spaceThis spacious 2 bedroom suite can accommodate 1-6 guests comfortably with the added benefit of an extra cozy sofa bed in the living room.Walk to the Bow River, Calgary Tower, Stampede grounds, Stephen Ave, 17 Ave, top restaurants and more!FLOOR TO CEILING windows with incredible Calgary Tower VIEWSIncludes:- Two bedrooms (both queen beds)- Sofa bed in living room- Two full bathrooms with tub shower combo- Fully stocked kitchen; with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans etc.- Shared gym in the building- Large private patio and shared rooftop patio- Shared pool (seasonal) (Currently Open)Go out for incredible downtown cuisine or dine in with Netflix in our fully stocked kitchen. Soak up the sun in the outdoor pool or enjoy views with friends and family in this peaceful and private space. Book now for an unforgettable stay!Guest accessIn the summer guests can enjoy access to the outdoor rooftop pool.The pool is currently CLOSED until Summer of 2026.Guests will also have access to one dedicated underground parking stall.Other things to notePets:No pets are allowed on the property. A violation of this rule will result in a fine of $500.Smoking and Illicit Substances:Smoking and the use of any illicit substances are strictly prohibited in the building and the unit. Violation will result in a minimum fine of $500.Parties/Events:Parties or events are not allowed on the property. Violation will result in a $2000 fine and immediate eviction.Keyfob Replacement:If the keyfob is lost or stolen, a $300 replacement fee will be charged.Deep Cleaning Fee:Our standard cleaning checklist includes disposing of your trash, washing your dishes, and clearing the fridge of any items you may have placed in there during your stay. We kindly ask guests to this maintain this standard and the property in the clean condition it was found in. Failure to follow will result in a $150 deep cleaning fee.Late Check-Out Fee (After 10 AM):A flat fee of $100 will be charged for late check-out.Registration DetailsBL278037
reviews:
Easy checkin
Convenient location
Safeway 400m
Secure building with gym and parking
Apartment is bright and airy.
Nicely decorated
Comfortable beds
Kitchen well equipped
Enjoyable stay!!

This place was in a great location, was as in the pictures, beds were comfortable and check in/out instructions were great. The only downfall was that the place was not clean and a note to the hosts regarding this was not answered. I spent some time cleaning on arrival but there was no mops etc for me to clean the floors. Windows had handprints all over them, crumbs on tables, floors were dirty, dusting hadn’t been done in some time and oven was unusable due to amount of burnt food/grease stains inside. Would have been a 5/5 if clean.

We loved our stay. I particularly enjoyed looking out at the beautiful city lights and looking at all the beautiful buildings. We were close to everything Safeway Starbucks every kind of restaurant you can think of in a movie theater. Our house even let us use their parking spot in a double gated parking garage with security doors, even into the building. We never felt unsafe. Sitting on the balcony was relaxing and really enhanced our Calgary experience. I would come back here in a heartbeat.

Wonderful stay! The place was spotless, stylish, and very comfortable- exactly as shown in the photos. The host was responsive, and made everything super easy. Great location too. View from balcony was spectacular! Highly recommend 👍

This place was clean and conveniently located for my trip to Calgary. It is in the heart of downtown and near train tracks so it is noisy at all times of day, but was to be expected for the location. The balcony was particularly nice with panoramic city views.

Host were gracious and accommodating. Responsive
It's in a great location. The building is close to amenities
Nothing you can do but that side of the building is a bit noisy. With doors closed all fine but can't really enjoy the great balcony and sunset view
It's a good not and accommodated 2 couples. Good size unit.
Not a 5 star clean however the hosts were responsive
Overall, it is a good spot for a short stay

This flat was in a great location - walkable to all the downtown areas. Great coffee shops and restaurants nearby. Great views of downtown and the Calgary tower from the flat. It was pretty quiet inside even though the trains came through downtown during the night. The hosts were fantastic with great instructions, communication and fast responses. Highly recommend.

Our super late check in was no issue had multiple units with a group in building. Parkade was big enough for a full size wagoneer no issue. (Even though we parked in wrong spot building was helpful and understanding everyone friendly front to back.

I had a wonderful 4-day stay at this Calgary apartment. From the moment I arrived, it felt welcoming and comfortable, providing the perfect balance of convenience and tranquility. With the doors closed, the space was incredibly quiet, allowing for restful nights and relaxing downtime. While the nearby train could be heard when the windows or balcony doors were open, it was never intrusive and didn’t affect my stay. The kitchen was a standout feature—fully equipped with everything I needed, from utensils and cookware to plates and glasses. The balcony was a lovely bonus, perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation, adding a touch of outdoor enjoyment. The host was responsive and accommodating, providing clear instructions and ensuring a smooth check-in & check-out process.  I would highly recommend this property to anyone visiting Calgary and would happily return on future trips.

We had a wonderful stay at Misbah and Zubi’s place. The view was amazing and felt secure even though it’s located downtown. The place itself was really great with enough space for 4-6 guests at a time. Fully functional kitchen plus air conditioning. Both beds are comfortable plus they have extra blankets (and towels) for the hide-in bed in the living room. Other than that, the place is accurately described in the listing.
Misbah and Zubi are both responsive and helpful in accommodating our requests when I reached out. I brought up the issue that some of the knives are rusty and they said they will be replacing them soon.
They also provided detailed information on getting to the place and in locating the parkade underground.
Highly recommend this AirBnb to anyone looking for a great place to stay. I would love to book this place again in the future!

Amazing Airbnb! One of the best I’ve stayed in by far. The location was amazing downtown and walkable to everything I needed to do for my trip. Secure and safe parking was a bonus. The unit was clean, had everything I needed and the most comfortable bed!! Very quiet and couldn’t even hear anything outside. Host was very responsive and accommodating to my plans and schedule. So worth the price and would definitely stay again.
Nice place to stay. Convenient for us to go somewhere. Feel safe and securities are friendly! Wish we could stay longer!
Amazing location in downtown. Very close to lots of bars and clubs, the Airbnb was beautiful, modern and clean.  Would definitely recommend!
A group of 5 of us stayed here for 2 night during Stampede. Great place, great location! There was coffee and coffee filters which was a nice touch.
I was there for a few days for business. An excellent place to stay, well located and very nice hosts.
This is a very nice condo in the heart of Calgary. Communication and checking was smooth. I’d definitely book again when staying in Calgary.
We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful apartment. Great location and incredible views!
Great apartment in a perfect location. Would recommend
Very nice place! Great location! helpful hosts!
Everything great at the apt. As expected

The apartment is perfectly located to explore the city on foot.
The views from the apartment are magnificent. The apartment is very spacious. We stayed there four days with our three children.
Wonderful place
Great location!

listing_title: Luxe Modern Escape W/ Tower Views
listing_name: Entire rental unit in Calgary, Canada

description_by_sections.value: Heart of Downtown Calgary | High Rise Panoramic Views  | POOL + GYM | FREE Underground Parking & FAST WIFI★Limited Time Weekly and Monthly Discounts Available★Experience luxury and breathtaking views at our luxe retreat in downtown Calgary.

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: This spacious 2 bedroom suite can accommodate 1-6 guests comfortably with the added benefit of an extra cozy sofa bed in the living room.Walk to the Bow River, Calgary Tower, Stampede grounds, Stephen Ave, 17 Ave, top restaurants and more!FLOOR TO CEILING windows with incredible Calgary Tower VIEWSIncludes:- Two bedrooms (both queen beds)- Sofa bed in living room- Two full bathrooms with tub shower combo- Fully stocked kitchen; with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans etc.- Shared gym in the building- Large private patio and shared rooftop patio- Shared pool (seasonal) (Currently Open)Go out for incredible downtown cuisine or dine in with Netflix in our fully stocked kitchen. Soak up the sun in the outdoor pool or enjoy views with friends and family in this peaceful and private space. Book now for an unforgettable stay!

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: In the summer guests can enjoy access to the outdoor rooftop pool.The pool is currently CLOSED until Summer of 2026.Guests will also have access to one dedicated underground parking stall.

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: Pets:No pets are allowed on the property. A violation of this rule will result in a fine of $500.Smoking and Illicit Substances:Smoking and the use of any illicit substances are strictly prohibited in the building and the unit. Violation will result in a minimum fine of $500.Parties/Events:Parties or events are not allowed on the property. Violation will result in a $2000 fine and immediate eviction.Keyfob Replacement:If the keyfob is lost or stolen, a $300 replacement fee will be charged.Deep Cleaning Fee:Our standard cleaning checklist includes disposing of your trash, washing your dishes, and clearing the fridge of any items you may have placed in there during your stay. We kindly ask guests to this maintain this standard and the property in the clean condition it was found in. Failure to follow will result in a $150 deep cleaning fee.Late Check-Out Fee (After 10 AM):A flat fee of $100 will be charged for late check-out.

cancellation_policy.cancellation_value: Full refund if cancel within 24 hours after booking. Get back 100% of what you paid..

This place was in a great location, was as in the pictures, beds were comfortable and check in/out instructions were great. The only downfall was that the place was not clean and a note to the hosts regarding this was not answered. I spent some time cleaning on arrival but there was no mops etc for me to clean the floors. Windows had handprints all over them, crumbs on tables, floors were dirty, dusting hadn’t been done in some time and oven was unusable due to amount of burnt food/grease stains inside. Would have been a 5/5 if clean.

We loved our stay. I particularly enjoyed looking out at the beautiful city lights and looking at all the beautiful buildings. We were close to everything Safeway Starbucks every kind of restaurant you can think of in a movie theater. Our house even let us use their parking spot in a double gated parking garage with security doors, even into the building. We never felt unsafe. Sitting on the balcony was relaxing and really enhanced our Calgary experience. I would come back here in a heartbeat.

Wonderful stay! The place was spotless, stylish, and very comfortable- exactly as shown in the photos. The host was responsive, and made everything super easy. Great location too. View from balcony was spectacular! Highly recommend 👍

This place was clean and conveniently located for my trip to Calgary. It is in the heart of downtown and near train tracks so it is noisy at all times of day, but was to be expected for the location. The balcony was particularly nice with panoramic city views.

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.90 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: This is an amazing two bedroom condo and is located in the Beltline area of Downtown. It offers floor to ceiling large windows, with sun filled early afternoons, beautiful views and city skyline During your stay with us, you'll enjoy the full array of home comforts within a tastefully adorned downtown condo.Ideal for business trips, couples looking for a romantic retreat, families on vacation, groups of friends, and even solo travellers in search of extra space.BL260264The spaceJust a stroll away from 17th Ave, the Saddledome/Stampede grounds, and the downtown core, this location places you at the heart of Calgary's vibrant scene. Explore the city's chic restaurants and lively nightlife, including favorites like St James Corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, along with numerous pubs along 8th, 10th, and 17th Ave. And for a quick fix or some zen time, you'll find Starbucks and a yoga studio just steps from the front entrance. Here is a list of the few free things available to make your stay delightful: Balcony with gorgeous skyline view  Central Airconditioning Underground ParkingQueen size bed Full Size bedTowels and beddingDinning Table and ChairsCouch and Love SeatPatio FurnitureComplimentary Drinks (Coffee & tea)55 " Smart TV with free Disney, Prime and Roku Live ChannelsDishwasher pods Hairdryer UG ParkingHigh-speed WiFiQ-tipsLaundry soap & softener Salt and a few spices Body wash/Shampoo/Conditioner SugarDishes and Kitchen items Extra blanket And so much more....Guest accessSelf Check InYou have a designated underground parking stall for your convenience.  Guests have exclusive access to the entire condo, there are no shared spaces.  Parking Details - Free underground parking is provided, suitable for a truck or large SUV.  - Please note: While most guests find the space comfortable, parking a larger vehicle may reduce the space between your vehicle and the neighboring one.  If you’d like to arrange an early check-in, feel free to reach out to confirm availability. A small fee may apply. 😊Other things to noteIn the spirit of neighbourliness, building management requires the installation of a noise monitoring system, which solely monitors noise levels. Please note that it does NOT have the capability to record any audio, it is strictly for measuring volume to help maintain a peaceful environment for all residents.Registration DetailsBL260264
reviews: Fantastic location with so much to do right at your doorstep. Close to tons of bars and restaurants. Building and area felt safe. Instructions were clear and easy to use to access the unit. Free parking was a bonus. When we arrived the tub was leaking and progressively got worse over the weekend but Selase was quick to respond and send someone out to fix it as soon as we asked. Would definitely recommend this home!

Great location with excellent restaurants across the street. 10 min walk to downtown. Easy to drive everywhere. VERY responsive hosts. Most complete kitchen at an Airbnb. Lots of clean linens. Most importantly we would stay there again. I left an item in the condo, they reached out and within 30 minutes we had a plan in place to get the item to our home in Burlington. Amazing

Our stay at Selase’s condo was excellent! We really appreciated all the informations and instructions ahead of time- this made parking and getting into the condo a breeze. Everything was spotless, comfortable, and the location was ideal for a short but sweet stay in Calgary! I would certainly recommend this listing.

Clean and beautiful apartment. A bit dark at night, but still comfy.
The check-in instruction is a bit difficult to understand. But the host was very proactive and responsive, he answered our question in minute making that not a big problem.
In general, we love this place. Recommended!!

We had a great stay at Selase’s. The place was clean and comfortable. Great location - coffee shop across the street. Easily walkable to everywhere we wanted to go - or if not, many Ubers available within minutes. Very nice view of Calgary. We enjoyed our stay!

Selase’s condo was great! So close to many things we wanted to see and do. Walkable to many restaurants around town! The view from the balcony is wonderful- especially at night when watching the Calgary Tower lights change!
Super clean apartment and all the amenities you need. Would recommend Selase’s place to anyone that wants to stay in downtown Calgary! Thanks so much!

We had a lovely stay here, the apartment is big and has everything you need. The location is fantastic with restaurants, breakfast places, bars and pubs all around. It's also really easy to walk from there to downtown. The skyline view from the living room is really special! We would totally stay again next time we are in Calgary!

Wonderful place to stay in the downtown area. Nice view and easy to get to most places in downtown or around the city. The rooms and amenities were just as described, and this made the stay wonderful for us. Selase was very quick to respond anytime we had a question about the place or city. Definitely recommend this place!

Our stay here was wonderful! The AirBNB feels very safe and is in a fantastic location. Our host was amazing and was so responsive to all of our questions. It was spotless and very cozy as well, plus it had an incredible view of the city! We would absolutely stay here again!

Highly recommend Selase’s place for a safe, comfortable and convenient stay in Calgary downtown. The condo was clean and equipped with all the essentials (and extra). Selase and Brionnae were kind to frequently check in with us during our stay and restocked what was needed asap.

Would stay here again. Only issue we had was with check-in. We weren't able to connect with the host through the intercom system after several tries. Thankfully, another resident let us in and we were able to get situated. Check in and parking instructions were clear once we got past that issue.
Amazing downtown views with several good restaurants nearby. Loved the patio and spent much of our downtime outside. Everything was as-pictured in the listing.
Would recommend!

Fantastic host, was very responsive and nothing was a problem. excellent location close proximity to shops and restuarants.
would highly recommend

Salese’s condo is perfect for a relaxing stay in Calgary. Whether you’re there for two days or a week the location is perfect. Across the street from fantastic restaurants and pubs as well as extremely walkable to downtown, shopping is also close by. The building is clean, modern and quiet. We will stay here again on our next visit to Calgary.
Great place walkable distance to lots of places and amazing balcony view

Excellent host and giving very good and explicit directions and resources. Would definitely stay again.... paid premium because of 15,000 Rotarians being in town. We loved all the grocery store and restaurant and food court options in the area. Felt safe.... I'm not a lover of parking ramps so didn't like the upward First climb or I'll quickly the garage door shuts but understand it and super appreciated having the parking space and the freedom to be able to drive to the mountains and come back at night and have a parking space. One night was super cold and my mother was very appreciative of the chicken noodle soup he provided in the cupboard. I loved the coffee syrup every morning. Very comfortable!!! Great skyline view day or night! And very walkable to the Saddledome and BMO Center. Loved his checking in mid-stay and then reminder of how to check out and what to do. Always seemed very reachable and responsive.
The place is very clean, walking distance to our venue in BMO Centre. The host is easy to communicate. I will stay again if its available during our next events. Thank you very much.

Great furnished condo . The owner was very friendly and we had a great time in the  apartment .  Lots of places to visit in downtown area or to eat/drink nearby including pubs or a Starbucks downstairs. The condo is fully furnished with good quality furniture, very clean and has everything you need. However I strongly not recommend anyone to go outside after 11 pm as the area could be crowded with lots of weird people. Otherwise I recommend this booking as a 5 star one.

If you’re looking for a place that truly feels like home, this is it! The attention to detail, cozy atmosphere, and thoughtful touches throughout the space make it stand out. Everything was spotless, the location was perfect, and the host was incredibly accommodating and responsive. It’s clear they go above and beyond to ensure guests have the best possible stay. Highly recommend to anyone looking for comfort, convenience, and a touch of luxury. Can’t wait to return!
Great unit! Very well stocked. And very good location.
Fantastic host.  Very responsive.
This apartment had a great view and was perfect for our stay in Calgary.
I can recommand this appartement!!!
Selase was very respectful and responsive, and the apartment was lovely and exactly as pictured
Great view of the city and excellent place to start your journey of Calgary on foot. Had some troubles getting into the building, but after that, the stay was great!

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.90 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Welcome home!This stylish suite has features floor to ceiling glass windows, breathtaking city views, two bedrooms, kind bed, comfy living area, a dedicated work space with dual monitors, UG parking, high speed internet, private patio and more.When you stay with us you’ll experience all the comforts of home, in a professionally decorated downtown condo.Perfect for diverse groups of travelers, including; business, couples, families, friends and even solo travelers looking for extra space.The spaceWithin walking distance to 17th Ave, Saddledome/Stampede grounds and downtown core. Steps away from Calgary's trendiest restaurants and best nightlife such as St James corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, endless pubs, popular 8th, 10th and 17th Ave, Starbucks and a yoga studio a stone throw from front entrance.Notable Features:-King bed-Work Station with Dual Monitors-Balcony with spectacular skyline view-Fresh beddings & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-Eating Bar-High-speed WiFi-Free underground parking-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machineID Verification required for our property.We do not accept arrivals 2am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time please refrain from booking. Thank youGuest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.Registration DetailsBL272356
reviews:
Great service from our host Kyle to access the condo, he is very proactive with instructions and very accommodating.
The condo was very clean and had more than enough kitchen supplies.
This location is a short walk to downtown and surrounded also by great restaurants and bars.
We will be repeat guests.

We had a wonderful stay at Kyle’s and Andrew’s Airbnb! The space was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Kyle and Andrew were excellent communicators and provided help whenever needed for a great experience. The location was perfect as it was close to everything in downtown. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a relaxing and hassle-free stay!

We especially enjoyed the view and the location!
The apartment is well equipped. It does not match the pictures exactly but it is very similar. Only the furniture is a little different (different couch, table and chairs).
The hosts are very responsive. We had an issue with a window and informed the hosts late in the evening. On the next day around noon the handyman already fixed it.
We had a lovely stay! Great views, clean, easy to check in and out and just perfect for our weekend stay!

Amazing location within walking distance of the Flames game and so many delicious restaurants. The hosts give clear and thorough instructions for your stay and complimentary parking! Would definitely stay again in future visits to Calgary!
Nice flat in a great location. All good.
Fabulous property in a great location. We would stay here every time we visit Calgary.
Great place to stay in Calgary!
Really great location, would book again!!
Great location and lovely unit.
Amazing location! Great place! Had the best time!
Kyle and Andrew are fantastic hosts. Proactive with all communication and check ins. The condo was lovely and had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again 🙂
The stay was great! Was exactly like the pictures and in a great location. Kyle was very quick to respond and checked in. I would stay again, I highly recommend.
Great Host !!! Very quick to respond... Good 1 Bedroom Den to stay in, Great Location, and Great hosts Andrew and Kyle !!!
Very walkable into the city centre. Beds were extremely comfortable and it was very quiet. Kitchen had everything needed to cook- there’s a Safeway not too far.
Tidy apartment, nice location
Amazing place! Kyle and Andrew were very helpful during the stay.
Very safe and secure condo. Beautiful views of the city.

This place is in a great location!! It is near good restaurants & bars so a bit noisy at night on the weekend with the bedroom window open. The beds were comfortable & the kitchen well stocked. Kyle gave prefect directions, provided easy access and was quick to respond to any questions.  The space was comfortable, good wifi, overall clean (floor carpets could use a cleaning) free parking spot is a bonus!  We would return.

The apartment is exactly as shown in the images. The location was great and very close to restaurants. There is a small indoor food market across the road along with a great Indian place on the other side. The apartment was stored well with essentials and communication was great. I appreciated the washer and dryer combo in the apartment as it came in handy.

Very clean place and it looks just like the photos. It felt like home and the area felt safe and cozy. If we had any inquiries Kyle and Andrew were quick to respond. I highly recommend staying here!
The only thing that would make it absolutely perfect is if there was a lockbox to drop off the key fobs for those driving so that they don’t have to go back into the building unit after they take the car out of the garage.

Nice unit in a great location within walking distance of many restaurants and attractions. Kyle’s instructions were very clear and he was very responsive, even proactive in asking how our stay was going and giving reminders about checkout.
What a beautiful stay. The view at night was gorgeous and would highly recommend. Hosts were accommodating and responded quickly to make sure we had access and were checked in.

Kyle was a great host! The place was awesome and in a great location to lots of great restaurants.  Plus, a Starbucks is literally right across the street.  We had an amazing time and would definitely return! Thanks!!

name: Condo in Calgary · ★4.72 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description: Welcome to your modern home-away-from-home, perfectly situated just minutes from downtown and steps from vibrant 17th Avenue and Mission. Including a fully equipped kitchen, laundry, underground parking, and a private balcony for those cozy eveningsYou’ll be within walking distance of top-rated restaurants, grocery stores, river pathways, fitness centres, and the Saddledome. Whether you’re in town for work or leisure, this centrally located gem puts the best of the city right at your doorstep.The spaceThis bright and modern apartment offers a welcoming blend of comfort and convenience. Featuring an open-concept layout, secure underground parking, a yoga mat, and light weights for your at-home workouts. Designed for both short and long stays, this space feels like home in the heart of the city.Registration DetailsBL264196
reviews: I loved my stay! The apartment was spotless, very comfortable, and exactly as described in the listing. The location is perfect close to everything.The host was incredibly responsive and thoughtful. I would definitely stay here again!

The location was excellent, with lots of great shopping and restaurants just a short walk away. The condo was very clean, and check-in was super easy. I would definitely stay again on a future trip to Calgary.

Great location & walkable to everything you need in town. We liked the apartment, everything was as shown in the photos.
There is air con but it’s extremely loud, so we couldn’t sleep with it on. Communication with the host could have been better but overall we enjoyed our stay.

The location was perfect. A lot of pubs and restaurants for food. It was a cute little condo perfect for 1 or 2 people for a weekend away. The a/c is two portable units, which could be a bit noisy to some, but we have a fan running all night at home anyways so it didn't bother us and  just gave us the white noise. Would definitely stay again.

Pros - good location, spacious, clean, well equipped, outside balcony is a bonus.
Cons - the bedroom is so bright we had to wear eye masks all night every night. It's the only window in the apartment without a blind, which doesn't make sense, and has a very thin white curtain which basically does nothing. Even at night, there's a bright lamp directly outside, so it's always bright. Frustrating when having a dark place to sleep is a pretty basic requirement of accomodation.
I also messaged, twice, for help or just advice on storing luggage before the flight and they just ignored my questions and instead just continued to send automated messages about checking out. Again, frustrating. Overall we would recommend despite this.

Stayed at Virginias during my stay in Calgary, first time comer so didn’t know the area too well before arrival- Virginia had recommendations to all her favourite places near by which help! Condo was clean and quiet! Definitely will be using Virginia’s Airbnb next time I’m in!
Virginias place was in an amazing location and very well kept and cleaned. All necessities were there like coffee, cups, shampoo, etc

Great location! Other reviews nicely capture the location / condition etc
Good value for money for sure
Great place to stay. Location had lots of places to eat nearby. The apartment itself was as described, very clean with lots of space for two people. Highly recommend!
Great stay at this place, it was nice and spacious and clean. We had a fun stay. Virginia was very accommodating and responsive to our inquiries too. 10/10
Great location for us and the time we spent at the MNP arena. Nice area with lots of restaurants.
Amazing stay. Host checks in with you throughout the stay to make sure everything is well and comfortable. I will definitely book again next time!

Great location! Lots to do nearby in terms of restaurants. Also a short walk to the river which was a lovely walk.
Fabulous to have a parking spot too!

Great location. Lots of walkable places. Cute place. Super responsive.
I would come back!
Love the mission neighborhood!  The apartment was a little warm, a tiny bit noisy and I would have loved some face cloths.   But aside from that I would definitely stay here again!
Lots to enjoy at this unbeatable location with parking! This quiet spacious condo has all the amenities and the 24/7 convenience, restaurants,  grocery are footsteps away. Balcony included!  😎

Was great to be back in Mission... only a couple blocks from where I lived my first 4 years in Calgary. The place was nicely decorated, with some personal flair. Great decorating. Have already recommended it to some friends.
Virginia was excellent and the place was beautiful. It was like home!
It is a spacious apartment, Virginia is a great, friendly and accommodating host!
She was very welcoming and would stay again.
Great location, clean suite I would recommend staying here
Fantastic spot and beautifully decorated. Very comfortable and Virginia was lovely and very helpful.

Very beautiful apartment within walking distance of many great restaurants and things to do.
The host provided clear instructions for check-in & out
I was in Calgary filming an event at the MNP Sport complex. An easy 15 minute walk. Convenience of location was great. It was just what I was looking for.

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.83 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description: Welcome to our charming 2-bedroom condo nestled in the heart of Calgary's vibrant Beltline neighborhood. With its transitional design and coastal colour palette, this inviting space offers a relaxing and stylish retreat for your stay in the city.The spaceWelcome to our charming 2-bedroom condo nestled in the heart of Calgary's vibrant Beltline neighborhood. With its transitional design and coastal color palette, this inviting space offers a relaxing and stylish retreat for your stay in the city.As you step inside, you'll immediately notice the thoughtfully curated interior that seamlessly combines the best of transitional design elements with a soothing coastal ambiance. The living area is adorned with comfortable furnishings and soft, neutral tones, creating an atmosphere of tranquility. Sink into the plush sofa or unwind in one of the cozy armchairs as you take in the natural light streaming through the large windows.The private patio offers a conversation area, complete with neighbourhood views.  You'll love soaking up the sun or enjoying it  with friends in this peaceful and private space.Whether you're in town for business or pleasure, our transitional-style condo with its coastal colour palette provides a serene and stylish oasis in the heart of Calgary's Beltline. Book your stay with us today and experience the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and contemporary design.Guest accessAs our guest you'll have access to the following amenities:•Private patio•Kitchen•2 Bedrooms•TV• High-speed internet•Washer & Dryer •Underground Parking•Professionally cleaned•Hosts that are available 24/7, should you have any questions.*** Always refer to the amenities section of the listing for the most up-to-date list of amenities ***Other things to noteThe FIREPLACE is not operational and cannot be usedRegistration DetailsBL270645
reviews:
Great apartment and location - personally like being near 4th and 17th for all the great restaurants and shops. Apartment exactly as shown. There were some issues with the master bathroom unexpectedly and the team was very responsive and offered a make good, which was much appreciated.
Would recommend.
I would highly recommend this place, the location is great, the apartment was very clean and super comfortable. The host is very helpful and responsive for any issues or concerns.

We were very comfortable at the location and it was close to the things we wanted to do. They were very responsive throughout the entire rental. The unit was spotless and had all the amenities to make our stay feel like home.

Great stay in a great location. Lots to do right out your door. Condo is spacious and comfortable, king bed very comfy other bed was ok. Clean and comfortable and good price point.
Thank you for the great stay

This was a pleasant and secure place to stay as a group of four! The location was central and allowed us to explore the city, and the apartment was comfortable, with well-lit rooms (a big plus for doing hair and makeup)!

Beth was really kind and accommodating. We arrived later than the check-in time, but she graciously stayed up to let us in. The building’s buzzer wasn’t working properly (a neighbor mentioned it had been having issues), but that was not Beth’s fault and the clear instructions she provided made things easy once we got inside.
The Airbnb itself is wonderful—clean, uncluttered, and well-stocked with everything you might need. There is a top sheet and plenty of blankets in case it got chilly, which I appreciated. The bed and pillows are softer than I’m used to, but that comes down to personal preference.
Overall, it’s a quiet, peaceful, and centrally located place that’s very walkable and convenient. I’d definitely stay here again.

Perfect Airbnb for those wishing to be located close to great restaurants and central inner city Calgary exploring. Communication was clear and fast, checking in and out was simple and the apartment was exactly as pictured!
Would highly recommend!

Amazing location! Close to 4th street & 17th ave. Packed with patios and great restaurants. Close to a gas station, grocery store etc. Has a great private patio for summer nights. Just down the road from Stampede grounds as well! Thank you, Beth!

Had a good stay in Calgary. The condo proximity to first street market food hall and a kids playground was perfect! Everything was clean and worked great. Wonderful washer and dryer.
Our only issue, and this is likely moot other times of the year, was the heat inside the apartment. When we arrived before 5pm the blinds had been open all day and it was 80F inside. The following evening it improved after keeping everything closed but it still impacted our ability to sleep comfortably. Would rebook here outside of summer months!

Beth’s place was perfect for our week-long stay to visit our daughter in Calgary (her sister came too) as we were one street behind her building! Lots of great coffee shops, restaurants nearby and downtown is just a few blocks away. The apartment was spacious, clean and having two bathrooms was perfect. Tastefully decorated, we took advantage of the large balcony with the beautiful, unseasonably warm weather for May. Communication was prompt and friendly and we were able to have any questions answered. We would definitely stay at Beth’s place again. Thank you!
Super clean spacious unit! Super awesome experience.  Beth was super responsive and accommodating!
Beautiful condo, nicely decorated, great location. Easy walk to restaurants. Very responsive host to address any questions.
The place was beautiful. Awesome having underground parking. Lots of places to walk to nearby!
Lovely, comfortable apartment in a fantastic neighborhood in Calgary.  Many great restaurants, cocktail bars, and shops in easy walking distance.

Beth and her team did a great job in making us feel welcome. She was very responsive to any questions that I had and the condo was very quiet and clean. The condo unit has two large bedroom and two 4 piece washroom with an ensuite washer and dryer which was perfect. The unit was very clean and the bed were fantastic! The actual location was perfect as it was a ten to fifteen minute walk to the downtown shopping and food district. There was also a specialty grocery store about five minutes away and a large format Shoppers Drug Mart that carried a wide selection of groceries.
There was also an Enterprise Car Rental about 10 minutes away if you need to rent a car.
The driving is very easy in Calgary and it took about 90 minutes to get to Banff. I would also recommend going to Drumheller for the dinosaur museum.
I was impressed with Beth and her team and would stay there again.

Our stay was wonderful, very spacious and with all the amenities you require.
Easy instructions and a responsive host- would highly recommend.

Over all the place was very clean and spacious! Great location and building. Two reasons I had specifically reserved this place because of the beautiful fireplace and free parking. The fireplace did not work and my vehicle did not fit in the underground parking. Boat did apologize but also indicated that they didn’t put the fireplace place under the amenity list (just deceiving when you see the pictures). There also was no where to indicate the underground parking had limitations. With a roof rack I am under 7”. Luckily I could shuffle around and get free steer parking since it was the long weekend. If these two “miscommunications” with add did not occur my review would have been 5 stars.

We stayed here last week for 6 nights & the apartment is so incredible! It was super clean & tidy, fully equipped with everything you need! All the  air b&b  staff were super helpful & accommodating. The apartment building itself is very safe & peaceful. You will just feel right at home here! I deffo would return here on my next trip to Calgary! Can’t fault it at all.

Great Apartment in downtown Calgary. The apartment was exactly as described and comfortable for 2 couples. Easy walking distance to restaurants and bars.
Parking was really easy to find and was ample space for a Dodge Durango (just in case anyone is concerned about the parking space size. Overall a great apartment for our short stay.
The apartment was very nice, however the building had many faults. Broken elevator, plumbing issues. The host was very responsive and accommodating.
Great week spent at this cozy condo!  Terrific location and super responsive hosts.
Fantastic place to stay, very responsive and helpful host.  Would absolutely stay here again!
Great spot in a central location in Calgary! Very walkable to main bars/restaurants and AirBNB was exactly as pictured in the listing,
We had a fabulous time at the rental. Easy walk to great restaurants. Building was safe and quiet.

listing_title: Tranquil Coastal Colour Inspired 2Bdrm w Parking
listing_name: Entire rental unit in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Located in the trendy Beltline neighborhood, you'll find yourself surrounded by a plethora of dining, entertainment, and shopping options. Take a leisurely stroll to the nearby parks or explore the vibrant nightlife that the area has to offer. With convenient access to public transportation and major highways, you can easily explore all that Calgary has to offer, including its renowned attractions and cultural landmarks.

description_by_sections.value: Welcome to our charming 2-bedroom condo nestled in the heart of Calgary's vibrant Beltline neighborhood. With its transitional design and coastal colour palette, this inviting space offers a relaxing and stylish retreat for your stay in the city.

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: Welcome to our charming 2-bedroom condo nestled in the heart of Calgary's vibrant Beltline neighborhood. With its transitional design and coastal color palette, this inviting space offers a relaxing and stylish retreat for your stay in the city.As you step inside, you'll immediately notice the thoughtfully curated interior that seamlessly combines the best of transitional design elements with a soothing coastal ambiance. The living area is adorned with comfortable furnishings and soft, neutral tones, creating an atmosphere of tranquility. Sink into the plush sofa or unwind in one of the cozy armchairs as you take in the natural light streaming through the large windows.The private patio offers a conversation area, complete with neighbourhood views.  You'll love soaking up the sun or enjoying it  with friends in this peaceful and private space.Whether you're in town for business or pleasure, our transitional-style condo with its coastal colour palette provides a serene and stylish oasis in the heart of Calgary's Beltline. Book your stay with us today and experience the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and contemporary design.

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: As our guest you'll have access to the following amenities:•Private patio•Kitchen•2 Bedrooms•TV• High-speed internet•Washer & Dryer •Underground Parking•Professionally cleaned•Hosts that are available 24/7, should you have any questions.*** Always refer to the amenities section of the listing for the most up-to-date list of amenities ***

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: The FIREPLACE is not operational and cannot be used

host_details.name: Beth - Your Key Rental Management
host_details.response_time: They typically respond within an hour

name: Rental unit in Calgary · ★4.78 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description: Enjoy easy walking access to everything 17 Ave. has to offer: From unique coffee shops to first class restaurants and lots of entertainment, the choice is yours. Easy access to the downtown core and to the Stampede Park/Saddledome/BMO Convention Centre. Have an amazing stay and feel right at home in this fully equipped, comfortable 2-bedroom condo. Whether you are here for leisure, work from home, a night out in town or just to relax, this very well appointed apartment will work great for you.Registration DetailsBL279342
reviews:
Unfortunately for $300.00 a night, a stained mattress on the ground with hair in it and a dirty ikea futon is a horrendous deal. Looks like a single man’s apartment.
I would recommend the host upgrade the space or else decrease the price, I could have stayed in a very nice hotel for what I paid.
On the plus side the unit is spacious and the host was very professional.

Nice place…really enjoyed the balcony views…walkable to happening 17th Ave. and many restaurants, coffee shops and a grocery store.
Kitchen was nice.
Overall we enjoyed our stay here despite some minor inconveniences.

This very nice apartment is in a fabulous neighborhood. It’s safe and about a five minute walk from lots of restaurants, cafes, etc. The hostess, Margarita, is professional, prompt and friendly. Highly recommend.

Location and value are tremendous! Host Margarita met me upon arrival, showed me around the building -- including the beautiful views from the rooftop -- and followed up the next day with cafe recommendations for remote working. Consummate host, who checked in a few times during my 16-day stay, which I extended an extra week due to loving the area. Pics are accurate, top floor means quieter, neighborhood has 2 grocery stores two blocks away, and 17th Ave is less than a five minute walk to restaurants and shops galore. I walked to downtown as well as to the Saddledome to catch a Flames preseason game. Super walkable and easy to get around. I also rented a car for a few days and it was nice to have access to the parking garage in the building. I really enjoyed my stay in Calgary, and Margarita and her apartment were part of the reason. I would stay there again and highly recommend!

Everything in general was well made and clear.
The retrieval of the keys was simple and very clear, and we easily got into the room.
The place was very nice like the pictures. The rooms and beds did not have any smell. There were many utensils, plates, kitchenware, and toilet ware available. The water pressure is very good, and the host was very accessible and responsive.
The location of the place is very accessible to many different eateries, convenience stores, grocery stores and gas station.
One of the only problems we had was that the elevator didn't work 2 times as the lift door did not open on the 'PH' level. We had to go up the stairs and ask someone from our room to open the door of the stairs into the 'PH' level for us (as it was locked). If not, we would not have been able to get back into our unit.
All in all, it was a very good stay and would stay there again. Thanks for hosting us!

This was our first stay at an AirBnB & we were lucky to have stayed at Margarita 's place. our interactions with her while we were deciding were helpful, she kept a check on us during our arrival and ensured the checkin was smooth & she met us, explained & answered all our queries. The place has everything you need & if you miss anything just ask Margarita. The building is well kept, no noise and peaceful. Overall the location is perfect, close to shopping marts & best of resturants & coffeeshops. we had a wonderful stay and felt at home. and yes, special shoutout to Margarita's partner Jose & family for the beautiful fruit basket for my family.
if you are looking for a home away from home, this is the place.

We had a nice stay. The appartment was very comfortable, well equipped and with a good wifi connection (we were able to work without issues). All kind the stores/restaurants nearby. As mentionned in other reviews, Margarita was indeed a great host, always ready to help and make our stay even better. We would definitely come back!

Would recommend! I stayed for six nights, and was quite happy. Host was quick to respond and reached out to check in and make sure I was happy. Location was excellent, with 17th Ave a short distance away as well as a grocery store and drugstore if needed. Space was clean and well kept, and the shower pressure was excellent (a major point for me).
Given the location and length of my stay, I was happy with the price point in comparison to other options in the same area.
Only thing I will note is that if you are highly sensitive to sound from outside that it would be best to stay in the bedroom that does not have the AC unit. Earplugs would help with this, however. It was not enough of a concern for me, but worth mentioning. There was construction happening on the weekdays I was there, but given the location that is not unusual.
Great value for location. Walkable to restaurants along 17th and close to the stampede grounds. Large space that works for a bigger group.

It’s a great, clean place to start exploring bustling SW Calgary. We had trouble getting into the parking garage but it was an issue outside of the owner’s control. Plus, parking is free and abundant on weekends.

Margarita, was a great host. We got in early and stayed an extra day. WiFi was top notch and a bonus we were able to bring our pet. Margarita was very responsive and I would highly recommend this listing.
it was a very nice  place to stay, nothing much to complain about

I really liked the apartment. Good location and in a quiet neighborhood not far from the city center and with quick access to the supermarket, market with bus stops and train stations. The apartment was perfect for me and my family. I really liked it. Margarita was always receptive and accessible and always responded to our messages and gave solutions to all our requests. I highly recommend his apartment to anyone who wants good accommodation and a welcoming host in Calgary
Great stay and amazing host always response fast, very helpful and extremely flexible!
Great value and great location!

Our stay at this Airbnb in Calgary was fantastic! The host was incredibly welcoming and made sure everything was perfect for our arrival. The home was spotless, well-furnished, and had all the amenities we needed. The location was also great—close to local attractions and in a quiet neighborhood. My wife and son had a comfortable and enjoyable experience throughout their stay. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a hassle-free and cozy stay in Calgary. Thank you Margarita

we loved staying at Margaritas lovely condo. Located right in the heart of downtown this is a fantastic location just a few blocks from Lively 17 Ave. The building is very quiet and well maintained. The unit was spotless, kudos to the cleaning staff, it is apparent she uses professional cleaners on her team. The unit was spacious for our group of three and medium size dog. Everything was 5 stars, we had the perfect stray. Margarita goes above what most hosts do and is extremely welcoming, helpful and accommodating. Thanks for having us!

Great apartment in an excellent quarter, especially with kids, to enjoy the city life. We got some difficulty in figuring out the access to the garage, but Margarita was very responsive to help us get in the apartment before she could come to give us an alternative key to the garage. She's also promptly replaced the broken microwave and provided a new kettle which made our life with kids much easier. The apartment has everything you need for a short or long stay in the city. Highly recommended!

My friends and I LOVED this space. Margarita was so awesome and very accommodating when we had to push back our check in time! Also- the water pressure in shower was incredible and we loved the central location.

Really nice spot, great location and the host was quick and helpful with any questions or concerns.
Gym in building was pretty terrific as well.
Lots of great places for coffee, food and drinks within a few steps.
Would 100% stay again.

Margarita’s home was beautiful. Easily slept a group of 6, and had plenty of space. It was in a great location and walkable to 17th avenue and even to Stampede. I must also note that the shower pressure was amazing!!

We stayed at Margarita’s place for 13 days, the location was perfect. It was walking distance to groceries, banks, bus stop, c-train and everything you would need. It is also close to parks which made staying with a pet very convenient. The place was exactly as described and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. It had complete amenities for cooking, had a work desk and fast internet. The place was immaculately clean when we arrived. The roof top lounge was a good area to wind down for the day. And most of all, Margarita was very friendly, easy to speak to and was very proactive in checking in on us. I really appreciate the stay and it made us feel welcome and comfortable in a new country. Thank you Margarita!

We like the place! We truly enjoyed our stay. It has 2 rooms, the other room was really small for the other couple, and the other room is perfect for us though. But the overall place is awesome plus it’s a pet friendly. Rooftop is a nice area to chill after a long day. It would also be perfect if they have a pool at the rooftop, my friends expected to have a pool cause they thought they have pool . Still it’s worth of what we paid for. Plus the host is really responsive and accommodating. We recommend this place who would love to explore Calgary, it’s close to so many nice spots within downtown.

The best host in Calgary hands down!
And the condo itself a true gem. I will definitely be booking her place and with her again and again and again!

The home was spotless, well-furnished, and had all the amenities we needed. The location was also great—close to local attractions and in a quiet neighborhood. My wife and son had a comfortable and enjoyable experience throughout their stay. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a hassle-free and cozy stay in Calgary. Thank you Margarita

we loved staying at Margaritas lovely condo. Located right in the heart of downtown this is a fantastic location just a few blocks from Lively 17 Ave. The building is very quiet and well maintained. The unit was spotless, kudos to the cleaning staff, it is apparent she uses professional cleaners on her team. The unit was spacious for our group of three and medium size dog. Everything was 5 stars, we had the perfect stray. Margarita goes above what most hosts do and is extremely welcoming, helpful and accommodating. Thanks for having us!

Great apartment in an excellent quarter, especially with kids, to enjoy the city life. We got some difficulty in figuring out the access to the garage, but Margarita was very responsive to help us get in the apartment before she could come to give us an alternative key to the garage. She's also promptly replaced the broken microwave and provided a new kettle which made our life with kids much easier. The apartment has everything you need for a short or long stay in the city. Highly recommended!

My friends and I LOVED this space. Margarita was so awesome and very accommodating when we had to push back our check in time! Also- the water pressure in shower was incredible and we loved the central location.

Really nice spot, great location and the host was quick and helpful with any questions or concerns.
Gym in building was pretty terrific as well.
Lots of great places for coffee, food and drinks within a few steps.
Would 100% stay again.

Margarita’s home was beautiful. Easily slept a group of 6, and had plenty of space. It was in a great location and walkable to 17th avenue and even to Stampede. I must also note that the shower pressure was amazing!!

We stayed at Margarita’s place for 13 days, the location was perfect. It was walking distance to groceries, banks, bus stop, c-train and everything you would need. It is also close to parks which made staying with a pet very convenient. The place was exactly as described and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. It had complete amenities for cooking, had a work desk and fast internet. The place was immaculately clean when we arrived. The roof top lounge was a good area to wind down for the day. And most of all, Margarita was very friendly, easy to speak to and was very proactive in checking in on us. I really appreciate the stay and it made us feel welcome and comfortable in a new country. Thank you Margarita!

We like the place! We truly enjoyed our stay. It has 2 rooms, the other room was really small for the other couple, and the other room is perfect for us though. But the overall place is awesome plus it’s a pet friendly. Rooftop is a nice area to chill after a long day. It would also be perfect if they have a pool at the rooftop, my friends expected to have a pool cause they thought they have pool . Still it’s worth of what we paid for. Plus the host is really responsive and accommodating. We recommend this place who would love to explore Calgary, it’s close to so many nice spots within downtown.

The best host in Calgary hands down!
And the condo itself a true gem. I will definitely be booking her place and with her again and again and again!
